comments: Daniel was an exeptional host!! We only had a short stay in Amsterdam but Daniel was extremely helpful as he had all the local transport timetables mapped out and ready for us to use. His place was very clean and comfortable. Daniel was incredibly accommodating on our last day in Amsterdam. Our flight wasn't till the evening and he was kind enough to let us leave our luggage for the day and return to pick them up before our flight. TOTALLY, TOTALLY, TOTALLY recommend Daniel's place next time you visit Amsterdam.
Great place, quiet and close to everything
Wonderful place, walking distance to the Central Station. Joanna was a wonderful host and this is indeed a beautiful apartment!
Habitación muy agradable y confortable situada en un lugar muy céntrico. Ideal si te gusta la vida nocturna.
The location is very good ! And Edwin is a very nice person . Helped a lot !!! Hope come back again
edwin是一个非常幽默的人，同时他也很热情，很周到。提供的房间不大，但是很温馨，很好，非常喜欢

We stayed at Joanna and MP's for a long weekend to celebrate my birthday and it was a brilliant weekend. I have been to Amsterdam many times and so can say quite honestly this is a fabulous, clean, well decorated and spacious apartment with everything you should possibly need in a great area for shopping, eating and drinking. The flat is also extremely close to the train station and so very easy to get to by foot.
Joanna was very welcoming and kindly allowed us a flexible check in and we were allowed to leave our bags when we checked out to collect later on in the day. Joanna is also full of ideas of places to go should you need any direction - especially places to eat!
Amsterdam is a wonderful city and staying here only enhances a wonderful experience, I would definitely recommend staying here - just be warned yes the stairs are steep but are definitely manageable just be careful with your luggage and you shouldn't have any problems at all.
Thanks Joanna we will definitely be back - the only problem will be finding a time they aren't booked up!

We had a wonderful stay - the location and apartment were so cool.  So many great restaurants within walking distance and a bike rental just down the street.  Very easy communication and check where we received great recommendations (loved the recommended cafe for apple pie).   Kitchen had everything we needed to cook when we wanted to eat in.  The apartment was very roomy and comfortable for everyone in the family.  Thank you for a great stay!
Edwin fue muy amable. La limpieza del lugar para destacar.
The apartment is a gem! The location is ideal and the space is well cared for and comfortable. Joanna is a wonderfully helpful and responsive host.  We definitely hope to return!

The apartment was beautiful and the location perfect for visiting all of the local attractions in Amsterdam. We arrived ahead of  schedule and Joanna kindly let us check in earlier. The info and tips about restaurants, cafes and boat trips was really helpful. Nothing felt too much even down to helping us with our very heavy suitcases when we left the apartment!  We would definitely stay here again. Thanks, Louise, Chris and Izzy.

Joanna & MP were the most amazing hosts! Their property is ever more beautiful in-person. If you are traveling to Amsterdam with toddlers or infants - Joanna takes extra special care to have all the accessories and toys ready for you. It was just a surreal experience and it is quite clear why they are super host with one the most highly reviewed properties in Amsterdam. We hope to stay with them again one day.
Edwin is a very friendly host that was very clean and easy to access all types of event around his place. Great place, clean  room and restrooms
Great location, great host, the street can be a little loud at night, but no problem if you bring good earplugs. I had no issues.
Es una acomodacion estratégica muy cerca de todo!
Central but noisy.
El mejor nocarz en el que he estado, la mejor zona, los mejores host, el más bonito! Casi no salimos a recorrer Ámsterdam por lo bonito que estaba!

Daan was a great host and even though we were late in arriving he took time to explain everything and give lots of advise. The apartment is amazing and has all you need and more. Convenient to get to the centre of Amsterdam as the tram system is only a few minutes walk. Would reckoned to anyone visiting.
Wir haben unseren zweiten Aufenthalt in diesem zentralgelegenen nocarz sehr genossen
Very nice accomodation close to everything

The location is unbeatable!  Amsterdam is a great city for walking and this location makes it even easier.  We walked most of the time during our 4-night stay as most sights/restaurants were within 10-15 minute walk away.  The apartment itself is as shown in the pictures - well appointed and clean.  Hot shower was very nice, good water pressure.  The stairs were a bit narrow but we were fine.  Also as mentioned by other travellers, Raymond brought breakfast every morning - a really nice touch!  Coffee and tea were in room also.

Everything was ok.
When We arrived Raymond wasn't at home but he left the keys in the bar next to the b&b.
The appartment is really nice. You have a nespresso so u can have a hot drink anymoment.
It's really near for the principal atractions.
The breakfast was amazing!
Highly recomended!
Hope to come again
非常好！！！离火车站不远的坐22路公交车可以直达！而且房子超级干净 Daniel人也很棒 我们去羊角村一天他会让我们把行李放在家里寄存一天！ 很安全 有报警器。 总之 去阿姆斯特丹就住这吧

My husband and I had a really lovely stay at Johan's apartment. It looks just like in the photos. Both Johan and his assistant Erica was very nice, warm and welcoming. One more nice thing about this place is the neighborhood it's in. There are plenty nice cafes, restaurant, bars and boutiques a few minutes walk away from the apartment. I would definitely stay here again when I'm back in Amsterdam.

Location-location-location !!! It is absolutely great . At the heart of the “9 streets” district ( shopping and restaurants) walking distance from trams, downtown, Frank House , canals, cafes, Spui area) etc.
Raymond was a great host and very accommodating. Would stay there again !

Le séjour chez Raymond s’est très bien déroulé, idéalement situé et à proximité à pieds de tous les lieux d’intérêts d’Amsterdam.
Grand lit, mou, une grande douche, des rideaux occultants, un ventilateur, wc séparés. Appartement très sympa et avec une vue sur une jolie rue

Johan was a delightful host, always helpful and friendly. His apartment is lovely and clean, well positioned and equipped with a fridge and coffee machine. It was lovely to stay there and we would highly recommend it.

We were welcomed very warmly by Johan and really enjoyed staying in this studio apartment last year, to the point that we returned again! It is spotlessly clean and well located close to the museums, Dam square and central station. It is a few moments walk to the canals and there are numerous shops and restaurants in the surrounding streets, as well as the adjacent trams. Johan is a very helpful and interesting host, who will ensure that everything is just right. You will not be disappointed!
非常友好，房屋舒適，用具也齊全，非常推薦：）
Stunning apartment, brilliant location (we eat locally each night of our 4 day stay) and our host could not have been more accommodating. We'll be back.

Beautiful apartment, great location.  We had a short visit with our 2-year old son and Cornelie's apartment was wonderful for him and at the same time a lovely place for us to enjoy.  Cornelie was very welcoming and we felt at home right away.  Perfect nocarz experience, highly recommended.

Super Accueil avec boissons et attentions pour l'arrivée. Description de l'appartement tout à fait correspondante. Quartier bien situé et connections avec le centre par les transports en commun tout à fait faciles. Calme la soirée et ambiance sécurisante. Bref, un super endroit pour découvrir la ville. Seul (petit) bémol: l'isolation thermique est celle d'un vieil appartement de charme et les nuits sont fraîches au printemps.
Great apartment in a superb location.

daniel was a really welcoming and friendly host, and his place was really clean and comfortable to stay in. he had good recommendations for food and things to do in amsterdam, definitely would recommend staying at his place!

I totally fell in love with the host and his place! It was really nice and cozy and i love the breakfast spread that Riks prepared every morning. The bed and pillow hugs you so comfortably that I find myself dreading to get out of it! haha.. The location was superb! words can't describe it. All i can say is, its walking distance from EVERYTHING YOU WANT AND NEED! Plus, the host is hot so thats a plus if you stay here! hahaha.. Riks really made our stay a pleasurable one. I highly recommend anyone who's travelling to Amsterdam to check this place out!
The place was a great location. Riks was a great source of information.  Will definitely go back.

My stay at Riks’s place was outstanding. It’s in a perfect location and I walked everywhere. I was able to get in early which was a huge bonus! Thank you Riks for making my first trip to Amsterdam so memorable.

Michiel is a nice person.
Everything was clear; amazing location.
Definitely I will come back soon.

Wij hebben een geweldige tijd gehad op de woonboot van Flip. Bij aankomst lagen er fortune  cookies op de kussens van het bed en op dat moment waren we verkocht. Heerlijke plek alles lekker schoon en fris en fantastisch centraal gelegen. 's Morgens werd er een heerlijk ontbijt geserveerd die met liefde gemaakt was. We mochten ook nog eens gebruik maken van de fietsen. Fietsend door Amsterdam was een fantastische beleving. Bedankt voor het delen van deze bijzondere plek en wij kijken ernaar uit om in de toekomst een keer terug te komen.. Groetjes, Guanita & Marcel
Fantastic stay on Michiels house boat! Thanks a lot!
We had a great stay! Very responsive host and charming location.

Gianni was absolutely amazing! He provided us with delicious Italian style coffee every morning and even made us an awesome cake! The apartment was beautiful and very easily accessible. We were completely blown away by Gianni's hospitality and how comfortable he made us in his home.

My girlfriend and I had a terrific stay at our host im Amsterdam.

He showed us the apartment at our arrival, explained us many details, and brought our heavy luggage over the small stairs to the top of the building with a beautiful view over Amsterdam. He even gave us his mobile phone number for emergency cases.

The attic is in a very typical Amsterdam style. It is situated in a great location, with a bright and big bathroom with a nice jacuzzi, separated living and sleeping rooms, a very friendly host who even cared about towels, soap and shower gel for our stay. The apartment might be a problem for taller people but for me with 186cm it was no problem at all.

The neighborhood is normally really silent. Only in the first night there seemed to be a little party near the house. There are excellent places nearby for a good breakfast (e.g. B&B Lunch, Laatste Kruimel, De Bakkerswinkel). The apartment offers wireless LAN wich is really useful and even a TV set which was excellent to watch a few soccer games.

To put it in a nutshell. If you are searching for a good apartment in a typical style in a great location with an excellent host, then we can fully recommend this location. It is not cheap but offers great value for the price. Keep up the good work!

Gianni was very accommodating and discreet and the house was impressively clean. The house is 35 to 40 minutes away from Amsterdam Centraal by tram. The only thing was that we didn't realise there was another room that was rented inside the house and we were afraid that it would be crowded, but there was no problem at all in the end, it was like we were alone. He accepted also to keep our luggage after the check in, in order to help us because we would leave from Amsterdam later at night. It was a pleasant experience for us. Thanks Gianni for your hospitality.
Henry was a gracious host. The room was super clean, quiet, he even supplied soap shampoo and a mini bar. It was in a centrally located part of Amsterdam with everything in walking distance.

Good location, but also very very quiet. Great to have bikes ready for us. Three ovens makes it hot even in wintertime. Great breakfast. 2x bathrobes makes it seem like a spa. Should bring own slippers. Flip is an interesting guy, good conversationalist, even heard him practice singing with his family which was nice.

Es war eine absolut toller Aufenthalt und eine wunderbare Zeit in Amsterdam.
Wir haben uns auf dem Hausboot rundum wohlgefühlt. Besonders zu loben ist auch das Frühstück, dass jeden Tag liebevoll vorbereitet und von Flip gebracht wird. Vielen Dank für alles! Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder!

Our Family really enjoyed staying at the Sonnenberg, a historic home in the Herengracht area, which is close to wonderful canals, shopping and eating options.  The place was clean and centrally located.  The stairs could be a challenge for some, but bedding, toilets and amenities were great - we thoroughly embraced the entire experience! Thank Wytse!
A charming and perfect spot to stay! Wonderfully helpful and friendly hosts, great location, clean and cozy, with the most fantastic view.

Brilliant quirky place to stay . Walking distance to main Center and location was amazing . Host Flip was helpful and he brought a fantastic breakfast every morning . Would definitely go back and recommend
Très bon accueil, pleins de petites attentions, bien situé et près de tous les services et lignes de transport. Je recommande chaudement!

Heerlijke studio om ff in Amsterdam te zijn.
Er is vers fruit, blikjes in de ijskast en rode en witte wijn. Heel attent. Kim sprak ook vloeiend Frans wat handig voor mijn medereiziger was.

I had an amazing stay, and the hosts were truly exceptional. Not only was the accommodation comfortable and well-maintained, but their kindness and hospitality stood out the most. I had an early morning checkout and accidentally left my phone inside the unit just before locking up. Despite the early hour, they were incredibly understanding and woke up at 6 AM to assist me without any hesitation. Their generosity and patience in that moment meant so much to me. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a thoughtful and accommodating host!
Very nice! Everything was perfect.

Communicatie vooraf verliep geweldig. Bij aankomst hadden we het idee dat we bij vrienden op bezoek gingen zo warm werden we onthaald. We konden de auto zo op de oprit parkeren wat natuurlijk erg fijn is. De ruimte is keurig netjes en leuk aangekleed. Het bed is echt heerlijk. Restaurants en kroegjes om de hoek. Al met al een hele fijne ervaring en zeker voor herhaling vatbaar. Ik kan het zeker aanbevelen.

Pros: Great location, 10 minute walk from Centraal Station, self made breakfast food included and awesome view of the canal from the kitchen. Cons: very small bedroom with no storage for luggage. I would suggest staying here if you value location over the size of the room.

Rik's place sits in a dream location, with a beautiful shared kitchen in the mornings, stylish rooms with fantastic views, and all right in the heart of all the action, and yet, still it has the wonderful feeling of a cozy and quiet residential setting. It's the best of all worlds, and add to that a kind hospitable host. Looking forward to next time, Riks, genuine thanks for sharing your space.

This was our first experience using nocarz and it has been very successful. Kamiel's apartment is really nice and well locate and he is a very good host. We went with our little child who needed a cradle and Kamiel looked for one quickly. He also offered us very useful information about trams, supermarkets .... In addition, Kamiel took care of us during our stay.
Thank yoy for everything, Kamiel!
Literally 3 minute's walk to RAI, great for people who are attending or holding the exhibition.
Edwin is a really nice host. I recommed to stay in here to everyone. Location is really close to everwhere.

My husband and I have had a nice time in Asterdam.Martin was a great host and gave us a warm welcome with fruits, cake and wine. He also let us know all things we have to know about Amsterdam.
Martins charming studio is very nice with the really beautiful terrace.
We only had to walk 5-10 minutes to the Vondelpark. and by bike we were in the center in 15-20 minutes.
So it is a great place to have a look to Amsterdam.

Yahav and Deidre's place conveniently located away from the craziness of Amsterdam Central. It was only a short 15 minutes away by tram so it felt like good conclusion to the night when you return.

Deidre was very nice in getting us set up and giving us directions to places to visit. The neighborhood was nice and quiet too, for the most part (you can hear the neighbors moving about on the top floor).

The only complaints I have is that the room is a tad tight so it just fit my girlfriend and I with our luggage. However, it was clean and comfortable so we didn't mind too much. Deidre also helped us get set up with some transit cards and that helped save a couple of Euros too in traveling costs.
Very nice hosts, clean environment (kind of small), easy access to public transportation, and convenient to local attractions. I would stay there again
Edwin hat sich sehr gut um alles gekümmert. Danke!

Les informations transmises par Yahav avant l'arrivée étaient très claires et nous avons pu trouver l'appartement facilement. Nous y avons été bien accueillis par Deirdre qui nous a aussi transmis les clefs des vélos. Un petit livret conçu par Yahav et regroupant plein d'informations sur Amsterdam nous a aussi bien guidé dans nos choix de visite. Très bon séjour ;-)

We had the most wonderful stay at this sweet apartment! The hosts were some of the most gracious and most hospitable hosts we've been lucky enough to encounter  - so patient and helpful! The apartment is in a great neighborhood - very easily walkable to any part of Amsterdam you'd like to see, and just a block from the tram.
Very nice house! Would definitely recommend it, especially for a family with kids.
The location is near the city centre by public transport (20 min. approx). Quiet place in a great neighbourhood. The only bad thing to comment was the blankets were wet.

We really enjoyed out stay!  The flat is beautiful and our children loved playing with the toys and looking after the cats.  Amazing views from balcony, we felt very at home and welcome there. Would recommend and hope to return again in the future.

Our stay was fantastic!  The room was just as described, perhaps even better than the photos depict.  Very modern bathroom was quite nice, and the view of the canal was spectacular.  David was very hospitable, informative and responsive, and left us breakfast in a basket that we enjoyed in the room prior to going out exploring each day.  He has a great selection of maps, tour info and books on Amsterdam that we made use of.  The bed was super comfortable and the room was very clean and welcoming upon our arrival.  We can't wait to go back someday.
Great place! We had everything we needed and it was incredibly comfortable and quiet. Couldn't have asked for anything more!
David's place was excellent with all the privacy needed as well as comfortable, and a great view of the river and proximity to restaurants and other great locations.
Die beste Unterkunft die man sich in Amsterdam vorstellen kann!

This place is amazing !!!! Very close to the central station and in the heart of Amsterdam. You can walk to everywhere. The view to the canal from the window has not price. David was very helpful and the communication was very good. I will come back for sure !!!!

We enjoyed our stay, and our hosts were very helpful and friendly. The kitchen was very well stocked. A comfortable apartment, and very quiet at night. The taxi from central station was 11 euro. Lots of bars and restaurants about 10 minute walk, and also a similar distance to Anne Frank house.
The room was nice and clean it is in the center very close to all main attractions and to the Central station so it is very comfortable. David was very nice and welcome. Great place to stay!
David and his partner were quite welcoming, and the room was just as described. The location is superb and the accommodations were exactly what we were looking for!

O apartamento de Madelinde é ótimo! Confortável, limpo, bem localizado.
A Madelinde é ótima anfritriã, nos atendeu muito bem quando chegamos.
Fácil acesso por transporte público, é também muito bom para ir a pé aos pontos turísticos.
Se voltar a Amsterda, ficarei novamente nesse lugar.

Comodo, pulito, tranquillo, semplice.
Ospite gentilissima e discreta.
Vicinissimo al centro.

I was a solo traveler who needed a comfortable and very safe base to explore Amsterdam.  The Apartment provided exactly what I was looking for, within easy reach of all the main attractions and it is exceptionally well equipped, with lots of extra touches to make the stay comfortable.  My only regret was that there is no easy chair to sit and read in.   I was relieved that my late husband wasn't with me, as I am certain the tiny bathroom would have been too snug for him and there are incredibly steep stairs to negotiate.  However this is probably difficult to avoid in Amsterdam!  As a light sleeper, I had noted other reviews which referenced the thin curtains and the inevitable and occasional noise from neighbours, so I took both my ear plugs and sleep mask.  The mask I definitely needed, but the ear plugs possibly not!  Lastly,  I didn't meet Madelinde, but I did meet her very hospitable husband and charming cleaner, so thanks due to all :)
Perfect location in the center of Amsterdam! Would go there anytime again!

My girlfriend and I loved our stay with Matthijs and Francina. The air bnb is extremely close to any shops, pubs, eats and sites. They performed above and beyond for hosts and it made our stay in Amsterdam all the better. Would highly recommend!

Matthijs,was great on all things. The only thing was one day he said we had left the bathroom dirty, I had , and have no idea, unless we weren't suppose to leave our wet towel hung up in the bathroom. We put them on the heating rack, but it might not have been the way they do things.

Siamo stati ospiti di Ton 4 notti. La camera è come viene descritta, ampia, luminosa, confortevole. Era a disposizione anche una stufa a gas nella eventualità che il tempo diventasse sempre più umido per la pioggia. Così non è stato per cui non l'abbiamo usata. Il bagno ampio e pulito. A parte l'iniziale impatto con le scale ripide, tipico di queste case della "vecchia" Amsterdam a cui ci siamo rapidamente abituati. La casa é non lontana dal centro, circa 45' da piazza Dam a piedi, è comodissima con il Metro, 5'-10'
Ottima l'ospitalità di Ton che fa di tutto per metterti a tuo agio. Le sue indicazioni per tram, bar o ristoranti, e anche per dove stampare la carta d'imbarco sono state buone e precise. Il quartiere fuori dalla folla dei turisti è carino, piacevole e dà una idea della vera Amsterdam con il fiume e il correre delle biciclette. Grazie Ton
André est très sympathique avec de belles petites attentions, chambre irréprochable. Un seul petit bémol, un peu trop excentré du centre ville.

I wish I could give more than 5 stars! Andre is an amazing host and a great communicator. So hospitable and friendly. The space is also so beautiful and convenient to get to the city center. Made our first visit to Amsterdam a perfect one!
Matthijs was a great host and very welcoming and accommodating. I highly recommend this place for staying in Amsterdam. He was very helpful and knowledgable.

Simone ci ha accolto con calore e simpatia, nonché con una bottiglia ottimo vino! Abbiamo cenato insieme all'arrivo ed è stato  piacevole chiaccherare con lei! Nella stanza,corredata di tutto l'indispensabile abbiamo trovato dolcetti e frutta ad aspettarci! Il frigo conteneva cibo in quantità per un ottima colazione! Abbiamo apprezzato tutto ciò e torneremo sicuramente. Grazie ancora Simone!
Le logement était super à 15 minutes à pied du métro. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans un endroit calme et paisible. Merci encore !

Anjo and Mirre were great and the apartment was comfortable and in a very central location. The apartment is right on the street with the main red light district - so that could be a plus or minus depending on who you are. The internet wasn't working while we were there, so you may want to check first to see if that is fixed first if you really need it. Other than the internet, everything went great!
Muy buena ubicación, excelente desayuno con vista a un canal. Todo impecable.  Volvería sin dudarlo y altamente recomendable

Clean, lovely and central stay for everyone.
A great host, great breakfast. We will come again.
AWESOME location! Check-in was easy. Would recommend this stay to anyone eager to check out Amsterdam!

Matthijs' place was in a perfect location to explore this beautiful city, easy walking distance to everything we wanted to see and do. The room is small but comfortable, very attractive, well designed, had everything we needed and was very clean. Matthijs was the perfect host, very responsive, friendly and so helpful - he gave us great tips about where to eat and drink and gave us both a map and a lovely little booklet which he has produced giving suggestions of restaurants, bars, cafes, etc. We loved the short walk along the canal to our great included Dutch-style breakfast in a pretty cafe. We would definitely stay here again!

Lovely property in a classic Amsterdam-style building and although in a quiet street just a few yards from a canal and only a two minute walk from the bustling Dam Square. Matthijs was a very pleasant, communicative host and has even produced his own informative booklet on Amsterdam, its history, culture, transport and amenities

We spent 2 nights at Mathijs' place, and we absolutely loved it. The location is unbeatable. You can walk anywhere from there. Mathijs is an excellent host and gave us awesome recommendations. I will come back and recommend it anytime.

La estadía en este alojamiento fue tan particular como placentero!!
Wendie te hace sentir como en tu casa, te brinda todo lo necesario para que puedas comenzar tu estadía de la mejor manera, te aconseja sobre los planes que tengas en mente... y todo en un ambiente muy cálido y confortable.
El baño es muy cómodo y tiene la ventaja de contar con un lavarropas !! a nosotros nos ayudó mucho. El balcón también es muy lindo!
La ubicación del dpto. es excelente... así que no saques tickets para el transporte publico ya que no los vas a necesitar... llegas caminando a todos lados.
Muy recomendable !!!

Un posto speciale. La barca e' confortevole, calda, bellissima. In una posizione perfetta: a due passi c'e' la fermata del tram che porta ovunque in 5 minuti. Dick e il suo team sono stati disponibilissimi e carinissimi. Andateci e' un posto molto romantico!

I had a great time on Dicks house boat.
It was a very unique experience.
The boat was clean and tidy. Very cosy and comfortable.
The location is amazing with the tram and bus line right outside.
The boat is amazing, the host is great and the city is lovely.
I would definitely recommend staying here.

Had a lovely stay on Dick's boat in Amsterdam. It was right next to a tram stop which made it easy to get around. Dick is a very welcoming host, gave lots of useful tips about the boat and the area. I would recommend this listing however I think it would be better to stay during warmer months as it did get cold at times, although Dick did warn us about this before arrival.

Nice two-floor apartment in Central Amsterdam. We spent here a rainy week in September. The heating worked well that was essential for us. The flat was clean and the pictures reflect its atmosphere, actually this was the reason for us to select this place.
Hot water is sometimes gone during shower, to be solved or repaired. Otherwise no problem at all.

Very nice Sailing Ship! The Ship looks exactly like on the photos. Jorn answered always very quick and the skipper was very friendly. Only the rear of the ship is a bit too cold in the winter because there is only heating in the front of the ship.

We had a nice time on the ship and would take it again!

Le logement de Hans et Wendie est très bien situé, dans une rue très commerçante mais au calme. La chambre, avec son petit balcon est très agréable. Comme la plupart des logements à Amsterdam, les escaliers sont étroits et raides... évitez les grosses valises!
Merci à Wendie pour son accueil et sa réactivité. Merci également pour les chocolats de Pâques, c’était une jolie attention!

The location of this apartment is amazing, right in the middle of Amsterdam, you can go anywhere important by foot in less than 30m. Lots of restaurants around. Hans was great, he waited us with snacks and spend a good amount of time giving us really valuable local tips.
The apartment is small and has a wierd architectural choice (you enter straight into the bathroom) but the location and the fact that is completely powered by green energy really outweighs that.
Definitely a strong reccomadation, 10/10
Wendy is a very really nice host. She led us into the dutch traditions with many tips for our trip. Really suggested!

Very short but enough to appreciate Matthijs welcoming place. It's clean, perfectly located as close to Amsterdam hits and located in a quiet street as well.
And the breakfast is really cool. What else?
We really enjoyed staying in the apartment - it is well located with good facilities & tastefully decorated. Ester & Mark were very hospitable on our arrival

This apartment is perfect. It's located in the fabulous de Pijp neighborhood, and is extremely easy to reach.   My husband and I went to the street market everyday.  We were very grateful for the drinks and snacks that Ester provided, as well as the extremely friendly reception. It was rainy while we were there, but I imagine the back patio to also be a great time during warmer times. I'd recommend this place to anyone, and we will certainly stay here if we find ourselves in Amsterdam again.

An absolutely lovely apartment! The place had everything that a guest would need and was a beautiful and perfect place to stay for our short holiday in Amsterdam. The local neighborhood was also convenient with many wonderful cafes, restaurants, and markets just around the corner from the apartment. Ester was a wonderful host and I would gladly stay here again if I make it back to Amsterdam!
Great location and a wonderful host.

Tres beau séjour a Amsterdam où on a pu visiter de nombreux musées et autres attraction. Ville magnifique avec ses canaux pittoresques. L’appartement est situé dans le quartier Leidseplein et est tres tranquille malgré l’achalandage parjois forte dans la rue. Wendy est une hôte super qui a su bien nous renseigner et qui montre beaucoup d’empathie pour ses clients. Nous la recommandons sans faute.

We really enjoyed staying in the apartment owned by Ester on Govert Flinckstraat. We were greeted with a smile, fresh flowers, and breakfast foods ready for us. Our host could not have been more friendly. The apartment had everything that we needed. The bed was comfortable and warm in the chilly November weather. The location was great. We liked eating at the local cafes and restaurants, as the people were all so friendly and accommodating. We bought fresh food at the Albert Cuypmarket and loved walking through there daily. The tram is very close, but we also enjoyed walking everywhere. We highly recommend using Ester as a host and we would not hesitate to stay there again.

Our hosts were very kind and accomadating. The location is fantastic. The room is right in the city center, but still quiet. The room was very cozy, clean, and comfortable. Though the room was a bit small, we didn't spend much time in it. We loved the traditional Dutch feel of the room. Highly recommend.

Ideally located in the center of Amsterdam, everything is nearby and the room is so quiet (incredibly quiet in fact). Matthijs&Francina are really great hosts; I felt warmly welcomed, with a high level of attention and respect. A great place for a couple of days stay in the city. Many thanks !
Apartamento com localização perfeita, super limpo e confortável. Matthijs é muito atencioso e nos deixou super a vontade. Café da manhã maravilhoso! Recomendamos com certeza!!!!

Accueil chaleureux de la part de Matthijs qui nous a extrêmement bien reçu. Ces conseils ont été précieux pour la réussite de notre séjour. Très bon rapport qualité prix et bien situé proche de toutes commodités. Merci

Ester was wonderful. The apartment is even better than the pictures. The bathtub is huge, everything was available, scotch tape, asprin, dish towels, and more. The neighborhood has everything, stores, bars, restaurants. It resembles Manhattan, but friendlier and much more affordable. It was my 1st experience with nocarz and I'm sold. It felt like being at a friends house who is out of town. This is a real treasure. I would go back in a heartbeat.
Carolyn

Wir haben sehr gerne in dem Hausboot-Apartment gewohnt. Es liegt toll in einem Kanal und die Straßenbahn ist ca. 10 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt. Mit dieser braucht man ca. 20 Minuten ins Zentrum von Amsterdam. Wir wurden freundlich begrüßt und es war kein Problem, dass wir etwas später ankamen, als geplant. Die Wohnung ist mit allem ausgestattet, was man für einen kurzen Städtetrip braucht, auch Informationen zu Amsterdam waren in Fülle vorhanden. Die Wohnung ist getrennt von der Wohnung der Eigentümer und hat auch eine separate Eingangstüre.
Wir kommen gerne wieder.
The location is very convenient to go to the centre of Amsterdam. It is a beautiful place with a very nice view on the canal and everything you need !

Astrid's place was just lovely, in a garden, very private and in a very quiet area of Amsterdam. Close to Vondel Park, restaurants, pharmacy, super market, and ATM. Just 15 minutes away from the airport, which is really convenient, specially if you have an early flight departure as I did.
The room had everything you needed and more, Astrid keeps it very clean, full of amenities, the basic ones and ones you normally don't pack but you need. It had a Nespresso machine, which was great because I'm a coffee drinker, but also had tea. Astrid greeted me with a can of Stroopwaffles, which I love, and maps and books about Amsterdam. She was even kind enough to lend me her own TRAM card so I wouldn't have to buy one.
If you are person that wants to discover Amsterdam during the day but wants to get a good night sleep away from crowded areas, this is the place for you.
Gorgeous basement suite, very spacious and comfortable. Ester and her husband were so accommodating and we were gushing over this nocarz!!! Would definitely return.

Ester was a great host. She was busy at the time of check in so her husband welcomed us. They had a lot of snacks ready for us. She replied quickly to any question or request. She also ordered a taxi for us and allowed late-ish checkout (12 pm). The location is great and safe.

Great flat, great location. Host was very friendly and invited me to share living space with her and her friends. Also gave me advice on places to go and events on in the city while I was there, even helped me to book train tickets over the phone!

Ester was so kind and responsive. We had a great stay. The house was very clean and comfortable. Perfect for myself, my husband and my 3 year old. There were lots of shops and restaurants in walking distance and the metro was also very close. Would 100% recommend!

Solo utilizamos la habitación y el baño y estaban muy limpios y cómodos. S siempre estuvo muy pendiente y nos ayudó con todo lo que necesitábamos saber de la cuidad. Aunque no queda muy cerca del centro no tuvimos necesidad de utilizar transporte público, solo caminamos. Los alrededores son lindos y seguros.
Great host, allowed us to check in late and was super nice about it

We had a great stay at the Waterfront B & B! The room was exactly what we expected, good distance from the city centre. Vera was very helpful. Would highly recommend to others and definitely stay here again :-)

What a great  spot,,  lovely room close to amsterdam central everything ,you need to make your stay easy ,vera was very friendly and helpfull,even letting us stay for a couple of hours extra because of travel hiccups  .

Fred var otroligt tillmötesgående och vi kände oss väldigt väl omhändertagna.  Fred förstod vilken information vi hade nytta av men var också lyhörd för vilka tips som kunde passa just oss. Rummet kändes lyxigt fast det var ganska litet. De välplanerade ytorna och  balkongen gjorde att det blev luftigt. Vi hade utsikt över den fina lilla trädgården med fiskdam, vackra växter, trädgårdshus och kanal. Boendet ligger nära stadsgränsen åt norr och man har nära till ett fantastiskt landskap som är som gjort för cykelturer. Lika nära är det att cykla till färjeterminalen där båtarna går tätt till både Centralstationen och Pontsteiger i centrala Amsterdam. Vill man inte cykla finns täta kommunikationer med buss till mer centrala delar nära. Frukosten=Underbar! Fast det finaste med boendet var nog Fred själv och hans lyhörda värdskap!
We had a wonderful stay at Fred’s place. He was extremely helpful and kind. We stayed 2 weeks and took many day trips from there. Train system easy to use and only 2 blocks away.
Lovely place, Vera greeted us at the door :)
Just what we needed for a short stay. Easy walking or public transport to the centre. Good shops, bars and eateries nearby

Ed's flat is a great place in an amazing location.
Just a 30 sec walk to some great cafes, bars and restaurants.
The flat fit 2 couples well, and has some really interesting quirky additions.
Ed very kindly left us a lovely welcome pack and check out was at our leisure.
Would definitely use again.

Edward is a great host and his flat in Amsterdam is great.  It's right off the canals and the view from his place is amazing.  The location is very central and within walking distance to great restaurants and shops.  His place is fun and artistic and gives you a real feel of Amsterdam life.
Sehr schöne Wohnung. Gute Lage. Netter Empfang von Freek. Freundlich und immer bereit uns bezüglich Infos über Amsterdam zu helfen.
We had a great stay at Ned's place. He was a very accommodating and friendly host. The location is great, loved the neighborhood.

We enjoyed our stay at the housboat of Doet. The room was very clean and its a quiet place. A bus station (easy to arrive at the center) and a bakery (for breakfast) are near. It is a lovely place for a short-stay in amsterdam!!

Cozy indeed... We enjoyed our stay at Ned's nocarz. Located in a neighborhood that offers non touristy shopping for food and clothing, and alsi a micro brew pup. During our stay we could hear a faint piano being played beautifully, quite peaceful place. Wifi was strong and transportation was easy.
Thank you Ned!
民宿主人給予很多很棒的旅遊訊息，房間的床很乾淨舒適，交通位置也很方便，還有兩個小小朋友的問安非常可愛:)
Nous avons passé 4 jours fabuleux. La chambre était super et les conseils de Rob et Fang aussi .

Ned’s place is clean and tidy, and in a beautiful quiet neighbourhood. Ned was waiting for us to arrive and helped us with our bags. He was very kind and welcoming. There’s quite a few stairs to the room but it’s a lovely little space and would definitely stay here again.

I had a great time at Ned's place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located and the apartment is close to everything you need. I would highly recommend staying at Ned's!
Ned’s place was cozy and close to everything. Very clean and very convenient. Highly recommend anyone visiting Amsterdam to stay with Ned.

We stayed at Marre's house in Amsterdam for 3 days and felt like we could have stayed forever.

The house was perfect for a family gathering in a foreign city. Very convenient, close to all the best things to see and visit in Amsterdam (museums, restaurants, cafes, transport).

Marre and her lovely family are very friendly and will make you feel more than welcome. She was very helpful prior to our arrival by providing us with information about activities and transportation.

We would highly recommend her home to any other air BNB member!

Great place to stay at. Comfortable room and fast internet. Cosy and near bus and train station. Only about 20-25 mins to town by bus.
Arne is friendly even though I didn't have much interaction with him as I'm a fairly private person. His personal list of recommendations is a must for anyone going to Amsterdam.

Marre's home was perfect. From start to finish, her home was easy to book, communication was great, location was perfect.  I could go on. We are a family of 4 with 2 preteen girls. Her home was just right. It had everything we needed, was clean and beautiful. It gave us a real Amsterdam feeling. We loved the neighborhood. Great restaurants, quiet, a playground across the street and walking distance to everything including a bike rental place and the tram when our legs got tired. Thanks Marre. Will definitely recommend your home to others or maybe be back again too. We loved Amsterdam and I know our stay here was part of that.
Amazing house close to the center of the City !! Marre is a very nice host, easy communication ! I recommand !

Our stay in Arne's apartment was wonderful. The room was relatively small but very cozy with an extremely comfortable bed. His apartment is charming and very clean with great decor. Even though we were unable to interact with Arne very much due to conflicting schedules, our interactions were friendly and he made sure we had everything we needed and were happy. Although the apartment is about a 25 minute bus ride out of the immediate city, it was a cozy, relaxing, and serene environment to come back to at the end of the day. Would absolutely recommend.

Nice Apartment - ideal Location to visit Amsterdam.
Positive: Good Communication, large flat, nice roof top terrace.
Negative: Not "so" clean, very very steep stairs.

Really nice appartement, perfect for a short stay in Amsterdam.
We always walk, and the appartement is at an acceptable walking distance, around 20-25 minutes from Dam Square.
The neighbour, Djoeke welcomed us and walked through some of the basics, she was really nice and helpful!
But overall great appartement! :)

Me and my girlfriend stayed at Olly and Josh's apartment and we loved it, it was clean and was located in a great spot. We had an amazing time and would love to stay at the apartment again. Thank you for letting us stay.
If you are fortunate enough to be able to stay at Arne's place, you will have hit the jackpot of hospitality and gained a friend in the process.
he was so nice and the apartment was so cozy.. we liked it there

Nicolet was such a wonderful host! Despite the fact that she was away on holidays when we arrived, she organised for her friend to meet us at the apt when we arrived and gave clear directions on how to get there.

There was a slight plumbing issue on the 2nd day we were there, Nicolet was very quick to respond via nocarz messaging and within the hour had her friend and sister in law down to help - and organised the emergency plumbers.

We had a lovely and comfortable stay at her apartment, it was one of the best presented nocarz's we had in the month long travelling we did around Europe.
Location was perfect, a stone's throw away to all the exciting sights in Amsterdam city centre. Don't forget to check out her pancake restaurant as well - 'Pancakes Amsterdam', it was seriously one of the best pancakes I had while in Amsterdam.

Thanks for making our visit to Amsterdam particularly special / amazing, we'll never forget her hospitality and also hanging out with her hilarious sister in law :)
Location was central for everything.  Place was very clean and comfortable.  Would stay again.

We booked this accommodation very last minute and Hans and his wife Nanette were very helpful in allowing to check in almost immediately following booking. The apartment is very large, well decorated and equipped with everything you would need. The area couldn't be better, right by the canal. There are lot's of bars, cafes and restaurants close by. It is walking distance to many local attractions and close to the tram stops, an ideal location. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, we just wish we could have stopped longer!
Great place to stay and the small courtyard is a bonus. Easy communication and Hans was very helpful.

Michele's houseboat was the perfect Amsterdam experience. We loved it, including waving at the dinner cruises passing by our window on the canal. Though small, it was more than adequate for our needs to work and sleep, and of course we spent much of our time on the town. The location was excellent for my conference at the RAI (walking distance with a route through Beatrixpark) and for the major museums such as the Van Gogh. Michele and her friends were excellent hosts in providing what we needed.

It was a phenomenal stay at Marijn’s apartment. Super clean, great amenities, and excellent location. Marijn was always available to answer questions and give tips. Would certainly come back again when I re-visit Amsterdam!

Es war wirklich ein schönes Wochenende in Amsterdam - die Wohnung ist super - der Ausblick, vor allem bei Sonne, echt toll - und Stephan ist ein toller Gastgeber! Die Lage ist auch perfekt, alles ist gut zu erreichen - zu Fuß und mit Bus und Bahn - Stephan hat uns an der Haltestelle abgeholt und uns ein paar gute Tipps gegeben! Es war alles da, was man so braucht (Handtücher, Bettwäsche, Föhn etc) und für drei Leute auf jeden Fall genug Platz (Couch und Bett auch sehr gemütlich). Bei An- und Abreise war Stephan sehr flexibel. Danke, wir hatten eine schöne Zeit!
Great stat at Katinka's place, clean and bright and quiet. Hope to be able to stay there again next time I'm in Amsterdam!
Second time at Katinka's place and I'd recommend it again. Quiet and calm and well lit. A nice stay, thanks!
In het centrum van Amsterdam, toch heel rustig. Zeer gastvrij en behulpzaam.

Marc has a beautiful apartment located only minutes from central station. We walked to everything, which was very nice. I definitely recommend staying here! The stairs up to the apartment were a little gruelling the first few days, but the apartment was well worth the steep steps. Lovely view from living room and bedroom, and spacious bathroom. Marc was a wonderful host as well.

i know Amsterdam for many years and that was a great n new experience. the house boat is beautiful exact as pics shows. it's in the center - the street to the dam is right next to the boat house.  the bathroom is great.  the only thing is that it was snowing and we come to Amsterdam to smoke - and to smoke out in the freeze was not the funnest, that's was the only concern.  in summer time it can be perfect.

We had great expectations on staying on a canal boat in Amsterdam.
Some were met, many were not.
Good stuff first... the location was great, and it was quiet and warm inside the boat, even though the canal traffic and city are on your doorstep.
Entry to the boat is a challenge, but we knew about this beforehand as it’s covered in other reviews.
Now the not so good.... the boat needs the attention of a good Handyman.
The bed in the second bedroom is broken in two places and two of the steps leading up to the top bed are broken with one more just about to go. This is a bit dangerous and our daughter said she felt unsafe going up and down in case a step broke (luckily she doesn’t weigh much!).
Some of the dado rails are missing or loose and the handle on the metal door to the boat is also coming loose.
The seal on the shower was hanging off in a couple of places and the fridge door handle had also come off.
There were no ‘welcome touches’ either. No milk in the fridge etc
We were instructed to be in for a period of time the first morning to meet the boat owner. We waited, he didn’t appear. Chased up and was told he was busy and my mobile number was incorrect. Even if that were the case, air bnb has a very efficient message system, which was not tried.
All in all this was a disappointment for the price we paid.
Richard and his team was very helpful and accommodating. Staying on a boat is a great experience. Will definitely come again in the future!

Séjour agréable, bateau très confortable.
Petit déjeuner copieux et varié.
Environnement plus discutable surtout en hiver.
Reinhart est un hôte accueillant.

Meeting people with a chillax attitude like Reinhardt in a cool houseboat enhances the Amsterdam experience.
Great guy and a great place.
We will be back.

PS:tell him to assemble his drums and have a jam ;-)
Leuk alternatief om in te verblijven
We had some nice days in amsterdam at Mirjams house. Mirjams place is comfortable and good value for money. The breakfast was delicious. Everything was good.

Reinhart was a wonderful host with a lovely home (houseboat) in the quiet section of Amsterdam Noord. The accomodation looks EXACTLY like the pictures show it and the views are EXACTLY as shown... No photographick trickery here! My wife and I were made to feel welcome from the very first moment we arrived. We were introduced to Reinharts son and shown to our room. As first timers to nocarz, we were a little bit nervous at the prospect of staying in someones home... whilst they were home but we settled in in no time at all as Reinhart was practically invisible wilst we were there. That said, if you needed anything, he was there in a flash... even letting me use his laptop and printer to check in for our return flight allowing us a relaxing experience at Schipol. As for the area itself, it is located literally 5 minutes from the hustle and bstle of Amsterdam city centre and the Red Light District, bars, coffe shops etc. That said, once you get on that free ferry that runs every few minutes, 24 hours a day (and is always strangely full regardless of the time), you arrive into a different world. We awoke each morning to a lovely heron, some swand, ducks and moorhens. The sceenry was second to none. The accomodations itself were impeccibly clean and the bed was properly comfortable. And the breakfasts... magnificent!

I simply hope not too many people read this lest his calendar fill up for our next trip to Amsterdam.... because I know that Reinharts home will be the very first place I look when searching for a place to stay in this beautiful city.
Reinhart est un hôte vraiment accueillant! Le lieu était vraiment très beau et la localisation parfaite pour un charmant week-end au centre d'Amsterdam !

I had a wonderful stay at Reinhart's boathouse! By far my best nocarz experience to date. This is an amazing home, in very close proximity to Amsterdam city centre, yet also managing to be out of the hustle and bustle. Reinhart was away sailing for most of my stay however extremely easy and prompt to stay in contact with when needed. Highly recommend this home for a unique and enjoyable stay in Amsterdam.

Thanks to Reinhart's help and hospitallity we had a great time at Amsterdam. His houseboat is perfectly located to visit the vivid city nearby and afterwards relax on his houseboad which is located in a calm neighborhood. Thank you Reinhart for your help with the concert tickets and see you on our next Amsterdam trip :-)

Milen & Joes house is a very peaceful house extremely well located, close to everything and all main places to visit in Amsterdam. We briefly met Milen & Joes when we arrived, they took the time to give us some addresses and hints to enjoy our stay which was very nice.

The house has a very big size terrace which we could enjoy, thanks to a perfect weather weekend.

I would very highly recommend staying with Milen & Joes if you can, we would next time we come to Amsterdam.

Your search ends here! If you want somewhere safe, beautiful, bright, clean and comfortable, close to everything, including the tram, this is the place. Alex was a great representative for the Dutch people, friendly, kind and more than happy to help with anything you might need, plus all the extras! Can't wait to get back to this unique city.
Great location with easy access to the north and the city center. Moscito net at the window would be an advantage. Nice breakfast service. Would defenitely come again.
It was great! Mirjam is very kind and helped us a lot with suggestions! The room is really cool and the attention with the details to make our staying good was big. I really recommend!

Waking up in the morning was wonderful: looking outside at water, swans and other waterfowl, and an old wooden sailboat, not to mention other houseboats in the historical docking area. Being on the water is a sort of gentle miracle. The houseboat is sparkling clean and homely, Reinhart's hospitality is first rate, and it's just minutes from the train station: an excellent location for travellers who want to drop off bags before exploring the city.
Amazing place! Room is clean and great location. Bathroom is big and shower has all the amenities and nice and hot. You won't regret it!

Mirjam's place was absolutely stunning. It was a lot more than we could have ever expected. First, the location could not have gotten any better. At the heart of Amsterdam, only a 2-minute walk to the closest subway station: Nieumarkt. Mirjam really was a superhost. She let us keep our luggage at her place after we checked out, she gave us some coupons to use at her beautiful Cafè just outside her house, and she had everything super prepared, it really felt like a hotel. The room was also lovely, really well decorated and furnished, with amazing natural light and a great view of an old drugstore warehouse from the window. You can tell she has been doing this for more than 10 years for how well she takes care of every little detail. Overall, I would 100% recommend staying at Mirjam's place if you have the chance!
Nice and central apartment with a rooftop terrace. Close to bike shop and vondelpark so easy to get around.

Die beste Wohnung die wir je hatten. Wir haben uns gleich wie zuhause gefühlt. Da die Wohnung normalerweise von Daniel bewohnt wird ist wirklich alles vorhanden was man braucht. Die Lage ist sehr gut. Es ist ruhig, grün und man ist mit der Bahn in wenigen Minuten im Zentrum. Die Katze ist wirklich pflegeleicht und wir fanden es sehr toll mit ihr am Abend zu schmusen.

We rented the appartment of Harriet for a week. We had a wonderful time in Amsterdam. The appartment is located pretty good and a subway station is directly in front. We felt welcomed and the interior is so lovely and inspiring. You can feel really fast at home and relax after a busy day in the city. I loved the styl of the appartment and I'm really jealous about the amazing terrace and the kitchen. It's easy to feel comfortable. Amsterdam is such an amazing city and we were glad that we had the opportunity of renting a private home. Everything was organized in a perfect way and made it easy for us. We wish both of you Harriet and her Husband all the best for their future as a family and maybey we have the chance to spend some time again in your lovely home. All the best from Germany.

My friend and I had a lovely stay at Miriam's gorgeous apartment. The area is nice and is close to restaurants and places to have a drink. It’s also very close to a tram line that takes you directly into Amsterdam Central.
Miriam was an excellent host and I would highly recommend to anyone wanting to visit Amsterdam.
Elle

Thank you very much Elmar. Your welcome and kindness were our best start in Amsterdam experience. Warmful, cosy and excellent location bring us relaxing time during our busy week.
More easygoing and friendship is not possible.
Best regards

A good neighbourhood well connected with public transport; bus stop, bars and supermarket within 1 minute walking distance. The flat has a separate entrance to the main apartment, is clean, has wifi and all essentials, albeit a slightly unconventional bathroom arrangement with the sink in the main room. I was busier than expected in and around Amsterdam, so I did not spend much time in the flat nor interact much with Patricia and Jacob at all, but they were patient even when I arrived late and they were friendly, accessible and helpful. Thanks!
We'd  stayed for 3 nights with 3 people. The apartment was very clean and comfortable.
Aardige gastheer en -vrouw die zorgen voor een hartelijk welkom.

The location was good, nice and quiet neighborhood and you can easily reach the city centre by bike or bus.
overall it was a nice stay and good enough for a weekend trip.

The place has personality and everything you need to have an easy, relaxing holiday. Cute, clean and well taking cared of!
Really recommend this place and Vera is lovely and easy to get hold of if you have any questions. Xx

Myself and three friends stayed at Dimphy's apartment for the weekend, and it was perfect. Dimphy was very welcoming and her apartment is amazing. It's just outside of the centre in a lovely quiet neighborhood, and it's easy to commute back in. Oosterpark is two stops away on the tram, and there a lots of nice little shops nearby. I'd definitely stay there again, and I highly recommend the apartment.
We appreciated Dimphy's smart and careful appartment for it's comfort, decoration, garden, calm. She's a perfct host, we warmly recommend.

Staying here exceeded our expectations. It’s perfect for a couple’s stay, and it’s a great location; it’s within walking distance from everything you’ll wanna see whilst in Amsterdam. The hosts were very kind and friendly, and gave us great local recommendations. We really appreciated their hospitality, and would definitely recommend this place as a friendly home base. The apartment has everything you need, and is a great value for your money! We would definitely stay with Jacob and Patricia again.

Jeremie and Amber were perfect hosts! The apartment is beautiful and cozy, just what we needed for our visit to Amsterdam. It’s a self-enclosed studio within the host’s home, with only a shared staircase, so plenty of privacy but with the advantage of on-site hosts, should you need anything. They even left us croissants for breakfast on our first day! What a thoughtful extra touch.
And on top of all that, we couldn’t have asked for a better location. The apartment is right in the middle of Amsterdam’s De Pijp neighborhood – a short walk from the city center, but a charming little area in its own right, full of great restaurants and little shops. There’s a great outdoor daily market just a block away.
I loved staying at this nocarz, and each day after exploring the city, it was a pleasure to come home to this bright and cozy apartment. I hope to stay there again if I return to Amsterdam. Highly recommend!

Thank you Mirjam for the lovely host and home!
The location was great (near the centre but not in the middle of the mess),
The house was warm and cozy, and in general we had a very good experience!

Jeremie und seine Frau waren super lieb und auch das Appartment ist schön, sauber und super gelegen. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln und auch zu Fuß erreicht man Supermärkte, Bars, Coffeeshops, Märkte, usw. gut.
The place quiet, convenient transportation, easy check in, everything is good

Sabrine really was a super host. From our booking to leaving she was communicative and helpful.
The house is in a super location, walkable, close to public transport, and felt clean and safe.
Sabrine gave some great recommendations on local restaurants and shops.
Highly recommended - and we would certainly stay again.
Top tip: get an OV-Chipkaart, use public transport everywhere. Tap on, tap off.

Tres belle maison aménagée avec goût. Rien ne manque!
Un accueil parfait par Sabrine d’une très grande gentillesse. Un très grand merci !
Nous avons adoré le calme du quartier à proximité de tous les commerces et tres bien placé pour accéder au centre ville.
I had a great stay with Rosie. She was very helpful and friendly and the apartment was in a great location. Highly recommended!

Rosie's place was clean and comfortable, and conveniently located a very short train ride from the airport. While it was in Amsterdam South, there were two trams right on the street outside which took me to the centre of Amsterdam in about 20 minutes, and I never had to wait long for them! Breakfasts at Rosie's were a social time, where we chatted for a time and I also got to know Rosie's other guest. What I really liked about Rosie's place was the peace of the neighbourhood and sitting at the table in the room, looking out the open balcony doors.
Great spot in a lovely neighbourhood. Easy tram access and great location for a quiet walk.

We have just returned from staying at this apartment, we did not meet Rosie during our stay but her husband Matt was very helpful. We were able to drop our bags off in the morning and Matt allowed me to get changed in their personal bathroom following an early flight. He gave us the keys and told us to come back anytime after 1pm. Matt gave us recommendations for food and places which was appreciated.
The room was lovely as shown in the photos with a shared bathroom - we did not see the other guest but could hear them going in and out of the bathroom and with their keys rattling in the mornings. However I am a light sleeper so this may well be why. There were a few times when I would go to use the bathroom and the toilet had been left in a mess, again this is down to the other guest not the hosts.
Location wise we found the apartment great. Only a 10 minute tram into the centre and the tram stop is basically a couple of steps away from the front door, very easy to use the trams too. There are some lovely little cafes and restaurants on the street for brunch type food.
Overall we loved our stay with Matt at Rosie’s place and would recommend for anyone looking for good value for money.

Your hospitality was good but if I come back to Amsterdam I will not book your room. Way too expensive for a bedroom only with a shared bathroom with other guests. You should consider in investing in a coffee machine like Expresso and offer good quality tea. The mugs should be in the bedrooms. One for each guest... and make your bathroom more friendly by adding hooks to hang our towels close to the shower.....

Henreitte has been the most wonderful and amazing host. I was truly moved by her kind gestures throughout my stay.

Her place is situated near the museum quarter with many attractions such as the Rijksmuseum, Concertgebouw, etc. It is not difficult to get around because the tram station is right at her doorstep.

Her place is highly recommended!! :)

Henriette and her husband Leo were really very nice and hospitable. They gave us all the guidance on how to move to Amsterdam. The house is very welcoming, clean and well connected with public transport. Very beautiful
Had a great stay at Rosie’s! Nice private room in a great location. Thank you Rosie for being super accommodating and welcoming :)

Stayed in Aren's place for 3 nights. He was very hospitable with a beautiful loft to stay in. He let us get on with our holiday with no interference. But he was always available if we needed to contact him. The place was wonderful and easily fit 4 guys and very close to the center but also in a quiet part of town. Would definitely consider staying again! Thanks

Petra was a wonderful host and her apartment was beautiful - even better than in the photos. She kindly met us, provided us with all the information we'd need to have a great trip, including recommending places for us to visit. The kitchen is a great size for a group to cook in & the lake provided a welcome respite from the heat! Everything was great and staying at Petra's was one of the best nocarz experiences that I have had. Highly highly recommended and would love to stay here again in the future.

The Tasmania boat is SO GREAT ! Peaceful, elegant, clean... We really enjoyed our stay in Sonja's boat and we enjoyed a lot her way of communication and reception. Easy to contact, nice food and wine when we arrived.
We warmly recommend her... Thank you Sonja

A perfect location a short tram ride out of town.  It was lovely being beside the water and being able to swim in the hot weather.  We found everything we needed and it was really helpful having the local tips on where to eat etc. .Petra's directions were perfect and it was nice that she checked in with us during our stay.

The Tasmania was hands down one of the most beautiful and unique places we stayed at on our recent trip to Europe. It is located near a bunch of good restaurants and bars and the space was very nice and comfortable. Sonja and her husband really made us feel at home. Would highly recommend.

Sonja was a super welcoming & lovely host. The boat is beautiful and so peaceful. It felt so clean, fresh and secluded and yet it was only a 5 minute cab from the central station. Will definitely be returning!

What a beautiful boat in a really quiet peaceful haven amongst the hustle and bustle of Amsterdam. Well equipped. Clean and well designed, it is fantastic. Bikes are available, which add to the Amsterdam experience.

Beautiful place to spend a few days in Amsterdam! Joke is a gracious host, and the apartment is lovely and very clean. Joke had a few drinks and snacks waiting for me when I arrived. It's the perfect distance from the city center. My favorite part of my trip was being in this location, and getting to walk along the canals into the city center (20 minutes of pure bliss!).

Joke also helped coordinate an early morning taxi to the airport for me, which was incredibly helpful!
Lovely apartment as described. Joke was very helpful and always on hand if we needed anything
Had an absolutely great weekend celebrating my friends 30th birthday! 10/10 would love to come back!

Joke was a great host. Very thoughtful and amazing communication with us. She gave us tons of local tips and was very friendly. Her location was very easy to get to, as well as close to everything. Thank you for your hospitality!

Appartement parfait pour découvrir Amsterdam.
Dans un quartier typique, mais calme, proche des transports mais d'où tout peut se faire à pieds si vous n'avez pas peur de marcher un peu.
L'accueil de Joke est parfait en plus elle parle remarquablement le français.
Attention toutefois c'est une maison hollandaise, il ne faut donc ne pas avoir peur de monter des escaliers, mais ça se fait bien.
L'appartement est conforme à la description. La literie d'excellente qualité. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour un excellent séjour.
A recommander.

Lovely apartment just round the corner from Vondelpark. Area is great with lots of nice restaurants. The apartment was as described. Bed is very comfortable and shower is great. Communication was quick and easy. Thanks for a great stay!
Merci à Joke pour son accueil et sa réactivité aux quelques demandes.

Top. très bien situé pour une visite de la ville.
Relativement central en restant calme. Propre, et très bien desservi.
Je recommande.

Great hosts and a nice location. This is definitely a residential area with less-than-average foot and automotive traffic. Our stay was quiet and peaceful.
I really appreciated how close it was to Museumplein and the entire area feels very walkable.
Be sure to check out Bar Do and Broodbakker Simon Meijssen

This was a wonderful stay.
The apartment is exactly as published, very comfortable.
The bathroom is a great size.
Being there, I realized how well located it is, near so many useful places, as well as walking distance to a beautiful area called Pijp.
Restaurants,supermarket,train station,everything is very near.
The stairs, it takes time to get used to them,but that is the way they all are in Amsterdam
In my future stays in Amsterdam, I would definitely consider staying here again

A lovely apartment in a great location. Joke is an excellent host. Joke met us upon arrival to give us a walkthrough of the apartment. Also gave us lots of great info on attractions to visit as well as restaurants and supermarket. The restaurant 2 doors down had great, reasonably priced food! I would highly recommend staying here!

Wir waren für 2 Nächte in der Unterkunft und das war wirklich perfekt. Das Zimmer ist sehr gemütlich und in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße. Es sind sehr leckere Restaurants und eine Straßenbahnhaltestelle in der Nähe, man kommt von da aus aber auch gut zu fuß zu beliebten Sehenswürdigkeiten. Wir hatten ein bisschen Schwierigkeiten mit der Heizung, aber hätten wir die warme Einstellung vom Anreisetag beibehalten, wäre es wahrscheinlich die ganze Zeit gemütlich warm gewesen. Das Badezimmer ist sehr klein, aber sehr modern, sauber und geschmackvoll. Ansonsten war es bis auf ein paar Bauarbeiten im Nachbarhaus sehr ruhig, obwohl die Lage unserer Meinung nach dennoch sehr zentral ist. Das war wirklich herrlich! Außerdem wurde uns auf Nachfrage ein etwas früherer Check-In ermöglicht, was wir sehr zu schätzen wussten nach dem Nachtzug. Insgesamt war die Kommunikation sehr freundlich und herzlich. Wir können das Apartment wirklich sehr empfehlen!

Nuestra estancia en casa de Santi y Toni , fue estupenda.
La ubicación esta genial , a unos 15 minutos andando de la plaza Dam,
La habitación es muy confortable y acogedora , con una gran ventana mirando a unos de los muchos canales que tiene la ciudad.
La atención de los los anfitriones fantástica , Toni que es con el que mas coincidimos , muy atento y te aclara cualquier duda , El desayuno fantástico , y algo importante que hablan Español .
Si volvemos a Amsterdam , volveremos a casa de Santi & Toni
Great location , lovely room and deco. Comfortable bed. Highly recommend.
Super appartement plutôt bien situé, à 10-15 minutes du centre à pied nous avons passer un très bon séjour.

A well located and comfortable 2nd floor flat, that my friend and I enjoyed 3 nights in. There were a couple of blips with the keys, but Richard sorted those out immediately. Great communication - friendly throughout, and a lovely welcome when we arrived.

Bon séjour. Logement bien situé.
Mais ne convient pas à des personnes âgées ou à de jeunes enfants
L'appartement est idéalement placé dans la ville. Proche des transports en commun et des commerces de proximité tout en étant dans un quartier un peu plus tranquille et résidentiel.
voor de prijs die je betaalt zou ik wat verbeteringen aanbrengen. Kwastje verf en wat kleine reparaties verrichten.
Immer wieder gerne!
Stijn is an amazing host! His place was the perfect spot for my stay in Amsterdam - super unique and awesome! I hope it's free next year when I return.

The house boat was amazing, it is really central and you can reach every thing in the city while walking. Stijn is an awesome host and will help you when you have any questions or when you need some local tipps. It was perfect for an romantic weekend. Thanks stijn!
Very nice host, warm welcome with cold drinks and snacks, and the location is spectacular. Ideal for a weekend trip. We loved it.
We had a fabulous stay!!! From beginning to end we had no problems and Santi was more than helpful. Highly recommend for your stay in Amsterdam.
Rustig gelegen, goed verzorgde kamer. Mooie badkamer en erg vriendelijke en behulpzame verhuurders. Dichtbij openbaar vervoer, supermarkt, restaurant en barretjes.
Very nice location and central, bicycles available. Diewert has a lot of good tipps

Très bon accueil chez Diewert , quartier très accessible pour se rendre dans le centre , endroit très calme , seul bémol la chambre un peu petite pour le prix et la vue peu dégagée . À part ça rien à dire !
Diewert est très disponible et très réactif et à su nous conseiller de bonnes adresses !
very close to the station slordijk ，just 1 stop by the bus 15！Daniella is so friendly，the room is clean，we have stayed 3 nice days at here

We loved our stay in the boathouse. A spacious , well designed home , comfortable and well positioned for a relaxing weekend in Amsterdam. Nicole is a great host - always easy to communicate with and very thoughtful.

The house boat was clean and had everything we needed. Nicole was very communicative and gave us great tips and recommendations. Quiet street but close to all of the things we came to Amsterdam to see. We would stay here again.
Nice place in a calm neighborhood. The communication and the suggestions where great, thank you! Just the view outside the window should be seen on the pictures online.

Great location, great amenities, great size.  It was easy. This place had everything we needed to stay in Amsterdam.  Gordon was very nice and helpful. There are 2 rooms separated by a huge shower and a toilet. We stayed in the blue room and we were right on the street. Keeping the windows open  felt like you were living there.  We were able to walk to everything. As we are 2 girls in our 20s, we felt very safe doing this (it looked safer than staying at a hostel  closer).

We enjoyed our stay at Gordon and Amy's. The location could not have been any better. Short walk to the train station and tons of restaurants and shops around. The apartment is located on a busy street so you can hear people walking and riding bikes throughout the night. If you want a quiet place to stay for a good night's sleep, perhaps check out the yellow room. Gordon was very easy to communicate with and very helpful. This room shares bathroom facilities with the other room, but they were cleaned every day. We loved the breakfast that they supplied and restocked every day! Fresh pastries, fruit, yogurt, coffee, and juice. We would reccommend staying here to live like a local.
What a lovely spot!! Absolutely cozy and wonderfully hospitable, a wonderful place and host - 10/10 recommend!

La chambre est spacieuse, propre et très bien située. Kristel et son mari sont adorables et ont été très arrangeants pour notre départ et notre arrivée. Nous recommandons cette chambre d’hôte de grand luxe !

O Erik é um excelente anfitrião, responde sempre de imediato e está pronto a ajudar em qualquer detalhe durante a reserva e a estadia, para mim foi a mais valia de ter ficado neste lugar.
O espaço é simples e tem tudo o que é necessário para uma estadia curta, fica bem localizado, fora da zona mais barulhenta do centro, mas perto de qualquer lugar caminhando.

Just meeting Erik and Mary Jo and hearing a bit about what they have done with their lives in Amsterdam was a pleasure in and of itself.  Aside from that, their place is clean, all you need, and in a lovely neighborhood! We felt so welcomed and taken care of. Thank you, Erik & Mary Jo. See you again!
Très satisfait, merci à Kristel et sa famille pour l’accueil
Schone kamer en snelle communicatie!
Great place. Daniella is very nice person, providing all kinds of help needed. Highly recommended!

The place was very Nice. Little bit far away to the center but accessible by the public transport. The room is very clean, quiet and cute. The bathroom is big and clean too. Daniella is very attentive and has given us very useful information for our vacation to go well.

Really appreciate Daniella for hosting me, she has hospitality down. The bathroom was beautiful the suite was clean and never once did I feel uncomfortable. This is a great part of amsterdam and often goes unexplored, very close to my favorite park in the city, with a great selection of grocery stores and restaurants very close by. Great apartment, great part of town, great stay!
Thank you Daniella!
Very good location, clean apartment. Big benefit is a Netflix on TV.
Great location for tourism!

Everything was fantastic. Apartment was clean, well equipped and bigger than expected. Public transport into the city only a 5 minute walk and very regular/efficient service. Judith and her son were very helpful in answering our questions. Highly recommend staying here!
Great host! In a great location!
Had a great time staying at Judith's apartment.

O apartamento é arrumado, acolhedor e espaçoso. Tem 2 andares, então é perfeito para grupos por separar os espaços e permitir uma certa privacidade mesmo em estadias mais longas. Hospedamos 4 pessoas (2 por quarto) e foi uma estadia tranquila.
Procurávamos um local tranquilo e sereno, e esta localização foi perfeita porque o bairro é bastante residencial, mas perto dos principais serviços. Também dá para fazer passeios em Amsterdã tranquilamente, estando a 40 minutos a pé da zona central (ou 15 min de metrô).
A Judith deixou instruções claras do local e acesso ao edifício. Ela foi muito solícita e flexível quanto aos nossos horários.

Die Umgebung der Wohnung ist sehr ruhig, unsere Gastgeberin war sehr unkompliziert und überaus freundlich. Sie hat uns einige Insider Tipps hinterlassen für Restaurants in der näheren Umgebung sowie für Kneipen und Kinos. Allesamt zu empfehlen. Die Straße abwärts befindet sich ein Supermarkt und vor der Haustüre sind Parkplätze vorh. (Kostenpflichtig) Tee für den nächsten Morgen und die Vorbereiteten Betten sorgten für ein angenehmes "Zuhause" Klima. Angesichts der Touristenströme in der Innenstadt und der hohen Preise ist die Wohnung wärmstens zu empfehlen.

Take & Eline were great hosts, showed us the apartment with map and a bottle of wine (but unfortunately I dont drink & my friend didn't open it thinking she won't finish it and would be a waste...but thanks for a great gesture). Eline very kindly lent us her espresso machine when the one in the flat didn't work. It's a great place with character, very spacious, an old house with new & modern finish. Very accessible to central station & the historic centre.

As it only has a small microwave/oven, it could be a prob if you stay longer and plan to cook. It's a nice and quiet area, but if you like lying in like us, then be prepared to be woken up by the noise of the kids during their play time close by.

Overall... We had a great stay and had a great time. Will definitely stay there again.

We absolutely enjoyed our stay in the accommodation. Henk is simply an awesome host.  Henk provided bikes for us, and it's an excellent location to enjoy both city of Amsterdam and country-side. Henk was also very nice in helping us with our transport-matters when we arrive and leave. The room is clean and spacious. Plus, Ollie is a wonderful 'football' player to play with, the best goalkeeper ever!

Wir haben die Zeit (leider viel zu kurz) bei Henk und seiner Frau sehr genossen! Ein toller Gastgeber, hilfreich und mit vielen spannenden Informationen zu Land und Leuten, und eine wunderschöne Unterkunft!

Ganz besonders hat uns der Kontrast zwischen der ländlichen Idylle bei Henk und der quirligen Metropole gefallen und wir fanden es wundervoll, mit dem Rad nach Amsterdam zu fahren und dort so mobil zu sein. Die Strecke ist perfekt ausgeschildert und hat uns eine der schönsten Seiten von Amsterdam gezeigt, die wir sonst sicher nicht gesehen hätten.

Wir kommen wieder!
Henk was a great host. Breakfast was wonderful. The bikes worked great to get us to the center and around. Henk was friendly and kind. I would not think twice about staying there again.
