Fijn appartement van alle gemakken voorzien. Micha is heel vriendelijk en gastvrij. De locatie is perfect, vlakbij de Arena. In een rustige buurt, vlakbij een metrostation, vanuit daar ben je snel in het centrum van Amsterdam. Wij komen graag terug.

Superb! Outstanding hosts with a most beautiful home!! Every amenity thought of, made our stay extra special! Exactly as listing stated- excellent location, great space, would love to come back if ever in town again. Totally recommend! Dank je! Take & Eline 😊
Dank Henk, het was super!
Amazing place - great views - stay and see what life is like for locals. Fun place and great hosts!

Siamo stati in 4 nell'alloggio di Micha per 5 giorni, una persona eccezionale e sempre disponibile per ogni evenienza, ogni giorno ci ha comprato qualcosa da mangiare, veramente gentile!  La casa è a 2 minuti dalla metro che in 15 minuti arriva in centro! Esperienza bella, da rifare!

Excellent séjour chez Henk ! L'endroit est paisible avec belle vue sur la campagne. Les transports en commun sont à proximité !! Nous avons pu visiter Marken, Edam, Parc du Keukenhof, Zaans chans et bien sûr Amsterdam et le tout dans un périmètre proche !!! Plein de belles choses à voir dans le nord de la Hollande avec de beaux villages ! Les photos sont conformes à la description. Le petit déjeuner très bon, varié et copieux ! Nous recommandons ce logement !! Henk se montre disponible et discret à la fois !
Fijne en bovenal rustige plek waar wij graag nog eens terugkomen!

Belle location, propre et confortable. Bon accueil de la part du propriétaire qui donne tous les conseils et renseignements utiles. Bon petit déjeuner copieux.
Nous recommandons cette adresse.
Freundlicher Gastgeber, schöne Natur, ruhig und idyllisch, kostenlose Fahrräder, gute Busverbindung und leckeres Frühstück!
Fand leider nicht statt, weil die deutschen Züge in Freiburg ausgefallen sind!

My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at The Canal House.  The apartment is well appointed and as described in the advertisement.  Beautiful views of the city and canals.  Comfortable beds and spacious.   Our nocarz host Take & Eline we’re very kind and always available if we had questions or needed restaurant recommendations or city informations.  You cannot beat the location.  It’s centrally located, walking distance to restaurants, pubs and public transportation.  I highly recommend this nocarz.  You won’t be disappointed.
Super Gastgeber und wunderschöne Gegend. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit und können Henk als Gastgeber nur empfehlen. Danke für die wunderbare Gastfreundschaft!

Nuestra estancia estuvo increíble. La habitación y la zona superó por mucho nuestras expectativas. Henk es una gran persona, amable, alegre y que está siempre atento de sus huéspedes.
Una de los grandes plus es el desayuno que nos ofreció Henk cada mañana, nos pareció muy vasto y delicioso.
Su alojamiento se encuentra en las afueras del centro de Amsterdam y los traslados a la zona turística fueron en bicicleta (las cuales nos prestó sin costo alguno) y esto nos permitió disfrutar de los hermosos paisajes de la zona. Sin duda una experiencia increíble.
Seríamos felices en regresar a hospedarnos con Henk
Sympathieke, spontane en snelreagerende host.

Fuimos a casa de Dragan porque íbamos a un concierto en El Ziggo y queda muy cerca.
Independientemente de eso, está muy bien comunicado con el centro.
Dragan fue muy amable, simpático y generoso xon nosotras.
Sin duda merece la pena volver y quedarnos en su casa.
Simplemente genial!!

L'accoglienza e l'ospitalità di Micha è stata davvero super. Ci ha dato molti consigli sui posti da visitare e ci ha piacevolmente intrattenuto con la sua simpatia.
Abbiamo trovato l'alloggio spazioso e molto pratico, in quanto è poco distante dalla metro con la quale è estremamente facile raggiungere il centro e, in generale, spostarsi. Buon rapporto qualità/prezzo. Consigliato!

Overlooking a scenic canal and a short walk from the central rail station, the location is perfect. The street is quiet but not far from the busy tourist attractions. Rooms and furniture are comfortable and hosts are friendly but not intrusive. They conveniently live downstairs. We would definitely stay here again.

Wir haben uns richtig wohl gefühlt und den Aufenthalt genossen. Das Zimmer ist sehr einfach eingerichtet, hat aber alles was man braucht. Das Knarren des Bettes wurde wett gemacht durch das liebevolle Bereitstellen von Muffins, Kuchen und Joghurt. Die Lage der Unterkunft ist einfach perfekt. Wir konnten alles gut zu Fuß erreichen. Amy`s B`n`B ist absolut weiterzuempfehlen.
We spent four days at Talk & Eline's place and it suited us fine, quiet few minutes from the railway station, easy walking distance and access to Metro and Trams.
The checkin was easy and flexible and the appartment big and modern. Th

Super maison, très bien placée à 650m des musées, elle a tout !!
super cuisine, une cheminée, un piano, grande chambre pour les parents, trois autres chambres et le top un bout de jardin charmant !
Merci aussi à Joris qui est très disponible si besoin et aussi à Remco le jeune homme qui nous a donné et repris les clés.
On se sent chez Joris comme chez soi ;-) Merci !

Estancia muy agradable. Casa muy bonita y acogedora. La comunicación siempre ha sido rápido y fluida. No está cerca del centro pero tampoco está mal comunicada mediante transporte publico. La recomendaría para familias que quieran disfrutar de la experiencia de una manera más relajada.

Robert and Anna were above and beyond what we expected.  They were very helpful in showing us where to go for good food and shopping.  The apartment was beautifully decorated and felt just like home.  Location was great and very close to lots of different types of restaurants.  We would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone who is looking for a place to stay in Amsterdam.
We really enjoyed our stay at Hans's apartment. It worked perfectly for me and my 3 teenage children. It was very walkable to all you'd want to do in Amsterdam.

We really enjoyed our long weekend stay at Roel's apartment, it was ideally located for us in & amongst the best Amsterdam has to offer.
Roel was very accommodating to our needs as we arrived early on the Friday, leaving late on the Sunday which was a great help to us.
On our arrival he gave us an 'idiots guide' for the apartment and local area of De Pijp which proved useful, he also left instructions on how to look after Bob, the cat who was adorable and very easy to care for.
The apartment is very stylish and representative of Roel's personality with quirky collections alongside a love for all things music, film & photography.
Overall we would highly recommend staying at Roel's house & we will look forward to visiting this wonderful City and staying here again.
Wonderful apartment, hosts, and location!

Anna and Robert are great hosts, and their apartment was perfect for my family - very clean and comfortable. Loved the kitchen and all the fancy gear. Great location with a quick walk to the tram and grocery store. And Anna and Robert were so kind and accommodating, providing us with many great tips for our adventures.
Thanks for everything!
Better than expected. Thank you.
Thank you so much Ingo.... You are a very nice and professional person and your apartment is so beautiful... Great !!!!

Nice flat and bedroom, bus every 15-20 min at 5 min by walk : 20 min in bus to be downtown.
You have to clean the bathroom at each use, be ready to clean the bathroom 10min per day ! It's one of the owner's rules

We had the best time during our 2 night stay in the Westerpark Sanctuary. Caroline was by far the best host - flexible check in and check out times, stocked fridge, breakfast.. the appartment holds everything you could ever need.
We also loved the location, it's a very nice, quiet and green disctrict in Amsterdam - but close to the center. There's the most amazing bars, cafés and restauarants (try mossel en gin! best gin!) around the corner in Westerpark, where you can also get the best ice cream!

From now on, whenever we get to Amsterdam - it's going to be Westerpark Sanctuary always.

Thank you Caroline for being such a nice and welcoming host.
Logement spacieux, pratique, se trouve à 2 min d'une station de bus. Nous avons apprécié pouvoir garer la voiture gratuitement.

Wanka is an excellent host! Definitely recommend. The house is located a little bit out of the city center but public transport is very close.
We have had everything what we need. Next time in Amsterdam I will definitely stay at Wanka’s apartment.

We hebben het appartement van Carolina een lang weekend gehuurd. Al vanaf het moment dat we hadden geboekt liep de communicatie via nocarz, e-mail en whatsapp erg makkelijk. Carolina was erg flexibel met onze incheck en uitcheck tijd, wat erg prettig was! Daardoor hoefden we ons niet te haasten en konden we uitslapen na onze laatste avond stappen in Amsterdam.
Verder is het appartement perfect om met 4 personen te verblijven, zijn alle voorzieningen aanwezig en is de ligging ideaal, ook ten opzichte van het centrum vanwege de tramhalte om de hoek.
Bij het inchecken had Carolina zelfs wat noodzakelijke boodschappen gedaan en ons verschillende tips gebleven voor ons verblijf. Dit appartement is zeker een aanrader en Carolina is een zeer fijne host!!

Standard nocarz offer, came with a few bad surprises, the bathtub does not work, the shower can not exceed 40 Celsius, told at last moment someone else was with us. A useful apartment (not too far), but nothing exceptional.

Amsterdam is a busy town. We visite Amsterdam by bike. It is like a dream. Big streets allows fast driving.
In Xiongs Appartement we feel like at home.
Absolutely gorgeous place, really clean. Would definitely recommend
very cozy place, host was excellent! enjoyed our time in amsterdam

A typical Dutch Neighbourhood!
Everything was nice & comfortable.
Wanka is an excellent host.
It gets a bit difficult to reach Amsterdam but its just 20 min drive.
Wanka has also provided some basic kitchenette - Toaster & Kettle only.

Marieke's place is just a perfect apartment for a couple, very romantic, cosy and comfortable. Everything is decorating with taste in every details, the bathroom looks like a spa. This one is very near from the city center, next to the tram station and located in a quiet neighborhood. An highly recommended place !

The posting was accurate and the apartment was as expected; quiet and clean with a big master bath. It was a great location for our trip as we were next to the park, walking distance to the museums and the tram was just around the corner. Perfect for us. I have stayed in Amsterdam several times with friends and at hotels.  I would highly recommend to anyone whether its your first trip or not.

The description of Marieke's apartment and photos provided were very accurate, although we were still pleasantly surprised at our arrival of the space and feel of the apartment. We also had good communication before our arrival which was very helpful. Marieke gave really clear instraction of how to get there from the Airport, which was super easy and the neighbourhood was fantastic, with the Vondel Park on the doorsteps and some great local cafes, restaurants and supermarkets.
Very good adress for a short stay in Amsterdam center
Lekker... :) immer wieder gerne!

Very stylish,comfortable and beautifully furnished. 30 mins approx walk from Dam Square. Nicole is a great host, providing delicious rolls for breakfast and everything to make our stay seamless.  Very comfortable beds! Great communication.

Toets is great and awesome! This was my first experience with nocarz and Toets have left me speechless with awe. Even before reaching her house, Toets had me aware of all the events and to-do stuffs during my travel. One of this included Le Grand Départ event flagging off Le Tour de France. If it wasn't for Toets message, I would have just visited Amsterdam, roamed around like one of those dumb tourist walking around, and went away, but luckily this wasn't the case.

She guided me with various other aspects like provided a map, public transportation, tours, etc. The place I stayed was very clean. She provided me with almost everything including towels, utensils, soaps, food, wine, juice, breakfast, books to read, adorable cats to play with, roof-top balcony to enjoy that morning sip of hot coffee, etc. etc. etc. etc. (a BIG list)

Upon request, she also provided me with certain utilities, and she didn't even charge me for that!

Toets is a great host, that you won't regret.
Like I told her before, why do people go to hotels when you have .... !

What a lovely place to go and stay. Nicole was incredibly welcoming and generous with her home. The room itself was lovely and the shower was brilliant!
I spent the day working from the deck on the canal. Couldn't recommend it more!

We really really liked staying on Siem`s Houseboat. It was comfortable, clean and well equipped for self catering.
Unfortunately we haven`t met Siem, but we could text or call him if we wanted to know something. So that was no problem.
We can highly recommend his woonboot.

Great family house near the museums. I like that it was away from the hubbub but easy enough to walk downtown (15 min walk). The place is very much lived in and not a sterile management-run nocarz. I would describe the furnishings/decor as shabby-chic and comfortable.  The kitchen is great. There were 2 sweet cats that lived there with us and required very little care.  It had everything we needed that wasn’t quite listed- washer, dryer, heating, 2 full bathrooms/one half, dishwasher, separate freezer, hairdryer.  I have no hesitations recommending this place.

When we arrived Siem's Dad came to introduce the flat. He was really kind, explaned everything what to know and made us a plan, how we could reach the city centre by bikes easily. The welcome wine and breakfast was really nice and made us totally feel welcome. The boat is really cool. We are fans of the deco!!!

Thank you for such a lovely stay! It’s such a beautiful, stylish and clean apartment with really comfy beds. The drinks in the fridge, tea and coffee was such a lovely and thoughtful touch too! The location was fantastic too :) would definitely come back again!

Experiencia fantástica. El local es bonito, funcional y totalmente equipado. Todo está limpio y ordenado.
Volveré siempre que pueda.
Nicole was very welcoming and helpful. Her home is clean and in a great location. We enjoyed our stay

We absolutely loved our stay here in Amsterdam. The location was perfect - just a minute's walk away from the Nine Streets and a quick walk further north to the Jordaan district. Great restaurants nearby and centrally located to nearly everything. The place was clean and quiet and we would absolutely stay here again!

Robert was at the apartment waiting to greet us when we arrived. He helped take our luggage up the long staircases to the top floor apartment and showed us around. The apartment was beautifully decorated, and the room we stayed in had a big, comfortable bed. The private bathroom was just a sink and shower, which was convenient. The toilet was just outside the room and was shared with other guests. There were other guests staying there on our first night, but we never saw them, and they left early in the morning for the airport.  Robert was communicative and had great recommendations for sights to see and foods to eat. He made us a lovely breakfast both mornings, and chatted with us while we ate. We enjoyed his company very much.  Only downside I can think of is the Westerkirk frequently chiming which I was annoyed with on the first night, but was better adjusted to on the second night. My husband, who is a light sleeper had no issues either night. Overall, we loved the neighborhood, and the apartment was just what we were looking for. Would definitely recommend it!

We, a family of four, kids 7 & 10, stayed for 2 nights. Our highlight in Amsterdam? At sunset, having a glass of wine, unpacking my birthday presents, whilst sitting on the deck and listening to the animals of Artis. A great memory.
That said, the boat itself is charming.
It has many old elements,well painted and is high on atmosphere. The kitchen and the main sleeping room are especially worth mentioning here. Never imagined one can sleep that well on a boat.
Whilst we never met the owner, he offered a very customised list of nice things to do in the neighborhood, keeping well in mind that we have two small kids. Furthermore, he left the key in a cafe ( first drinks on him) , he left some beers and some food in the fridge for us.
So we would recommend the place, especially if you are with kids visting Artis. It is a very convenient,high on atmosphere and quiet place - one hears early in the morning and late in the evening wolves, lions...where else can one find that?
We had a lovely time in Amsterdam and really enjoyed our stay at Ton´s cosy little houseboat. Thank you very much :)

Wenn jemand nach einer speziellen Übernachtung nicht weit vom Stadtzentrum sucht, ist hier genau richtig. Das Hausboot ist wunderschön mit Stil und viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet. Ton hiess uns mit Brot, Käse, Wein, Eiern und sogar einer Rose willkommen.
Ich würde sofort wieder zurück kommen.

We had a wonderful stay at Barbara’s house. The house is spacious with lots of atmosphere. We really appreciated our hosts’ “what-is-ours-is-yours”-attitude.
The neighborhood is great and everything seems to be within walking distance. Taking care of the cats was really easy – and actually quite enjoyable! We highly recommend Barbara’s house!

This apartment is beautiful and the bedroom very comfortable. The area is superb and very central. Sharing the toilet was a bit of a surprise as I assumed ensuite included everything. My husband could not sleep the first 2 nights because of the loud church bells ringing every hour - 2 sleeping tablets helped the 3rd night. The 48 steep steps will not suit everyone. Overall it was a unique experience and we felt as if we were living for a short few days as many of the locals did.

It was a brilliant experience and the place has a lot of character and care which is evident when staying there. Superb space that ignited interest with all the artistic books and references and vintage furniture. Ton was very helpful and a great host would definitely  recommend to anyone who wishes to be in a good spot in Amsterdam but also feel very at home in a comfortable setting

Marcel was so welcoming! His place was very nice and so close to the center. We loved using the bikes he had to go through the city and it was so easy!

Would definitely recommend anyone to stay here!

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans l'appartement de Marcel. Tout en étant très discret, Marcel a répondu présent sans tarder quand nous avons eu besoin de ses services, c'est un hôte hyper agréable. Quand à l'appartement, rien à dire, il était conforme à ce à quoi nous nous attendions au vu des descriptions, les équipements sont à la hauteur, rien ne nous a manqué. La terrasse donne sur une cour magnifique, verdoyante et très ensoleillée, le tout dans un quartier très agréable et proche du centre, que ce soit en transports ou à pieds (15-20 mn). Nous n'avons pas pu utiliser les vélos car ils étaient trop grands pour mon fils, mais nous avons constaté qu'ils étaient en parfait état. Bref, nous sommes ravis!

Ton hat uns super nett begrüßt und uns sein Hausboot für 3 Nächte überlassen. Für uns das erste mal auf einem Hausboot und die Erfahrung muss aufjedenfall jeder gemacht haben. Die Lage gemütlich ruhig, toller Blick aufs Wasser.
Im Großen und Ganzen eine klare Weiterempfehlung!
Wir kommen nochmal😊

Ton siempre fue amigable con nosotros, una persona muy cálida y alegre. Su bote es u. lugar hermoso para quedarse, muy cómodo y tranquilo. se descansa muy bien. la ubicacon está  perfecta para moverte al  entro y a las principales atracciones
Had an amazing time at Marcels ! The location was perfect the room clean & tidy with lots of space and plenty of amenities. Thanks Marcel

L’appartement était exactement comme sur les photos. La terrasse est très agréable, au coucher de soleil vous pourrez profiter du spectacle des oiseaux dans le ciel. Marcel a été super clair dans ses explications et très réactif. Un séjour parfait !

Marcel's apartment is the perfect distance from Amsterdam's centre, it is nice and peaceful in the evenings but not far from the city centre. You can easily walk there in under 30 mins or get a tram which is a 5 minute walk from the front door.
The apartment is perfect for couples or 1 person wanting a nice break, the terrace is cosy and private so if you're coming to Amsterdam to smoke then Marcel's apartment is a must book.
The apartment is also very close to Jordaan which you must visit when coming to Amsterdam as it is beautiful.
To sum up, this apartment is excellent and Marcel is an amazing host, you should book your stay here as soon as possible!

Great place! Central location but quiet for sleeping; comfy bed. Rooftop looked lovely but we didn't get to use it due to rain. Be aware that there are a lot of steps so not a great fit if you have mobility challenges.

Wir haben den Aufenthalt im Appartement von Anna&Marnix mit unseren Jungs (6 und 9 Jahre) sehr genossen.
Die Lage ist spitze! Man ist in einer sehr ruhigen Lage im Grünen (Park mit Spielplatz gegenüber), kann sein Auto parken und ist mit der Fähre in wenigen Minuten mitten im Zentrum.
Das Appartement ist einfach großartig. So viel Platz hätten wir in dieser Lage nicht erwartet. Die Einrichtung ist sehr liebevoll. Für mich als Musiker waren die Gitarre, die alte Orgel und der Plattenspieler eine wahre Freude! Auch unseren Kindern hat das viel Freude bereitet!
Insgesamt eine klare Empfehlung. Falls es uns wieder mal nach Amsterdam zieht, wollen wir unbedingt wieder hier wohnen!

This is a gorgeous houseboat, in a great, quiet location roughly 5 minutes from a tram. Fauve was an amazing host and although we didn't get to meet, they arranged for us to meet a friend of theirs who was very friendly and who went out of their way to help us when we arrived a lot later than intended. No better way to experience Amsterdam than on a houseboat!

Fauve’s houseboat was in a perfect location and it was truly delightful with everything you would need. The checkin / checkout was very straight forward and communication throughout our visit was really great. Would definitely recommend this place and if we revisited Amsterdam would stay there again. Just lovely ..

If you plan to go to Amsterdam for some days and need a bedroom to spend the night nearby the city but not inside , try out Marta and her little cosy house. It's a bit feeling like being at home when you are there.We really enjoyed the few days with Marta as a host and her lovely pets Bruxha & Casper.
War sehr gut
Bon séjour calme au milieu d'une ferme

Paul's apartment in Amsterdam is a gem. The apartment is really clean and spacious. It is also situated in a great neighborhood, near interesting attractions in Amsterdam. Also the hospitality of Paul is second to none. Stacked fridge and pre-paid coffee coupon to mention some. If you are considering going to Amsterdam, you should definitely stay at Paul's apartment! 5/5 !
Gianni was a terrific host. The plave is very clean and quiet. I wiuld definitely recommend to anyone going to Amsterdam.

Elmar is a very nice guy, smiling and friendly.
The flat was amasing and pleasant, we enjoy the very large open view from it...!
It's really a good plan to come to Elmar's home.
We park our car in his private parking, and then we use his two bicycle to go around the city. So very simple and practical.
We really enjoy this trip

Thank you Elmar! And for the t-shirt :) !
For sure next time we come to Amsterdam again, I will come back in your flat

Best regards
Carine and Noémie

we have arrived to fenno apartment in amsterdam for 4 nights. Fenno was really nice and helpful, he gave us some great advices about places to hung out. we went to some of them and his recommendations have been founded as great ones. the place is nice and quiet. great facilities for cookers and there was one thing above all..... THE SHOWER!!! wow the best shower we ever had.
it has to be said the place is a little far from the town center and the saloon is a little. but we really had a GREAT TIME. thank you fenno. keep rocking on...

Excellent séjour à Amsterdam! Très bon accueil de la part de Fenno et à l'écoute pour que notre séjour se passe au mieux. L'appartement est parfait ! Propre, fonctionnel et dispose d'une belle terrasse forte agréable par beau temp. Nous n'hésiterons pas à revenir chez vous pour notre prochain voyage à Amsterdam. Merci

Je recommande vivement cette adresse, idéalement situé à Amsterdam, dans un quartier vivant et très proche de l'hyper centre.
L'appartement est idéal pour un couple, calme et chaleureux.
Fenno est une personne délicieuse, pleine d'attention et particulièrement attentif à vos besoins, pour que votre séjour se passe au mieux.
En Bref, vous ne serez pas déçu.
Great location and the apartment was perfect.

Pros,
1) Everything is very thoughtfully arranged.
2) All the essential amenities are available.
3) Well connected with Metro, Tram & bus
4) Very clean place (especially washroom)
5) Host is very clear with necessary instructions & also helpful.
Cons,
1) Washroom is not attached with the room & needs to be shared with other room. However Gianni keeps it very clean as he also lives on the same floor but different room & uses the same washroom.
2) No kitchen, however he provides coffee machine, microwave & more than enough morning snacks/breakfast.

L'accueil de Joke a été en tout point conforme à l'annonce et aux commentaires élogieux qui l'accompagnaient. Ses qualités humaines (et culinaires) rendent son hospitalité bien amicale, ses efforts pour aplanir les difficultés de langue donnent envie de poursuivre le voyage en sa compagnie.
Todo muy limpio, buena ubicación para moverse en el transporte, habitación muy limpia y ventilada.

Jokes nocarz is fantastic and I can highly recommend it! It is very well located in a lively neighbourhood with lots of pubs and bars around. You can also get to the centre very quickly by tram, the stop is right outside the door. But the walk is also recommended, as you can discover a lot.
The room is tastefully decorated and cosy. The whole flat is very pretty and clean.
Joke is a wonderful host who spoiled us daily with delicious breakfast and gave us great insider tips about the city.
A 5 star accommodation! We really enjoyed our stay there ☺️
Joke is very nice and caring and easy to communicate with. The place is luxurious with delicious breakfast. It beats hotel since you get to meet Joke. Highly recommend.

We loved our stay at Karin, the location and ambiance is perfect!
Very open and friendly hosts, we had an interesting chat and got some usefull tips. Photo's are very accurate; nice and cozy.

Karin's Boathouse was the perfect place to stay for our trip to Amsterdam. It's so central so really easy to get anywhere in the city; it especially helped having the two bikes included in the deal. Without them, it would've been much harder to see as much of the city as we did. Karin and her family were lovely, very helpful and and were very good at making us feel at home. The room was clean, the bed was comfy and there was even a wet room to boot. The view of the canal was the icing on the cake. I can't recommend The Boathouse highly enough - so much awesome for a really nice price. If you're spending some time in the Dam, look no further.

Lovely, well-appointed flat in a cute neighborhood. Easy access via bus and tram to other parts of Amsterdam. Casper and Caroline were very responsive to our questions. We’d love to stay here again if we come back.

I stayed with Wilma and her son for 5 days in January 2014. Overall, it was an excellent experience. The room was very clean and spacious, the bathroom fresh, and the location was close enough to the city centre. One could walk in 30 min, or simply take the tram for 10 min. I can imagine that the house close to the canal would be even better in spring/summer.

Wilma was a great host, and there were complimentary drinks in the room, and some basic equipment for eating breakfast or a small meal, which suited me perfectly.

Great location, nearby a tram station, nice view on a canal. The appartment was clean and nice.
The only thing was the bad sound insulation, so we were waken up on the mornings by Wilma's son. So if you plan to sleep late, it would not be the best place.

A superb location.
Karin is very friendly and a lovely hostess.
It was nice of her to stay.
Thank you Karin.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis, la chambre est idéalement placée. Rien ne manquait.
Encore merci.

Karin hat uns herzlich willkommen geheissen. Sie ist eine aufgestellte, gastfreundliche, unkomplizierte Frau. In ihrem Zuhause fühlt man sich wohl. Das Zimmer war gross und hell. Die Lage war super, 10 Minuten vom Bahnhof und mitten im Zentrum. Der Wegbeschrieb war einfach und klar. Wir haben das Haus sofort gefunden. Wir werden sicher wieder Mal nach Amsterdam kommen und bei ihr um Logis anfragen.

We had a very pleasant stay at Ana’s house. The bed was comfortable, the house warm, hot water was plentiful and the hosts were generous and helpful.
We enjoyed an excellent pizza locally but other than that cooked simple meals at home.
Perfect spot in the middle ofthe city. Great and really kind host.

Mart's place is clean and comfortable. It is only 2 bus stops from the central transport station and easy to get in to town. The building is over 200 years old, but comfortable and roomy and updated. Just be aware the stairs are steep, but what building in Europe isn't?! I had a very good stay with good sleep!

Super süßes Zimmer mit Dachterrasse im Dachgeschoss. Küche, Bad und Wohnzimmer werden mit Mart geteilt, dessen muss man sich bewusst sein.
Zu beachten sind die sehr schmalen Treppen!
Wirklich gemütlich, tolle Lage (alles zu Fuß erreichbar), freundlich - gerne wieder 😊

Der Aufenthalt bei Mart bedarf keiner weiterer Worte. Die Kommunikation war von Anfang an gegeben, er gab klare Informationen, wie man zur Unterkunft gelangt und wie man zu dieser Zutritt erlangte. Jeden Morgen wurde von Mart ein Kaffee angeboten, man konnte sich aber ebenfalls einen Tee oder ähnliches selbst machen, er hielt alles dafür vor.
Er gab Tipps und Tricks, was man unternehmen konnte, erklärte die Abläufe im BnB ganz genau und war allgemein ein sehr zuvorkommender Gastgeber.
Für meinen nächsten Aufenthalt in Amsterdam würde ich auf alle Fälle, wenn verfügbar, die Unterkunft bei Mart wieder buchen.

Our family loved this place!  We enjoyed watching the boats going up and down the canal and the great location.  Margo was really helpful, they live in the apartment below,  she left us passes to the Rijksmuseum and helpful papers and where to eat and sights to see.
Idéalement placé et très joli. Parfait pour une famille.
Roel is a very nice host. His windmill is as presented in the description: unexpected and confortable. Our stay was, as our host atypical and charming.
We’ve really enjoyed our stay here and would really recommend to stay here! Great host, location and room on private floor with bathroom.
Loved the boat. I can totally recommend it. Our stay was great and the boat is so central that we could practically walk everywhere. Dann was a great host and helpful.
Apartamento muito bom, limpo, organizado, com ótima localização e a Wilma é muito atenciosa com tudo e ajuda muito com dicas para conhecer a cidade, recomendo com certeza !
Mooie locatie in een prachtige omgeving. Roel (en kat) zijn heel gastvrij. Een aanrader !
我们非常高兴能体验住在风车里。这里很安静，很自然，适合居住。房东为我们介绍了风车的构造，还为我们准备了早餐。值得推荐的地方。

We had a great time on Daan's houseboat. The place is very nice and with a walk of a few minutes you can reach everything you need. City center, supermarket, tram, even to the centraal station it is only around 15-20 minutes by foot.
The boat is in a good shape. It was apleasure to sit on the roof terrace in the evening.
I would definetly recommend to stay at Daan's boat, if it is available.
Great city, perfect area to stay and lovely boat so much nicer than being stuck in a hotel room. We’ll be back!

Location of the houseboat is very ideal and convenient with access to public transport, restaurants/ cafes and supermarket all within a short walk.
Houseboat is also very comfortable, homey with all lifestyle facilities provided and functioning well.
Host is very approachable, timely and communicates extremely well. Also very accommodative to requests and helps with the check-in of heavy luggage especially with steep stair access into the boat. Children enjoyed the experience and was sad to leave on the last day of our stay!
Thanks for making our stay memorable and pleasant!
Roel is a wonderful host. The room is clean and comfortable. It was a great adventure staying in the windmill. It was easy to get to the city center. Highly recommend.

100% recommended !
The appartment is well located, you have to walk 5 min to the tram. We really enjoyed the bikes, that you can use whenever you want during your stay.
The room and bathroom are great, Wilma thought of everything we could possibly need. We stayed for 7 days and everything was perfect!
Finally, we felt very welcomed by Wilma, who is very kind and available.
We had a wonderful stay and will not hesitate to come back!

Der Gastgeber war super freundlich und unkompliziert. Die Unterkunft war ein bisschen schmuddelig und das zweite Doppelbett war etwas klein. Jedoch die Lage und die Dachterasse war der Hammer!!! Ich würde es für einen Männer-Kurztrip sofort wider buchen.

Amazing nocarz definitely a must place to stay if this place isn’t booked. We were given a quick breakfast in the early morning because of our flight, which was very hospitable of Roel (the host) to do. We appreciated the hospitality, kindness, and the space we were given and loved every moment staying in this nocarz.
Great spot. Had a wonderful time.  Thoroughly recommended

We loved staying at Hinde and Rafael's house. The house was perfect for our family of five. We had two cribs and a little bed for the kids. Also they loved to play with Chadi's toys. The house is great if you travel with kids.

The kitchen is very luminous and has all the necessary tools and tableware to cook at home. The apartment is conveniently located around 10 min. walk from tram 13 that takes you to central station. There are two super markets close to the house too.

If I had something to say I think the bathroom could have been a little cleaner. Anyway, it is a great and charming place to stay that I would definitely recommend. I want to thank Hinde and Rafael for being so nice and helpful with all our needs.
This was a fantastic location with an even more fantastic host. Could not recommend enough!

I had a wonderful stay at Miguel's beautiful two-floor penthouse. The apartment is spacious, well-equipped, and has a large terrace that's perfect for relaxing. The main bedroom is comfortable, and the kitchen with a bar area is great for meals. It’s located in a quiet part of the city but still close to everything. Highly recommend and would stay again!

We really enjoyed our stay! The space is in a historical building and the room is clean with a comfortable bed. Wilma was very welcoming and was happy to share her recommendations in the area. We recommend this nocarz to others!

Being greeted by Ayla and Max (the welcoming canine) upon our return to Amsterdam was one of the most wonderful experiences of our trip. Jake and Ayla's houseboat is a delightful place to spend a few nights in Amsterdam. The bed was super comfy, and the upstairs area was perfect to sit and enjoy coffee and write. The shower was also wonderful, complete with a porthole for ambiance and ventilation. :) Jake and Ayla were so hospitable and gracious to us during our stay- thank you!!

Aldo's flat is gorgeous with a big spacious open plan living room/kitchen area. It's spotlessly clean and very comfortable and beautifully decorated. The kitchen has everything you would need and the bed is really comfy too!
The flat is perfectly located - it's about a 5 minute walk from the Heineken building and about 10 minutes or less to walk to Rijksmuseum. It's in a really lovely quiet residential street which is near the Albert Cuyp market and has lots of lovely places to eat and interesting little shops. The tram/bus stop is close by and it's a really good location to explore the city from.
It's nice and quiet at night too - we had no issues with noise.

Great apartment - had plenty of space, great natural light, brand new kitchen and all working ammenities.
Amazing location too - surrounded by great restaurants, bars and cafes. As well walking distance to all of the great museums and public transport.
Would recommend in an instant :)

We had an amazing time in Amsterdam! The houseboat is located in a very nice area of the city and just 5-10 minutes from the central station. There are a lot of restaurants, shops and bars just around the corner. Sean (a friend of Ayla & Jake) was answering all our questions and was very helpful. Even in winter a stay in the houseboat really worth it!
The boat is equipped with everything you need (including maps of Amsterdam, coffee machine, fridge, wifi and music boxes) and even the bagel restaurant for which we got vouchers is great. We definitely recommend this place and would go back anytime!

We were relaxed, comfortable  and happy in our little boat quarters. Ayla and Jake were nice, and thoughtful. The neighborhood was quiet but close to everything, the bed was very comfortable and the shower was nice and hot.  Highly recommend!
An incredible experience.  I am 6'3 and the space was great for me, especially the shower.  Ayla and Jake are both so warm and accommodating.  Great experience.
Tolles Boot - super Lage - liebevolle Einrichtung - absolut empfehlenswert.

We had great stay at Marloes & Gabriel apartment. It's a nice spacious place with good location with just few minutes walking distance to bus or 25 mins on bike to the centre. The apartment is right next to a gorgeous park which we really enjoyed riding bikes through. Marloes & Gabriel were very kind to lend us 2 bikes to use during our stay. We highly recommend this place to anyone travelling to Amsterdam.
gerne wieder :)

La nostra permanenza a casa di Jacqueline è stata perfetta!
La casa era proprio come appare nelle foto : pulita ed accogliente, con uno stile ricercato. Jacqueline ci ha dato indicazioni precise per arrivare alla casa e l'accoglienza è avvenuta senza alcuni intoppi.
La casa è raggiungibile con estrema facilità con i Tram e la mattina ci mettevamo 10 minuti per arrivare nel centro della città. Il quartiere è molto carino, e ci sono bar e ristoranti a pochi minuti a piedi dal portone di casa.
Ci siamo trovati benissimo e consiglio vivamente di pernottare in questa casetta per godersi a pieno un soggiorno ad Amsterdam….io sicuramente ci tornerò!

It was a fantastic week-end. Peter received us graciously. A gifty basket was installed. The houseboat is a romantic place, very clean.
We were independent but Peter can be joigned easily. He lives in a another place of the houseboat. And we were near the city centre.
This town is very charming with a beautiful architecture and very quiet with all those bikes.
We recommend this location. We have now a lot of fantastic memories...

We loved staying on Peter's boat! Very easy to find and very close to the tram making central Amsterdam very accessible. The boat was very clean, plenty of clean towels and the bed is incredibly comfy! Wish we would have booked one extra day just to spend in that cozy comfortable bed! Thanks for making our trip so memorable, Peter.

Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt bei unserem kurzen Aufenthalt. Trotz Verspätung mit der Bahn und guter Kommunikation mit Peter zwischendurch hat dann alles wunderbar geplant. Es ist eine wunderschöne Unterkunft und wir haben uns sehr sehr wohl gefühlt. Das Boot liegt sehr zentral sodass alle Ziele in der Innenstadt in wenigen Minuten gut zu erreichen waren. Von Vorteil war auch die Gastronomie in der nahen Umgebung. Bagels & Beans war ein Segen zum Frühstück. Für unseren nächsten Besuch in Amsterdam würden wir diese Art der Unterkunft wieder bevorzugen :-)
Great communication, flexible and considerate host with a lovely apartment close to restaurants and grocery store. Perfect distance from the city centre.

The location and neighborhood were excellent and was quite convenient to get everywhere by food. I lied the communication before and during the stay and recommend the place. The apartment is very unique and cosy with lots of wonderful details. Thank you for the great stay and flexibility!

Brilliant host. Lovely apartment. Very kind and enthusiastic to help if needed. Very helpful information left for us in the apartment about local information.
Few minutes walk to various tram stops in to the city. Good night bus access. Would very much recommend staying here!

The loft on the canals was the most perfect way to experience Amsterdam. Mark was a fantastic host, very hospitable and easy going. This has been our favourite nocarz and we highly recommend you book this for your next visit to Amsterdam!
Perfect location for a few days in Amsterdam. The accommodation is clean, stylish and well appointed. Mark was courteous and helpful and very easy to deal with. Would recommend 100%.

El barco estuvo padre, la llegada es accesible. Estaba muy limpio y con detalles personales que nos dejó Peter. Su mamá nos atendió y nos dio la llave. Es buena la experiencia de vivir  en una casa flotante perl sí se me hizo caro.
非常好 很可愛的貓

The apartment is beautiful and Cozy.

the district of Pijp is one of our best place.
Close to everything you need. tram station, markets, coffee, restaurants, rental bikes, parc...
Great and quiet neighborhoods. Really a Cool place!

Wendy is the best. He took care of everything we could ask for and was available for any questions . ( whatsapp :-) )
The description to get the appartement is perfect
She really made our stay perfect.

So clearly and truly I can say that this apartment is G-R-E-A-T-!
The location is perfect,
and Wendy amazing

Thank you Wendy

For sure We will be back to visit!!

Fleur's apartment was the perfect place for my wife and our girls. You could tell that a large effort was made to ensure we felt at home. The house was sparkling clean with, and had everything our family could need. Our girls loved the park up the road, and we enjoyed the foodhallen just a few minutes walk away. Gonnie the caregiver was great, and came over in a moments notice when we locked our phone inside. This nocarz was the best part of our trip!
My wife & I stayed at Anne's place for a weekend. Anne had everything covered with rips
L' appartement est très agréable et sympathique, calme, proche du quartier Jordaan, avec fenêtres donnant sur le canal.
We really enjoyed our stay! The place is very conveniently located and easy to get to.
In eigen land een vakantie gevoel

I definitely recommend Peter's place.  The boat house apartment was quaint.  I had a lovely stay.  The street/canal neighborhood is very calm (no noise) and yet a <5 minute walk to a choice of nice restaurants, museums, and the zoo.  The location is ideal.  Peter was available to greet me on my arrival and graciously kept my suitcase while I did some visiting on the day of my departure.  The boat apartment has all the basics in the kitchen (salt, pepper, evoo, vinegar, honey, sugar, coffee, tea, etc).

Peaceful, tranquil and chilled. A wonderful place to stay and relax.
Clean, stylish and unique.
I thoroughly recommend staying here
Carla has a great apartment, only a short walk/tram ride into the city and a great park with bars & restaurants right across the road!

This is a wonderful apartment in my favorite area of Amsterdam. The place is perfect for couples and beautifully decorated. It's even nicer than the pictures suggest because Yvonne got a new couch, TV and kitchen table. You get lots of natural light from both sides of the flat. The kitchen is well-equipped. The bathroom is spacious. The stairs up to the bedroom loft are steep, but easy to manage, and the bed is large and comfy. You're on one of the most happening blocks in Jordaan, with great restaurants, bars and cafes just downstairs (check out La Perla for incredible pizza!) -- but up in the bedroom, we didn't hear any street noise! Yvonne was a pleasure to deal with, just a super nice person. We would love to stay here again in the future. Thank you, Yvonne!

The apartment has everything you need in a convenient and lively location. Jesse is superb with fast communication and checked in with us during our stay. While the other reviews mentioned the street noise, it didn’t bother us. I felt it typical for a bustling neighborhood. The stairs are narrow, but I assume they are standard for the architecture. We really enjoyed staying here and would return again in the future. Can’t beat the short walk to trams and metro stations. Grocery, pharmacy and liquor is a 2 minute walk. Endless choices for delicious restaurants and just few minutes from Albert Cuyp street market.

Een heerlijk verblijf gehad op een fantastische lokatie op loop afstand van alles wat Amsterdam te bieden heeft. Op het dek van de boot de laatste avondzon mee kunnen pikken  terwijl de laatste bootjes voorbij varen. Een aanrader.

Just outside of the main part of town you will find this perfect location in a humble quiet neighbourhood. Nadia is an absolute gem and willing to lend a hand or offer advice at any point. You genuinely get the feeling that they care and what you to have the best time possible in Amsterdam!
The place is close to public transport (trains, buses and trams) and major grocery stores are only a short 10-15 minute walk away. You can be at central station in as quick as 10-15 minutes by train, but the bus ride is quite nice as well if your willing to take a little longer.
The accomodation is small but has everything you need including a fully functional kitchen and great wifi and comfortable bed! Can get a bit hot in the summer afternoons, but cools down nicely through the night!
For those interested in fitness, there are multiple gyms around. There is one about 15-20 min walk, or a great one about 15-20 bus ride away (Shape All In).
The apartment was perfect - Great location and very clean. Eduard was a great host and very helpful. Highly recommended!

Although we didn't meet Alex, she was very communicative throughout our stay and responded very quickly to messages. It was easy to get the key from her cleaning woman, and simple to check out. The surrounding neighborhood had a lot of popular and well-reviewed bars and restaurants, and it was almost literally right next to the Heineken Experience, if you're interested in that. It is also right around the corner from a tram stop, which makes it easy to get downtown, although it was also a nice walk to that area if you have the time.

The apartment was very clean and bright with the large windows pictured, and the view onto the courtyard was lovely - I just wish we could have had access to it! It made for a peaceful stay, especially when it came time to sleep. The kitchen was stocked with bowls, plates, and utensils, as well as some condiments in the fridge.

There were some minor downsides to the apartment, such as the steep staircase (which we assume is typical and we didn't have too much of a problem with, but others might) and some uncomfortable springs in the couch and the bed. The bedroom window opened fine, but we were unable to open either living room window, which made it a little stuffy at times without much air circulating. We heard our neighbors at times (other nocarz's we think) but it didn't disrupt our stay.

Overall, this was a good find when we booked fairly close to our trip, and we were pleased with our stay!

Alco was a great host and was helpful to us throughout the stay.
I was travelling with my infant baby and the house was in perfect shape. The apartment is very well located with a tram stop just 50 metres away and if you rent a car there is ample parking outside on the lane as well at very low cost at a huge parking lot less than 150 metres away.

Really lovely place and the ideal way to spend time in Amsterdam. The size was just right, the bed was incredibly comfortable and sitting out on the roof in the evenings was so nice. I’d really recommend this place.

This was the perfect spot for our weekend getaway! We will absolutely be staying here again if we can. Peter offered to take our luggage when we landed early. He was the best host! Extremely responsive and helpful. We loved this location! Easy 10 min tram into the centre. And we loved walked around the quiet neighborhood for breakfast too. 10/10!!
An absolutely fantastic place to stay in Amsterdam - perfect location, great atmosphere, couldn't of wanted anything more!

Edouard est un hôte formidable ! Il est très ouvert et aime partager ce qu'il connait si bien de sa ville, c'était un réel plaisir d'échanger avec lui un peu chaque jour sur nos découvertes. Son appartement est fonctionnel et très propre. Il est situé dans un quartier typique de la ville (il faut donc être prêt à monter les 3 étages à pied via un escalier assez raide, typique des immeubles du centre d'Amsterdam ; à noter qu'Edouard nous a bien aidé en montant nos valises !). Les principaux sites à visiter sont tous accessibles à pied (20-25 min de marche environ, et à quelques minutes du tram). Résider quelques jours chez lui a été pour mon fils et moi une parfaite expérience d'immersion dans cette très jolie ville !

Eduard greeted us at the door before we could even ring. He welcomed us into the place, gave us a quick overview of the city and recommendations - many of which we did and were excellent experiences. Very clean place, excellent host, and great location close to everything.

A great place to stay! Very close to the Metro stop, walkable from center city, peaceful location, quiet and safe late at night, extremely comfortable bed, fantastic water pressure in the shower, squeaky clean environment, and Peter was very friendly and responsive! Also, if you are a bigger and taller person like I am and you are worried about the size of the space, I had plenty of space to move around and found it very easy to use the ladder. You should definitely stay aboard Peter’s place on your next visit to Amsterdam!

I had a Fantastic stay in the apartment. Maartje and Camille are very friendly, easy to talk to and we were always in touch; throughout my stay they were checking regularly if I needed anything (which I didn’t since the apartment is well equipped!).

I already stayed the second time at Maartje’s and Camille’s place and it was as perfect as the first time :) they are both lovely persons and Maartje even took me by car in the morning because she was working next to the place I needed to go. I mean how cool is this - I enjoyed the daily talks in the car and even got to know a lot of details about life in Amsterdam and topics that currently move its inhabitants. What a beautiful nocarz experience :)) i will definitely come back!

Maartje and Camille have the best nocarz in all of Amsterdam!! Additionally they are very kind, always helpful, flexible, fun to be around with and the apartment is just perfect. This was my third (!) time in Maartjes & Camilles place, and I would/will come back for sure, feeling at home already! Almost, I would have never left... ;)

Spacieux et bien équipé, l'appartement est idéalement situé pour visiter Amsterdam. Bien que je ne parle un bon anglais, Eduard a pris du temps pour discuter avec nous et nous conseiller. Je recommande vivement

This is my first time in Amsterdam during the winter and also my first time using nocarz in Amsterdam, although I've been there many times previously. I needed a place for a long weekend that is located close to my local friends' place that is clean and comfortable. Joyce's place ticked all the right boxes and the listing is accurate. Joyce was very welcoming, being there at the place when I arrived and when I departed.

Something to note is that there is a very nice looking garden that I think would be very nice to use in summer (as you can see from the photos in the listing). In addition, there are two negatives that one should be aware of: (i) the bathroom is relatively small for my taste; and (ii) I did note the neighbours coming in and going out during the night time and in the morning.

Overall, I still recommend this place.

We have stayed in August 2017, the appartment is very nice.Perfect location: very closed to many bars, restaurants and shops. I would recommend the appartment without any reservations! Thank you so much, Ella!

Great space, great location. A beautiful open air market right next to you.
I strongly recommend this apartment.

Very nice apartment in a good area of Amsterdam. The street is quiet but hustle and bustle close by and 2 tram stops within 5 mins walk. No adverse comments about the apartment whatsoever and check in / communication very efficient

The bed was comfortable, although very high up? The bathroom didn't make sense, took me a minute to figure out where the toilet was. Our host gave us a lot of helpful tips and it they accepted our request on very short notice.

Marijke was e really nice host! alltough she wasn't home the first 2 days, everything was perfectly prepared and clean. We met her the last day when she came home fromher holidays. She's a absolutly agreable person, would book again!
Olga, Mutter vom Katja, war sehr freundlich und hat uns einen späten Check-In erlaubt. Die Wohnung ist in super lage und war sehr sauber! Danke nochmals! :)
Apartment is in a good location but appliances and unit is a bit old.

Ian and his friend Patrick were really nice and helpful to us and made themselves available for  any query during all our stay. The apartment is nice, functional and located in a very quiet neighborhood with a beautiful view.

This place was perfect - just what we were looking for. The location is prime (right in the center of the action and a short walk to the Train Station), the guys that live there are friendly and normal. The place is clean and cool. They were available if they needed to be helpful but we had plenty of privacy.
A great place to be; quiet, clean, nice view on the gardens, and only 5 min by underground to the center.
Great place to be !  Cosy, friendly, easy to find and so quite. So easy to visit Amsterdam !

Margot was wonderful! Her place is a cute studio with plenty of space. We found it to be clean and as described. She included cheeses and meats for breakfast and snacking. We had very relaxed mornings here before hitting the pavement each day for exploring.
We were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go and found her neighborhood to be quiet and safe!

The houseboat really exceeded our expectations, we had a really comfortable and relaxed stay. Annemiek and Bauke could not have been more kind and helpful, from leaving some food and wine to helping with the local purchase of a saxophone case. Also so lovely to wake up in the morning to see a duck gliding past the window -if they ever leave here I will be first in the queue to move in! Will hopefully return sooner rather than later as plenty more to do and see in Amsterdam.
We really enjoyed our time in Amsterdam and staying at Margot's place was big part of that experience. Well located, clean and funcional. Would definitely book it again.
A wonderful experience to stay on Emma’s house boat!! Lovely restaurants and shops nearby. Neat with everything we needed. Would really recommend this place.
The location is fantastic. Down a quiet street but within a short walk you are right in the middle of the busy city.
Sheryl & Lukasz's apartment was fantastic. Clean, great location and checking in and out was so easy. Would highly recommend!!

Njords apartement is very nice, clean and cosy. It´s inside of a typical old builing of Amsterdam. It´s perfect for everyone, who wants to stay in a very nice and central neighbourhood, with many restaurants and bars. The contact with Njord was perfect, very kind and helpful. Thank you Njord, we felt like at home!

The apartment was as promised and Ellen responded to questions quickly. She was not there to welcome us but had organised other person to greet us. The weather in Amsterdam was rather cold at the time and the house was a bit cold, so bring your warm sock just in case. When the weather warmed, it was really nice to spend time in the beautiful back yard. Bus stop was really close, a nice cafe at the corner, a grocery store close by, and the apartment was just enough off from the bigger street to be nicely quiet.

The photos depicts exactly how her place is, simple and cosy. Rosie has been an extremely helpful host, who went out of her way to get me travel information after I told her about my plan to book a day trip. Breakfast at her place is a good time to interact with guests from the other room who may give you some recommendations to do around the city. Definitely an interaction and experience one may not get from staying in a hotel. Tram is almost right at the door step and takes about 15 mins to get to the central which is really convenient as it passes by most of the main areas like Dam square and museumplein. However, do note that the walls are thin and you can hear the movements outside your room. If you can live with that, her place will be a great place to stay!

Sehr gute Ausstattung, sehr sauber, gute Matratzen. Bei geschlossenen Fenstern, Lärm von Autobahn und Flughafen geringer als gedacht. Zu beachten: Dachterrasse - kein Balkon, wie auf Foto. Für Besucher mit kleinen Kindern: bodentiefe Fenster lassen sich zur Wasserseite groß öffnen. Kein Schutzgitter vorhanden. Gute Lage. Ca. 5 bis 10 Gehminuten zur Straßenbahn. Sehr gut funktionierendes WLAN bzw. Internet.

Great little cozy place near the center of Amsterdam (Only 15 mins away by tram). Wilbert was a great host everything was clean and tidy. The staircase was kinda steep, but after being in different houses and shops in the Amsterdam, most of the stairs were like that.

We had such a wonderful time staying on your houseboat.  Thank you so much for taking the time to introduce yourself.  The description of the houseboat matched the experience we had - clean, location, amenities.  The bikes you provided were amazing.  We were able to see and do so much more without relying on transit.  Once we understood the rules of the road, the bikes provided us with so much freedom.  A 6 minute bike ride to get groceries and a 20 minute bike ride to Centrum.  We would definitely go back.
Definitely recommend Wilbert's place. Everything was great from his directions to check-in to availability to hospitality.
A nice quiet area from the city, yet not far from it. Thr public transport is convenient to get too not close but not far overall had a great stay .
Wilbert was a perfect host and his nocarz was so nice! Extremely clean, great area, comfortable bed, great shower and mini kitchen.
I loved the place! It looked exactly like the photos, the location is great, and the hospitality... A place I'll book again for sure!

Wilbert is a sociable and helpful host, he's easy-going and it's great to know that he is always available to help out with any questions or queries. Checking in was simple and the place was perfectly clean and tidy.

The room was clean and easy to reach. The host was friendly, but due to - apparently - several bad previous experiences of the host, we were not able to get a key which would have allowed us to go for breakfast - without our luggage - and to come back again to pick it and have a work call before checking out.
Nice place very conveniently located between the airport and Amsterdam center

Hay muchas reglas que Rosie no tiene en la descripcion del alojamiento, lo trata a uno como niño de 7 años y es un poco incómodo recibir tantas reglas. Me parece que en su vecindario no saben que renta habitaciones o no quiere que se enteren porque no me dejo hablar en la puerta sino me calló y eran las 10 de la mañana. Un tema bien delicado es el baño que es un tanto especial.
El agua caliente que me proveyó con las instrucciones no era suficientemente caliente.
Clean and safe space close to the heart of the city. Rosie is a wonderful host and I highly recommend this stay 🙂
I really enjoyed staying at Rosie's. They're a lovely couple, family-oriented and made me feel at home. They have a beautiful home and the area is awesome.
amazing place. little far from central. The host is very nice and helpful.
Great value for a great location. Dinos is thoughtful and always ready to help you out :) we enjoyed staying at his place very much!
Much better than I’ve expected. I will stay again at the same place again, for many times I hope.
Cozy and spacious 2 bedroom apartment on a houseboat. Everything is very clean and well organized. Free bikes a plus. Will probably return, but in the summer to better enjoy the top deck on the boat!

The apartment was very homely and comfortable. we also managed to rent bicycles from their neighbor at very reasonable prices. His cat was also very well behaved and was fun to play with. Location was near the tram, but we mostly cycled, as the city was very accessible by bicycles.
Great apartment very stylish and clean has all the things you will need for a comfortable stay the location is great walking distance to everywhere
We had a great stay, my son loved seeing the ducks every morning! Lovely bakery around the corner and there was excellent transport links into town and the airport. Thanks!

We hebben het enorm naar ons zin gehad op de woonark, alles zag er netjes, schoon en verzorgd uit. Ook was de ruimte erg smaakvol ingericht. Alles wat we nodig hadden was aanwezig en Harry reageerde en kwam snel te hulp op onze vragen. Het dakterras is echt heerlijk en de ruimte zelf een unieke ervaring. De omgeving van de woonark zelf is rustig en omgeven met groen. We hebben er gewoon een heel fijne paar dagen vakantie gehad, zeker een aanrader! Dankjewel!
This houseboat was a great end to our Europe trip, it is in a peaceful neighborhood with a short bike ride to the most popular attractions and restaurants
Nice place just outside the centre of Amsterdam. Definitely a worth for a comeback!
Hey Joyce. Bedankt voor de overnachting. Echt een top huis met een top locatie. Wie weet tot ziens :)

This is a wonderful apartment, full of character and very cosy. It was just as we had imagined based on the photos.
The apartment is just outside the city centre, so you get a lovely local vibe and does not feel too touristy, but is close enough to everything that (apart from arriving/leaving) we were able to walk everywhere. It was especially useful for exploring the Jordaan, Grachtengordel and museum areas. So you get culture, canals and great places to eat/drink right on your doorstep!
Eva made us feel very welcome, our flight was late arriving and she was great about waiting around for us and helping us find our way when we were tired. She had left us a bottle of wine to welcome us and provided a map and a brilliant little guide to places around Amsterdam that she recommended visiting, including some lovely restaurants in the area. Even though she was going to be away, she made sure we knew we could contact her any time and had left us the number of a friend in the area in case we needed something in an emergency.
We loved this flat and would happily return, it made a lovely holiday even more special.

Simone was on holiday during our stay, so we did not get a chance to meet her in person. However, all communication with her was prompt and pleasant! Her style and decor was fantastic, which made my wife really feel comfortable during my work hours. All in all, she was an excellent host-from-afar and we would definitely stay again!

Gorgeous, gorgeous place with a lovely roof,in a vibrant neighborhood. The stairs are very real, so you should be in proper climbing shape, but this is one of the most beautiful apartments I've been in, let alone stayed in.

Nienke is very interested us. Call and send messages.
Nienke is so cute. We are very happy to amsterdam holiday.
House not far from city centre, 2-3 min walk after going to the train. This train going evetywhere. Good location, good host. Thank you so much. 👍
Trinette is a warm and accommodating host. The neighborhood is charming and quiet. Close to very good restaurants, a bakery and grocery. Very cozy place much like a little village.

Very nice and quite place. Very clean. Very nice location and neighborhood. Very nice hosts
Appartement tres agréable calme et propre. Très bien situé dans un quartier très sympa, un peu à l’écart de l’agitation, à une vingtaine de minutes de marche du centre. Hôtes très agréables, discrets et bienveillants !

It's all about the location! A beautiful canal house right in the city centre. No hotel can match the experience we got here. A very good and comfortable stay.  However there was a lack of personal touch to the whole process, which is the whole idea of nocarz. Nonetheless a pleasant experience and would recommend it to others.

Wij hebben genoten in deze mooie ruime loft van Marie-Sophie. Ze heeft ons super goede tips gegeven en had alles netjes geregeld. Haar huis is aan het einde van het Vondelpark in een nette buurt. Je kunt wandelen naar het centrum of met de tram en de auto is ook vlakbij goedkoop te parkeren. Wij hebben een super goede ervaring met de ligging, het huis en met Marie-Sophie en raden het dus zeker iedereen aan!

Wir waren vor einer Woche in der wunderschönen Wohnung von Marie-Sophie. Diese war sehr sauber, stylisch und entsprach absolut der Beschreibung ihrer Anzeige.
Schon vor unserer Anreise in Amsterdam hatten wir SMS Kontakt mit ihr und somit den Eindruck wirklich willkommen zu sein. Wir haben Marie - Sophie dann auch persönlich kennengelernt und sie war immer für uns da und wußte zu jeder Frage (nach Restaurant etc.) immer sehr schnell eine ausführliche Antwort.
Die Wohnung liegt in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße. In nur wenigen Gehminuten trifft man auf ausgezeichnete Cafés, Restaurants, einen Fahrradverleih, Supermarkt und diverse kleine Geschäfte.
Durch den nahgelegenen Vondelpark ist man in ca. 20 Minuten zu Fuß in der Altstadt von Amsterdam.
Wir würden jederzeit wieder zu Marie-Sophie kommen und können sie und ihre Wohnung uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen!
Was a lovely appt in a good area, really close to the cdb. Just rent bikes and u will have great holidays

Logement trés agréable conforme aux photos, Christian nous avait gentiment laissé une bouteille de vin rouge sur la table du salon pour notre arrivée.
Quartier trés calme (Amsterdam Noord) et à 15 minutes à pied du ferry (bac gratuit, fréquence toutes les 5-6 min, 24/24) qui permet ensuite d'atteindre la Central Station en 3 minutes, le quartier rouge et le quartier de Jordaan sont trés accessibles à pied, nous n'avons jamais pris le tram ou le métro, le centre d'Amsterdam restant assez petit.
Le toit terrasse est trés agréable meme si le temps n'était pas vraiment de la partie...
Les chats sont sympas et assez indépendants, juste à leur donner à manger avec quelques carresses !
Pas de problème pour se garer juste devant l'immeuble.
En résumé, un bel endroit pour passer nos 2 nuits, nous étions trés bien installé. Vivement recommandé !
Many thanks Christian. Brice & Flo.
Wonderful communication with the hosts, great location for those wanting to explore the city.

We had a wonderful 5-night stay in this apartment! This was my third time visiting Amsterdam and the best location I have stayed in. It is far enough from the city center to have a little more peace and quiet, but extremely accessible to many wonderful  tourist destinations. The de Pijp neighborhood is wonderful with cafes, bars and restaurants on every block. The Saphartipark across the street is a nice little green oasis. The apartment is extremely comfortable with a well-stocked kitchen, enormous bathroom and comfortable sitting area. It sleeps four very comfortably if you don't mind not having too much privacy,  and was quite affordable compared to other similar-sized apartments. I appreciated that it was on the first floor and we didn't have to carry our suitcases up the stairs! Our host was very sweet and friendly, helpful and responsive but not intrusive. I would definitely stay here again.
Great place and well located. Sonja was nice and flexible with arrival and departure times.
Appartement correct, très bien situé près d'une ligne de tram.

This is a gorgeous home! We have been on many boats in Amsterdam and this is definitely one of our favourites ... The location is peaceful and away from trouble but within easy reach of all you need and a quick connection to the center. We loved the cats and the duck and all the lovely items on board. All the best to you!
Was a very nice holiday, rooms are clean and spacious. Super nice, quiet area of ​​Amsterdam, in 10 minutes you are also in the center. Dear hosts, thank you for everything!
We had a nice stay at Stef's place and can absolutely recommend it.

Had a great stay, the place was perfect. Just hope for better weather next time we come 😀
Thanks Stef, see you in the future
Alice and George
Nathalie's place is in a great location in a great city.  Her home felt like a real home where someone lives, and that made the stay that much more comfortable.

Overall​, the stay was a really pleasant one. We actually appreciated the fact the host didn't disturb us, though being there for check in and check out would've preferable. Also as we are reasonably new to the city, having someone to recommend places and potentially show us round would've been really appreciated. The location of the apartment was just fantastic and really made the stay a lot more convenient and comfortable, as well as beautiful as being on a canal was just amazing. If we get the chance would love to stay again and would definitely recommend this place to a friend.

This is such a lovely studio apartment. Clean, tidy and comfortable to stay in. Easy walkable distance from most locations with plenty of bars, coffee shops and restaurants close to the apartment.  We had a fantastic time in Amsterdam and staying here and having a lovely place to come back to after all the waking around was so nice. I would recommend this apartment and we would love to come back again.
Very stylish apartment located in a cozy neighborhood! Everything went very smooth and we can recommend the place to the community!
Great room - spacious and nice decor - in a great location! Edith was the best host ever - kind, gave us help with a few things we needed and flexible on arranging meet up.
Mooie plek dicht bij het Leidseplein. Het lekkere ontbijt en de uitgebreide babbel met Edith waren de perfecte start van de dag. Een aanrader !
Schöne Unterkunft etwas außerhalb von Amsterdam City - mit dem Fahrrad fühlt man sich allerdings wie heimisch in der Stadt! Frans ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber. Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt.

Maria is an amazing host! My friend and I just traveled abroad and stayed in Amsterdam for a few days before heading back home. Maria immediately greeted us and gave us very helpful information about the surrounding areas/things to do. She even gave us directions from the airport to her nocarz. The location is perfect! It is just outside the city and is a very delightful area to stay in. We pretty much walked everywhere and if we did take a bus it wasn’t a far walk to the stop. Definitely recommend to anyone wanting to have a great experience in Amsterdam! Maria is the sweetest and is willing to help you with anything you may need :)

Wir haben eine wunderschöne, sonnige Zeit verlebt. Die Gastgeber waren ein wenig reserviert aber sehr nett. Wir wurden nett empfangen und direkt mit allen nötigen Info's bezüglich der Unterkunft, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Lokalen in der Nähe etc. versorgt.
Die Unterkunft war sauber, hell und schön eingerichtet. Das Boot liegt in einer ruhigen Gegend und man geniesst eine tolle Aussicht ;) Die Küche ist mit allem bestückt was man für einen mehrtägigen Aufenthalt benötigt.
Als sehr einladende und nette Geste standen bei unserer Ankunft einige Getränke im Kühlschrank und ein wenig Obst und Kekse bereit.
Im unteren Bereich, also im Bad und Schlafzimmer gibt es eine Bodenerwärmung - sehr angenehm!
Was man wissen sollte, das Bett hat nur eine große Decke. Da leider keine zweite im Schrank war, haben wir uns noch eine vom Gastgeber geben lassen, was aber überhaupt kein Problem war.
Die Fahrräder die zur Unterkunft gehören sind total klasse. Da wir top Wetter hatten, sind wir nur mit dem Rad unterwegs gewesen.
Das war mit der tollen Unterkunft das Highlight der Reise - man lernt Amsterdam ganz anders kennen - einfach nur TOLL.
*** Immer wieder gerne...***
This is a great room in a perfect location. Edith took the time to welcome us and give us some very useful travel tips. I would highly recommend this place!

Frans was very welcoming and very helpful. He communicated clearly how to get to the apartment and even offered to pick us up from the airport. He had left breakfast items and beer in the fridge for our arrival and was easy to communicate with throughout our stay.

The place is great the room is really large and clean
Maria is a great host and really gives a great tips about visits and restaurants
Thank you Maria

Edith was a great host! The apartment is in the city center close to all facilities.
It was a great experience especially if you are attending to ADE conference.

Edith is an amazing host. Gave me some awesome tips for local places to check out. The location was central to everything I wanted to see in Amsterdam. Communication was great.
The room itself was spotless. It's on the top floor so you will have to go up some steep stairs.

Frans was a fantastic host, he helped us out on several occasions, made sure we was settled and gave us the privacy we wanted. the boat house was beautiful, a very lovely place to stay with my girlfriend. Getting to the town centre from the house boat is very easy, the tram only takes 30 minutes. You can buy one ticket and hop on and off the trams as many times as you would like.  Definitely recommend Frans and this house boat. Thanks for an awesome place to stay, Frans!
Super gut - super zufrieden - definitiv eines der Highlights der Reise
Alles top wie erwartet 😀
Très belle endroit, conforme au photos, Frans et sa femme sont super sympas, je recommande

We stayed in this lovely little canal apartment for 4 nights in November.  Located just a 10 minute walk from central station on a nice, quiet, safe street, it was really easy to find.  Just a 5 minute walk from shops, restaurants and nightlife.  Douwe is an excellent host; answering any questions we had and also giving us tips of what to do during our stay.  A nice bottle of wine chilling in the fridge on arrival was a great touch, thanks a lot Douwe!  The heating in the apartment was brilliant; just what we needed for those cold November nights.  Pity we had to leave early to catch a flight as we were told we could check out anytime during the day, no rush, that was awesome.  You won't find anywhere as good as this little apartment and with such a helpful host and for such good value in the rest of Amsterdam.  Looking forward to going back already :-)
Great place in Amsterdam! Everything went super well. The room is complete and perfectly located. Edith is great and gave super nice recommendations.

Very cosy little appartement, autonomous, on the 4th floor of a typical amsterdamian building, with its famous steep stairs !
Ideal location for whom wants quietness but proximity of places to enjoy life in Amsterdam : the tram is 5 min away, the Rijks at 10' walk, and by walk it takes 30' to go to the tourist center...
Edith is a perfect host, disponible, warm-hearted and perfect for advice to discover the real pleasures of Amsterdam, far from tourist invasion !

We loved our stay at the houseboat! Frans was so friendly. It was great to have the bikes - we rode them to dinner one night and followed the trail along the canal the other. Fran’s boat had everything you could possibly need and more! It was so peaceful, beautiful, and perfect, especially after a few days spent in the city as well!
Super séjour passé a Amsterdam logement bien situé et très propore. Hôtes très sympathique donnant des bon plans.
hôte très serviable, nous a attendu malgré un long retard de l'avion. appartement très agréable pour un week end... rien a dire

Das Zimmer Ist Funktional aber für eine oder auch zwei Personen passend, wenn sie es zusammen in einem Doppelbett aushalten. Der Tisch reicht für Kurze Arbeiten am Abend, die Internetverbindung ist auch super.
Das Messezentrum RAI ist super per Bus oder auch zu Fuß erreichbar und man ist auch zügig am Flughafen. Das Frühstück ist nicht riesig aber man wird satt.
Gerts place is great. He's an amazing host and has great communication. You're centrally located to everything. If I return to Amsterdam, this will definitely be on my list to stay at again.

We enjoyed our stay in Gert’s flat very much. It’s a lovely flat and perfectly located, not in the huzzle and buzzle of the city center but close enough to get there quickly.
We were warmly welcomed and Gert provided us with all relevant information.
The room is located very close to the Zuid station (10-15min from the Centraal Station). Very clean and quiet. Strongly recommended!

Staying at Vibeke's house was great. All what you read in the description, you find in reality when you come. The house is very comfortable, nice and stylish. Very pleasant and helpful Vibeke. WIth her advice and help we could explore the city with big experience. And finally, after long time walking through Amsterdam you can spend your time in the company with nice and shy cats Moet and Chandon.
Very friendly host with many tips of things to do in Amsterdam. Location is very charming and outside the bedlam that is the Centre of Amsterdam but only a 15 bus ride to the Centre.
Rigtig dejligt sted

If you want to be accommodated in sweetiest human in whole amsterdam apartment, you should choose this. Vibeke was very nice and pure soul, and she saved everything that was impossible to save anymore.
Douwe was very helpful and easy to get hold of. The location is perfect, could walk everywhere. Apartment was perfect size to fit 4 adults on a short weekend away.

Jo was simply the loveliest nocarz host we've ever had.  She stayed up late to meet us after a long trip and was very warm and welcoming even though it was so late on a weeknight.  The apartment is settled right in the middle of the old Jewish area of town so it's a bit more quite and not right in the middle of all the noise and tourist attractions of Amsterdam, which is what we wanted.  A lovely neighborhood in and of itself, Jo has made a fantastic map for you to explore and discover that part of town (which isn't always at the top of everyone's "must-see" list.)  Espresso machine, electric kettle, and all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay.
