I would say the only disappointment is that we chose to come in March and even though the weather was on our side we didn't get to reap the benefits of the beautiful private garden attached to the apartment.  Jo says it's filled with beautiful blooms and blossoms in the spring and summer months.  I only hope we have the opportunity to visit Amsterdam and stay at Jo's rental again to see the flowers.  We highly recommend this apartment for a beautiful, serene, stay in Amsterdam.

The garden flat was absolutely lovely and the garden itself was gorgeous.  Jo was very welcoming and friendly.  We had an incredible time in Amsterdam and wouldn't hesitate to recommend Jo's garden flat to anyone.  We would definitely like to stay there again.  The district the flat was in was also really nice.
Vivian is a really nice and welcoming host. I enjoyed the stay at her apartment. Because of the really cold weather in June she even turned on the heating for me in the evening.

L'appartement est sublime et est idéalement situé dans le centre d'Amsterdam. La terrasse est d'une bonne superficie et domine les toits de la ville, c'est magnifique ! On y trouve tout le confort nécessaire comme à la maison !
We enjoyed our time at Jo's. The location was great for getting around. Jo was very helpful and kind. We would recommend this nocarz to others looking for a place to stay in Amsterdam.

Great apartment & great location! The apartment was clean, homely and spacious. It was fantastically located within 20 minutes to anywhere in Amsterdam. Nathalie was very communicative and had no problems. Would  definitely use again!
Perfect cozy little place just out of the city centre. Completely modern and clean. Jo was very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

Our stay in Jo's apartment was fantastic. The room was very spacious, extremely clean and well furnished. The small private garden was perfect for sitting outside in the sun :) Jo was very helpful and messaged me details of how to get to the apartment but was away for our stay there, alternatively her neighbor Els looked after us. Els was extremely helpful and allowed us to a late check out as there wasn't any others due to be checking in that day! This made our stay all the more enjoyable as we had a late flight booked that day. Can't recommend this place enough! Only little thing is the walk into central, around 25 mins, if you don't mind walking then no big deal!
It is a tiny place, no table or desk, no TV or kitchen area. But the joy of it is the lush and peaceful garden that made me feel peaceful in the busy city.

My boyfriend and I enjoyed everything about this beautiful apartment. It was comfortable, well equipped and perfectly located, with extremely convenient access to everything we wanted to see in the city, and all the  restaurants we wanted to try. There's even a grocery store right around the corner! We would absolutely love to stay here again.

This was a beautiful home.  It had all the necessary amenities for a family with young children to be comfortable.  We loved the location which was a short walk to Vondelpark.  It was also very easy to get to restaurants and stores.  We would absolutely stay here again!
Très beau séjour dans ce logement. Le cadre est magnifique et le logement très confortable.

Thomas and Eyal's place is conveniently located next to the red light district and close to all attractions, everything within walking distance. Thomas was very friendly,welcomed us during check-in and gave us a tour of the house. He was always available via text.The apartment itself is quite old and compact and has your basic necessities (although don't forget to bring your own shower gel). Suggestions to add to the apartment: a toilet roll holder, a towel rack to the washroom. Downside is at night time it was really hard to sleep as it was really loud out on the streets and you can hear people talking loudly or sudden screaming. Great place to stay if you would like to be in the heart of entertainment.

Nous avons fait un sejour très agréable à Amsterdam que nous visitions pour la première fois. Le logement de Karin correspondait très bien à notre attente et bien conçu pour un couple et un adolescent . Literie très confortable . Ventilateur bien apprécié pendant cette semaine chaude. Le descriptif correspond tout à fait . Petites attentions sympathiques dans le frigidaire .
Amsterdam bien desservie par les transports . Pour ceux comme nous qui viennent en voiture attention de bien lire les indications pour utiliser le parking P+R ce que nous n'avons pas fait et alors cela coûte très cher !
Merci Karin pour ce séjour et ce logement bien sympathique .

The nocarz was perfectly located, walking distance from every atteaction.  The nocarz was clean, very comfortable, however, not much insulation between lower and upper level. Would definitely return to this nocarz.
Merci beaucoup Karin pour ce weekend à Amsterdam!

We loved our stay in Karins houseboat. There was everything we needed for a very comfortable, unique stay. The snow was an added bonus!! The supplies on arrival were a lovely touch and there is a large supermarket just next to the tram stop for the house which was very handy. Between trams and buses you can easily get into town quite quickly or to the airport. Just be aware that a travel card may not necessarily cover all modes of transport so pays to work out how you will best travel. Felt very safe walking around the area getting home sometimes late at night. Thanks!!

It was such a lovely and comfy apartment! We enjoyed our stay very much. The location is perfect for those who want to be in the center of Amsterdam. Thanks so much for making our trip to Amsterdam so special!

My 2-night stay at Thomas’ place was absolutely perfect. Not only was it easy to find, it’s also so close to everything, museums, attractions all in walking distance or just a 5-15min bus/ tram/ metro ride.
I particularly liked how it’s in the city centre near the canals but also not on the main street that it’s too noisy. The large windows allowed natural light and fresh air to come through which I am a fan of.
Thomas was also very kind and helpful especially when I arrived. Even though I arrived earlier than intended (before noon) to drop off my luggage and when he was cleaning the apartment, he greeted and introduced me to the place before I headed off for a nice lunch.
Overall, it’s a very pleasant experience and stay. I would totally come back when I visit Amsterdam again. There’s still so much to see!

Had the best time staying at Thomas’ place. He was so lovely and helpful - sent through a long list of recommendations for things to do, places to eat/drink/shop and local attractions we might be interested in. Location was perfect and only a 5min walk to the centre of Amsterdam which was so helpful. Area was quiet at night set back a bit from the busy bars. 4min walk to the metro so was able to get all over in minutes. 100% would recommend and stay here again!!
super séjour jo a été a l écoute de nos demandes. chambre spacieuse propre. parfait
Nice place, clean and quiet. Karin is a great host
Very cute and as pictured. Spacious bedroom and very clean space. We enjoyed our stay and Karin was kind and gracious. Would happily come back.
Jacqueline was really nice. She gave us a lot of tips to discover Amsterdam. She will help you in your trip. She was there to welcome us. We had a lovely trip and wonderful memories.
My son and I stayed here for three nights. We had a wonderful time. The house boat was a really cool place to stay.
Ruhige Unterkunft, sehr schön am Kanal, aber durch die Metro schnell in der City
Eine wirklich schöne Unterkunft im Herzen von Amsterdam, viele Cafés in der Nähe. Tolle Hosts! Jo hatte sogar ein Bügeleisen für uns :)

Dianne and Roel are amazing hosts ! We received a warm welcome and they took time to give us good advice for the activities and places to visit.
The accomodation is well located, 5 min walk to the tram and 15 minutes to Amsterdam. Very clean and calm as well.
We hightly recomend them :)

Ad and Anna's studio was great! It was in a fantastic area of Amsterdam. They left very helpful sample itineraries and all kinds of suggestions of places to go. The bed was super comfortable, and we loved the stroopwaffels they left for guests!
So Nice house . I like its location , very convenient .

This place is a safe haven with a  truly unique and wondrous atmosphere. The entry walls have helpful guides and info on all things Amsterdam. The pillows... Oh my the pillows and comforter are magic. We met Ad who was welcoming and kindly met our needs. The location is perfectly centered in Jordaan, which allows access to some of the most magical cafes, art galleries, coffeeshops and views. You will leave this small underground palace feeling so rejuvenated!
great location, clean room. Would recommend

숙소 설명은 정확했고 중앙역에서 트램을 타면 집 근처에 도착해서 찾기 쉬웠습니다. 호스트가 충분히 친절하게 맞이해주고 숙소 설명도 세세하게 잘 해줬으며, 숙소 위치가 고흐 박물관과 가까웠고 유명한 와플집도 걸어가면 10분거리여서 좋았습니다. 집 앞 큰길은 시장이 열려서 식사거리나 간식거리를 사기에도 편했습니다.
3명이 지내기엔 충분한 공간은 아니었지만 짐을 세탁실쪽 복도에 내놓고 사용하면 지낼만 했고 2명이 지내기에는 괜찮아 보입니다.
그리고 체크아웃하는 날 호스트가 저희 짐을 늦은 오후까지 보관해줘서 국립미술관을 편하게 구경할 수 있었습니다. 이 점은 정말 감사하게 생각하고 있습니다.

**그리고 테라스는 담배를 피거나 저녁에 맥주 한잔하기 정말 좋았습니다

Fantastic stay, Dianne is a brilliant host.  We loved her place, lovely setting, free parking, all the facilities we needed and very big comfy beds. And so close to Amsterdam city centre. We would recommend to our friends and hope to return soon

Everything was great. Unfortunately Olaf didn't stay on the boat during our trip to Amsterdam. However Ellen, a friend of Olaf, helped us a lot and stood all the time on the boat so we could ask her all the time everything. The ship was very clean and there is enought space for a group up to 20 people...
We would choose this location at any time again

Séjour impeccable (à 3 adultes). Logement idéalement situé dans un quartier à la fois tranquille et vivant, commerces et restaurants proches, accueil parfait et souple. Literie de qualité, nuits silencieuses et reposantes, terrasse très agréable si le temps le permet.
Attention l'escalier est très raide pour atteindre le 4ème étage, à déconseiller notamment aux jeunes enfants. De même il faut se faufiler sur la mezzanine pour accéder au lit le plus haut. Coin cuisine assez minimaliste mais fonctionnel, nous l'avons peu utilisé.

Olaf and his family were really welcoming and the novelty of staying on a boat was so much fun! as a group of 14 women we all had the best time. The group space was comfortable, nicely decorated and had everything you needed. The showers were hot and the cabins, though a bit on the small side had comfortable beds. The boat is opposite a small square with a good sized supermarket and shops for all your groceries. Olaf also recommended a taxi company which would deliver vans for 14 people within ten minutes every time, they cost to the center around 18 euros depending on the time of day.
As an experience and the atmosphere Lotus was 10/10!

Michel runs this B&B very professionally - he was in regular touch to make sure everything was OK, especially at check-in and departure. Breakfast supplies were plentiful and delicious. The place was spotless. Everything - gadgets, locks etc - worked and was easy to understand. Michel made clothes washing facilities in the top floor flat available, which was really appreciated. In short, it's a great place. The street is very quiet and in the heart of Jordaan - distant bells, bicycles rolling past. There are regular markets held in the street but even these are quietly set up and broken down.

Only two small criticisms - firstly, there's no bathroom sink, so the kitchen sink or shower must double for shaving, washing hands etc. Secondly, footfalls in the top floor flat, also part of the B&B, and on the stairs, are very audible. This is probably a part of the Amsterdam experience, too, and was not a serious problem. I would definitely stay here again.
Michael is really helpful and caring, a great host ! The flat is just right in the central, a swimming pool next block is big plus!

Our stay at Michel's apartment was wonderful. The apartment is in such a beautiful area of Amsterdam and within walking distance to most things.
Michel went above and beyond to make us feel at home. I couldn't recommend more highly.

Michel was great to deal with, provided us heaps of tips and met us on arrival to walk us through everything which was great. He was very easy to deal with and we would highly recommend staying at his property and would stay there again.

Is there a SUPER-ULTRA-HOST category? If so Michel you should be on it! Is the highlight the host or the apartment? I don't know :)

Communication was easy since the first time I contacted Michel. Check-in was super easy he was waiting for us at the apartment. Gave us all the directions and tips on how to get there.

We had an amazing time in his place, super clean, amenities accurated matching what you see on the pictures. Bed and Pillows are SOOO GOOD (I wanted to steal it!). Shower was great too.

Fridge was stocked with a lot of food for breakfast - delicious Netherlands goodies. Breakfast and Bikes will make you save some good cash.

Now about the SUPER-ULTRA-HOST Michel - My boyfriend travelling with me lost his passport and we contacted Michel that helped us lot, being so supportive going extra miles to help us! Thank you a lot for all your help! Best host ever :)

Very happy with our stay Nicci was very helpful with directions, advice with places to go, places to eat and with public transport, our host we’re very helpful and informative and helped us get settled on the ship,
Very good experience and would recommend to others!

At first: the appartment is perfect for a stay in the city. It is very well located, in the middle of the city so that you can reach everything by foot. If you don't want to walk, you can also rent a bike from the host. This is a very nice way to discover Amsterdam.
The appartmemt is very tiny, for 3 people it is okay, but I think it is to small for 4 people.
A highlight is the balkony, which is very nice to sit on in the summer. You sit above the roofs of amsterdam and it is really quiet.
You must know that the stairwell is very closly and steep, but for young people it is okay and we got used to it in the end.
Also good to know is that the bathroom is very tiny and that it is only a shower and a toilett, but no sink to wash your hand. You can do that in the apartment. For tall people the bathroom may be a little problem.
Diogo was our host: he was very nice and always communicated very fast and uncomplicated. He gave us a few good tips for our stay.
To conclued this apartment is nice for a city-trip. It is not luxurious, but we liked to stay there, because the location is perfect and the hosts a very nice & caring!!

Wow!! Marlot’s place was simply excellent. Plenty of space, very clean, a comfortable bed. Marlot checked in with us throughout our stay to make sure we were okay and didn’t need anything and even offered us use of the washer and dryer. The sink in the bathroom is quite small but ok for brushing teeth. I did go up one level (where the washer and dryer are) to use the larger sink for washing my face at night and found that to be an easy solution. The stairs are steep so do be mindful of that if you’ve got large suitcases but other than checking in and out, we didn’t mind them. The apartment is perfectly located, almost every activity and restaurant that was recommended to me happened to be in close walking distance. Would not hesitate to stay here again and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a great home base during their Amsterdam visit.
Super Aufenthalt. Haben eine Stunde vorher die Unterkunft bekommen und wurden herzlich begrüßt und abgeholt sowie zur Unterkunft gebracht. Super netter host. Würde ich aufjedenfall nochmal buchen.

great experience
for people not scared of tiny space - for a close group of friends

Marlots place is in the Heart of Jordaan with loads of stuff right on the doorstep. Check in was seamless. The apartment was fantastically comfortable and
Marlot was extremely helpful with information. Superb.

The apartment is really nice, great for discovering Amsterdam, Jordaan neighborhood is a really good idea for your holidays! Marlot was the perfect host for us, advices, bikes just in front of the building :-) don’t hesitate to book :-)
Super plek, schoon, gezellig, toplocatie . Bed boven is klein maar slaapbank is ruim en ligt lekker. Voor herhaling vatbaar. Goede communicatie met eigenaar die goede tips geeft.
Toplocatie, handig ingedeelde ruimte, heerlijk dakterras
buena zona y tranquila

Marlot's apartment was perfect for our first visit exploring Amsterdam. Well placed for walking in and lots of lovely cafes, bars and restaurants close by. We really appreciated Marlot's local recommendations and her responsiveness. Great to be able to use the bikes provided too. Highly recommend.

We were very happy with the possibility of an early check in and a late check out. Also we were delighted when we came back to the apartment, as they put some fruit and cookies in the kitchen for us. This was a nice touch and very attentive. Rob & René were very accommodating.

Marion and Jang’s home is the best nocarz decision I have made to date.
Location: Their home is a bit outside of the city center, tucked into a cozy little neighborhood and close to an old shipping warf which has a few great restaurants and access to the ferries. It’s just far enough to escape the crowds but not far enough to feel like you’re missing anything. Getting to the center is easy - it’s a short (free!) walk-on ferry away. It’s also a bike ride away from some beautiful Dutch countryside. Our favorite day during our trip was the day we spent touring the countryside/coast per Marion and Jang’s recommendation!
The home: the bedroom is small, but perfect for two people. There’s a great library just off of the bedroom that acts as a living room but we were lucky to have perfect weather so honestly didn’t use it much.
The hosts: Marion and Jang are truly the best. They went far above and beyond to make us feel at home and to help us have the most amazing time in Amsterdam. We were there for 5 days and every day Marion or Jang (or both of them) would make us an excellent breakfast and we would sit in their beautiful garden where they would provide us suggestions and answer all of our first-timer questions. We had planned very little before arriving in Amsterdam (intentionally) and thoroughly enjoyed everything they suggested. They let us use their bikes for 5 euro per day which was SO great. We spent more time on those bikes than we did on our feet. The convenience of being able to ride the bikes back to the place we were staying and then just grabbing them again in the morning before heading out was wonderful.
I can’t recommend this place enough. If you’re looking to avoid some of the hustle of the center but still have easy access, be in close proximity to the country side, eat a wonderful homemade breakfast every morning, and get to know two of the loveliest people on the planet, then do yourself a favor and stay here.

The location of the apartment is ideal, very well situated for getting to all the prime locations.
Yes it was a little loud on a night, but that added to the vibe.
The stairs as expected are steep, as one would expect in a Dutch designed House.
The windows are beautiful, and the sun shining through them really made the apartment into a kaleidoscope of colours.
Thank you for a really nice stay and to your uncle for his help.

THe house is clean and in perfect setting especially if you are looking at a relaxing place after a long day sightseeing. Parking is available and safe. Hose is welcoming and available. Breakfast is great... Overall would come again

We spent three beautiful days at Henk's apartment and we really enjoyed it. We could use bikes for free and cycle through the great pictoresque nearby nature and landscape. To get into the city centre , you only need 25mins by bike. So you can have both relaxation and action ;) The place and the host is perfect - thank you so much!

Fantastische plek, goed bed en heerlijk ontbijt.
Gastvrije en flexibele gastheer.
Mijef war ein guter Host und war alles tiptop wir würden das Apartment sofort wieder buchen!
Amazing place

Bei Vincent und seiner Partnerin ist das rbnb-Konzept voll aufgegangen: ich habe mich vom ersten Moment gefühlt, als wäre ich bei Freunden zu Besuch. Alles lief reibungslos und unkompliziert. Die wunderschöne Wohnung ist in der Nähe des Westerparks und dem Kulturzentrum Westergasfabriek, aber auch ins Stadtzentrum ist es nicht weit. Der Bus vom Hauptbahnhof hält direkt vor der Haustür. Das Zimmer ist zwar klein, aber liebevoll eingerichtet und ich habe im Hochbett sehr gut geschlafen.
Vielen Dank an die beiden Gastgeber, ich würde gerne wiederkommen und kann diese Unterkunft wärmstens weiterempfehlen.
Would highly recommend to anyone!

A very convenient location. A super cosy place. My family and I very much enjoyed our stay. Stores and restaurants around the corner.
Onno was very responsive to all requests.
Highly recommended.

Location is excellent for central Amsterdam, about a 15 minute walk to cafes and bars, but quiet in the nights for a good sleep. Apartment was clean, well presented and Roman provided excellent communication and support for the trip.
Spacious and well-located!

Excellent, well maintained & spacious apartment in central Amsterdam. Close to all sites, easy access and lovely location on the canal. We enjoyed our stay, and
recommend this apartment to others.
Fue una excelente experiencia. Marly muy amable y disponible. La habitación muy cómoda y en una zona muy tranquila y muy bien comunicada con autobús y tranvía cerca. Totalmente recomendado.
The space is much better than it appears on the photos. Great views and location! Walked every where and used cafe downstairs for breakfast. Will be back!

Bibi est une personne très accueillante et très sympathique
Son appartement est super bien placé , proche du centre ville et de Jordan
Il y a tous les commerces à proximités , même une boulangerie !
On dort bien la nuit est on entend absolument rien grâce à l'isolation .
Seul bémol , la salle de bain est à la danoise , c'est à dire wc et douche côte à côte. Il faut juste s'y habituer car c'est pas très pratique .
Le point fort à mon sens , c'est la luminosité grâce aux larges baies vitrées dans le salon .
Expériences positives pour nous . Le plus, bibi répond très rapidement à nos questions et est à nos petits soins .

Perfect. Don't hesitate, just book it. You'll not find better accommodation in Amsterdam. The location is top notch. It's clean, tidy and ideal for anyone. The hosts are attentive and helpful and made our stay very welcome and simple. We had complete privacy but attention whenever we had a question.
Superb. We look forward to our next trip.
Thank you. Sasha and Dan

This place is so charming! We were able to see all of the city and feel like a true local. The beautiful views and boats going up and down the canal. What a dream holiday! Dorien was a great host, she answered all my questions and then some.
We would/will stay here again if we are able to come back to Amsterdam. Which I hope very much!

Westerdok 25 is an incredibly beautiful property and Hank is an awesome host - we can't recommend highly enough. The boat is excellent, with beautiful decor and lots of historical interest. The facilities are great too, including a very comfortable bed (we slept so well!) and a great shower. Hank included some lovely touches, such as a coffee machine and cookies. The location is very convenient, about 10 minutes' walk from Amsterdam Centraal train station. Before and throughout our stay Hank was incredibly friendly and helpful, even through we were delayed on arrival. He took us on a guided boat tour round the canals which was a real highlight of our holiday and great value for money. His knowledge of the city and it's history is considerable. Hank even drove us to the station at the end of the trip to make sure we didn't miss our train! We really hope to stay here again next time we visit!

Vieve’s apartment is beautiful, even better than it looks in the pictures. The location was perfect, a quick walk to museums, restaurants and the city center.
Vieve was also a great communicator and check in/out was seamless.
Marc is a really nice host, we had a very pleasant stay!
Great stay at Ellianes house. Very convenient localization to visit Amsterdam. Super easy to get from and to the airport.

Elianne’s place is sparkling clean and it makes me feel at home. The bed is super comfy as well. Location is perfect to get around the city. There are also many great cafes around. Elianne is very friendly and easygoing. I would highly recommend Elianne’s place.

The highlight of this home is the amazing location. A short walk to the Van Gogh museum, canal cruises, Vondelpark, etc. but also feels separate from the hustle and bustle of downtown. This really allows you to feel integrated into every-day life in Amsterdam.
It is someone’s home, so if you don’t want to share communal areas that is something to consider. It is also a basement level bedroom, so there was an issue with dampness and a smell during our visit due to lots of rain that week. The dehumidifier helped, but some people might be sensitive to smells.
The home is beautifully decorated. The back patio is lovely to sit on. Overall, I was happy with my stay here and thank Elianne for her hospitality.
Feels It was very lucky to we could stay in Frank's beautiful flat. Location was amazing, very close with city center and place had everything you need. We had very cozy time in there 🥰
The apartment was very big the location was 10-15 minutes form the dam Square

Martijn and Fenneke are excellent hosts. We only met Fenneke but she was very helpful when we first got there. The thing I liked most about them is that they allow you your privacy and only help when you need it.

They are very knowledgeable about the area and went above and beyond by printing our boarding passes for our return flight.

This is a great place to stay if you want to explore Amsterdam. The location is perfect with tram stops located five minutes away.

The room is very nice and clean, though we didn't spend a huge amount of time there as we were too busy exploring the city. The room was great and I don't have anything bad to say about it.

This was our first time using nocarz, and we couldn't have asked for a better experience.

Très chouette endroit ! Les chambres sont propres et identiques aux photos. L’extérieur est très sympa, des transats, canapés et même un lit d’extérieur sont à disposition. Le logement se trouve en périphérie de la ville d’Amsterdam mais le métro est direct et facilement accessible.
Great location, very clean room with nice host, Martijn!

We had a wonderful time at Harald and Edith's. The apartment is very private, it is really clean and well furnished and is the perfect size for two people. Edith and Harald were perfect hosts. It was a really nice touch to have supplies of tea, coffee and other items in the fridge, as well as toiletries had we forgotten anything. The location is excellent, very close by to everything. We thoroughly recommend staying at Harald and Edith's place. We loved our few days in Amsterdam!
Super located, de Pijp is the best place to stay in Amsterdam. The room is great and peaceful.

Experiência fantástica! Harald e Edith são ótimos anfitriões e fazem de tudo para que você tenha vontade passar muito e muitos dias na casa deles. Fomos muito bem recebidos, o quarto era muito limpo, bem equipado, confortável e o principal, os detalhes eram pensados com muito carinho, desde os pequenos stroopwafels até os fichários com as dicas dos restaurantes, aluguel de bicicletas e museus.

A localização é ótima, perto de tudo em Amsterdam (a cidade é muito segura e dá pra fazer tudo a pé). Muitas opções para comer, fazer compras ou dar uma volta e conhecer melhor a região. Recomendamos para todos o local e temos certeza de que se pensarmos em voltar para Amsterdam, é lá que vamos ficar.
La propiedad es mucho más amplia y agradable de lo que se ve en las fotos, tienes todo lo necesario y Mirthe es una gran anfitriona. Muy muy recomendable !!

Nadim's apartment was very nice and spacious. He greeted us when we arrived and showed us around which was helpful. We enjoyed staying there and exploring Amsterdam. its one of our favorite cities! The only thing I would suggest is that it was not stocked with bathroom essentials like toilet paper. When we ran out of the roll that was supplied we had to go out and buy our own which was unfortunate. Also we couldn't figure out turning on the television while we were there, but its ok since we weren't inside too much just to sleep. Other than that it was a lovely place and we hope to be back soon! :-)

Xiong is really nice person. It's pleasure for me to meet him and stay in his apartment. It's very clean, light and well equiped. I saw 2 swans on a canal and 1 rabbit near his house :)
I'd recommend his apartment to stay. Don't afraid that it's a bit far from city center, you can easily get to the center by bus and train.

I had a comfortable stay at Xsjong’s place. He pays attention to detail and he is very Friendly. I was there for the Amsterdam marathon and we chatted about that and other things. Xsjong does not leave there but gives you all the necessary information you need to get around Amsterdam. The bathroom is very nice. He is very structured and needs you to keep the house neat.

Xsjong’s apartment was easily navigateable by public transport from the city centre and was in a peaceful location at the same time. Xsjong was very communicative and an excellent host. He shared with me all the things to do in the city. 100% recommend!

Merin is a perfect host - friendly and always there when you need her, but not intrusive. The flat is amazing and the photos are accurate. It is bright and airy and spacious, while still homey and well-decorated with vintage items but comfy bed and sofa. The area was perfect for our first weeks in Amsterdam: we loved exploring the local streets and restaurants, and once we had a handle on local public transportation, we could easily get ourselves to any part of the city with one tram. Being in Amsterdam during the long days and a heat wave, we appreciated the cold drinks waiting for us in the fridge, and the sleep-masks were also appreciated!

La localización es realmente ideal y deliciosa! Corina amable, disponible, siempre responde rápido y dispuesta a resolver todo lo necesario. Buena cama, buena ducha, lindo jardin privado. Todo ha sido muy fácil. Gracias!

Very clean and beautiful apartment in a great location at the Jordaan. Could not have asked for a better location or nicer host. While it is billed as a private room it is really like  a separate apartment as you share only the front door. Very private and has a very pretty private garden.
Such a great place to stay, Harald's place has everything that tourist may need and hosts were very caring ! Also the location is perfect, everything was near by.
As advertised- one of the best locations in Amsterdam. Can’t thank Corina enough again for the hospitality. She was accommodating from check in to check out! Five Stars!!!

Corina was wonderful and very generous in accommodating our late check-in. The location of this unit is exactly what we were looking for as it provided great options locally for food/drink and very walkable to all the main Amsterdam attractions. The space was clean, shower was wonderful and the bed was very comfortable.
The comment I'd make to others is that the space feels more like a local hotel room versus staying with a host. The only real shared space is the entry hallway to place your shoes, but beyond that you're left to your private space downstairs. This isn't necessarily a bad thing, but something I felt was worth pointing out to others. Additionally, during our stay there were a few items in need of repair (loose toilet seat, bathroom door handle wasn't fully attached, lights above bed need repair and electric fireplace wasn't working). The unit does come with an additional space heater.
Overall I'd recommend the space for its great location!

Place was as described, excellent location, lovely garden attached to room although we felt too cold to use it often.
Corina was extremely responsive and helped us out when we had trouble with working the shower and heating up the room.
the only major issue happened at check in... we were coming in early and I had asked for early check in
but due to unfamiliarity with the station layout, train schedules, tickets and spotty cell service we got to her place about 45 min later than we anticipated and she got a bit upset with us because we kept her waiting. She wants to be there to meet her guests which is nice but a flexible check in process would be better to avoid unforeseen issues. Otherwise everything was great.

Corina’s place was just as described .It was very comfortable and it was in a nice area of Amsterdam . It was easily commutable from the airport and to the station . Corina  had  a delightful personality and was very attentive and caring .We had everything we needed for our stay with some great recommendations in her little booklet that she provided in the room . We loved the tranquil garden setting which gave us some peaceful respite away from the busy city .We really enjoyed our stay ! Thank you for being the perfect host Corina 😄

Thank you Noa and Anat for being so nice and helpful host. The location is great, check in and out was smooth, and the room is exactly the same as the picture. Mimi was lovely and sweet, she responds to her name and likes to be with people.

De ruimte, de tuin, alles straalt rust en tegelijk ook energie uit. Alles is heel makkelijk en wijst zichzelf waardoor je je snel thuis voelt. in totaal zijn er 4 kamers en 2 yurts. Je treft elkaar eigenlijk alleen bij het heerlijke ontbijt in de gemeenschappelijke ruimte. De tuin nodigt erg uit om te ontdekken en dat doe je ook steeds weer. Hoekjes, planten, water, spreuken op bordjes. Heel bijzonder en verzorgd zonder opdringerig of over-done te zijn. Enige verstoring is de provinciale weg die er steeds is. 's Nachts is deze gelukkig heel stil

Cozy, well equipt, clean room with ensuite shower/toilet in the centre of town.
Very helpful and friendly owner which made things smoother on leaving day.

L’environnement est très agréable mais assez loin du centre : il faut compter 10 minutes pour accéder au Métro et ensuite comptez 25 minutes pour Central station .
Le petit dej est simple mais complet bien que servi un peu tardivement ( 8h30 serait idéal )
La route est très passante et difficile à traverser .
Le séjour était très agréable .
Great stay, good location, very nice owners and one of the most comfortable beds I've slept in in my travels.

6 of us stayed at Taco and Tiffany's warehouse. It was well located with only a quick bus or ferry ride into the centre. The apartment itself exceeded expectations and was truly unique. It had all the amenities we needed and as a group of young guys we enjoyed using the space to chill and have fun in between trips to the centre.

Our gracious hostess, Tiffany, made sure we had what we needed and advised about transport and the local area.

I will be recommending this place to any friends who plan to travel to Amsterdam and will likely return myself. Thanks again for an amazing stay!

Manja was very helpful and easy to contact. The apartment was everything we expected and was in a great location with nice local bars, restaurants, cafes and parks. The nearby tram stop made getting around Amsterdam very easy.

Lugar con excelente ubicación, cama cómoda, buenas toallas, agua caliente, excelente Internet, tv inteligente, adicional nos dejaron unos snack de cortesía, así como unos vinitos, refrescos y café.
Marja es una excelente anfitriona, se porto muy amable con nosotros, excelente atención por parte de ella y su esposo. Recomiendo ampliamente este nocarz, tuve un Eurotrip, me hospede en 5 nocarz distintos, y este fue el mejor en todos los aspectos! Si vienen a Ámsterdam reserven aquí, será la mejor decisión :)

Palmyra is an amazingly friendly person and tries to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The room is perfect and has everything that you need. I highly recommend this place for anyone who wants to stay in Amsterdam!
- good place! Fun and perfect for a group of lads in Amsterdam

Super schönes Apartment in bester Lage. Die Kommunikation war stets sehr freundlich und schnell.
Die Wohnung ist sehr stilvoll eingerichtet. Veerle und Björn haben wir leider nicht kennengelernt aber wir haben uns im Vorfeld viel ausgetauscht und die beiden haben den Aufenthalt super angenehm gemacht. Gerne wieder! :)

This houseboat met all our expectations. Close to Ampsterdam centre, public trams, supermarket and cafes 10 minutes walk and enjoyed the peaceful late evenings. As it was summer we would sit on the balcony watching the amazing sunsets over the water at around 9.30 with a glass of wine.  The bed and shower were fantastic. Thank you Aart for your hospitality. Garry and Sonya Perth Western Australia

The partment located in the perfect area, city centre but super quiet!
We arrived pretty late, but Riks were waiting for us and welcomed us. We were a bid worried if we can reach to this place but Riks's explanation was very accurate and we found it quite easy. Everything was prepared and we didn't have any problems during our stay.
The room was clean and tidy and we really enjoyed our stay. Thank you very much Riks!

Great place to stay. A few streets away from the action but close enough to not moss anything. Riks is very easily contactable and answers all questions. We had an issue with our shower head which he fixed straight away.

Aart was a super host! At first we didn't see each other for the first two days but everything worked out, no problems at check-in and out either.
He is very kind and helpful, no questions left unanswered!
A big thanks again for letting us stay at your place and sorry again for the "tiny" mishap of my friend on the last night... maybe a "missshat" would be a better fitting word ;D
Great place and great host!

Perfect place to discover Amsterdam
Authentic district near centrum but peace and quiet.
Giulia is a great host, easy and smooth check in, perfect communication.
We really enjoy the beautiful and warm flat.
We ll book it for our next stay in Amsterdam without doubt

logement très propre, et agréable. bon rapport qualité prix, proches toutes commodités , accès au centre ville d'Amsterdam facile et rapide. accueil lors de notre arrivée ( tardive) par son amie jean très chaleureux. logement recommandé pour une famille de 4 personnes ou deux couples.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Karlijn’s Amsterdam apartment from the 12/27/2017 to 1/1/2017. It was that time of the month for my girlfriend and unfortunately the bed sheets got stained. Karlijn ended up charging us for the sheets without even attempting to wash it first. As a guest, it just doesn't feel right that we are responsible for stained sheets because: 1) Hotels would never have such a requirement. 2) There was no explicit mention on the listing that guests are responsible for stained sheets. 3a) There was a cleaning fee, I assume that fee is used for cleaning such as laundering the sheets. 3b) If the cleaning fee does not include laundering the sheets then what does it actually cover. 3c) We view ourselves as clean people: Even though there was a cleaning fee, we did wash the dishes and make the bed. 4) I did some research on how other nocarz hosts handle this situation and it does look like the general consensus is to treat it as a cost of doing business: Jennifer (Windham, CT) https://tinyurl.com/y9mk5jaz, Linda (La Quinta, CA) https://tinyurl.com/y7uyb39a, David (Como, CO) https://tinyurl.com/ya9na739 5) From Karlijn's messages to the resolution request, I don’t think she even tried to clean the sheets (EVEN THOUGH THERE WAS A CLEANING FEE): Karlijn’s message to me on nocarz: "Hey David, Just got home. The house looks clean. Only the sheet and matrass cover are really dirty. I will try to wash them first, but if they dont get cleaned I would like to ask you to pay for new ones. They were from IKEA so not too expensive.” Jan 1, 9:25 AM Funds Request for Replacement Sheets: Jan 1, 12:27 PM From the time she got back to the her apartment to take a look around to the time she took pictures and requested replacement sheets were 3 hours apart. I don’t believe she even tried to clean the sheets. 6) Karlijn said: "I have a washing machine in my apartment that they could have used, David and his girlfriend however decided to put in a corner for me the resolve the incident.“ Jan 2, 11:21 AM Again, as a guest, I assumed the cleaning fee includes laundering the sheets. Again, there was no explicit mention that we needed to clean the apartment after our stay. 7) After I declined her request for funds, she is now mentioning other small things like we did not take out the trash: "In addition, even though I have a bin next to my toilet, they stuffed a small bin in the bathroom with dirty pads to the extend that the lit did not even fit. I understand that they do not have to clean the garbage, but I am also a bit surprised they do not seem even slightly embarrased by the whole incident. I personally would have thrown it away in the garbage outside my house and contacted the host to ask what to do.” Jan 2, 11:21 AM For goodness sake, we...
Perfect place. Nice and cleen
Tom’s place is cozy, clean, and modern. Great amenities in a part of town that is accessible to public transit as well as grocery stores, cafes, and more.
Place is clean and cozy. It close to tram and bus.
Great location and a good value.

Great, I couldn’t go to amsterdam bc i have some problems, but my friend does and she told me that i was excellent!
Everything was so clean and she enjoy it!
Room is isolated, clean, central, prefect sized and comfortable. Highly recommend.

hi , well big thanks to the host Alexander.
The location was very central just a walking distance from dam square,shops, and so all the rest as well.
The room was a bit hot, but understandable as we had the most hot days in Amsterdam as they where 33°,
I really enjoyed my trip and the welcoming by Alexanderand little brief about the city. well done big thanks and looking forward to come back again!!
Great place to stay at, the apartment was very close to the city center and all sights to see

Davvero una bella casa. Ottima l'accoglienza e la generosità dei proprietari. Abbastanza vicino ai mezzi di trasporto. Li vicino c'è un fantastico parco e un percorso per l'allenamento davvero incantevole.

Alexander was a great host - easy to communicate with and especially receptive when my flight was delayed.  A great location - the room is exactly as described.  Don't expect the Ritz but if you want a comfortable room in a quaint old Amsterdam townhouse with excellent access (on foot or via nearby metro or tram links) this is a great place to stay.  Thank you Alexander.
Marga es una anfitriona genial y el alojamiento es muy único, acogedor y limpio! La recomendaría esta habitación, ¡Muchas gracias Marga!
All as described, everything was great.

We had a nice moment in edoardo's place. It is well located, with trams going all the main attractions in Adam, and supermarkets are really close.
Out host was very helpful and is really nice!
I recommend this place.
Thanks edoardo.
Great host, great location and great city.  Amsterdam is truly amazing.
It was a very nice and cozy boat. Everything went so good
Very quiet and nice place! Recommend it to everyone!

Marga and Rico have a very quaint guesthouse in their garden. It's certainly cozy, and their cats were as exceptionally welcoming as their parents. I arrived in the morning, and while check-in isn't until later in the day (the previous guest was still there), they were happy to safely store my belongings until I came back that night. Definitely utilize the bikes they offer as it's the best way to and around the town; you won't mind the distance to downtown as you're biking along the Amstel all the way there. Their place isn't too far from public transit, but they are also happy to give you a ride. You won't regret this choice.

Great space! Clean, tidy, very quiet given the fact you are in the middle of the busy city center.
The little apartment/studio is located below the house, with a private entrance, a relaxing area and a comfortable two-person bed.
Communication with Ernestine was excellent and she even offered an earlier check-in so I could drop my big suitcase and enjoy A’dam in the afternoon.
Highly recommended!
Super !
It was a really nice experience to stay at Juul's house boat. Definitely would recommend to anybody.

I had a wonderful experience with a great host, friendly, very helpful, good communication and the apartment is spacious and friendly but also well located neighborhood is very quiet HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO THANK

O apartamento é muito bem equipado e em uma localização que permite você chegar a qualquer ponto de Amsterdam a pé ou de transporte público de forma rápida. O espaço era bastante limpo e, apesar de próximo de uma área mais movimentada da cidade, não tivemos qualquer problema com o barulho à noite. Recomendamos bastante o lugar para quem viaja em casal e precisa de um lugar estratégico para conhecer Amsterdam :)
Modern apartment in a quiet area. The next tram station is only 2 minutes away. We really liked the living room and the big balcony.

Maurits’s place was great. Spacious and comfortable with tons of light. Apartment was on a canal and in a quiet area. That said, it was only a few blocks from a busy street with numerous bars, shops, and restaurants. Check-in/out was easy and I appreciated the hosts care. Can’t recommend this place enough!

Jan was very nice and kind, especially to me who was a bit nervous! This was the first time I booked a flat via nocarz, but he meet us with a big smile and made us feel right at home. Even with a good tour of the apartment, and telling us all the does and don´t of the place :) The place was nice and clean! and he gave us good directions and answered all our questions.

Thanks agian! =)

Very near to train station,5min walk.
House is every clean with own bathroom and spacious.
So far the best BNB I ever stayed in.
Very pleasant experience with Jordis kindness . Delightful house and very practical to access quickly to the city center and many shops around. We totally recommend!!
Great location, very nice warm hospitality

We had a wonderful time on the boat. Bob&Eve are extraordinary hosts. These little things, such as fresh flowers on the table. Some good and drinks for the welcome and helpful answers on all our questions made us feel very comfortable.
We would always like to be a visitor again on this lovely boat.

The boat was beautiful, all we had hoped for and more! Bop and Eve were very accommodating and responsive. They gave us great tips on places to eat and go out. They had two easy to use and navigate bikes that we took full advantage of. The boat is about a 5-10 min bike ride out of the heart of Amsterdam, so you are in s quite area with the popular and busyness of the city in close proximity. We would 100% stay with Bob and Eve again if we make it back to Amsterdam. Amazing amenities, amazing hosts, all around amazing time in Amsterdam!! Highly recommend this boat!

Es un alojamiento perfecto para quedarse en Ámsterdam. Súper recomendable para una estadía corta para dos personas, que quieran hospedarse y disfrutar de uno de los canales más lindos de la ciudad. La casa es chica pero muy acogedora.

Ottimo soggiorno da Rick!
Rick è molto gentile, accogliente ed affidabile. Appartamento da consigliare! Bello, ordinato, pulito, in una zona residenziale ben collegata con il centro città. La fermata della metro "Postjesweg" è raggiungibile in pochi minuti a piedi. Il tram numero 17 anch'esso vicino all'appartamento porta direttamente in centro. L'aeroporto è comodamente raggiungibile con il treno.

I loved staying at Rick's apartment! All was exceptionaly clean and well organized. View is great. Located walking distance to tram and bus, some close by excellent restaurants. Park is lovely. Rick is very welcoming and has great 'tips for what to see in Amsterdam. I would stay again!
This place was really nice and accurately described. The breakfast was a plus and rick was very accommodating to our needs.

Excellent accueil. Petites intentions de la part de Bop et Eve. Conseils pour profiter de notre séjour.
Endroit calme et dépaysant.
Excellente expérience. Si on retourne à Amsterdam on ira chez Bop sans hésitation😊.
Nous recommandons sans hésitation un séjour chez Bop et Eve.
Gemütliches Zimmer mit netten Leuten
Schönes Ort für alle die es schätzen am Wasser zu sein. Lustige gemütliche Atmosphere. Sehr besonderes auf ein Boot zu übernachten. Sehr liebevoll und kreativ gemacht. Gerne wieder!
Amazing stay!

very nice apartment, great location in a nice small and quiet street. everything really new, clean and nicely made with small detailes, decorated with love, everything you need is provided..we had a good stay there, very recommendable.

Our stay at Gabriel & Emiel’s apartment could not be better. It was simply perfect!!
Emiel our host is such a kind person. He was wheeling to help us on any time. The apartment is nice & clean and there was all we needed.
Is located in a great place. We enjoyed very much in Amsterdam. And big part of this is our stay at Gabriel & Emiel’s apartment.
Tnx Emiel!!
Emiel was an outstanding host, very enthusiastic and thoughtful. The apartment was lovely, great views and location was spot on. Thank you Emiel.

We had a wonderful stay at Suzanne's apartment! Suzanne was incredibly kind and attentive, making sure everything was perfect from the moment we arrived. The apartment is beautifully decorated with lots of lovely details, and it’s in a fantastic location, perfect for exploring Amsterdam. The place was spotless, and the bed was super comfortable, ensuring a great night's sleep. I highly recommend staying here – thank you, Suzanne, for being such a great host!"

Merlijn's house boat is such an amazing place to stay. I've stayed in hotels in Amsterdam many times and this was the best experience. Waking up with the sound of the river and sitting on the deck with a cup of coffee will be something I will never forget. His communication was perfect and was very helpful with directions and tips for exploring the city. I would stay again at the "Morningstar" in a heartbeat.
L’appartement est très cosy et propre, proche du centre et du métro. Emiel a été très arrangeant lors de la remise des clefs tard dans la nuit. Je recommande !

La casa es tal y como se describe en las fotos y la información. Tiene todo lo necesario e indispensable para pasar unos días en la ciudad y relajarse al llegar a casa después de estar todo el día fuera. Está alejada del bullicio del centro de la ciudad pero a la vez muy cerca, a sólo 10 minutos en tranvía. A 2 minutos dispones de un supermercado bien surtido y grande. La comunicación con Lotje fue fluida, aunque no nos conocimos en persona, su amiga Jeanette nos atendió bien tanto a la llegada como a la salida.

I really enjoyed staying at Lenny & Chris’s place. It is the perfect location for walking and exploring the city. They were very patient and extremely accommodating. They gave lots of great recommendations, I couldn’t have asked for a better visit!

Très joli appartement spacieux clair et cosy
Hôte très accueillante
Localisation près des transports qui desservent le centre et beaucoup de commerce bars et restos sympas à proximité
Amenities not as described in original listing. But had a good trip otherwise. Location is a 10 minute tram ride away from everything you actually want.

Paul is a very friendly host and we felt very comfortable on his boat. Everything was clean and the kitchen was well stocked with plates etc and two fridges.
It took a ten minute walk through the park followed by a ten minute bus ride to get to the Central Station.
Great place to stay for a large group!
Great time! Would recommend to anyone looking for a good and calm place to stay in the center.

Reinout nous a très bien accueillis. La chambre est conforme aux photos, spacieuse, très propre, avec un mini frigo, une machine à café et une salle de bain privée. Le logement se trouve à quelques minutes de la gare, en plein centre. Nous recommandons chaudement cet nocarz 😊

My friends and I stayed at the Boras for my hen party.  We were 16 ladies so the boat was full.   If you are looking for something different to accommodate a large number this is it!   Grietje is a lovely host who met us at the ferry and then checked us into the spotlessly clean accommodation.  The cabins are small but it is what we expected, living area is a good size and well equipped. The access to the accommodation is down a steep ladder which again is to be expected but worth remembering if you have any mobility problems.  Grietje was always there on hand to help if we had any questions and was very helpful.   We really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend.

Dieses Studio war die perfekte Unterkunft für unseren Besuch in Amsterdam! Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt! Marieke war eine tolle Gastgeberin, hat uns bei der Ankunft sehr nett begrüßt und uns alles gezeigt. Der Raum ist sauber, gut ausgestattet, super gemütlich und mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet.  Im Osten der Stadt gelegen, braucht man mit dem Rad etwa 10 Minuten ins Zentrum. Marieke hat jede Menge Tipps in einem kleinen Heft zusammengefasst, so dass wir gleich alles gefunden haben - den Supermarkt, Restaurants in der Nähe zum Frühstücken und interessante Orte in der Stadt. Die Fahrräder haben wir jeden Tag benutzt - ideal zur Fortbewegung in Amsterdam, man kommt überall hin und fühlt sich auch nicht wie der typische Tourist. Die Zeit ist leider zu schnell vergangen - ansonsten uneingeschränkte Weiterempfehlung! :-)

Marieke was a great host. Very friendly and her user guide was very handy. Very cool very retro studio complete with record player. Enjoyed the stay and would recommend it. Was easy to walk (15mins) or cycle (5mins) in towards the canal belt whilst also giving easy access to the less frequently explored by tourists eastern suburbs.
Thanks a lot.

Marieke's place is perfect for an authentic city break, the stay was so lovely and we got everything we could of asked for. Marieke also recommended some lovely places to visit and eat which made our stay extra special, would definitely recommend for a great holiday!

Amsterdam was a dream and Marieke's hospitality made it an even better stay. We were a little bit far to walk everywhere but only because it was 0 degrees Celsius and for us California girls... that is unheard of. If it was a little warmer we would have walked everywhere. The place was perfect and the bed was super comfy. We had a great time. Thank you again Marieke!
Excelente apartamento sin dudarlo lo recomendamos , volveremos una casa hermosa y su gato punk muy cariñoso! Gracias por la excelente estadía!

Grace est très accueillante. Étage privé dans la maison avec chambre, toilettes et salle de bain. Accès indépendant du reste de la maison. Endroit paisible. Situé à 500m du tramway et 800m du métro, idéal pour visiter Amsterdam. Logement très propre grâce à toutes les recommandations/instructions de Grace. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.

Our hosts were well prepared for us with everythink we would need, including information.  They were friendly and made us feel very welcome.  We had the opportunity to chat with them and make friends with their dogs.  The surroundings area was both beautiful and peaceful and we enjoyed staying there.  We also enjoyed the lovely breakfast.

Maike & Caspar were very warm, friendly and helpful hosts. They made us feel right at home, and gave us a great room with a mesmerizing view of the bay. The breakfast was superb, brought right to our door every morning, and they gave us all the info we needed for getting around Amsterdam. Thank you Maike & Caspar for everything.

Maike et Caspar sont des hôtes charmants. Je suis ravi de ce séjour à Amsterdam. L'habitation, l'accueil, la chambre... Je recommande vivement ! Et quel plaisir de voir les bateaux, le matin, passer devant la maison. Merci pour tout !
Thanks for having us. I have a great stay in Amsterdam.

This was my best nocarz experience yet! The space itself is perfect, everything you would find in a hotel and better. A very short walk to the bus stop to city center---couldn't be easier! A nice peaceful space to come home to and the view is amazing. Breakfast was also lovely and a huge perk. Can't say enough good things :)

Very friendly and welcoming hosts. Spent a couple nights, room was big enough for 2 persons and included all you need for a short stay. Nice view over the IJ from big window, enjoyed the large book collection, Sonos system and superb breakfast.
we only slept there one night it was good

It was an interesting experience staying at Hotel Not Hotel. The concept of staying in a hidden room behind a "secret bookcase" is very original, but the room itself is a bit small and cramped. And it would be much better to have individual bathrooms and showers instead of one unisex area for the entire hotel. But overall, it was a good hotel and conveniently located.

I had a lovely time staying at Maike & Caspar's place. The room was very clean, and beautifully decorated and trendy. It had everything you'd find in a nice hotel room. Very short walking distance from a bus stop that you can catch right from Amsterdam Central Station, which made for a very convienent location!
nice place friendly staff

Franchement un endroit atypique incontournable d'Amsterdam! Des secrets rooms partout avec des univers différents. Les gens qui y travaillent sont adorables.
niveau prix, c'est super avantageux et niveau emplacement c'est pas trop loin d'un parking relais et à environs 20 mins du centre ville en transports en commun.
merci pour tout!
Très beau lieu, très bonne nourriture, lieu atypique, personnel très agréable. Donc séjour parfait
Das innovativste, coolste Hotel, in dem ich je übernachtet habe.
Mit dieser Unterkunft und den Gastgebern macht man absolut nichts falsch. Großartig und ich komme sehr gerne wieder!
진짜 좋아요!!! 암스테르담에서 사는 기분들었어용😆

Maike and Casper we very welcoming to my daughter and myself. A private space and extremely clean with a warm touch of homeliness. The information provided was extremely useful and made our stay relaxing and stress free. Recomdations were very accurate. A great stay beautiful view and serene environment.
Thank you Maike and Casper

The room has very nice furniture and is thoughtful decorated. It is a real place to feel comfortable and relax after a long day in Amsterdam. The view is amazing at every time of the day! I enjoyed my stay a lot and would recommend it!
Great place!!!

Great studio on an awesome location. Just 2 minutes walking from Leidseplein. The studio is very bright, clean and has everything needed for your stay. The bed sleeps very well, there is a well equipped kitchen, a nice bathroom and a couch.
I was welcomed with Nespresso, tea and a small book with handwritten tips about Amsterdam. When I would be back in Amsterdam for a short trip I will stay here again.

Arie & Gerda's houseboat is undoubtedly the best (and only place) to stay in Amsterdam. The houseboat is lovely (the pictures do not do it justice), comfortable and centrally located. From the moment we arrived, the host's gracious attitude and patience in showing us the houseboat and answering questions about Amsterdam was the beginning of one of the most wonderful vacations we've ever had.  The houseboat was fastidiously clean and extremely comfortable. It was an easy walk to public transportation which allowed us to see the entire city. The host provided wonderful goodies (the coffee, stroopwaffles, cheeses and wine) and beautiful tulips that were greatly appreciated. We also enjoyed opening up the huge sliding windows while watching the boats going up and down the canal. It was one of the most relaxing and exciting vacations we have ever been on...when the urge to go somewhere struck us it was easy to get there...and when we wanted to relax, your houseboat was the perfect place to relax. In fact, I enjoyed some of the best naps and sleep I've experienced in years. From the first day there, we were already discussing the next time we would plan our next trip to Amsterdam...and this houseboat is the only place to stay.
Muy buen alojamiento, se nos brindo todo lo que decia en la publicacion. El desayuno es muy bueno!

We loved our stay at Monica's apartment! We were a group of 4 (2 couples) and the apartment was perfect for our trip. It is very clean, spacious, beautifully decorated and well equipped with everything needed. The neighbourhood is fantastic and in particular we loved the stunning roof terrace! Would not hesitate to recommend and would love to visit again ourselves!
This unit is located on a very busy street. The double door entry does make this seem as a lot more private than expected in this area of the city.

We had an amazing time in the yurt!
Every morning a great breakfast was brought into the yurt.
As we had bikes there, ist took about 45 min to the center of Amsterdam, which was a nice tour every morning.
The only thing wie didn't expect was that the bathroom was like on a camping ground, but we didn't have a problem with that.
Geweldige dag en nacht gehad! De kamer is prachtig, hadden nog een mooie rode kater onverwachts als gast en dat bed! Heerlijk geslapen. Ook ontbijt was geweldig!

The place was exactly as on the pictures. Andrea left us some snacks, towels, bathrobes and city maps. There is everything for comfortable staying in the room. The flat is very close to subway. I recomend staying at Andrea's place!
Andrea's house is so comport and She is really kind even my freind is little rude, she forgive him. I really appreciate that.

Andrea személyében egy nagyon kedves szállásadót ismerhettünk meg, a szoba pedig teljes mértékben megfelelt az oldalon leírtaknak. A lakás jó helyen van, a Centraal Station-től egyetlen metróvonallal, átszállás nélkül elérhető. A közelben minden megtalálható, amire szükség lehet. (bolt, éttermek, stb)
A lakás tiszta, kényelmes és mindennel felszerelt, ami egy pár napos tartózkodáshoz kellhet.
Összességében bárkinek nyugodt szívvel ajánlom ezt a szállást.
We hebben erg genoten van dit bijzondere plekje! Heerlijk geslapen in de Yurt en werden wakker met een ontbijt in de prachtige tuin!
А, что говорить уютно, комфортно, всё близко и Андрэа очень хороший человек. Приезжайте не пожалеете
Paul's apartment is beautifully decorated and warm, it was very clean, the location is excellent. The only thing that was very missing was a body mirror that was not there

A sparkling clean space with amenities close by. Metro takes you straight to the centre.
Andrea was welcoming and very helpful to us and drove us to where we needed to be one of the days. Meram Turkish restaurant was excellent.

Total toll!! Wir hatten uns schon riesig drauf gefreut und ware dann total happy da! Es ist genau so schön wie es auf den Bildern aussieht und Nachts fast noch schöner durch die Lichterkette. Alle ware sehr freunlich und alles im allen waren wir super zufrieden.

Sehr zentral gelegene Unterkunft, es lassen sich auch fussläufig viele Sachen erreichen.
Zudem ist es auch schön und gemütlich eingerichtet, wir haben uns sichtlich wohl gefühlt!
Alles in allem waren wir sehr zufrieden und haben schöne Tage in Amsterdam verbracht!

Très bon air bnb !
Il est en plus, super bien situé ! Comme le métro qui n’est pas loin pour aller dans le centre d’Amsterdam!
Logement très propre !
Je recommande !
The hut has a really nice charm and is located in a beautiful garden. The check-in was easy and the breakfast small but delicious.

Communication was very good before and throughout our stay. Arriving was easy with the use of a keysafe, and we found parking just outside the house.
The apartment was stylish and comfortable, and the kitchen was well equipped. The coffee machine was a great bonus.
We did not use the public transport to get into town, however, from central station it was approximately a 15 minute drive away.
For local restaurants and supermarket it is really best to have a car, as most things are some walk away.
Underfloor heating was a nice touch.
Wifi was on-off, and not very reliable at peak use times.
We would recommend this apartment.

Beautiful apartment, nice garden.
Very nice hosts, very helpful with everything.
Fast reply.
They left us very helpful information to get to know the city and all the stuff about the house.
.
Consigliato

The hotel was an interesting concept... it's great for a couple of nights and with someone who is a light travelers.
I loved the concept and would totally do it again and stay in another room... check their website they have 5 or 6 concept room.
The breakfast is amazing....
leuke opzet, fijn en flexibel personeel
No duden en elegir el alojamiento de Alexader y Natasa. Amabilidad y atencion incomparables.
they really took care of us. we felt like at home. they made our travel extremely easy for us. would definitely stay again. the breakfast and the wines were perfect.
Tout était parfait ! Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour ! Nous avons été très bien reçus. Le petit déjeuner était top ! Nous avons aussi été bien conseillés soit les choses à voir!

Natasha, who you’ll be sharing the flat with, is a very outgoing and kind host who will be entertaining you at breakfast. If you’re not a morning person, you might want to let her know that you’d rather eat in private. The bed is comfortable, but half the room isn’t shown in the pictures - it’s much bigger than shown. The walls are thin, so our dog got a little antsy at night. Natasha had some vegan options for us for breakfast, which was nice! If you don’t mind sharing your space with someone, this room is definitely a good option.
Very good place to stay in Amsterdam, nice quarter, Vondelpark is just around the corner, coosy room with a little terrasse and gardenview, very friendly host. Highly recommended!
The Willem's Palace is all that you could wait. It's a beautiful house, clean and big. Great experience.

Willem's house is tidy and fully equipped. It's all mostly in the pics, I would add as a plus, a great sound system in the living room. The downside is that it's a bit far away from city centre, you might need to take ubers constantly (around a tenner€

Willem's place was everything I expected it to be! Although we did not get to meet him, the apartment was very clean and in a perfect location. Very easy to walk into the city for all the tourist attractions but in a quiet neighborhood so we could enjoy some peace while we were home! I would highly recommend this apartment!
Lovely apartment, beautifully designed. Great location: near the tram, restaurants, and coffee bars, all in a quiet neighborhood. We would definitely stay there again!

Superbe appart confortable,  aménagé avec goût et très bien situé à 2 pas du tram. On s'est tout de suite sentis comme chez nous. Et l'accueil de Buck fut très chaleureux. On serait bien restés quelques jours de plus ...

Great location. The guest house is just as pictured, very clean with plenty of space for two people. Also extremely well supplied-had everything we needed. Mischa provided helpful tips on restaurants, where to buy groceries, etc. and is a lovely host!
The room in the loft is very cosy and the area is quiet. The host is very helpful and attentive.

Overall it wasn’t a pleasant stay. We didn’t appreciate being pre warned on more than one occasion about the house rules, especially when we hadn’t even arrived in Amsterdam and Miriam was already sending me messages like “if we step out of line, she’ll need to take action”, we aren’t little children for you to treat us like this we are responsible adults. Maybe don’t put your apartment on nocarz during ADE if you’re so concerned. You have no idea what type of people we are so jumping to conclusions was not very nice. Also, the issue with the door, maybe you should be at the apartment to show your guests how to properly shut the door so your neighbors don’t get upset. We closed the door properly every single time we left the building and made sure of it. Lastly, the disgusting smell from bathroom was very unpleasant and spread throughout the entire apartment. It smelt like it was coming from the sewer and you said you had sent someone to take a look but they didn’t do anything, the smell was still very bad throughout our entire stay. The bathroom and kitchen weren’t clean at all, the kitchen bench was dirty and the kitchenware wasn’t washed. The bathroom had old hairs all over and the toilet hadn’t been cleaned properly. Also, think about providing some hand towels for your guests, especially if they’re staying for 8 nights or more. You need to focus on being more welcoming to your guests so that they want to stay at your place again, unfortunately we didn’t get that vibe from Miriam so we would not recommend this place at all.
The most hipster and unique place someone can stay at. We were within walking distance to everything, and the room and home were just beautiful. Highly recommend for couples and best friend trips.

Roman was the perfect host! We are two couples in our early 30s, late 20s, staying for the weekend in Amsterdam. We  took a short tram ride from Central Station to meet Roman at his apartment. He met us there with some chocolates and a bottle of wine. The apartment is simply gorgeous - with a garden in back and two separate bedrooms. We also enjoyed having Roman's cat, "Pookie," around :) When we departed on Sunday, in our rush for the train, I forgot my handbag with wallet, ID, credit cards at Roman's house, and he quickly express mailed them to me the next day.  We highly recommend Roman's apartment, just 3 minutes from the tram stop. And if we visit Amsterdam, we hope to stay there again. THANK YOU, ROMAN!
Ubicación inmejorable
Tolle Unterkunft in einem sehr schönen Haus. Top Lage! Immer wieder gerne.

Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt bei Novella sehr genossen. Obwohl es bereits unser vierter Besuch in Amsterdam war, war es das erste Mal, dass wir in einem gemeinsam genutzten Wohnraum untergebracht waren – etwas, das für uns eigentlich ein No-Go ist und das wir bei der Buchung übersehen hatten. Doch diese Erfahrung hat unsere Einstellung vollkommen verändert. Dank der herzlichen Menschen und liebenswerten Tiere wurde unser Aufenthalt zu einem unvergesslichen Erlebnis. Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder!
Mit freundlichen Grüßen
Dominik & Vanessa. 🌞

Fantastic location—so close to Central Station and the bustle of the more tourist-oriented parts of Amsterdam...yet walk out the door and turn right and you’re in a laid-back, picturesque neighborhood. Felt very safe as a single woman in this area and building. Riks was incredibly welcoming and helped lug my (too heavy) bag up the 3 flights of stairs, and that was literally the last I saw of another person in the building during my 3-night stay. No complaints and will happily stay here again if I can make it back to Amsterdam!

We were very well received. The house is big and have everything what you need. The room was warm and the space was perfect. Although is not very close to the city center there are a lot of options to go there in a very fast way.
Logement parfaitement situé, petit-déjeuner avec vue unique. Nous avons été accueillies très gentiment en français! Excellent rapport-qualité prix pour ce logement, n'hésitez pas!
Klaas' spacious room was the perfect stay just outside of the city of Amsterdam. Very convenient location and I would definitely stay there again. Would recommend to anyone visiting Amsterdam!
Es war sehr toll! Alle waren sehr nett und hilfreich. Standort war super. Wir würden es gerne weiterempfehlen! :)

Jorrit's place was perfect for our group of 4 friends. If you want to stay near the city center and in a quiet neighbourhood it's the right choice.
Checkin as well as the communication was really fast and sophisticated. I would definitely book again.
Gina was a great host. Everything was ok ;)
Gina is very hospitable and kind. Her home is in a quiet neighborhood outside the canals with a 10-15 minute walk to the center.

Cosy apartment in an excellent location. Marielle was a great host and went out of her way to assist us during our stay in Amsterdam. She gave very good directions for how to find the apartment and was there to meet us on arrival. Very easy to reach by bus form Schipoll. Hot tip: Rent a bike around the corner and get to any destination in Amsterdam in only a few minutes.
A fab base for a weekend in Amsterdam.
perfect view and flat in Amsterdam

This place was perfect.  It's exactly as described.  Very clean and plenty of space. The free coffee and tea was a nice extra touch.  The beds are very comfortable.  Marielle was so great.  She was always incredibly responsive and I appreciated her checking in to see how things were going partway through my stay.  I would absolutely recommend this place and hope to stay again when/if I return to Amsterdam!
Sparkling clean, very cute and well located. Marielle was also very accommodating and quick to respond to messages. Exceeded expectations!

Arjan is the model nocarz host. In fact, he should teach a class on how to be a great nocarz host. His space was great, he had so many local tips, his dog is friendly and sweet, and he knows how to read exactly what you’re looking for. He is as present as you want him to be, offering fun conversation as a host when wanted, but is more than happy to direct you to do your own thing.
I can’t recommend Arjan enough. If you have the chance to book his place, do it.
Amazing place to stay in the perfect area. Marleen was a great host. Thanks!

Flexible and reliable check-in. Friendly host assistant.
Very nice apartment, spacious and clean.
No hot plate -> limited cooking possibilities.

We had a lovely stay here for a week in the Netherlands. The location was perfect for two of us; while not in the center of action (we didn't want to be in the busy area), it was in a lovely walkable area with plenty of cafes and shops nearby. Had a great time sitting on a bench outside to read and listen to the sounds of city life. Very close to Vondelpark and conveniently located near a few trams stops, so getting to Centraal was a breeze. Marielle was wonderful and communicated quickly, answering any questions and providing some great recommendations. Be wary of the infamous Dutch stairs - I knew to expect them but wow was it no joke!!!
Was really delightful. Amazing location and the apartment was beautiful and clean. The hospitality was exceptional too!
It was a very nice experience!

Yo les diria a todos que si tienen la suerte que tuvimos con mi familia de conocer el espacio de Arjan, seguro que van a coincidir que Amsterdam es la ciudad que van a recordar por siempre, y en gran parte gracias a Arjan. Gracias totales amigo Arjan.
A great and pleasant stay! Room is cosy and comfortable.

Sehr sehr nette Gastgeber, sehr toller Ausblick jeden Morgen und Abend!
Gerne wieder!!
Extremely friendly and helpful, really cool apartment with a garden as well

It was great staying at Raul and Jans beautiful apartment. Centrally located and very nice hosts. There was a little breakfast prepared and the apartment haven't missed anything for our stay. I can really recommend this wonderful apartment for this gorgeous city!
Best regards!
Raul's place was wonderful! Good location, perfect bed and hosting up to the little details.

Raul's place has a great location : near the gare station, in the center of the city. You can do everything by walk.
The studio is clean, comfy and very spacious. The bathroom is very nice and you also have a dressing.
However, we asked a few questions by text to Raul but his responses were slow so we couldn't organize ourself perfectly.
It is a great place to stay in Amsterdam. Would definitely recommend it.

We loved staying Raul’s place. The location was fantastic! The area is very scenic with small corner cafes/bars/restaurants on the corners by the canals. Less than 10 min walk to the train station (2 stops to the airport, 1 hr to The Hague) which was also where our river cruise docked!
About 25 min walk to the very busy city centre.
The apartment is 5’ below street level, roomy, has very soft mattress, and could use some more dishes.
But we would stay there again for the location. Be sure to have the apple pie at Cafe Winkel!!

Muy buena ubicación, Raúl nos solucionó la falta de microhondas. Lo más dificultoso fue el uso del lavarropas debido a que no teniamos libre acceso al mismo. La estadía fue muy agradable y Raúl estuvo atento a todas nuestras necesidades.

Grazie Marielle per questo soggiorno,comodo,pulito e confortevole. Per un viaggio con lo zainetto ha tutte le comodità (bagnoschiuma,salviette,phon).
Il libricino con i consigli per cibo,musei,mezzi,noleggio bici è stato molto utile,posizione molto comoda.
Grazie per tutto!
Lo consiglio vivamente

Erik's houseboat is fantastic. The spacious living-room has an incredible view at the Amstel. From the daybed in the living-room you can watch the boats floating by and there are some friendly ducks visiting every morning. There is one bedroom with shower and toilet and an extra toilet in the corridor. Thus it is perfect for 4 persons. When we arrived the houseboat was clean and everything you need was provided (e.g. towels, bedclothes and even some coffee). The communication with Erik was friendly, quick and realiable. I would love to visit again!

Wir haben zu zweit das Osterwochenende in Eriks Bootshaus verbracht. Es war das 1. Mal, dass wir in einem Bootshaus gewohnt haben und es war eine tolle Erfahrung. Das Haus ist hell, warm, gemütlich, sehr geräumig, mit allem was man braucht ausgestattet, und man hat von Schlafzimmer, Wohnzimmer und Küche einen tollen Blick auf die Amstel. Zu Fuß ist man in 10 Minuten an U-Bahn oder Tram Station und von dort dann schnell im Zentrum von Amsterdam.
Fußläufig erreicht man vom Bootshaus aus schnell einige Restaurants, Supermarkt etc. Das nächste Mal würden wir uns trotzdem vielleicht Fahrräder mieten ...
Alles in Allem hat es uns gefallen und wir hatten ein wunderschönes Wochenende! Es war bestimmt nicht der letzte Hausbooturlaub :-)) Die Kommunikation mit Erik war unkompliziert und schnell. Vielen Dank für alles und der Wein war köstlich, haben ihn direkt nachgekauft ;-)

Heidi and Ben have created a wonderful apartment which is of very high quality and their welcome, quick communication, and help to us made our visit to Amsterdam so enjoyable. I would definitely recommend.

Rod and his home epitomize all the things I love about nocarz.
