His flat really felt like a home away from home, being close enough to the city centre to make it easy to explore on foot/bike/tram, yet in the midst of residential inner urban amsterdam so you immediately feel like a local! The flat was a spacious and light filled haven to return home too. Rod was the quintessential host, going out of his way to make us comfortable and welcomed after a long delayed long haul flight. He gave us tips to great eclectic local hang outs - it really is the best neighborhood in Amsterdam! I can not recommend Rod and his wonderful home enough!

Olaf was a lovely host, he was very hospitable and provided us with the necessities.
He was very accommodating and was great with communication.
His home is amazing and the rooftop terrace exceptional, just a shame we weren't there long enough to utilise it. I would definitely recommend Olaf!

Fantastic accommodations! Exactly as described. Very modern, sparkling clean, extremely comfortable. Michele is very nice and was flexible with arrival and departure times, which was very helpful. Note: as shown in the photos, the curtains let in light and there is no curtain on the upper window, so worth being aware of if you're sensitive to light. Extremely quiet and relaxing. I highly recommend it! Ideal for single or couples.

Heidi and Ben were welcoming. They were excellent hosts and made it easy to enjoy the city. There was a friendly family playground right behind the house and everything was walkable. Heidi and Ben had groceries ready and everything we needed for a great stay. I would highly recommend their rental and both of them as hosts.
Dit verblijf heeft onze verwachtingen volledig ingelost.

Thanks a lot to a Great and uncomplicated host ! The flat is shown as on the pictures and quite. The neighbourhood is lifely and the City can easily be reached by foot. Once more thanks a lot to you Olaf.
Vickie was a great host. She made my stay very comfortable. The houseboat has 3 units. My unit was nice and comfortable.
lovely apartment in a beautiful and quiet part of Amsterdam with great transport access. Dene was responsive and explained check in/check out perfectly

Very good experience!
The house and Annette's help were just fantastic, making highly enjoyable our stay in Amsterdam!. For sure, we would repeat. Thank you.

Annette et ses enfants sont très accueillants et chaleureux, et ont été de très bon conseil.
Leur maison est très joliment décorée, cosy, spacieuse, très bien équipée et très propre, avec un petit jardin attenant.
Il est possible d'aller très rapidement dans l'hypercentre avec le tram 24 et l'arrêt du tram 12 est très proche de la maison.
Toutes commodités à proximité avec supermarché (notamment bio), boulangeries et nombreux restaurants.
Nous nous sommes de suite sentis chez nous :-)
------------------------------------------------------------
Annette and her children are very kind , friendly and welcoming people, and their advices have been very useful!
Their house is very nicely decorated, cosy, spacious, very well equipped and very clean, with a little garden equipped with a Sofa.
It's very quick to go to the historical center by the Tram 24 and the Tram 12 Stop is very close to the house.
Very close around, you will find all for living: bakeries, supermarket (including organic) and numerous restaurants.
We felt at home from the really beginning :-)

I’ve always wanted to stay in a houseboat! Michele’s place was lovely! I saw ducks out of the window!
The bed was extremely comfortable, I almost didn’t want to walk around the city (it’s that comfortable).
The houseboat is close to all the fun stuff in De Pijp and the city center, and Michele puts some local tips in the room for you. WiFi worked great.
I would recommend Michele’s place to a friend!
We spend a nice Weekend in this cute, cosy and clean Studio Thank You Monique!
Olaf is the perfect host and has the perfect apartment for three persons in Amsterdam. Would recommend Olaf’s place to anyone travelling to Amsterdam.
Nice little appartment in a quiet place, close to the center. Monique is welcoming and available. We had a really nice stay in the beautifull Amsterdam.
Marieke‘s apartment is so nice，just like the picture，the location is great，close to the main museums，she also cooked breakfast for us，we enjoyed our stay，Thank you very much！

Lovely Mickey museum!
I heartily recommend this house to anyone wishing to leave a good memory!

Sander made us right at home .
A fantastic place to base yourself in to explore Amsterdam .
Great flat with awesome views didn't have to rush off to feel like you were in a special place one look out the window and you new it ! Thanks Lynda & Mavis
Sander's place was wonderful. He was very easy to communicate with and check-in was a breeze. The balconies were wonderful and great for soaking in the city. Great location.

Francine is a great host, the communication between us has been very smooth and effective. The house is located in a quite residential area, 20 mins away from the city center by driving. Free parking is also available in the neighborhood. Apart from that, Francine has prepared all the amenities that we probably need, especially the kitchen is fully equipped. The house has been a warm and cozy shelter for us every time after a long day trip. We appreciate her hospitality!

Betty was a wonderful host. Her explanations were very useful.
The neighborhood was really quiet. I would recommend this flat wisn't any hesitation.
Thanks a lot for your hospitality. See you soon!

Our stay was fantastic! The apartment was bigger than it looked and spotlessly clean. My teenage children loved the modern feel to it and it also felt very homely. The outdoor area got the sun in the morning, so was lovely for breakfast.
The location was perfect; the area felt really safe and we got to all the attractions easily either by walking or by tram. The famous Vondelpark was only about 15 minutes walk away and there were bike hire shops nearby, so we also had a day cycling round the city.
Our host, Lotte communicated by email and everything was well planned with the babysitter letting us in - she was really friendly and helpful. There were also some useful notes left by Lotte, advising on local eateries. Etc.
I would definitely recommend this place! :)

Enith foi incrível! desde os contatos antes da chegada até a entrada na casa. A casa é extremamente agradável, limpa e confortável, supera as fotos! Fica num bairro a 4km do centro, super fácil acesso de bicicleta. O quarto é amplo e confortável. Enith é super amável e atenciosa. Super recomendo e com certeza, quando retornar a Amsterdan, ficarei aqui novamente!

Très bon séjour dans ce lieu,maison très fonctionnelle avec électroménager haut de gamme ainsi que les salles de bain.
Maison très bien située,tramway à 5 minutes à pied et 20 min du centre d'Amsterdam.
quartier résidentiel et très agréable .
Hôte bien joignable et récupération des clés très facile,
Reviendrons dans cet endroit lors d'une prochaine visite à Amsterdam.

This is a really nice place to stay - my favourite out of the four places we've stayed in Amsterdam. It's a very large light space and nicely decorated to a high spec. The area is peaceful but handy for supermarkets and public transport - or it's a short walk to the Jordaan. Check-in was no problem even when we changed the time and we were made very welcome.

This houseboat is located away from the central (tourist) spots in Amsterdam, but is easily accessible by the #5 tram that picks up right at the end of the street (1-1/2 block stroll). The #5 tram route travels all the way from Westerpark out to Haarlem, so you can get to just about any neighborhood of Amsterdam you wish to visit (we rode this line into the Jordaan, Centraal, and all the way out to Haarlem (by accident LOL!)
I chose this location, specifically, because I wanted to be away from all the 'tourist trapping' and, after our evening strolling through that area into the Red Light district, boy was I happy with my choice! Content to say, 'Been There, Done That', but there is little in the Centraal district that would draw me back.
Wilfred's houseboat provided us the 'native' experience we were seeking...GREAT little neighborhood, everything within short walking distance, and even offers 2 bikes to rent CHEAP! Be sure to check out the Westerpark (just a couple blocks away), it is serene and has a few cool places to eat/drink.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Y. Le logement est très bien situé et très tipique. Nous avons aimé sejourner dans cette rue calme et centrée. Merci pour la confiance que cette famille nous accordée. Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse.

Enith's place was incredible!  She was very flexible with our check in time, had a map and plenty of suggestions ready for us when we arrived, and the space was spotlessly clean.  The room itself is very large, the outdoor space is lovely to enjoy a morning coffee, and the house is easily accessible by transit.  We would love to return again soon :)
Enith est très accueillante ainsi que ses fils je recommande . Très heureuses de notre séjour on reviendra !😊

Very nice place to stay in when in Amsterdam.
Value for money is very very good, and you can have your private floor.
The host is very friendly and helpful.
I would book the same place again when in Amsterdam.
Great place, great host.
The apartment was a true Amsterdam experience. We loved it! The location is ideal. Mimi was so helpful and a delight. The access staircase is unique and would be difficult with large luggage.

Amazing trip to Amsterdam with an absolutely wonderful stay in this lovely accommodation. Perfect location for wandering the streets and canals. Mimi and J were wonderful hosts, providing above and beyond tips and advice with great communication. I can highly recommend staying here when you next visit Amsterdam!

This apartment is in a great location. It's an old Amsterdam "shop house" and it's clean and (at night) quiet. It is accessible through the shop below and is on the top two floors of a four floor shop house. It has the original iron circular stairs, which some people may find challenging, but we were fine with them.
There is a "coffee shop" across the street that is very busy during the day but they shut down early ... and we didn't find that to be a problem at all.
It's close to pretty much everything. We'll stay there again for sure!
Super séjour passé à Amsterdam et des hôtes adorables 😊

Amazing host, there when you need him but not in your face . Amazing place to stay and everything just a walk away. One tip, book your trips for museums etc before you go. Happy staying in this amazing city x

O espaço da Enith é perfeito para uma estadia maravilhosa em Amsterdam! Para quem gosta de uma boa caminhada, o bairro é perfeito, com muitos lugares bonitos e uma vizinhança ótima! O apartamento fica perto do centro e da estação de trem. Fora isso, Enith é uma anfitriã perfeita, os snacks, cafés e chás que ela deixa no quarto são ótimos! Ainda tivemos a oportunidade de desfrutar bons momentos com Enith e a família dela, foi inesquecível! Recomendamos muito o lugar de Enith em Amsterdam e esperamos voltar!
Zeer professionele en hartelijke host!! Prachtplek en meer dan ideaal gelegen in het centrum van Amsterdam.

The location was perfect, we loved the Jordaan.  The room was spacious and the bathroom was very nice.  I loved the rooftop terrace.  The weather wasn't very good when we were there but I highly recommend relaxing up there if you can.  Marcel was awesome with helping us check in as soon as possible.  We flew overnight and it was nice to store our luggage and clean up a bit.  He was very easy to communicate with.  I would gladly stay here again!

Wow. Couldn’t be happier with the stay we had at this place, can’t recommend this place enough, it was so incredible.
The roof terrace was beautiful and peaceful, we had a wonderful chat with the owner upstairs on the roof terrace and he gave us lots of great recommendations, and loads before we had even arrived.
It’s located right in the centre.
The room and the facilities were lovely.
Just the perfect place for a stay in Amsterdam

Great value and location!  Marcel was quick to respond to any question we had.  He was very friendly and his place was very nice.  The rooftop terrace was awesome!   Great restaurant's and bars nearby.  Large grocery store 10 minute walk away.  We wish we could have stayed longer than 3 nights.  We would definitely recommend staying here!

Tahier was waiting for us when we arrived. He had been in touch with us several times before we travelled with very helpful information and we easily found the accommodation when walking from the station.  The studio is perfectly placed to get around Amsterdam and was exactly as described. It was cosy, very comfortable and had all the amenities we needed. Tahier had even filled up the fridge for us and had gone out to get rolls for our lunch. This was the first time we had used nocarz and it all worked perfectly.  All in all we couldn't have asked for more and if we ever go back to Amsterdam, we would certainly go back to Cosy Studio. We highly recommend this place and our very welcoming and helpful host.
Great location. Friendly atmosphere. A great little corner in Amsterdam!

The appartment is amazing.
Location is perfect in the middle of the old city really close to Dam and Centraal.
The appartment is big and beautiful and we got some food and drinks with our arrival.
Great host excellent experience

This was the best nocarz experience that my wife and I have ever had! The location is prime, the space is the perfect blend of modern and cozy, and the host was warm and kind - he was able to make sure all of our needs were provided for without being overbearing. We will always try to stay here during future visits - cannot recommend highly enough!
Cozy flat. We felt like home. Nice area

Nice experience in this house,it's clean and located in a perfect area,close to everything and our host was kind and helpful,good breakfast too.
I recommend for sure

Merle was a fantastic host! Very easy to communicate with and was there to greet us when we arrived. She was very accommodating! The apartment is beautiful and in a lovely location. There are some lovely bar/restaurants around the corner and a cycle through the Vondelpark brings you to the centre. Would highly recommend!

Thanks to Thomas, he was very cooperative and supportive.
It was an optimum place to stay and everything was perfect.

Wir waren Anfang April zu zweit in Amsterdam und haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt. Die Lage ist absolut top, das Zimmer war sehr sauber, trotz der zentralen Lage sehr ruhig und definitiv ausreichend für einen kurzen Städtetrip.
Thomas und seine Mitarbeiter*innen waren alle total hilfsbereit und aufgeschlossen und das kleine Frühstück am Morgen war perfekt, um gut in den Tag zu starten.
Wir können die Unterkunft auf jeden Fall empfehlen und kommen mit Sicherheit wieder! Danke für den schönen Aufenthalt :)

Virkelig hyggeligt ophold i gammelt hus lige ud til kanal Keizergracht. Meget snæver trappe til 3. sal, men det var jeg informeret om. Man skal ikke have al for stor og tung kuffert med.
Lille men enkelt og praktisk indrettet værelse med både skriveplads og garderobeskab. Fint badeværelse en suite og fin udsigt til frodig have.
Dejligt morgenmads og opholdsrum med udsigt til kanalen. Enkel men god og rigelig morgenmad.
Guesthouse Keizergracht er den tyske sømandsmissions sømandshjem. Det synes jeg ikke man behøver at lægge skjul på i annonceringen.
Gangafstand til hele byen. Kommer gerne igen.

Chambre très agréable, extrêmement bien située. Nous avons pu parcourir Amsterdam à pied dans tous les sens. Erik est un hôte remarquable, soucieux du bien-être des personnes reçues, qui prend plaisir à partager. Échanger avec lui fut un plaisir aussi grand que celui de découvrir la ville.

Erik’ home is well located and easily accessible. It is very clean and smells very good. The room is a nice size so you can fit your belongings inside. Erik is a responsive and friendly host, accommodating, engaging and gives you your privacy. We rested very well in the room.
Wohnung ist gut gelegen, sehr nette Gastgeberin und super Dachterrasse. Wir kommen gerne wieder. :)

This place is absolutely amazing: unique location next to everything, lovely and cosy furnishing with beautiful details, nice tags everywhere to find your needs. Very friendly and helpful housekeeper with a lot of tipps for tourists!
It was rainy and stormy in Amsterdam, but the whole family enjoyed the stay aboard. As discribed the boat ist really spacious and everyone has had more than enough place to do his own things. We would like to come back again sometime. To enjoy the large deck in summer, maybe sitting at the fireplace, having a barbecue ... dreaming of Musard – an own small world in Prinsengracht.

Hadewych, thank you very much that you allowed us this wonderful expierience.

Nous avons passé un séjour parfaitement agréable dans la péniche de Hadewych. Tout est a bord !
La péniche est spacieuse, confortable et très propre. Nos enfants ont adoré. Nous avions un peu peur d'avoir du bruit en pleine ville, mais les journées et les nuits ont été reposantes.
Il y a plein de petits restaurants et boutiques ravissantes a deux pas autour de la péniche.
L'endroit est magnifiquement situé pour découvrir la ville !
Attention pour les futurs visiteurs de Amsterdam, il faut réserver ses billets pour les musées à l'avance. Les queues sont abominablement longues.
Si nous devions séjourner à nouveau à Amsterdam, nul doute que nous retournerions sur cette péniche.-

Very nice little room, with a door directly to community garden. Location is excellent, you can have a nice walk from Central Station to the place through the very center of the city. It is very close to Amstel canal, but at the same time there is not do many preorder in the streets as in the very center.i stayed for one night only and for my trip it was a very good fit, thank you!
We had a wonderful stay! Awesome place, fabulous location, and Mimi was very responsive!

What a great find!
Easy walkable distance from Amsterdam Central Train Station with lovely restaurants, bars and cafes nearby in Dam Square and we loved the great little Italian cafe opposite for a light bite. The apartment is above Mimi's shop and it's light, quirky and very comfortable. You'll definitely get the feel of living like a local when staying here. The spiral staircase is narrow but we managed with cabin cases and went up and down several times a day with no issues whatsoever. Plenty to see and do and we certainly covered some walking miles over the long weekend!
We had a wonderful time, great apartment, well located, great hosts... we will definitively try to stay there when we come back to Amsterdam
The apartment is in a great location within a short walk of all the attractions. The kitchen is well stocked. the apartment is a top floor duplex that is very well designed.

Apartment was immaculately clean. Debby was a wonderful host. It really felt like an oasis in the city. Good location, close to public transportation  and within walking distance of everything. Fantastic experience thank you Debby!

We had a really pleasant stay here. Debby was really welcoming and informative considering we were delayed and a lot later than expected. The apartment was really clean, well decorated and very peaceful. It was very well equipped and some really thoughtful touches added to the experience -maps and books of Amsterdam, tea, coffee and waffles , cotton wool buds, make-up remover, robes and slippers, phone chargers.
The location was great and allowed us to experience life out of the Dam centre as well as walk to the centre of Amsterdam. We had beautiful weather which totally made our short break. Thank you Debby and will hopefully stay here again. Nick and Helen Driscoll

Debby's apartment is just outside the city centre, close enough to walk but the area itself is quiet and residential. You feel like you are getting the real local Amsterdam experience here. Very close by is the foodhallen (a converted tram station) which is great for a casual evening of delicious street style food and drink.
Debby greeted us on her ground floor ceramics shop when we arrived which is definitely worth looking around - she makes all the products herself from a studio in the garden. She took us up to the apartment on the first floor which has a private entrance. The bedroom is very spacious with a lovely bathroom and a huge bath! It was decorated in a modern style without losing its charm as the building itself is very old. The bed was big and extremely comfortable and as the area is quiet, we slept very well!
Debby is the perfect host and recommended plenty of things to do and see with a handy map in the bedroom and smaller ones you can take away.
There is a powerful hairdryer provided (necessary in the winter months!) and other nice touches like towelling dressing gowns, slippers, coffee machine, tea etc and there is shampoo, conditioner and body wash so you don't need to waste precious bag space!
We had the perfect stay and I can't recommend this place highly enough.
Debby's place was fabulous, and she was a wonderful host! Would gladly stay there again.

El apartamento  es excelente tal cual la descripción , la ubicación inmejorable , tiene una plaza de comidas y locales para compras espectacular a 5 minutos y Debbie es excelente y cómo vive en el mismo edificio es fácil de contactar .
We had a very pleasant stay Foodhallen down the street very convenient.
Super schnell und unkomplizierter Check-In/-Out. Sehr schön eingerichtetes zimmer. Sehr zu empfehlen.

L' appartement de Nick est super ! très calme, mieux que sur les photos ! c est propre et la terrasse est un veritable plus !
Le quartier est sympa, avec des petits commerces de proximité et les transports (tram, train) à quelques minutes.
Nous le recommandons vivement et y retournons surement !
Debby has a lovely place to stay in Amsterdam. The location is terrific — lovely neighborhood with good nearby restaurants and a short walk to museums.  Highly recommend
Værelset var virkelig fint, lå i et rigtig spændende kvarter og spillede.

Great little nocarz it’s central and very spacious, love latte et market around the corner to get your fresh pastries and freshly squeezed OJ
Very quirky staircase up to the apartment.

Amsterdam is expensive otherwise I might have booked a flat rather than a room.  However, although this is a family home, it was remarkably quiet.  Derek and Iman were friendly and helpful whenever I bumped into them but we rarely encountered one another.  It is just a bed, there's no desk, tv, kitchen facilities other than a kettle, so you will have to go out.  But the location is close to the city centre, almost directly opposite the maritime museum, well worth a visit (and the hotel within the naval complex, Homeland, is good for breakfast).  Nonetheless these eastern dockland islands are generally quieter, more residential, than the inner canals.  And if you're interested in the history of Amsterdam as a naval and commercial port, Kattenburg and the next door islands which were the home of the Dutch East India Company, were at the heart of it.  I'd recommend Sotto pizzeria on the Kadijksplein, a short walk away, and Olijfje (Turkish) a bit further away on Valkenburgerstraat, and for a drink the Groene Olifant on Sarphatistraat.

Logement tout à fait conforme à la description, bien équipé et très propre. Nous avons apprécié la terrasse en particulier ! Le quartier, très résidentiel, reste agréable quoiqu'un peu éloigné du centre ville. Merci à Johan et sa famille.
Incredible location, place, and host!
This had to be the best nocarz I've been in! so unique with beautiful plants everywhere and such a great host. Would 1000% recommend to others!!

La casa está ubicada muy cerca de líneas de metro, tranvía y bus en un barrio muy tranquilo.
Las camas son muy cómodas y está todo muy limpio.
La comunicación con Johan fue muy buena. Es muy amable y atento.
Recomendaría esta estancia y sin duda volvería.
Amazing boat, fabulous location and really helpful host.

Great place to stay, beautiful houseboat, very clean, shops and metro stop close by, only 15 Minute walk into city center, would highly reccomend. Also Lucas is very helpful and always replied quick. Thank you for everything!
Tolles kleines Gartenhaus .sehr nette Gastgeber haben uns rundum wohlgefühlt . Immer wieder gern

We hebben ons uitstekend vermaakt in Amsterdam in het kleine huis in de tuin. Het voldeed aan al onze verwachtingen. En de locatie was verbazend groen zo dicht in het centrum van de stad. Een echt rustpunt na de drukte in het centrum. Nancy en haar gezin zijn ook ontzettend gastvrij, je voelt je meteen op je gemak. En wil je iets weten dan helpen ze je graag.
appartement propre et bien equipe,bien situe pour visiter Amsterdam
It was a nice experience to live in Nancy's house!
very good location
Wij waren er nu voor de 2e keer en hebben weer een heerlijk weekend gehad met 4 vriendinnen!
Die Wohnung war wie beschrieben. Die Kommunikation mit Anneke war super. Vielen Dank

Die Unterkunft ist sehr zentral gelegen und es hat zahlreiche, sehr gute Restaurants in der Umgebung. Auch die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten sind sehr gut zu Fuss zu erreichen. Zweimal wöchentlich (Samstag & Montag) gibt es vor der Haustüre einen Markt. Unsere Familie hat den Aufenthalt in dieser nicht alltäglichen Unterkunft sehr genossen und wir können das Hausboot als Unterkunft nur empfehlen.
I had a great time in Amsterdam! Wouter is friendly and helpful. I had everything that I needed.

Wouter was an amazing host. He was kind and extremely helpful. He runs a uber service at the same time so if you ever need to get around in the city he can definitely help you. I would definitely recommend staying with him if you are in Amsterdam!

The story book home is everything you would want and need when traveling to Amsterdam. The location alone is perfect - a short free ferry and stroll leads from Centraal station to a quaint oasis. Perfect for accessibility to old Amsterdam but also allowed a glimpse into local living. There is so much to see and eat in Amsterdam. Start your visit with a canal tour to learn some interesting history and get a different perspective from the water. Highly recommend visiting local markets; stop for a cheese sampling, hot stroopwafel and poffertjes- our favorite was in Jordaan. Other food highlights were breakfast at Omelegg and ending the day with a slice of Winkle 43's famous apple pie. We loved walking around admiring the architecture of the city (be very aware of cyclists as it seems they always have the right of way). Nancy was an incredible host and has her own brochure of recommendations to make planning your day easier.
Es war so traumhaft schön, eine Oase in der Stadt. Vom Checkin bis zum Checkout lief alles hervorragend und unkompliziert. Nanny war eine tolle Gastgebende und es hat uns an nichts gefehlt.
Todo muy bien muy agradable

Klaas was the most helpful host I can possibly imagine, always taking care we had everything we needed and there was no doubt we could turn to him. The bedroom and bathroom were very clean and well-kept, and we absolutely loved the balcony, taking our meals there, the water, juice and tea provided was a nice bonus. We were also provided with great tips regarding the public transport, places to visit or where to shop, which was a great help, making it easy for us to get around!
The neighbourhood is quiet and a great place to rest after a busy day.
Nancy and her husband are welcoming, easy-going and attentive hosts! We felt like home.

Nancy was supervriendelijke host, fijn ontvangst! Leuke tips (voor tijdens Corono lockdown) werden op voorhand doorgespeeld, was top. Daarnaast is de ligging van de nocarz fantastisch om het centrum en alle nieuwste dingen op Noord te ontdekken.
The house is cozy and great! We really enjoyed our stay!

Wir haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt; das Hausboot ist persönlich und sehr schön eingerichtet; die Lage ist super; wir haben  Getränke und etwas zum Essen im Kühlschrank vorgefunden, was uns sehr gefreut hat; die Gastgeber waren sehr freundlich und herzlich; wir können die Unterkunft von René und Laura sehr empfehlen;
Very nice apartmend in great location. Very comfort, very beautiful with garden, cable tv. Easy access to Centre with Tram 2. Otto is the best! Very recomended!

Gerard was the perfect host you would like to meet! He was very kind when i came to his apartment. The apartment was clean and well equiped! He daily cleaned up the apartment and put some typical cookies from Holland (Stroopwafel).
Rate of this stay: A+!

Gerard's place is absolutely perfect for two travelers, it's clean and comfortable with a stylish modernised design.
The room it's self is also well equipped with a nespresso coffee machine (which was a very welcome suprise), fridge and ensuite.
On top of how good the room was, Gerard was an outstanding host, giving us loads of information about Amsterdam by providing a map and sheet of recommendations for places to eat, he also had the foresight to have plug adapters already in the room and as the icing on the cake he happily did a load of washing for us, hung it to dry and folded it for us before leaving them outside our in the wash basket. He also didn't disturb us at all even when changing the bins (he timed it so we were out) and when we checked out he answered his door quickly and I expect if we had required any other assistance with anything he would've been more than happy to help.
We would both highly recommend Gerard's place, and expect we will return at some point.

Stylish little place right on the beautiful Prinsengracht canal.  And at ground level so no near-vertical stairs to climb.  Bench outside and a split barn door means it’s a great place to watch and listen to the world go by.  And it does.  Supermarkets nearby and loads of cafes/restaurants for breakfast and dinner.  Small but perfectly located.
Posizione ideale, nel cuore della città e vicina a tutto! La nostra camera era splendida: ampia, pulita, luminosa, ben arredata! Ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo! Consigliatissimo
John是个很好的房东，他的房子很漂亮也很干净，离中央火车站很近，到阿姆斯特丹各个景点都很方便，而且房租所在的街区很安静，是在阿姆斯特丹旅游很好的住处。
Emplacement idéal
Oke, Amsterdam is vanaf nu een stad waar ik niet meer moet zoeken naar een nieuwe gastheer. Je kan nergens beter zitten dan bij John.

Netter und humorvoller Gastgeber
Gerne wieder!

Отличное жилье, нам очень понравилось!
Чисто, уютно, стильно и главное, очень хорошее расположение.
Женя хороший человек и интересный собеседник.

Excellent location within 5-10 minutes walking of the center of downtown. Hotel-quality amenities, sparkling clean, and all wood interior which was great. Also stylish and organized. The bed is the kind of foam that compresses (memory style) as opposed to the more resilient kind. This doesn't work for my back, but I don't think this will bother most people. It is a large bed and I think quite comfortable for 99.9% of people. Check-in was also efficient.

We had 4 great nights at Renske' place. The apartment is better than pictured, with a neat little kitchen, nice open lounge and dining and great outdoor courtyard. The bed was very comfortable as well. The apartment was in a great location too - we hired bikes so getting into the city centre took around 15 minutes or so. Public transport was also very close. The only issue was that the wifi wasn't working for us. While only a minor issue, it did make organising things to see and do incredibly difficult. Other than that, it was an excellent stay :)
Great place. Very close to everything. Deffo reccomend!
Great room,  very quiet and clean.  The host is great as well.
Good location, near train station. About 20 min. from every part of Amsterdam. The host was very kind explaining us everything and giving some recommendations..

Very nice place to spend time with friends, near all activities and nightlife, Aart was very nice and super accessible, cosy boat and the yellow bathroom is something to see !
Thanks to Aart for his hospitality and his time !
Would definitely recommend it

Excellent stay, can’t complain!
Aart is great, very friendly and helpful
The boat is gorgeous and lovely inside
Francesca made everything so great. Checking in was easy and all the instructions very clear. The apartment was very cozy and the Jordaan neighborhood is phenomenal. Would stay again for sure!
We had a wonderful stay! The apartment had everything we needed, well furnished and very clean!

We had a great stay at Kerem and Basak’s place! It’s a beautiful apartment and super comfortable. The living space and kitchen is especially nice. The apartment is also in a great area. Close to museums and a bunch of great restaurants and bars (but not too noisy at night!).
Nothing to say

Nous avons passé un super séjour à quatre dans ce studio proche du centre.
L’hôte est très agréable et l’appartement bien équipé et très propre. De plus le jardin est très appréciable et nous rappelle que l’on est bien à Amsterdam.

Nabila's place is great and it is in a real peaceful part of Amsterdam, so no street noise is going to interfere with your sleep. Nabila is really friendly and relaxed so any communication with her is fast and easy. Good choice!
Marc and Ellen's place was perfect, away from the hustle and bustle of centraal. Very clean and near shops and tram line.

Just 15 minutes from Amsterdam Centraal, this quiet island is a hot spot that treats you to a truly relaxing part of the commotion that Amsterdam is generally known for. There are a multitude of AMAZING restaurants within walking distance of your stay that allow you to genuinely sit back and breathe easy. The neighborhood is quiet, modern and family oriented. If you possess the desire to enter the center of the city, which you absolutely should, the tram runs every 5 minutes and is just a 2 minute walk from the house. Do yourself a favor and check out Ijburg!

We had a great time at Robins flat in Amsterdam. A five minute walk to the tram and grocery store. It was warm during our visit, but Robin supplied fans for each bedroom ( thank you!!)
If you like plants- this is the place for you! Beautiful greenery both inside and out! Would highly recommend.

The room was very nice and clean! It is very private and because of this we did not see the hosts much but they were very nice, helpful, and always available when needed! I would definitely recommend!

Super accueil de Romain et Tessa avec croissants et jus d'orange réconfortants! La chambre est très douillette, propre et agréable. Enfin, le quartier est charmant et tout se fait à pied!
Si nous devions revenir à Amsterdam nous reviendrions chez eux sans hésiter!

Very very nice apartment, nice location, in front of the Dappermarket.
We enjoyed the typical neighborhood closed to everything.
Rens is very nice, helpfull and available.
I recommend his place to people looking for quiet and authentic experience

This is a cozy room - perfect for one or two people traveling together. The location is amazing - walking distance to many spots, a short bike ride away from everything, and very close to public transportation. Everything about our stay was perfect!
Ein süßes, kleines Zimmer, eine mehr als perfekte Lage, herzliche Gastgeber - was will man mehr für ein verlängertes Wochenende

Gorgeous stay in a great place which is really cool. Loft style, huge windows, directly located in front of the water. Bas is a wonderful host, he even bought goodies for our dog! He is very kind, and we are sure to book his place again!!
Exactly as advertised -- great central location, beautiful front windows, and Bas is an accommodating host. Great stay in a beautiful city!

Anna is the most perfect host I have ever met~!
and her house is also nice.
she made breakfast every morning for us and gave us lots of advice concerning Amsterdam.

It is an amazing apartment, which is indeed peaceful and in the middle of the city. Great place for tourists to stay and explore the city.
Bas is really communicative and helpful. It was easy to get in contact with him and arrange the details of arrival and leaving.
It is in a very attractive neighbourhood; the house and the host are very welcoming.
Very clean and central appartment. The communication with Tessa and Romain was quick an precise.

Perfect spot to enjoy all Amsterdam has to offer without being in the utter madness that some areas can bring with them. Steps away from beautiful Vondel Park. Public transportation is nearby and easy to access. Restaurants and pubs are a short walk away. Anna is really accommodating and detailed with her instructions and suggestions so you will have any and all information you will need to enjoy this amazing city. Definitely recommend.

Anna is a lovely host, and her flat is beautiful and located in a very pleasant residential area of the city, about a 30 minute walk through the park from the Rijksmuseum.  She thoughtfully waited up for us to arrive late from the airport.  Perhaps because we arrived so late, we never got a full explanation of whether or not we were welcome to use the common space/kitchen, so didn't use it at all. Overall, the bedroom doesn't offer a ton of privacy, though it is a very comfortable space. We didn't realize that we would be sharing the bathroom with Anna, and with her (very nice) cat. While we stayed, there was constant, very loud, construction work happening in the flat below (or possibly next door?). This is of course completely out of the control of the host, but it would have been great to have a bit of warning or a suggestion to bring earplugs.
Parfait pour le calme et le plaisir d'être à dix minutes du centre ville. Nous recommandons cet endroit.

Amazing host! Never felt so welcomed before! Great location, clean and cozy apartment. Resalieke helped us with any question that we had and made sure we felt like home :) would totally recommend this host!
Great location. We walked to all the major attractions we wanted to see during our stay. Nice restaurants in the area. Studio has everything you need.
Beautiful place, steps from bustling Amsterdam hot spots. Loved the backyard/outdoor space. We would recommend this place to anyone!

The room was very nice, exactly like in the pictures. The location was very good, few meters from the bus stop and up to 10 min to the city center. Jeroen was really nice and willing to help. We really enjoyed our stay and we certainly recommend this place. :)

It was an absolutely lovely place to stay. Walking distance from everything, a friendly area and the roll top Bath was a dream.
We hope to go back next year as they were such wonderful hosts!

We hebben heerlijk genoten van de nocarz van Judith & Job! Met een ov-fiets waren we vaak binnen 5 minuten op locatie en konden we met een nieuwe blik naar Amsterdam kijken. Deze nocarz raden we zéker aan en tot gauw!

This nocarz is very quaint and neat. The interior is spacious enough to comfortable sleep 2-3 people.
Given the age of the apartment, there are small things that unfortunately cannot be remedied, such as super thin walls to the point of feeling like the neighbors are in the room with you.
The shower was newly repainted which was nice, although it had not had time to air out as there where hints of paint fumes if you left the door open long enough (shouldn’t be an issue going forward).
All in all, very nice place near some great food options and an easy walk to town.

One of the best nocarz stays we have had!
Judith and Job were very welcoming and informative at check in. The accommodations were exactly what I expected and as advertised. They have maximized the space in the flat in a thoughtful, comfortable and stylish way. We were centrally located to everything we wanted to do and loved exploring this quiet neighborhood close to the action. We hope to be back!

We loved our stay! The nocarz itself was lovely, and taking a bath in the clawfoot tub was absolutely magical. The garden area was also much bigger than we expected! We had a really nice time enjoying some wine out there. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Todo genial, muy limpio y cerca del bus que lleva al centro. El barrio no tiene mucha vida. Un poco lío con el asunto de las cerraduras y las puertas de acceso a la habitación.

Hetty is a great host who makes sure to make you feel at home. Easy check-in and communication. Great location at walking distance from big attractions and the Zuid station. Small room but to be expected for this value in Europe. Overall, highly recommended!
A nice and cosy apartment, great location.

The location of the house is very good, public transport passes right in front of the house and you can go to the center in 15 minutes. Entry and exit are convenient. You can reach and support Hetty at any hour, she is a very cheerful and pleasant person. But you should know that there is 1 more room for rent in the house and there are tenants like you staying there. The kitchen and bathroom are shared with other tenants. The house in general, especially the kitchen and cabinets, was a bit dirty and if adequate hygiene is provided, the stay will be much more enjoyable.

The place is a little far from downtown AMS but with such a warming reception and lots of helpful tips from tenants is worth the experience. Plan in advance, the shops and restaurants nearby close early!

Place is great. Located in a quiet neighborhood up north. Travel is less than 30 minutes to and from the city center via a combination of bus and metro.
Place is very near a mall, about a 2 minute walk. Mall is very convenient as it has a lot of grocery options and snack bars.
Jeroen is a great host, he makes sure that his guests feel welcome. Plus, he has great recommendations for places to go, especially if you don’t have anything planned.

So an sich war es Gut. außer das neben an ein Kindergarten ist hätte man in der Beschreibung, schreiben können. Der Türgriff von der Schlafzimmer Türe hatte man immer in der Hand. die Lampe im Wohnzimmer viel zu groß man ist ständig gegen die Lampe geknallt. Man konnte Einkaufsläden und Stadt ein paar Gehminuten erreichen. Gute Zug Verbindung. Föhn war auch vorhanden ist im Glas schrank im Badezimmer des Schlafzimmers den Spiegel kann man öffnen.
The cosy and small, but comfortable and centrally located Studio on the boat is a really Sweet gem. Best neighbourhood to stay, kind People, - loved it!
Amazing apartment, really modern and spacious. Excellent public transport. Bas met us from the tram and was a great host! He gave lots of advice and suggestions of places nearby.
First time staying in a house boat.  Super fun.
This is an amazing space!  The main floor is open yet cozy. The outdoor spaces are also great!

Tawan's apartment was clean, comfortable and stylish. Tawan herself was very accommodating and helpful. She made us coffee and tea and plateful of Dutch waffles upon our arrival. She also helped us a lot with tips on places to visit and enthusiastically showed us how to get to those places. My wife and I fully recommend Tawan's place for your next visit to Amsterdam.
Hemos estado muy agusto, había una nevera en la habitación con muy buenos precios, teníamos almuerzo incluido y el perro muy cariñoso. Los anfitriones muy amables.

I felt very comfortable. Tawan was very trustworthy in communication before the trip and responded very quickly. During my stay, Tawan was very caring - so she helped me iron a shirt, was able to recommend a good bike rental, gave me a bottle of water for the trip upon departure ...
In the room is a coffee maker and a water boiler, moreover Tawan welcomed me with cookies and fruits. This was very friendly.
People who are sensitive to noise should note before booking the room that there is a railroad line right next to the house. The passing trains can be heard in the night even with the window closed. I bought earplugs, after that I could sleep very well.
I was in Amsterdam because of a scientific congress that was held nearby. So I was in the room mostly just for the overnight stay. That was perfect.

Ich finde, Dass alle Unterkünfte von Henk ein absoluter Geheimtipp sind, um Amsterdam zu erkunden. Die Caravans auf dem Bauernhof sind einfach ideal, wenn man mit Kindern reist. Man kann mit dem Fahrrad nach Amsterdam, gleichzeitig aber auch mit dem Rad das Waterland erkunden oder einfach sich von der super netten Gastgeberin den Bauernhof zeigen lassen. Ganz herzlichen Dank und ganz bestimmt wieder!
Nice little escape to the country. Fun to pet the cows and calves. Homemade wonderful breakfast. Great location.

Muy buenos anfitriones!! Destaco su
Amabilidad, limpieza y buena predisposicion. Nos recibieron con un mapa de la ciudad y nos explicaron todo lo turistico que podemos hacer. Buena ventilacion y cama super comoda. Nos dejaron salir 1 hora mas tarde! Todo impecable y super recomendable. Ubicacion perfecta

Chantal was the most accommodating host we could have asked for & we couldn't have enjoyed our stay more in her lovely home.
The apartment is bigger than we expected. Four of us stayed here very comfortably. We especially loved the open plan layout, the comfy beds and the canal view from the balcony. The well equipped kitchen was a dream to cook in & the Apple TV came in handy.
Central station is literally a short walk from Chantal's place with a tram / bus stops being two minutes away. We felt our travel pass went to waste as the apartment was so close to the centre.
We would love to stay here again if we went back to Amsterdam. Chantal is a lovely lady who went out of her way to communicate with us & give us information and help us with our stay.

very clean room.
nice hospitality
Very nice place. Ruben was great.
房主非常热情，在很早就发来了联系人等各类相关信息，确定入住时间等。在我临时更改入住时间后，接待者还是快速完成清理工作，按时接待我们入住。公寓地点很好，方便出行，只是楼梯对于小孩子或带着大行李箱者有些不便，但阿姆斯特丹的楼房大概都是如此吧，也更能体验这种传统的荷兰建筑。公寓内设施相当完备，尤其是厨房，看得出来房主是热爱生活热爱美食的人。期待下次再来入住！
Muy recomendable!!! Para repetir

Mit meinen Freunden verweilten wir 3 Tage in dieser überaus angenehmen Unterkunft, die Gastgeber waren sehr entgegenkommend und Perfekt für einen Amsterdamurlaub mit Freunden ;)
Gerne kommen wir nächstes Jahr wieder!

The room is bright and really clean. The bed really comfy, the house is warm and it makes you feel like at home.The location is perfect, a very nice neighbourhood but not too far from the centre. Ruben is very friendly and he gave us some really good advice about places to visit or where to eat. I would hardly recommend it.
Our stay was very pleasant and easy. The flat is lovely and the location is absolutely amazing. Definitely recommend!

Ruben was an outstanding host! My flight landed early in the morning and Ruben was awake to take my luggage. The place was very clean and modern. The balcony was a nice perk. The space was in a very good neighborhood. Plenty of stuff to do in the area.  It was a very quiet area, the room was great for sleeping off the jet lag. I definitely will book with Ruben in the future!
Excelente lugar! La cama súper cómoda :)
Lea was a great host and the rules were simple and you had freedom, the bathrooms were clean and our room was nice. Very cozy and old house.

Maxime's appartement is wonderfull. Really lovely and spacious. Well located only 25 min of center by feet and 10 mn by tram. Maxime was helpfull even if he wasn't there. Good value. I recommand him as a host!
Lovely apartment in a very quiet and beautiful part of Amsterdam. The hosts were very friendly and welcoming. I can only recommend their place!
Все очень понравилось. Спасибо за встречу и помощь с багажом

Katja und Peter sind zwei ausgezeichnete Gastgeber. Die Unterkunft entspricht voll der Beschreibung, liegt in einem sehr schönen Stadtviertel von Amsterdam und die kostenfreie Fähre zur Innenstadt ist bequem per Fahrad in 10 min zu erreichen. Wir waren mehr als zufrieden mit der Unterkunft.
Die Unterhaltungen mit Katja und Peter haben uns zudem geholfen Amsterdam schneller und besser kennen zu lernen.
Alles in allem ein überaus gelungener Aufenthalt in einer bezaubernden Stadt mit sehr freundlichen, netten und hilfsbereiten Gastgebern.
Nachmald Danke für alles :-)
It was pleasure to stay at there. Definately I'll stay again if I had a chance to come back to Amsterdam.
wir waren nur eine Nacht da aber waren mit allem sehr zufrieden 👍
Logement très sympa. Hôtes très agréables et disponibles
Very accommodating hosts with thoughtful touches.

Le studio de Laurence est très cosy. Laurence nous a très bien accueillis avec de nombreuses explications. Elle habite dans la maison et est toujours disponible en cas de souci. L'appartement est un peu excentré mais il y a beaucoup de transports en commun. N'hésitez pas une seconde à loger dans cet appartement.
This backyard room in the Amsterdam suburbs was a great place to stay! Peter and Katja are extremely accommodating and made it a great time to stay at their place. Would recommend!

Le logement est très bien équipé, tous les équipements utiles y sont pour passer le meilleur séjour possible. La décoration permet de se plonger dans la culture hollandaise ! De plus, Laurence met à disposition de nombreux guides avec des idées de restaurants faits par ses soins.
C’est aussi très bien desservi en transports. Je recommande !

Die Lage des Hauses ist wunderbar geeignet, um die Stadt Amsterdam und auch das nahe gelegene Naturschutzgebiet zu erkunden. Und das ist von dort aus alles mit dem Fahrrad möglich. Wir haben uns sehr wohl in dem blauen Haus gefühlt und konnten dort nach den (Stadt-)Unternehmungen entspannen. Peter und Katja sind wirklich sehr nette  Gastgeber, geben auch tolle Tipps und haben uns zwei Fahrräder bereitgestellt. Unser Fazit nach der Woche: sehr empfehlenswert!

A lovely apartment and well situated in the city, only a 10/15 minute walk to centre which we enjoyed in the morning. The apartment is also close to Centraal station so a very easy travel from Amsterdam airport to the apartment. Everything worked very well and we had a lovely stay, a peaceful neighbourhood and the host was very welcoming. I would defiantly recommend this to others

Maika's apartment was fantastic and in a great location (just outside of the very busy centre, but still walkable to all locations and very close to park). The apartment was clean and felt very stylish to stay in. The private garden terrace was a lovely location for a morning coffee and croissant! Maika herself was easy to communicate with and provided extensive local tips, we recommend Morgan & Mees for a nice meal out.
First class nocarz host!

We had an excellent time on this beautiful houseboat. The hosts Renske and Bas were helpful, very kind and did reply always in less than 12h to our mails.

We loved to stay at their place and can recommand this nice hosts and the boat as well, when ever you plan to stay in Amsterdam!
La casa está genial, la zona super bonita y la anfitriona de 10!

- Hosts extremely welcoming and accommodating.
- Apartment was very clean, tidy, heated and well-furnished.
- Amenities were as advertised if not more, with a wide array of kitchen appliances allowing for easy food preparation.
- Location was as advertised, 15-20 minutes walk from the centre of Amsterdam in a quiet residential area (~2-5 minutes from shops/restaurants one street over)

Extremely glad we found the place, would definitely reccommend.
Julie was incredibly helpful & hospitable. The location is walkable to central Amsterdam. Great choice for a bed to crash for a short trip.
Great location.

Erik's house is located about 10 minutes from the next Metro Station in the South-Eastern part of Amsterdam. With the metro it takes about 20 minutes to go to the city centre. I have been working in Amsterdam for a month and was staying at Erik's place during that time. Erik was a wonderful host, very helpful and always up for a chat. We sat down for a bit of talking a couple of times and Erik always had a beer and some interesting information for me. The area he is living at is a peaceful, multicultural neighborhood and the room was just as described. I can warmly recommend Erik!
Great place to stay, very quiet and comfortable (refrigerator, condition, separate bathroom). Eric is very hospitable.

a comfy and great place. beautiful surroundings full of greenery all around.
i mean I love the vibe and Erik was super nice and a great guy to chat with.
would definitely recommend and would also visit him again
good room , and very good welcome...she speaks a lot of language and are very helpful

Het verblijf bij Ruben vonden wij prima. De kamer die wij hadden was aan de straatzijde, maar het was niet rumoerig. Het bed is goed. De kamer is licht en is netjes onderhouden en het bankje geeft het net iets huiselijks. Ruben kwam in de avond kennismaken en was heel gastvrij. We hebben even gezellig gepraat. In de buurt is een park en cafe's en restaurants zijn vlakbij. Dit adres bevelen we van harte aan.
J & M
Martine is very nice! Her house is in a quiet place outside the city. There is a lake nearby and you are surrounded by nature

Ruben was a nice host and the communication was great. The room has lots of spaces, very clean and comfy bed. The only problem we had was the room too hot/humid without fan or AC, we could not sleep for 2 nights. There are also noise come from the street as this is second floor and we can hear car running by and people talking with or without the window open. Not recommended for people want to stay there in the summer time.

Fabulous location, walking distance to almost every site you could want to see, adorable and quaint fishing boat turned into a private studio apartment, it’s small but perfect for 2 people or a couple with small child. Really unique experience, I’d recommend it very highly!

Firstly, Friedrich truly deserves the title of Super Host. He was very welcoming on our arrival and even allowed us to stay an extra night when we were caught up in the Gatwick drone fiasco. His Popeye boat is just glorious and so charming. A very different and quirky place to stay. Just 10 minutes from the station and only a few more to the sights. A very quiet and convenient location.
Great Boat experience in sweet Amsterdam neighborhood.
Ruben is a very nice and helpful host. I can highly recommend him and his room! Very nice area, 200m to Albert Cuypstraat!
Convenient location, well lit room. Place is as described!
Hyggelig husbåd i meget rolige omgivelser. En snert af det maritime. Ikke for gæster med gangbesvær (stejl trappe, højt op til køjen)
Very nice location... an easy going and comfortable apartment in a great price !!

Elvira is avery nice host very attentive , her flat is very well located in the old part of Amsterdam, very romantic , peaceful .
Elvira will you you all the recommandations to spend an enjoyable time , she has very good taste for recommending restaurants .
her flat is very convenient , very well designed and pretty.
Ruben’s place is in a nice neighborhood. Easily accessible by tram. The room is big, clean. Recommended.

Gina's place was perfect for my little break in Amsterdam, location easy to find and walkable from the centre, hosts extremely friendly and flexible.
I would go back !

excelente anfitriona, junto a su pareja y el señor don gato, buena comunicación y la amabilidad es algo que se agradece en todo momento, el detalle del café en la habitación junto con la nevera es genial..!

A lovely and comfortable place with a beautiful green terrace in a noiseless area very close to the museum quarter (2 tramway stops). All convenience and tramway station nearby and at walking distance about 3 to 5 minutes. Amsterdam Centraal railway station is at 20 minutes by tramway. Nikki welcomed us so kindly. Thanks for the drinks also...

Stylish and comfortable flat int eh heart of Amsterdam!bed was extremely comfortable and even provided a mosquito net around it (you're right off the canals). The views of the canal was perfect and the location itself is steps from several main tram lines. It was a perfect place for our first stay in Amsterdam.

Perfect place for single-traveller! So easy and fast to reach Trainstation Centraal, Centre, public transport, Cafes, restaurants by walking. The room was nice with a small courtyard (great if you smoke). Warm blankets & hot water are available. Gina was a very helpful and friendly host :)

WE de 3 jours extra!
Logement parfaitement adapté à un petit séjour à Amsterdam.
La maison est bien située, accès facile et rapide à l'aéroport et au cœur de ville, proximité des transports.
l'organisation de la maison permet une autonomie du résident et les chambres sont très confortables. très jolie rue dans un quartier calme et agréable.
l'accueil est très sympathique et respectueux du voyageur.
Parfait, vivement recommandé.
Pour les voyageurs la "city card" est bien pratique et avantageuse.
jean christophe N
Absolutely amazing stay! We arrived a little late and Yvonne kindly let us in. The room was beautiful. The bathroom was spotless. And the bed was unbelievable. Highly recommend!!
We had a very pleasant stay in Ania's appartment. Nice location, functional appartment and beautiful decoration! Ania was always available for us and everything was simple!

Simon was a very nice host! We can only recommend. We spent there only one night, but it was very enjoyable. Simon's apartment is in a good neighborhood, near downtown and public transportation, the apartment is beautiful and modern. Room is nice, clean, more suitable for shorter stay. Thanks for everything! It was a lovely weekend in Amsterdam.

Yvonne’s home was absolutely lovely! Very clean, and taken care of. Her and her husband thought of absolutely everything we could need. The location is perfect, in a small calm town, 7 min by train to the city center! Amazing stay would definitely return!! Thank you Yvonne!
Great location.  Comfy space.  Responsive host.

For my trip to Amsterdam I was looking for a quiet place not in the touristic centre. This place was quiet and fairly well connected with transportation. The living room is magnificent, and couches among the most comfortable that I ever tried. Henk was very responsive and always available for hints and help. However, keep in mind that this one is not a place where you can organise parties and make noise. Henk was very clear with that and I was very happy with it. I needed a place to relax. Overall for me it has been a good stay.

Jantien greeted us at the house with open arms! We felt very much at 'home.' She gave us a tour, took time to recommend restaurants, activities for the children, shopping, and kept in touch throughout the weekend. We felt very well looked after. The home is clean and contemporary in design. Our children loved having toys with which to play. The neighborhood is quiet and lovely yet steps from the bustle of the city center. We would highly rate this home for a stay in Amsterdam.

L'appartement de Jantien est très bien placé. Conforme aux photos : moderne, spacieux et propre. Notre groupe d'amies a profité d'Amsterdam. Nous avons été très bien accueillies, le vendredi soir tard par une voisine de Jantien. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement!
Convenient location, was able to get in early due to vagaries of early arrival, lots of local tour books and information on Amsterdam, very positive experience overall.

Bir villanın üst katında konakladık. Evin bir anahtarı sizde duruyor. İstediğiniz saatte eve girebilirsiniz. Evin içinden odanıza çıkıyorsunuz. Evin dekoru da çok zevkliydi.
Oda çok temizdi. Balkonu çok keyifliydi. Yvonne ihtiyaç olacak herşeyi düşünmüştü. Kahve makinası olması büyük artı. Sabahları kuş sesleri ile uyandık. Çok güzeldi.
Evin muhiti çok güzel. Metroya 3-4 dakika yürüme mesafesinde. M52 ile heryere ulaşım kolay. Aynı yerden Havaalanına tren ile bir durak. Büyük kolaylık. Evin yakınında bir fırın ve market var. Odada yakın restoranların bir listesini bulacaksınız.
Yvonne güzel bir tatil geçirmeniz için elinden geleni yapıyor.
Loved our stay with Vera! Great hostess, beautiful home, nice location and she made us the most fantastic breakfast!

Very spacious and comfy room and private bathroom, a few minutes from the Zuid Station, 15mn walk to the congress center through a lovely garden. I attended a congress there and it was the perfect place to stay in the meantime. Yvonne is very friendly and hospitable. I didn't have any problems during my stay.
Very nice place for a trip in Amsterdam. Rubben is a very welcoming people :)
Pleasant apartment in a good location with easy access to the tram and buses. Vera was very friendly and generous and brought us breakfast each morning.
Really nice place and very well connected. Cleaned to the highest standards. We will definitely stay there for our next visit.

Increible la estadia en la  casa de Yvonne!  Agradecemos su cordialidad,  la atención y el cariño con que nos han tratado todos en la famiia. Nos sentimos como en casa. Preciosa la habitación con una decoración increible, un baño espectacular. Todo con una limpieza impecable y maravillosa la ubicación a 3 cuadras del metro con un viaje de 10 minutos desde el aeropuerto, y a 10 minutos del centro de Amsterdam.  Sin duda 5 estrellas !!!!

We had a very comfortable stay at Yvonne's place. Location is great, quick & easy walk to the metro which can get you just about anywhere. The whole place was very clean. Loved being able to have espresso right in the room! Yvonne is very helpful with any questions we had and made sure she informed us of things we might not be aware of such as daylight savings time change that happened on our last day, extra time needed at the airport etc. Would definitely recommend her place!!

Много красива къща, със зелена градина, в тих квартал, съвсем близо до влак, метро и автобус за Койкенхоф. Стаята беше изключително удобна и уютна, обзаведена с качествени мебели и стилно декорирана. Банята беше светла и приятна. Очакваха ни много идеи за приятно прекарване в Амстердам. Обичахме да пием кафе в красиви чаши на пейката в градината. Ще отидем пак.
Vriendelijk onthaal. Goede locatie. We hadden onze fietsen mee en waren binnen een 15-tal minuten in het centrum

We loved our stay at Vera’s place. It accommodated 4 of us, 2 couples easily. The beds were comfortable and the apartment was spacious enough.
It was also well equipped with the necessary kitchen items and bathroom amenities to make our stay comfortable.
There’s lots of food options available near by and a nice grocery store just at the corner which makes it easy to purchase breakfast or snack items.
5 minute walk to the Tram makes it easy to get into the downtown tourist area.
We would have no problems staying at Vera’s place again.

Apartment is in a great location; walking distance to Centraal Railway Station. Hans is a great host. Communication was prompt and easy and Hans had stocked the apartment with little things to make our stay welcoming like tea and coffee, beer and soft drink in the fridge and a packet of biscuits on the table.
bueno

Look at these reviews. GREAT place. Central yet away from the noise. Close to Centraal staion so can get anywhere. Hans is gracious, flexible, easy going and responsive. Great communication. HIGHLY RECOMMEND this apartment. Ideal Amsterdam experience (luv  the bakery across the canal!)

This is a very pleasant, homey apartment which is well located on a canal.  We enjoyed watching the drawbridge go up when a boat needed to pass.  Given the wide bed (160 cms), two people who are not a couple can share the bedroom without inconvenience (as long as neither one snores!).  Hans is a very helpful and attentive host.
Everything was ok with the room and ruben, I definitely recomend him to other people.
Nice place

Abbiamo passato tre notti in questo alloggio. Ruben è stato super disponibile e flessibile con check-in e check-out, anche con la possibilità di lasciare i bagagli dentro casa in attesa della nostra partenza all'aeroporto. La zona dista 20-30 minuti dal centro e ci è sembrata tranquilla. L'unica pecca è stato il riscaldamento leggermente basso secondo il nostro parere ed il fatto che il letto matrimoniale sia composto da due materassi singoli che andavano a creare un buco troppo grande tra di essi, per una coppia un po' fastidioso. Per il resto consiglio!

It was an exceptional stay. The house is located near the public transport. Sun shines through the apartment during the morning and evening. Garden in the back has birds chirping all day long and makes the balcony a really magical place to rest.
Loved staying at Michelle’s place!

Frank’s flat was very accommodating and location is a perfectly stroll into the city centre or a quick tram from outside the house. Very cosy living space.
Check-in and check-out was very easy. Thanks so much Frank!

Our stay at Friso's houseboat was so much more than we expected. The apartament is clean, nicely designed and in perfect location, pleasant walk distance from city center. Friso is very good host, helpful and responsive. I really recommend this place!
amazing place and great service!

This place greatly exceeded my expectations. The staff and the amenities are incredible. It is also in a perfectly walkable location to the major areas in Amsterdam. I already can’t wait to stay here again!

Due to Frank's lovely flat and hospitality our trip to Amsterdam was just marvelous! Although we went there by car from Germany and parking is very much expensive in And around the city centre there was a save underground parking right in front of the house. However, everything is within walking distance or quicker with public transportation. They'd even prepared a bowl of strawberries for us as well as water and tea/coffee, maps and a nice book about the canals. It was just like staying at the house of friends- Frank/ his daughter were always contactable if necessary and communication was very easy and caring. We would definitely recommend this place and will come back one day!

This was my second time in Amsterdam; the first time was in the dead of winter, but this time was close to summer and it made such a difference! I really enjoyed staying at Frank's place. It was quiet and peaceful, qualities I enjoy when I'm on a holiday. Frank made sure I was okay and he was very accommodating, both checking in and out. He was also provided detailed instructions about how to get to the place which really helped as a foreigner. I really appreciate making this stay very enjoyable.

I love this space, I came here before to work and relax, and to tiny concerts! They have a great kitchen and bar upstairs, lovely communal area to relax, and the hotel is equally nice! I love how efficiently they constructed the space and how comfortable I felt there. Beds are comfy, kitchen is small but sufficiently equipped.
Belle hôtel la chambre était très propre idéalement situé pas trop loin du centre et la station de métro à 2minutes

I had such a lovely time in Arne's apartment! Very stylish, spacious, clean.  I walked in to the centre day -  the central station isn't very far and it's a lovely city to see by foot. Arne's girlfriend Roos welcomed me to Amsterdam and gave me some fantastic tips on what to see that's not on usual tourist agendas! I especially loved NDSM werf. Thank you Arne and Roos for a lovely holiday!

We had a great time staying at Arne's apartment! He was there to welcome us when we arrived, and had many good ideas for what to do during our stay. The apartment is comfortable, and the neighborhood calm, relaxed and pleasant. The nearby Bakkerswinkel café is a really nice place to get breakfast every morning. I would definitely recommend spending your time in Amsterdam in Arne's apartment.
Arne’s house is so cute and confortable. Everything was clean and Arne is adorable. And he speak French ! :)

We truly enjoyed our stay at Yara's place.  Communication was great.  Location was great.  Unique set up and they provided everything we needed and them some.  Early drop off for our luggage allowed us to visit Amsterdam without dragging it around with us.  The directions were accurate for our exit from our river cruise right to their doorstep.  In my opinion, a perfect location and very good value.  They made us feel at home.

Zoku is the perfect place to stay in Amsterdam. The vibrant social atmosphere, complete with a bar, restaurant, and ample space for various activities, makes it truly unique. The staff are outstanding—friendly, helpful, and always ready to assist with a smile.
I absolutely love the way the rooms are designed; they’re functional, stylish, and equipped with everything you could possibly need. On the 6th floor, there’s even a convenient shop where you can grab any travel essentials you might have forgotten to pack.
The location is fantastic—just a 10-minute walk to some of Amsterdam’s best spots and only 20-25 minutes away from the iconic Rijksmuseum.
Zoku has become my go-to accommodation in Amsterdam, and I can’t wait to visit their spaces in Vienna, Copenhagen, and Paris. I hope they expand to even more cities across Europe.
Believe me, you’ll fall in love with Zoku!
Great place! Everyone is super helpful! We had a great time definitely coming back!

Mark was great. The flat were very tidy, quiet and it offers everything you'd need like fresh water, wine, towels, wifi etc...
I recommend this place which is also very close to the center !
We had a great trip

This is a wonderful loft in a great location - it's close enough to all of the sights (we walked everywhere and only took an uber home once because it was raining) but far enough away that you don't have to deal with the massive crowds of people in the heart of the city.  It's a wonderful respite from a day of sightseeing and exploring.  The loft is modern and well-appointed, and the bed is very comfortable.  And we LOVED the heated floors in the bathroom!  Mark is a fantastic host - we accidentally knocked over one of his wine glasses on the first day and he graciously replaced it and cleaned the glass we couldn't get up with our hands.  He also gave us some wonderful recommendations for authentic Dutch food which we loved.  I would absolutely recommend staying here!

Rene's loft was one of the most beautiful spaces we have stayed. We have stayed at many since traveling with our family.
The convenience, the cleanliness and thoughtfulness added to the best vacation. We hope that on our next trip we can stay again. Thank you!
Parfait ! Mark est un super hôte, hyper flexible et joignable à toute heure. Et l'appartement au top :)
Studio avec chambre en mezzanine. A 10 minutes de la gare centrale et proche du centre historique. Calme et agréable, bon accueil/ bonne adresse.

Mark's place was a lovely home away from home for several days in Amsterdam. Location was ideal for walking to to the center and museums, bed was comfy, shower was great, and the space was cozy and clean. Mark was welcoming upon arrival, and checked in throughout the stay to make sure everything was up to standards. I would stay here again without a doubt!

We stayed in Wijnand's home for one week and were very happy about it. The apartment is located in a nice area on a quiet street and the place has everything you need to have a pleasant stay. It is close to the tram and in walking distance to nice shops, restaurants, supermarkeds, etc. We enjoyed having our breakfast at the balcony every morning after having slept very comfortable in the big bed. We felt at home in the apartment because we could feel that it is actually a place where people live and not just a regular "nocarz apartment". Our overall stay in Amsterdam was good and staying at Wijnand's place only made it better therefor we can definitely recommend this place to anyone planning on making a trip to this charming city. Thank you for having us.

I cannot recommend Laura and Arjan's place enough. The location is ideal...located on a scenic canal in a quiet area just minutes from the hustle and bustle of the city. The apartment itself was spacious, clean and had everything you needed. And I haven't even got to the breakfast yet: fresh croissants, eggs and fruit delivered every morning along with coffee and juice. What more can you want? Oh, and they let us borrow their bikes, which is truly the way to experience Amsterdam to the full extent. Laura and Arjan were very flexible with check-in/check-out, and even gave us a ride to the airport for our departure, which saved us a huge hassle. On top of all that, they're great people and a part of what makes nocarz so great.

Mark and Sebastian were incredible hosts. We loved the space, it was a quiet neighborhood, but very close to all the things Amsterdam has to offer. We were warmly greeted at the door, and they even had wine waiting. If we ever make our way back to the Amsterdam, this is where we’ll stay! Enjoy!

We really enjoyed our stay here. The space was very clean and it was in a great location next to the central station. It was also an easy 5-10 minute walk to the main shopping streets. Mark was very lovely and helpful and gave lots of recommendations of nearby places to eat and swimming areas (it was very hot while we were there!) . We would absolutely recommend this place to everyone.

Laura' place fulfilled all of our requirements and more for 5 nights.
We enjoyed coming "home" to the quiet after a busy day. The location was great, beside a waterway, close to a bus stop ( only 2 stops into the Central Station) but walkable to town.
A scrumptious breakfast was provided each morning - fresh orange juice, coffee, cereal, croissants, fresh bread, boiled egg, cheese....
The facilities were there to cook an evening meal, but with some great restaurants close by, we chose to go out.
A chocolate on our pillow when we arrived, a bottle of water each, a lift to the airport were extras that made it more special.
I appreciated a hairdryer and plenty of fresh towels available as well as alternative doonas. The bed was a little on the firm side for my back but that was not a big problem .
Communication both before and during our stay was excellent; Laura and Arjan are outgoing , friendly and welcoming people and Cheri was delightful and very focused on making us feel welcome and comfortable!
We thoroughly recommend this place and hosts. Thank you team Laura!
Great host. Easy to communicate with. Place is as described. Great value for its location.

The flat is good located, near the services (supermarket, restaurant, bars) and the transport. It is also situated in a calm neighborhood. The flat is as described by Marijn. Marijn and her fried welcomed us. Everything was perfect. I recommend it.

Bigger than most in Amsterdam. We really enjoyed our stay and felt like home. The check-in and check-out went very smooth and easy.
Jacqueline was such a wonderful host.
Note: it's not recommended for those who don't like cats.

Es un lugar muy lindo y con buena ubicación para llegar al centro. Tiene una parada de autobuses cerca que te lleva al metro. Te prestan las tarjetas, que para nosotros fue lo ideal y tienen un mapa con lugares recomendados para visitar. Sin duda volvería a su hogar.!!!!

Very nice and cozy place. Ellen has always been available to give us directions to best enjoy our journey.
Thank you.

Wonderful airb&b in AM. La casa è bella, pulita e i letti sono comodi. Spaziosa  anche per 3 persone. Ellen e Ron sono stati molto accoglienti e riservati, ma anche puntuali e disponibili in qualsisi momento della giornata. La casa è distante dal centro di Amsterdam, ma con uber si può raggiungere la stazione centrale con 15/18 euro e da lì muoversi a piedi. C'è il bus 35/36 a 10 minuti da casa che ti porta ad una stazione della metro, per poi  prendere la linea per la Central Station (2 fermate). Puoi comprare il biglietto del bus dall'autista, ma con carta di credito (3.50 euro) e vale per tutti i tipi di trasporto pubblico, per una durata di 60 minuti.

This place is such a gem!! Would 100% recommend to any couple looking for an amazing place to stay in the city. Laura and her husband were extremely hospitable, and the breakfast each morning was so delicious! The croissants were to die for. Not a modern tv, but we were too busy enjoying the city and the amazing neighborhood to even think about watching tv. The rain shower was amazing!!! We can’t say enough wonderful things about this place and the hosts. It’s in the basement, so there was some noise from above, but it was a nice reminder that breakfast was on its way :)

I had the opportunity to meet Tanja, she is extremely friendly and helpful host.
The space is amazing, exact as in the pictures, a really big room with a comfortable bed, hot shower and very well located.
I higly recommend!

El Dto de Laura y su familia es muy lindo y muy bien puesto. La cama es muy comoda y la ducha es fantastica.
Nos gusto mucho la ubicacion, es un barrio tranquilo, no lejos del centro.
El desayuno esta incluido, eso es un plus!
Gracias Laura and Arjan!! Volveremos!

Great place to stay in Amsterdam! The location is very central and walking distance towards many locations. There is a metro and tram stop minutes from the apartment. There is a kettle and espresso machine. The room is very spacious with a private entrance, and the bed is super comfy. The apartment was very clean and Magnus was very kind and knowledgeable about the area and provided tips on things we should do while there. I would 100% stay here again if ever in Amsterdam!
cozy place in amsterdam close to everything

Great place the owner is very helpful and kind. The studio is so clean and decorated with great originality that makes you feel excited to be in Amsterdam. Excellent location as well. Would definitely recommend for a couple trip with a significant other.
I had a great stay. The space was nice and just what I needed for a full week. The hosts were very helpful as well.

We were delighted with our stay at Magnus. Although it faces a busy street, it is still very quiet. It is very well equipped for a few days' stay and ideally located, close to the center but away from the hustle and bustle, just a few steps from the delicious restaurants of De Pijp.

Alex’s place is located at the central core of Amsterdam. It was very well decorated and had well stocked kitchen. It was quite spacious (it was situated from 3rd floor to 5th floor) and it was enough space for a family of four. The stairs were quite steep, so if you plan to stay with elder parents, I would suggest other accommodations. Overall, I really enjoyed staying at Alex’s place and I would definitely come back to his place.

Must say peter and Zora were fantastic as hosts. The house is recently renovated and made with lot of love and artistic in nature. The rooms, toilet etc are very clean.The hosts are so cool and flexible and guide you to making your visit more memorable. Next time I go, am surely staying at their place.

Rudi's apartment is light and spacious with a lovely view of the canal. It's clean and comfortable and in my favourite areas, the Jordaan is peaceful but vibrant, full of places to eat shop and drink. I fully recommend staying there!

Stilvoll eingerichtetes Appartement, genau wie auf den Fotos abgebildet! Gut organisierter und flexibler Check-in. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt genossen und vor allem die Lage ist sehr gut.
