Zu Fuß sind es 3 Minuten bis zur Haltestelle und dann ist man mit dem Bus oder der Straßenbahn ganz schnell (10-15 min) in der Innenstadt. Die Nachbarschaft selbst ist sehr zu empfehlen, wenn man in Lokalen der Einheimischen essen oder etwas trinken gehen möchte. Für die Selbstverpflegung ist die Küche des Appartements gut ausgestattet und der große Esstisch bietet mehr als genügend Platz. Einziges Problem war das sehr kleine WC. Für einen kurzen Aufenthalt aber durchaus in Kauf zu nehmen. Ich würde wieder buchen!

La ubicación, acceso al transporte y cercanía al supermercado está bastante bien. Sin embargo, la casa parece bastante abandonada. Cuando llegue había basura, cosas en la nevera, platos en el lavavajillas, el sofá con muchas manchas, muchos interruptores no tienen luz, las sábanas tenían agujeros... Incluso había agujeros en el techo de baño, y debajo de los muebles de la cocina se veían todos los cables. Es un segundo piso, y las escaleras son tipo holandés. Muy estrechas y empinadas. Tuve que hacer la maleta en la entrada del edifico porque era peligroso bajar una maleta pesada por ellas

The apartment is in a really really pretty part of Amsterdam with nice local bars and food. Very easy and quick to get into the centre - 10 minute walk. Apartment is even better than the photos, and Frits was a great host. I'd definitely stay again and recommend to friends
Accoglienza ottima. Casa carina. Quartiere interessante!
Fantástica ubicación para ir y venir al centro. Gran espacio, volvería a quedarme.

Bas is a nice guy who make my stay better then I thought  as a guy who used to sleep in hotels.  Bas is kind he helped me to change the date of the rent  and help me by informing me any news that going on. In Amsterdam. Thanks for everything I am sure that When I will back to Amsterdam I will come to you again

Vincent was a great host, always available and kind. I would deeply recommend staying at his place (great location to smoothly enjoy the city with plenty of cafes and restaurants nearby). Grazie mille!
The house boat is sparkling clean and very nicely setup. It was an absolutely fantastic and unique experience

Mark was a fantastic host - super responsive and communicative around checkin and check out. The location is fantastic and being on a houseboat with a garden roof deck, was perfect. The canal was one of the best, there were quaint local shops but it wasn’t touristy. One of our favorite activities was sitting on the deck with wine and cheese. Mark has great tips for the city and we loved his restaurant recommendations. Place was clean, modern and just right for holiday.
Great experience to stay on a houseboat. Perfect location!

Our stay on Olaf and Mark's houseboat was a great experience. The location cannot be beat as it is just around the corner from a Metro stop and is within walking distance of the museum district and many restaurants. The boat is much larger than we expected from the pictures. The weather was beautiful during our stay and we were able to enjoy sitting on the deck  and watching the world float by.

Alloggio come da descrizione .
Thom è stato puntuale e disponibile.

Attention à l’arnaque !! Thom ne demande pas de caution mais en contrepartie il exige une somme supérieure à 1000 euro une foi notre départ ! Il m’accuse a tord , il a endommagé volontairement sont appartement et maintenant il me réclame des sous .. c’est une honte à thom , méfiez vous je vous le déconseille fortement !!!!!

This is a great place to stay, centrally located, wonderful host. The place is small but well arranged and everything you need is there. Thanks Hein!
PS it is very close to the metro, find the end of the street closest to the station. Google maps confused us.
Apartment was very clean and looked exactly like the pictures. The location is great too. We definitely enjoyed our stay in Amsterdam!

Paul's ground floor studio is perfectly located close to the De Pijp subway station. We stayed for 10 days and loved it - it is compact but not at all crammed, and has the most comfortable bed. We were able to cook great dinners in the full kitchen; food was easily bought from the nearby Albert Heijn supermarket.
Please do not be put off by other reviews raising noise issues. The street is generally quiet any day of the week. We weren't at all bothered by the occasional persons chatting outside (patrons of the gelato shop next door - super yummy ice-cream BTW), and slept very well every night.
110% recommended for a great value stay in Amsterdam.

We had a perfect stay  at Eliens cosy and stylish house. It is a nice and quiet  neighbourhood  but still so close to the very busy citycenter of Amsterdam. She was very helpfull and attend to our needs and we felt very welcom. I will definitely come back again.

We had a perfect time at elien and frankys place!!! It’s a super charming house that has a great vibe, very very clean, kid friendly and exactly as described! My daughter felt at home and that was important for us! And so did we! Would come back anytime!
Marion was a great host! Very helpful and friendly! The room itself was perfect, with a comfortable bed and nice bathroom. Location is excellent for a trip to Amsterdam. Highly recommended!!!

This was a fantastic base for a weekend in Amsterdam, located in the most beautiful area, with everything in walking distance. Marco was a great host, checking in with messages, really easy check-in and check-out & even leaving us some goodies in the fridge.
We were here with our 1 year old son; there was a baby bed set up for him and we were able to put him to bed and then stay up in the kitchen/dining area.
Can definitely recommend!

Marco's place was perfect. Very central without being too much in the thick of things. The place is small but perfectly formed with everything you would need and more. The food and drinks provided by Marco are excellent to get you started and the place has been decorated with great taste. Highly recommended.
Marion was a great host and was extremely helpful and informative. Communication was also good.

We had a wonderful stay at Marions place. The bedroom was big and the bed was very comfy. Marion is a very thoughtful and nice Person. She gave us a lot of good tips and recommended us great restaurants.
Amazing location near museums, shops, tram lines and a metro stop.
Marion's place is a peaceful oasis in busy Amsterdam, with easy access to the centre of the city, and plenty of eateries nearby.

Hein was a fantastic host who greeted us warmly and gave us so many good tips for exploring Amsterdam. The place is small but big enough for a couple or solo travelers.
Communication was a breeze and he let us store our bags as we had a later flight which was very much appreciated. We came when it was getting cold, only one radiator which we couldn't seem to work so we were a little cold however this could just be us not knowing how to work it properly.
Thanks Hein!
Amazing location and place! Marion is helpful, friendly and lovely! Would recommend.
Marco ist ein vorbildlicher Vermieter. Die Kommunikation war einwandfrei, sehr ausführlich und informativ. War Gastfreundschaft durch seinen exzellenten Service. Definitiv weiter zu empfehlen.

Der check-in war sehr gut und einfach, da der Gastgeber schnell antwortet und auch persönlich vor Ort ist. Die Lage ist unglaublich gut alles ist einfach und relativ schnell zu Fuß zu erreichen.
Alles in allem sehr empfehlenswert für einen Kurztripp!

On a été séduites par l’emplacement, et Marco a été très sympa avec nous. Plein de petites attentions qui nous feront revenir chez lui si l’envie nous reprends de visiter une autre partie de la ville ! Je recommande

Brigit is a lovely host and was available to receive us when we arrived. Was very helpful with local information.
Was easy to settle into this nice charming place. The patio is lovely. Only feedback for improvement is the wifi connectivity. It could easily have been the network provider issues but maybe a new router with better range might help
ottima posizione, casa accogliente e host super gentile e disponibile.

We thoroughly enjoyed our second stay here! Marion is a warm and welcoming host, the place is clean, quiet and comfortable and the location is great! We hope to visit again! Thanks for all your kindness, Marion!
Marion is a very pleasant person and it’s a very good place ! I recommend it

Che dire Hein è un ottimo host il locale piccino lo consiglio ad una persona e portarteli dietro roba per debellare le zanzare anche
Se vi è la zanzariera😀

Great place to stay in the museum zone, perfect for walk all Ámsterdam touristic points.
The host was helpfull all the time
Marion is a wonderful host and lives in a very nice neighborhood. Everything was clean and the communication was great.
Great location, nice place, great bathroom and bed. Communicative host as well.
Nice place to stay, very close to city centre
Sonia and Ben are great hosts! Their place is in a peaceful and beautiful area in the North of Amsterdam. Recommended!
Excellent stay. Everything is like in describe.

Marion ist eine sehr herzliche Gastgeberin, sie war immer für uns zur Verfügung und gab uns viele Tipps zum Sparen. Zusätzlich ist das Zimmer sehr sauber, geräumig und ruhig. Ich würde dieses nocarz jeder Zeit wieder buchen!
The size of the place was great had everything u needed. Supermarket is closes enough to walk to if you need stuff. Just a great place to stay.

Hein était vraiment un hôte irréprochable, il est à l’écoute, vous conseille et il est surtout quelqu’un de très amical et accueillant. En ce qui concerne le logement, il est nickel. Il correspond aux description, et il est parfait si vous souhaitez passer un petit séjour à 2 personnes 🙌

Highly recommended for a large group of close friends who don’t mind sharing their personal space with each other. The location is a bit far out of town, unless you use a combination of Uber and the ferry to central station. The warehouse is fantastic for a pre party, you have a pool table, table tennis and plenty of space to hang out.
Tess and Felix were brilliant hosts! The house is really perfect for a family trip to Amsterdam! They helped us at any time.

The appartment was good situated in nice district, Jesse was listenning for all your problems,
I recommand for all.

The apartment is located perfectly next to Vondelpark. So many cafés and restaurants are nearby, we loved the atmosphere of the WPA area. All you need for a relaxing trip to Amsterdam you will find at this apartment including a well equipped kitchen, fast wifi, a great balcony with relaxing garden view and fast wifi. Our host Barbara was wonderful. We will come back fore sure!
Barbara works with hosts and welcomed us wonderfully. The place is just as pictured and the back porch is divine.  Perfect location.

Wir waren zum Feiern eines 40. Geburtstages in der Wohnung. Als Startpunkt und als Ort zum recovern ist sie ideal !
In 20 Gehminuten erreicht man die 24/7- Fähren in die Innenstadt (Uber 10€).
Supermarkt, coffee-shop und Restaurants in der Nähe vorhanden.
Wir würden die Wohnung nochmal buchen !
Cheap, basic place. In need of some looking after, light 💡 at top of 4 floors didn’t work-in the dark, dangerous. Otherwise location and value is average.

We really enjoyed our stay at Taco’s warehouse and would definitely return again. Super fun space with the ping pong and pool table, and finding the disco ball light was a great moment. We wish we’d stayed longer!
The apartment has a great location, Jesse is very quick on communication and once you get past the four flights of stairs 😅, you’ll love this cozy space.
Amazing host. Really helpful throughout and gave us a warm welcoming. Would definitely recommend and wouldn’t hesitate to stay again. Thanks Debbie 😀

Location, view, and comfort. This lovely apartment has it all. Location: A six-minute walk to Amstel Station to catch the Metro, a two-minute walk to Amsteldijk to catch the Number 12 tram. This location makes your mobility in Amsterdam a breeze. View: The Amstel River enters the windows of this apartment like vibrant paintings in a gallery. Houseboats at their moorings. Tour boats with two tourists, or twenty-two. Sculling teams rowing past ducks, gulls, swans. You have a front-row seat to this historic river. Comfort: The furnishings and ample floor space provide all the comfortable livability you could ask for. The apartment is much better than the photos.
As a host, Debbie is the best we’ve ever had, hands down. She communicates with you so you don’t have to waste vacation time with uncertainties. She also provided us a truly superior list of restaurants and events, and gave us transportation recommendations. It’s no wonder she is so positively reviewed. She’s as good as they come

Checking into Jesse’s nocarz was a smooth process and the apartment was cozy. Located on the fourth floor with a narrow stairwell.
The only issue was the smell that came from the bathroom.
Adorable loft and a great location, approximately 20 minutes walk from all of central Amsterdam.
If the bathroom spell could be addressed, we would have no complaints for the price we paid and would recommend if looking for a spot in the city of Amsterdam!
Tutto perfetto
This apartment is great! The location was amazing, the room was very clean and the hosts were the best. I recommend this apartment to all future Amsterdam visitors.
Great place, great location. Easy to get to around either by walking or via the tram nearby

Pros:
Communications was great
On 4th floor with no lift but they carried my luggage for me at check in/out
Very kind, warm and welcoming
Easy to walk places nice neighborhood
Private toilet right next to the room
Was flexible with check out time(thank you!)
Use of shared kitchen and fridge
Cons:
Shower water still splashes out
Some of the towels smelled( like smoke?)
Loud speaking noise passed 12am some nights(living room is right next to the room and you can hear all the conversation)
Dog is very sweet but may bark at you sometimes
Probably not the best option if you prefer a quiet place( as hosts seem social and have company often) but maybe if it’s a short stay or if noise doesn’t bother you, or if you are very social too, it could be perfect:)
Only good things to say about the hosts! Genuine, kind people and good communication:)Appreciate them welcoming me and sharing their home for 5 nights!

vraiment très bien situé ! le tram est juste en bas de l’appartement ! pour un séjour à amsterdam ce nocarz est parfait !
simon et rein sont très réactifs, arrangeants et super sympas, je recommande fortement !!
Beautiful house and the room and bathroom were lovely. Great hosts, very cute dogs and a good location. Highly recommend this as a place to stay in Amsterdam!
Great neighborhood, immediate access to tram, wonderful host, lots of space, stores and restaurants close by...
It was a nice stay at Rein’s place. Thank you for hosting us, will come back next time.

Posizione perfetta! Ottima per i tram e perfetta per una bella passeggiata: in 20 minuti a piedi si raggiunge il centro. Vicino a supermercato e negozi.
L'appartamento è con vista sul canale.. meravigliosa!
comodo e ben pulito, dotato del necessario per una breve vacanza. Grazie a Jesse per tutte le informazioni, i consigli e le mappe della città. Grazie alla mamma di Jesse per il check in.
Ci ritorneremo sicuramente! :)

Subho? Clearly short for super-host.
Nice guy, great club-recommendations, helpful and friendly.

Great apartment, close to everything! Great host who made everything easy! Great value too!
Very Great!
Lovely place in a brilliant location. The weather was bitterly cold during our trip, so we were really pleased that the flat was so nice & warm! Really comfy bed too :)

Thanks for a great weekend and your
very quick answers!
I had a really nice stay. The host was very responsive, the area is very quiet and it was easy get into Amsterdam. Definitely worth the price
Great place, Partoe is a super host.

Jesse was a wonderful accommodating host. His instructions were easy to understand! The apartment is lovely and spacious and just a minute from the tram. Jesse let us keep our things in our apartment longer than check-out time, as well. We had the best time in Amsterdam, can't wait to come back!

My wife and I had a really great stay at Franz and Maria's place. The room had really nice interior decoration and lots of natural light. The highlight was definitely their super friendly German Shepard, Leica, and my wife could not stop playing with her. Loved that her shower room was exclusive to us and my wife would soak in the tub after a long day of exploring Amsterdam. Would definitely recommend! Location was really convenient to get to downtown and the wifi was fast too.
정말 깨끗해요 정말 정말! 한 사람마다 일회용 슬리퍼가 준비되어 있었고 깨끗한 큰 수건도 준비되어 있었습니다. 1층이지만 안전합니다. Jesse는 아침 먹을 곳, 갈 만한 곳을 추천해주었고 좋았어요. 정말 추천해요! 교통도 편한 편이에요.
Incredibly friendly host. Clean, cozy, and comfy room. Highly recommended!
Very good location, easy to find and go to places. Room very clean and confortable, bathroom as well. We really enjoyed to stay in Jesse's room!
Great position, colse to the Central station. Reinout is a perfect host, we really enjoy breakfast (fresh fruits,eggs orange juice and bread). Strongly recommended for privacy and cleaning.
A spacious private room with a really nice bathroom, ideally placed in my favourite neighbourhood of Amsterdam
Jesse est à l’écoute et nous a donné des bonnes adresses. Son logement est l’endroit idéal pour se reposer après avoir marché toute la journée dans la ville d’Amsterdam.
Super great location, and place to stay!
The four of us had an amazing 4-day-stay at this beautiful spacious apartment, perfect access to tram & train and very nice communication! Thank you Arie and Penelope! :-)

The house was perfect in terms of space and organisation, but the kitchen and also the bathroom are a little bit dirty.
We aspect to find breakfast ready in the morning just because we want to discover the city and we have a lot of things to do.
The position of the house is very well located, near the station and the centre.
There is also the possibility to rent a bike (10€) for the entire day.

This double studio located in De Pijp area of Amsterdam is charming, clean and a great location. Shopping, eateries, and connections to tram and metro are excellent, if you don't want to walk too much...but most popular tourist sites are within walking distance!
Comfortable beds, plenty of pillows, kitchen dishes, pans and flatware stocked for 4 people. Shampoos and body washes supplied also.
Fresh flowers were a special touch!

Nous avons passé 2 nuits chez Reinout, l'accueil était très chaleureux, Reinout est disponible et sympathique.
L'emplacement est idéal (5' a pieds de la gare) et la maison est très calme.
La chambre était propre et nous n'avons manqué de rien. Le seul bémol : la propreté des parties communes.
Le petit+ : Reinout propose de la location de vélo a prix imbattables !
Merci pour ce séjour, nous reviendrons :)

Logement au top. Nous sommes parties à 4 (groupe de filles). Appartement très bien situé (Metro M52 De Pipj à 5 minutes à pieds et tram 4 à 2 minutes). Commerces à proximité. Les 2 chambres sont très bien équipées : literie extrêmement confortable, cuisine équipée, frigo, 2 salles de bain (1 avec douche et 1 autre avec douche et baignoire). Logement très propre. Les serviettes de bain et le linge de lit sont fournis. Nous avons été accueillies par Marco, le compagnon d’Esther, très sympathique et arrangeant. Que du positif !!!
Die Wohnung ist super sauber und ausgestattet mit allem was man braucht. Marloes ist super nett und antwortet immer schnell. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in Amsterdam und würde wieder kommen.

Our stay was great!  The place was just as shown in the photos.  We were able to get in just a few minutes early.  Keep check in times in mind when you travel or you could be waiting for quite some time to check in.  The location was great - we walked all over town and even rented bikes from a place down the street for 12 euro per day. Only 13 miles round trip to see the windmills north of town - no tour guide needed!  Our check in was quick and easy and IAMnocarz rep was there within minutes of our text with helpful tips too.  We would definitely stay again!
Cosy apartment, feels like at home. Perfect place to discover A'dam by bicycle. Great brekfast/brunch places in the neighbourhood (Dovers Dog).
Nice and clean

We stayed at Dennis' place for a couple of days on a city trip. The place was really comfortable, communication was easy and uncomplicated. The place is super close to public transport into the heart of Amsterdam and also has great places for food and drinks around the corner. Definitely recommendable.
Great Apartment, Thank you!

This place was a great choice for a long weekend trip to Amsterdam. The location was great! I was a bit worried before we got there - but don't be! The public transport is great and the area itself is nice and walkable. Dennis is a very reliable host and very flexible whenever we needed suggestions or help. As we spent most of our time outdoors we didn't spend much time at the place, but the room was great and clean and provided with everything. I definitely recommend this for someone spending a few days in Amsterdam!

Noam welcomed us with open arms in his apartment. He is super warm and friendly and very easy to talk to.
He was super flexible with the check in and check out times. Everything was exactly as described from the interior in the apartment to the neighbourhood. There is a wonderful park right in front of his house.
Easy access to the tram stop which takes you within 15 min into the centre of the town.
The train station Lelylaan is just 10 min walk away and the airport is with just a 5 min train ride away.
Amazing view over Amsterdam!
We are already talking about to rent his place again for the next visit!

We had a great time in Amsterdam
and staying at Samia’s place. It is in a lovely neighbourhood, easy to reach the city centre and lots of restaurants and cafes near-by. The apartment is really nicely decorated, has all the basic amenities and a lovely balcony to enjoy the sun. Communication with Samia was also great, and she supported us with lots of recommendations, definitely would stay again!

What a spot!! so fabulous to stay in this cool canal boat... right next to Magere Brug. It wasn't too noisy at all. The boat was so cool... great bedrooms and living spaces. We had a problem with the water draining in the shower, but Richard was very quick to respond so hopefully it won't be an issue for anyone else.
The boat has a kitchen area, but we only used it for breakfast. It has a dishwasher (tablets supplied) which is great... and a Nespresso machine- which was fabulous in the mornings to sit outside on the beanbags and have a coffee!
There were quite a few spiderwebs around and perhaps a little bit of TLC (leaky tap) is needed.
Shireen is lovely and very helpful! She even let us stay a few hours later for check out. The location is VERY easy by transit and takes only about 15-20 min to get into the city center. Thanks!!

Das Hausboot ist eine absolute Empfehlung für einen Aufenthalt in Amsterdam. Alles entspricht den Bildern, das Boot ist blitzblank sauber. Abends auf den Sitzsäcken auf dem Dach liegen und den Lichtern und Booten zuzuschauen, war ein Highlight. Die Lage ist 1A. Richard und Birgit waren bei Fragen sehr schnell erreichbar. Alles in allem ein tolles Erlebnis!

We had a wonderful stay on Jupiter. Right next to the Skinny Bridge, which lights up at night, along with the bridges surrounding it. Very magical. It’s situated within walking distance of all major attractions. 30 mins walk from centraal station and 5 mins walk to the metro. Get a travel ticket from centraal station and you can use this for 3 days on all trams and metro. Travelling is extremely easy.
The boat is spacious, clean and cosy. Everything you need and a lovely shower and jacuzzi bath.
Richard and Birgit live at the other end of the boat, completely separate from the b&b and are very helpful and friendly. We thoroughly recommend Jupiter.

Marieke's house was in a nice, quiet neighborhood and very pleasant. The interior of the house was beautifully decorated, useful and comfortable. Marieke clearly explained the location of the house and was attentive to our needs throughout our stay. Thanks you!
Lovely apartment , perfekt situated, Fremke was always helpful and easy to communicate, cool cat 🐈‍⬛ wonderful, cosy place to stay in Amsterdam
One of my most amazing nocarz stay ever! Rosa’s also the loveliest host.

Laurens flat was just as described, a little bit bigger than what the pictures show. The flat is in a good location, safe and close to transport links and not to mention very clean!

Laurens was very contactable during our stay and was very helpful. I would recommend staying here :)
Great Amsterdam experience. Very helpful and friendly host. The ship is very close to bus public transport which is very handy to get into the centre of town.

We had a great time at the apartment. We were 4 people staying for a week and we had no problems. Mik & Isabelle were good hosts, easy to communicate with and even bought us breakfast and a bottle of wine as we arrived. The apartment is fresh and it's easy to go everywhere with tram 4. Can warmly recommend their place!
Highly recommend this place it is amazing!

Our stay was perfect and beyond. I wanted a romantic getaway and that was realized we had a little paradise of our own. We had a complementary breakfast for our first morning. There's a kitchenette for light preparation of a warm meal. The place is in the ground floor and in walking distance (2min) of public transportation. There are plenty of café and restaurants in the neighborhood. It's a quiet area with easy access to the more brewing spots in the city centre. I only spoke to Mike briefly but check-in was very easy. Everything was self-explanatory. And check-out went smoothly as well.
Thank you for having us and I would definitely come back or recommend this place for couples :)
Thank you very much! It was a very nice stay. The things left in the fridge for breakfasts t were welcome. Very quiet and cosy place! Everything was perfekt! :)
Great host! Very friendly and accommodating, staying aboard the Maria while visiting Amsterdam was a very cool, romantically cozy and relaxing experience, would highly recommend!
Great beautiful little apartment, perfect location and very friendly hosts! I recommend this place 100%!

Très bel appartement, pratique et bien situé pour visiter Amsterdam ! Mike est très sympathique et très arrangeant ce qui facilite vraiment le déplacement et la communication. On recommande vraiment !

Nice, spacious studio. Friendly check in (parents of host I believe)
Kitchen with fridge, gas hobs, coffee machine and coffee, and plenty of utensils.
WiFi worked fine, nice balcony too :)
Tram right outside apartment, takes a few minutes to get into the center. However it is walkable in 30 to 45min
Thank you for the stay

The apartment was super clean and has a lot of light, as the street in front of it is very broad compared to normal Amsterdam. Quiet neighbourhood but very central. Tram 2 is a 2 min walk away from the apartment, which took us to almost every destination in Amsterdam or close to it. The balcony is sheltered from rain, as there is a bigger balcony above it. Apart from the shower's water jet, which is pretty weak, it is one the best stays we had in Amsterdam.
Great location, great price, great host !

Sehr schönes Appartment, sauber, es ist alles da, was man braucht - und noch mehr. Ein Frühstück für den ersten Morgen mit selbst gemachter Marmelade und auch Saft. Die Fahrräder waren super für uns, wir sind damit jeden Tag gefahren - besser kann man sich in Amsterdam nicht bewegen. Mik war immer erreichbar und antwortet in kürzester Zeit. Das Appartment liegt ruhig, aber trotzdem relativ zentral - in 15-20 Minuten waren wir mit dem Fahrrad in der Innenstadt - auch die Sehenswürdigkeiten sind innerhalb dieser Zeit zu erreichen. Ganz toll war, dass Mik uns in seinem kleinen Boot durch die Grachten mitgenommen hat! Wir können die Unterkunft und die Gastgeber wirklich uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen!
Parfait, comme d’habitude ! Nous reviendrons :)

We had a really pleasant stay, good communication, flexibilty in Check in & out, nice and calm area around, perfect neighbourhood, really central and good to explore Amsterdam - especially with the bikes included. Thank you, we would book it again and can definitely recommend!
Laurens’s place is wonderful! Highly recommend for a stay in Amsterdam!

Gabriella et John sont des personnes formidables et d'une grande générosité. Ils savent recevoir et mettre à l'aise leurs visiteurs. Leur grand appartement est à leur image, magnifique et convivial.
La chambre est somptueuse et le lit d'un grand confort.
Leurs conseils et petites adresses, nous ont permis de découvrir la belle Amsterdam sous ses multiples facettes.
Gabriella et John sont de grands ambassadeurs pour nocarz qui méritent 10 étoiles.

Gabriella and John are best host ever.
They have extrem personal charms.
Me and my friend are falling in love with Gabriella's house even now..(We are in Paris now.)
Gabriella's home is really warm and comfortable.
Beautiful shower room, living room, bed room, kitchen.. and all of the area.
I am not good at Eng but They always hear and wait to understand what i want to saying.
Gabriella's house is close to the central.
if you use bus or bus and tram it only takes less than 10minutes from home. or you can walk!
Here is better than the other places even hotel.
I hope Every person who visit in the Amsterdam should be stay in there.
We want to give them a Big prize.
thank you for your help.
you are touched my heart a lot.♡♡
한국인이신가요..?
굳이 홍등가쪽에 잡지 않으셔도 된다면 이곳이 최고입니다. 정말 좋은 기억만 가지고 가요 ㅜㅜㅜ
가브리엘라랑 존은 정말 사랑입니다♡
버스,트램 카드 사셨나요? 암스테르담이 작아서 어디든지 15분 이내에는 가는 것 같아요!
다시 네덜란드를 간다고 해도 저는 이 숙소를 잡을래요 ㅜㅜ
이 숙소가 좋아서 암스테르담에 다시 가고 싶을정도예요♡

House of Swings is such a pleasant and wonderful place. Gabriella and John are super kind, welcoming and helpful. We really loved our stay in Amsterdam in their beautiful home with a breathtaking view of the gorgeous Jordaan neighborhood! Although it was a short stay, they took very good care of us. They even woke up early and prepared a delicious breakfast. They are the most generous hosts you will ever stay with!!! Thank you again Gabriella and John... let us know when you come to Las Vegas!!!

This was such a memorable stay. Easy and quick to get to from Schipol. The apartment was spacious, plenty of bench space for luggage and counter space in the bathroom which isn’t always a given. We loved using the bikes to get around town. Thoughtful amenities in the kitchen and bathroom. Mike and Isabelle are kind and flexible. Highly recommend.

Great location,  very convenient to go to central station.  Breakfast is  delicious and my friend and I really love it. We also enjoy the swings in the living room and the view we can see from the window nearby the swing is fantastic specially at night. Gabriella and John gave us practical information about Amsterdam and provide great recommendations. We really enjoy our stay and Gabriella and John really make us feel like home :)

Koen and his apartment were excellent. Very attentive clean in a great area seriously couldn't ask for anything better! I would love to stay here again and would fully recommend it. One of the best air bnb situations I have ever had! Cheers
An amazingly comfortable and well situated accommodation. Siz was the ideal host. Highly recommend!
Great stay at Jacco’s place, it was comfy for two people. Access to the backyard private patio was a big plus. Thank you Jacco!
Highly recommend!!! This nocarz is very unique and refreshing. Gabriella and John keep it spotless and it is decorated in a very tasteful style with beautiful touches everywhere.
Great updated apartment and great suggestions on activities to do around the city!

Apartment is situated in nice area. So close to all important pit stops like
-Heineken experience
-Van gogh museum
- Canals experience
20-25 min walk from central amsterdam where you can have full moon party
Rooms are nice/spacious and a good size lawn where you can have quality time with talking to your friends whole night
Living room is a winner for this place with 55" LED with home theatre , What else you want to enjoy in Amsterdam
We had a nice experience in Nanning's place.
Keep up the good work
Kate’s place and hospitality was great! Location is ideal, walking distance from everywhere. Kate is chill and let’s you do whatever, really recommend.
Superprofessionellt skött!

Gabriella's home is really special and homely, and you can feel that they are people who love life! John took me on a room tour very carefully when I checked in, telling me where everything was, how to open the door, etc. And will communicate in time to ask if I need help, I love this place! If I had to choose, they would be my first choice for a stay in Amsterdam!

Excelente lugar para aquellos que requieran un lugar tranquilo, la ubicación es inmejorable, el barrio muy seguro y muy bonito, los anfitriones siempre atentos a nuestras necesidades. 100% recomendable!

Formidable !! Que dire de plus!!🤩🤩
Propreté, confort, proche du centre et des lignes de transport dans un quartier calme!!!
Ville magnifique !
Nous recommandons vivement ce lieu et espérons pouvoir y retourner !!😉😉
Merci Floris
Muy buena ubicación cerca de los museos y estancias muy limpias.

Floris is absolutely amazing and so lovely. Communication is brilliant, a smooth check in and check out process is provided and the room is just perfect for what we needed. Lovely and clean and in the most wonderful location. The neighbourhood is so nice and everything is within walking distance. Floris even went the extra mile to tell us about the situation at the airport and checked to see if we managed to fly home ok. A wonderful person and nocarz! Would 100% stay here again :)
Perfect location with a very helpful host at a reasonable price. I strongly recommend this place!
Muy buen alojamiento! Gracias por todo Kate

We had a wonderful stay at Floris’ flat. The location was amazing, very walkable throughout the entire city and also quaint and quiet. Plenty of great restaurants within walking distance and easy access to public transportation. We would definitely recommend staying here and would stay again when we return to Amsterdam!
great host, great location
مضيف يحسن التعامل بشكل رائع
excellent petit séjour ! merci à vous ! je recommande fortement ! hôtes très gentils ! lieux super mignons et impeccables, c’était parfait !
great place
Stunning house! Amazing location, loved our time there

Super zentral, super gemütlich, super persönlich!
Wir haben 3 Nächte auf dem Hausboot verbringen dürfen. Es ist genial umgebaut. Auf kleinstem Raum haben Sie ein Reich geschaffen. Jede Ecke ist perfekt ausgenutzt und gut organisiert. Das ganze Boot ist extrem modern und stimmungsvoll eingerichtet.
Die Lage ist perfekt für einen Städtetrip und dank den Velos die mit gemietet werden können braucht man nicht umständlich für einzelne Tage Velos zu mieten sondern man kann diese während des ganzen Aufenthaltes bis in die späten Abendstunden nutzen.
Die ganze Organisation war einwandfrei, immer schnell geantwortet und total sauber. Einfach nur gelungen.
Ach ich wünschte mir auch so ein Boot :-) we love it

Hi everyone
So you know Stijn was not at home at the time when we arrived but he made sure a neighbour did all the introduction for us . Over all nice place to stay in close proximity to the city center and museums .
I will stay there again if the place will be available .

Thank you Stijn
Even if it was just one night, it was a great experience living on a boat. Edward and Anita made a wonderful room. I hope we will get the chance, to book again!

I loved Sas’ place and Steve was a lovely and friendly host. A privilege to stay in this old Dutch house, full of character, arty and decorated with flair. Watching the sunrise on the roof terrace was a peaceful and special experience. Great location too, right in the heart of the city and within minutes of the main station. I wished I had stayed longer and will be back in the spring.

Edward was friendly and helpful, but not intrusive.He offered tips on places to eat and the ones we used were great.
The boat was spotlessly clean and ideal for a short stay.We especially enjoyed a glass of wine watching the boats go by sitting on the deck.
The location was perfect, close to the centre, but quiet at night.
Thank you Edward and Hannah.x

The hosts were brilliant, giving us useful tips about the area and where to eat and what to do. The accommodation was in a perfect location, everything was accessible by walking distance. Such a lovely unique stay with great interior, really made our Amsterdam trip 10x better

If you have any curiosity about staying on an Amsterdam houseboat, test out Malaika’s place and you’ll never want to stay at a regular hotel again! As other guests shared, the location is so convenient - we didn’t have to deal with rolling our suitcases in and out of the city from Centraal Station, and walked everywhere. It was quiet and serene at night. During the day, other boats (quietly!) glide by and wave. It was nice to be situated in a real neighborhood, with other people coming and going from their homes.
The houseboat itself has everything we could’ve needed for a stay much longer than just our 2 nights. Malaika was super communicative and kind. Thank you for welcoming us into your home!
Ótima localização no Jordaan, dando para fazer quase tudo a pé e linda vista para o canal. Martjin é atencioso e prestativo. Foi uma ótima estadia.

Great experience to stay in house boat.
Nice location, easy to find and easy to check in/out.
Friendly and helpful host, Edward will give you the informations about nice restaurants,cafe or any places to go in Amsterdam.
Superb stay. The apartment looks exactly like the photos and has a great location. Wonderful view from the deck and very clean!

Edward is the epitome of super-host!
Prior to arrival Edward had been in contact providing instruction on how to get from airport to door; this made the transition extremely easy
Edward’s daily communication including daily activities in the surrounding area were extremely useful, allowing us to experience hidden gems of Amsterdam.
Due to our flight times changing, we required luggage storage - Edward went above and beyond, allowing us use of the room for the duration of the day, nothing was too much for him!!
Edward made himself known to us and is polite and friendly and I couldn’t recommend him enough!
Thank you so much for the best time!

Edward’s cabin boat is quirky and cosy. It was warm and welcoming to come back to and the location was excellent. It is a great base for 2 or 3 nights. Space is limited but it is easy to be out and about immediately surrounded by all that you need/want. Warm and sunny weather would give you more options for sitting on the boat and watching the world go by. Edward’s recommendation’s were excellent.
Man fühlt sich gleich nach dem Ankommen wie zuhause

For two worn-down travelers that were just stopping in Amsterdam to catch a flight the next AM, this place was amazing to stop at. Willem greeted us, when we got there an explained everything about the place. There were several places to get food at nearby, and fairy easy to get to via public transport. In the AM, Anaatje gave us a ride to the airport and offered such warm company. I would definitely recommend this place!
Super saubere Wohnung mit gepflegten Garten. Man wird herzlich empfangen und die Umgebung wird einem Anhand einer Stadtkarte erklärt. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt!

L'appartement est top avec une grande pièce à vivre et idéal pour un couple.
Tout y est : grand lit, salle de bain, toilettes, kitchenette, wifi et même un espace salon...
Il est situé dans un quartier très tranquille, à moins de 10min du tramway qui vous amène directement au centre-ville ( compter 25min ).
Willem et Anaatje sont très accueillants et disponibles pour vous renseigner.
Le rapport qualité/prix est top !
The apartment of Willem and Anaatje very clean. Bed is comfortable.  Anaatje cooked for me and my colleague very tasty cakes in the morning.  Thank you so much.
Very nice Appartment. Lovely cats. Not far from centrum.

Fantastic location & houseboat is exactly as discription . It was more spacious than I was expecting & 4 friends had plenty of room.
Hosts were easily contactable (for just a couple of minor questions) -and keen to please. Loved it !

We had great time visiting Amsterdam. Mariska's place seems to be popping out of a design magazine, it's a bright, well situated apartment in a noiseless street.
C'est un petit bijoux.
Nice boat. Pretty small, but cozy inside. Smart TV, Wifi, modern Bathroom. The entrance is really small though, so be advised its not toooo easy to get into the boat.

Excellent stay at Maja’s houseboat. The boat is well located, comfortable and clean. Check in/check out was smooth and Maja was responsive when we needed to leave our luggage earlier than planned. I recommend!
Genialt husbåd det helt rigtige sted i Amsterdam - godt indrettet.

Tivemos uma ótima estadia. O lugar é muito bem localizado, próximo à estação central. Os anfitriões são muito simpáticos  e ajudaram a tornar a estadia agradável, especialmente com as amenidades disponibilizadas. Também foi muito amável a espumante que ganhamos de presente em comemoração a nossa lua de mel.

Perfect location, lovely apartment, great amenities! Unfortunately our weekend started on a bad note due to unforeseen circumstances, our flight was delayed and we had limited phone access making finding our apartment difficult! Upon contacting the host and arriving at the accommodation we were greeted in a rude and unfriendly manner and lack of understanding our the circumstance that lead to our late arrival. No further contact from host until check out
Wonderful location on the canals. Great restaurants only a 5 minute walk away. Host was very friendly and kind. Will definitely stay here again.
Great location, close to Amsterdam Centrale, lots of cafes, shops and markets - the real Amsterdam!
Great hosts, lovely place in a great location. Thanks!
A great location centrally located.
Air bnb très confortable des propriétaires vraiment adorable. Très bien situé au bord du canal. Quartier très calme et reposant tout en étant proche de la gare et du centre ville. Très bon séjour!

Kiek and Eiso's house is perfectly located; close to the station but still in a quiet area. The hosts are very welcoming and are more than happy to give recommendations and guidance on do's and don'ts. The apartment is spacious (apart from the ceiling height) and has most things you need except a kitchen. An extra plus for the range of guide books.

No words can describe how great this nocarz is.  Very accommodating and helpful.  We truly felt welcome in their home.  Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Amsterdam. Close to  everything you could want to visit

Great location…… hosts go above and beyond to make you feel at home on your vacation. They were like friends not hosts. Huge apartment. If you can book it, a great place to stay when your visiting Amsterdam . Thanks for everything it was a 5 star experience and thanks for inviting us into your home
Donna and Richard

so wonderful to stay in this beautiful canal house. hosts are very nice and welcoming people. this is our third stay with Kiek and we couldn't recommend a better place to stay while visiting Amsterdam, everything is close within a few minutes of the apartment. wonderful hosts. 5 star hosts with a 5 star location. we will see you in a few weeks when we return to Amsterdam. thanks for everything
Donna and Richard

Best nocarz and best host we ever have had . Great location right in the heart of the city.  Everything close and easy to find. Thanks for everything  we really like staying with this host. Can’t be beat

Jan is an excellent host taking care of everything you might need during your stay. The studio is nice and cozy, clean and has very nice tea ;). It is also very well located near amstelstraat and vondelpark. I recommend this place

Ich war beruflich in Amsterdam und gleich um die Ecke. Das Studio ist klein, aber fein. Das Bett sehr gemütlich und alles vorhanden, was man für einen Kurzaufenthalt braucht. Die Einrichtung war gut durchdacht. Jan war sehr zuvorkommend. jederzeit wieder! Vielen Dank

Louise was a great and kind host. When we arrived Louise had some beer, bread, butter, milk, etc. already stocked for us which was a nice gesture.
The flat is larger than expected and had everything we needed. It is in a great location and we would definitely stay here again.
Everett’s place is in a fantastic location in the heart of Amsterdam. It’s close to public transit, endless restaurants, and has a beautiful view of the canal!

My family and I loved Louise and her quaint, Dutch souterrain apartment.
Louise was waiting for me upon my arrival with a warm welcome. (My partner and family arrived later). Fresh fruit, coffee, tea, butter, eggs and bread were a lovely surprise as I got cosy in my new Dutch digs.
The apartment is beautifully located a stone's throw from the Skinny Bridge (Magere Brug) and an easy walk to Rembrantsplein, the Hermitage and everything that Amsterdam has to offer.
My partner and I slept in the back bedroom on the double sized, slat bed. It was firm (which I like). The small kitchen allowed us to prepare coffee, tea, breakfast and a meal if we wished. The shower /toilet is small but adequate.
We didn't use the fold-out lounge bed as Louise was kind enough to let my cousin and niece sleep in the bed on an upper floor. Louise was often upstairs or close by, which was great if I had any questions.
We look forward to staying with Louise when we're next in Amsterdam!

We unfortnunatly didn't meet Eline & Balder personally but the apartment was very designed, beautiful, full equiped and well located in the one of the best areas in town. It was easy to check in and check out, and, though Eline was not in person she was very gentele and accessible to any doubt or problem.

Absolutely, we recommand this house in Amsterdam !

Louise is an amazing host. She is so friendly, helpful, and willing to assist in where to go and enjoy Amsterdam to the ‘max’.   We fell in love with the location, which was absolutely magical, and so close to so many attractions. Walking to them was very easy, but it is also close to tram. The accommodation is very spacious - far bigger than we had expected, and private from the rest of the house. There is a large separate bedroom, bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, dining area, and large lounge room with an additional bed settee if required. We didnt have a car so cannot advise on parking. We felt it was a real priviledge to stay at this wonderful location with such a wonderful host. Louise is the BEST.

Ines und Rembrand waren selbst in Urlaub, aber es war alles bestens organisiert für unsere Ankunft. Ein Freund empfing uns sehr herzlich und zeigte uns alles. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und es war alles super vorbereitet. Sogar der Kühlschrank war bestückt und ein Brot lag bereit. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
Vielen Dank an die Gastgeber für ihr Vertrauen!
Ciudad maravillosa, Louis es increíble ser humano, si buscas un sitio en el que te sientas como llegar a casa de tu familia no lo pienses más,,,no hay mejor opción en Ámsterdam.

This was our first stay with nocarz abroad and I'm afraid we are forever spoilt by it! The attic is very cozy, the view is wonderful, location perfect (close to the downtown but quiet at night). Kim and Daniel are amazing hosts and the breakfast they offered made our hearts melt! We will definitely come back if we can!

We want to thank Linda for the stay in her apartment and moreover for being very helpful and communicative about different nightlife opportunities for NYE. The flat is as described and matches the pictures. We were also very happy about the neighborhood that offers a wide range of cool shops as well as restaurants and cafes for all kind of tastes

Great location surrounded by food places, bars, cafes, 3/4 coffeeshops (better than central) within 9 minutes walking distance.. one on the road. Many food options.. great place to be. Smart TV with Netflix and phone connections. Balcony! huge plus point. Only 20/25 minutes to get to dam square (although there are much better places than central Amsterdam to enjoy....)

Très bel endroit, très propre, petit déjeuner compris!
Emplacement idéal et chambre très bien aménagée :)
A réserver les yeux fermés
Wonderful place to stay in Amsterdam.   5 star location, great host.  Thanks for everything

Das Apartment ist ein Traum! Wunderschön eingerichtet und die Dachterasse ist auch ein kleines Highlight! Leider waren es 40 grad als wir da waren und dementsprechend war es direkt unter dem Dachboden sehr heiß. Durch die Ventilatoren war es aber okay! Trotzdem weiterzuempfehlen, die Einrichtung ist einfach toll, das Frühstück super lecker und mit der Fähre und zu Fuß dauert es nur um die 15 Minuten zur Central Station! Kim und Daniel und Kunnie und Paul(ihre Eltern) sind wirklich super nett und hilfsbereit. Danke für alles!

really lovely apartment, much more spacious than the photos show. really great to have a nice clean and cool space to come back to throughout the day. super accessable from the tram, walking distance from lots of great stuff and in the heart of a lovely neighborhood. the host Louise is lovely and very accomodating. allowed us to check in early and to leave our luggage for a while after check out to allow us to have a last half day without carrying it around. 100% would stay again and would recommend to anyone.
Just perfect

Louise is an extraordinary person. After few minutes we felt at home and talking with an old friend! She is genuine, warm,  real! The place is great and centrally located… you can walk everywhere! I will always comeback to her when visiting Amsterdam… my daughters felt in love with Louise as well. I recommend this place to anyone visiting Amsterdam!

Couldn’t have been happier with my stay on Stevin and Jol’s houseboat. It was my first time in Amsterdam and I can’t imagine experiencing it any other way. The boat itself is SO cool, and inside was super comfortable. When traveling solo, it’s so nice to have such a lovely place to come back to at the end of the day. I arrived from the US several hours before check in time and Stevin was kind enough to let me drop my luggage off early. I’d absolutely stay here again!

Louise provided clear and concise instructions to her home and it was easy to get to from Central Station. Louise was there to greet us when we arrived and showed us around. She treated us like family and made us feel at home. Quick response times if we had additional questions. The accommodations were clean and comfortable for our family of four. We enjoyed access to the garden in the rear of the home and we were pleasantly surprised at how peaceful it was.  The location is perfect and a few minutes walking distance to public transport and to city center. I would definitely stay here again for any future trips to Amsterdam.
N'hésitez pas, c'est une bonne adresse
Wir können nur bestätigen, was andere Gäste vor uns hier bereits geschrieben haben. Tolle Lage, tolle Unterkunft, sehr schönes Ambiente. Wir würden sofort wieder die gleiche Unterkunft buchen.

Louise is a fantastic host, she was very responsive and made sure we had everything we needed and made us feel at home immediately! She also gave us restaurant recommendations which was very helpful. The apartment is in a fantastic location and was perfect for staying a few days in the city.
Wir waren nur 1 Nacht in Amsterdam und die Wohnung war perfekt...obwohl in der City gelegen absolut ruhig...Außerdem war die Vermieterin super nett...Grüsse an Louise ;)
Logement permettant de découvrir Amsterdam à pieds car très central. A savoir absence de cuisine réelle (sauf un micro-ondes) .Logement correct manque un peu de confort. Hôte très chaleureuse.

Louise went above and beyond! She was super friendly, accommodating, and the place was amazing. The only downside was that we only had one night to stay in this cute canal house. If we're ever back in Amsterdam, we'll definitely stay again at Louise's.

Die Unterkunft war wirklich wunderbar selbst für 2 Personen über 1,90 Meter hatten wir nur Probleme wenn wir an einander vorbei laufen wollten. Es war alles sehr einfach und schnell erreichbar. Daniel und Kim waren tolle Gastgeber. Im Großen und Ganzen war es ein toller Aufenthalt in Amsterdam.

Louise was an absolute gem! She made my friend Sarah and me feel right at home and safe. She was friendly and helpful and the area was perfect for getting around Amsterdam. I would HIGHLY recommend Louise and her apartment to anyone looking to visit this charming city! We hope to go back to Amsterdam and see Louise again! 🥰
Lovely clean and bright appartment, well located close to the centre in a quiet residential area... Couldn't ask for more!

Really great place in a really nice area. You can go downtown really fast and around the corner you will find some awsome restaurants, wineshops, chocolate, coffe, fruit, bakery and other stores. Paul allowed our child to play with any toys in the apartment. The Lego was awsome. Anmstel park is nearby and truley great for children! And the rooftop terrace is simply to die for! We certanly recommend this apartment! The whole family really wants to get back soon :-)

Haenk is an amazing host with a vibrant personality and awesome sense of humor! He was always happy to chat with us and provided valuable advice on what what we could do in Amsterdam. His place is located in a nice area that is extremely easy to rich by public transport during day and night. Free bikes was a super bonus, so that we could feel a real spirit of the city. P.S. Haenk even gave us a free lift to the airport!!! Public transport workers were on strike on the day of our departure and I was stressed that I wouldn’t be able to reach airport, cause we received texts from KLM suggesting not to travel to the airport and offered to change flight.  I will definitely stay again at Haenk’s place during my next visit to Amsterdam!
Tout était parfait ! Logement convivial et chaleureux, Henk est de très bon conseils et amusant !! Je recommande vivement 👍 À bientôt pour de nouvelles aventures 😎
Charming place in a great location.

The studio apartment in itself was great, very clean and spacious and the location was very ideal, we were able to walk pretty much everywhere!! There are very steep flights of stairs to get to the room so beware if you have mobility issues, but for 2 young adults with not much luggage it wasn’t an issue.
It was not very well equipped though- had a coffee machine and a kettle but not much else. Also be warned- the ‘TV’/monitor thing that is in the pictures doesn’t actually work, it’s not connected to anything so there is in fact no TV.
Our one complaint was the check in/check out process. As mentioned in other reviews, the apartment is managed by a big company and not Kate herself, and for check in/check out you have to walk to an empty cafe which is about 10/15 minute walk from the apartment itself. This was not the end of the world but it wasn’t ideal, especially if you have luggage that you don’t want to be carrying back and forth through town.
Other than that we enjoyed our stay, the location was very ideal and the apartment very clean.
Tolle Unterkunft, mal was anderes als ein normales Hotelzimmer. Sehr gemütlich, besonders die Koje zum schlafen. Sehr zentral mit im angesagten Viertel.

Barbara’s nocarz surpassed my expectations in every possible way. The boat was absolutely beautiful and it gave me a truly unique experience in an amazing city.
Barbara is more than helpful and is one of the best nocarz hosts that I’ve had so far. She’s more than happy to give tips on museums, restaurants and other local attractions. The location could not be more ideal and is a close walk to all parts of the city. There was an amazing market going on just a 2 minute walk away from the nocarz on a Saturday morning which was a very nice surprise.
If you’re looking for a unique stay in a great location, I strongly recommend Barbara’s nocarz.
not as expected. low service and bad communication

Lejligheden har en rigtig god beliggenhed, med gå afstand til alt det, man gerne vil opleve i det centrale Amsterdam.
Der er rent og pænt. Super god kommunikation med Eva og Kobe ved indtjekning, og massere af gode anbefalinger til oplevelser fra deres side af.

The apartment is simply great! Clean, big enough for 1 or 2 person at least, has a big kitchen and living room, bedroom (open, it doesn’t have doors), and a nice terrace! The 22 or 48 stops in front of the house so that’s perfect to get central station, and has big supermarket and pubs nearby. Bas has been perfect, I would recommend
Amazing place at a nice location with good connections to the centraal station. We had a great stay

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. L'emplacement était au calme, à 20 minutes à pieds du centre ville et à 2 minutes de l'arrêt de bus.
La petite cabine du capitaine était fonctionnelle.
Nous avons aimé le pont avant comme terrasse pour prendre l'apéro.
Merci pour ce séjour original

Barbara was an excellent host.
The boat was fantastic and very well described.
Would highly recommend.
The boat was well located l, only 2 stops on the bus from Amsterdam Central.
Overall the boat was a great stay and a great way to top off a great weekend.

This is one of the most uniquely fabulous places I've stayed!  Location is very convenient... easy walk to Centraal station, and then you can be anywhere!  Barbara is delightful!  Staying here is a must-do experience!!!

I spent two nights at Mark's place with my family. It took us only 30 minutes to get there from the airport. Mark left the keys for us at a café closeby, which all worked out perfectly fine. The appartment is nice and clean, just as in the pictures. Communication before and during our stay was very easy and Mark helped us with good local tipps and recommendations once in a while. The appartment is situated in a rather quiet residential area, but "the pijp" is in walking distance, and the tram to the city center runs at regular intervals.  We enjoyed our stay and I would come back any time!
Thank you Joop for a wonderful stay, perfect location not far from tourist attractions, beautiful accommodation and very kind and welcoming host. Will definitely be back again!
Sehr herzlicher empfang. Man fühlt sich willkommen und auch sehr wohl bei ihm zuhause. Definitiv empfehlenswert! Tolle Lage von der man mit dem Schiff in die Stadt kommt.

We stayed 5 nights in Sheriens apartment and really liked it. It was easy to reach the city by tram and a few supermarkets near the apartment. I especially enjoyed the kitchen because it is very good equipped but the rest of the apartment was also very nice designed. We really enjoyed our stay!
It's the best and warmest house I have ever stayed. You can find everything in Rini's house, it makes me feel amazing to live here.

Staying at Rini's bright and airy studio in Amsterdam was a wonderful experience.  We were there during the Remembrance Day observance on  May 4 2017 for the anniversary of Holland's liberation from the Nazis in WWII.  The town held a grand procession with a wreath laying ceremony at Dam Square to honor the victims of that war.  But on to the studio - the location was perfect.  Literally around the corner from a major Metro stop (Waterlooplein) and on the street outside is a tram stop for transport to all the major sites.  For convenience, we purchased a 72 hour transport pass at the airport before we took the train to Waterlooplein.  The studio was ready for us and Rini had provided everything we needed in the way of milk, eggs, cheese and fresh fruit.  We found two excellent restaurants within walking distance - Il Canto at #2 Amstel and Harmsen's on Utrechtstrasse.  A great bakery "Bake My Day" is a 5 minute walk across the bridge. Rini was also helpful in arranging a taxi to the airport for our departure.  We are an elderly couple so the fact that the apartment is on the street level was very convenient for us.  We have stayed at many nocarz apartments but this was by far the best.

Brilliant little quirky place to stay just a stone's throw from many central places. Ideal for Rembrandt sq and lots of lovely bars and eateries! Across the road from metro links and also canal tours! Fab place and brilliant host. Will be back again!
un abitazione carina ma per il prezzo pagato un po eccessivo soprattutto per il fatto che a volte veniva anche il cugino del proprietario che abita di fronte a farsi la doccia lì.

We arrived to Peters apartment at 1pm but the room was not ready till 3pm. However, Peter's brother was kind to store our luggage at his cafe below the apartment and enjoyed there delicious apple pie. The apartment was great for us to stay for 4 nights, great location and would visit again.

Marius' place was exactly like the photos! Check in was easy as the space was in his art gallery. He even gave us a fridge full of food + water + juice, which was super sweet!
Right across from the Amstel river + close to the Waterlooplein station.
Super close to many shops + easy to get to/from the airport, after we checked out, we were even allowed to leave our luggages before we headed to the airport!
I would definitely recommend to friends + family looking for a place to stay in Amsterdam :)
Vriendelijke ontvangst. Top locatie! Mooi ruim appartement met alle voorzieningen die je nodig hebt. Zeer gezellige sfeer. Heerlijk bed.

Lovely, clean apartment for a few days exploring the city. Peters father met us with the keys outside their cafe downstairs. Everything explained about apartment including Wi-Fi. Stairs to the apartment were steep which is good to keep in mind with luggage. Trams are about a 10 minute walk so you are best to walk into the centre but travel pass to explore the city is a must for ease. Bells on church opposite ring every half an hour but we found them fine and not disturbing. Recommend the hot chocolate from the cafe before returning to apartment. Will be back soon

Pieter and Hanny's place is located in a great area of Jordaan! This is the picturesque spot of the beautiful canals and local shops! This place is in walking distance to all the major museums and nightlifes! Everything here is at most 20min walk! This is walkable city! Within the city quarters - it was faster to walk to places then use the metro. the place is 3 floors - top floor is the bigger bedroom and the other bedroom (Murphy bed) is the on main floor.
I would recommend this place - its on a quiet street - you walk out and the canal is right there! Coffee shops are 3min walks! Hanny and Pieter were great hosts and were very accommodating to us for an early check-in!

Casa molto carina con una posizione in un quartiere ottimo, tranquillo ma vivo, con molti ristoranti e bar.
La camera in cui siamo stati si affaccia su una piazza molto carina, lungo uno dei canali della città. L'alloggio ai trova sopra un bar di gestione degli stessi proprietari di casa.
Da sapere: le scale di entrata sono estremamente ripide, potrebbero potenzialmente essere un problema per persone con problemi di mobilitá.
Complessivamente l'alloggio é consigliatissimo.

Bart and Bernadette’s studio was a lovely place to stay. A very handy base to have for a few days of exploring Amsterdam. The studio was spotless and comfortable. It felt very private and also homely. Bart was an excellent host and was very flexible with our check in and check out. He messaged us to make sure we were happy and comfortable. We would definitely recommend this studio to anyone and will 100% book again if we were to visit Amsterdam again in the future. It had excellent transport links and we could get into Amsterdam central in 20 minutes door to door.

We absolutely loved our stay here. The apartment is beautiful and has everything you need. Merijn gave us some amazing food recommendations and was friendly and easy to communicate with. The outdoor patio was so peaceful, bed was comfortable and was spacious. Highly recommend.

Riza was such a friendly and accommodating host. He helped us with some problems we had, gave us some great local tips, and showed us some lovely places in the city.
The flat was light, spacious and clean and there is a great view from the balcony. It was a really fantastic place to say and Riza was such a friendly and caring host. Definitely recommended!

Riza was helpful, friendly and very welcoming.  The space is simple, with everything you need and was perfectly clean.  His flat is like 3 minutes walk to public transport to anywhere so super convenient!  I would definitely go back!
Riza was a good host, the flat was very clean and nothing was missing. Breakfast was great. I will come back

Soggiorno nel complesso positivo. Da segnalare la gentilezza e la disponibilità di James, appena arrivati ci ha fatto trovare il frigor colmo di cibo e bevande (affettati, formaggi, frutta, verdura; ma anche acqua, birre e succhi di frutta). L'appartamento, molto pulito e molto ben fornito, è ideale per 4/5 persone. L'unica nota negativa che mi tocca segnalare è la distanza dal centro della città, 10' a piedi dalla fermata del tram e altri 20/25' per arrivare alla stazione di Amsterdam Centraal. Il costo complessivo è abbastanza alto sebbene non si discosti troppo dagli altri appartamenti.

Roza was very welcoming and helpful, helping me finding my way around the city and recommending various things to do. The place is spakling clean with a comfortable bed, as well as close to public transit.
I can only agree with other reviewers- Riza is very clear, friendly and easy to communicate with, and his place met all my needs for a good comfortable first night in Amsterdam.

Staying at Riza’s was great for my family. Riza could accommodate to a last minute request for additional person straigtaway. He was also very helpful in providing us with tips on where to go and how to get around! A great place for Muslim families as there are lots of halal food places in the neighbourhood. Thank you Riza for being welcoming!
Great place, ideally located in town, warm reception. Thank you

I had the great fortune to choose Harry and Carola's stylish and impeccably clean apartment where I stayed for nine days. They are superb hosts, welcoming, friendly and very helpful, even printing out some tickets that were supposed to be  e-tickets but then needed to be printed. The apartment is quiet, stylish, and very close to public transportation and good food. The apartment has a little kitchen which was perfect for cooking simple meals and had just the right amenities. I highly recommend staying here and will do so again when I visit Amsterdam.
Great location, very clean and comfortable place. Easy check in and great value for money. Would definitely stay again

This gorgeous apartment is a great centrally located home base for exploring Amsterdam's amazing museums, the cute shops and restaurants in De Pijp and Jordaan. But be warned as other reviewers have noted: the hike up the steep and winding staircase is not for the faint of heart, especially with a giant roller bag.
A wonderful place. Lots of room and very comfortable. Conveniently located with access to public transport.

We had an excellent stay because our accommodations were clean, comfortable and very well located to enjoy all the places we wanted to visit in Amsterdam. Our hosts communicated with us very well, making our arrival very easy. We would definitely return on a future visit.

We spent a few days in Amsterdam and Lasca’s place was the perfect location to base ourselves. Only one bus ride away from the airport, and lots of trams and buses that pass our accommodation. This is the place to be if you want to really get a feel of living in the Amsterdam apartments, stay in the Jordaan neighborhood, close to the centre but away from loud tourists.
The place itself is great, quite spacious for two and huge bathroom. Clean and love the natural lighting that comes through during the day.
The hosts were also really kind and helpful, were flexible with my check in time and really responsive with messaging. They also left us flowers on our second day which was a really nice touch!
Only thing to note are the stairs, it is quite steep and if you are not able to carry your luggage I would not recommend. We had no issues however.
Thank you
Great area to stay at.

L'alloggio è situato sopra il Coffeeshop 1eHulp e in zona abbastanza centrale! Mezzi comodissimi esattamente sotto casa, arrivando dall'aeroporto col 397 è situata a 300 metri dal capolinea della linea!
Ruben è stato gentilissimo ad accoglierci e ha dato la massima disponibilità! Consigliato per chi vuole farsi una bella vacanza ad Amsterdam!
This place was lovely! In a great area and right next to stations and shopping and great restaurants :) the place it’s self is very cute and great for a weekend getaway!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Amsterdam. L'appartement est propre, lumineux et très agréable, dans un quartier calme et tout près du quartier Joordan, sûrement le plus charmant de la ville!
Daan a été très flexible sur les horaires, super communication et nous a donné de belles adresses à découvrir.
Quelques lampes dans le salon et un vrai drap housse (il s'agissait d'une alaise) ne seraient pas de trop, mais rien à redire.
Merci Daan! :)

Appartement très beau et quartier sympa, mais quelques équipements seraient à changer, notamment les lits. Ce n’est pas à hôte particulier mais une entreprise.
Un peu cher

Dans le cadre de mon travail, j'ai passé 3 semaines dans l'appartement de Sezi. Tout était très bien, le salon est lumineux et la chambre au calme. Le quartier est familial et se situe à moins de 10 minutes en vélo (ou bus) du centre-ville.

Chaleureux accueil de la part de Daan . La maison est très agréable : propreté , décoration soignée , nombreux équipements ,voisinage et quartier calme . En fait , Daan s’éclipse le temps de la location et laisse à disposition sa maison !
Les literies sont confortables . Le jardin est une valeur ajoutée à cette location .
Tout est à disposition dans ce nouveau quartier de Ijburg : arrêt tram 26 à 2mn de la maison et à 20 mn de Centraal Station et donc du centre d’Amsterdam . Attention toutefois , les transports en commun sont très chers ( 3,20€ / heure ou 8€ la journée !)
Il y a deux grandes surfaces et des bars restaurants à proximité .
Pour tous ces points , nous recommandons vivement le logement de Daan !!
Thanks we enjoyed our stay!

Had a wonderful stay at this apartment! It’s in a great location so we were able to walk to most places we wanted to go to. The host was responsive and helpful. They even helped us with carrying our luggage up the steep stairs. Highly recommend this place for your visit to Amsterdam
Location location location! The place was great, will definitely consider staying again next time we are in Amsterdam
Perfect Place to stay, for a Short Holiday Trip  to amsterdam.

I recently stayed at this vacation rental and had an absolutely wonderful experience. The cleanliness of the property was impeccable, which immediately put me at ease. The space was peaceful and had plenty of natural light. The host was incredibly responsive, promptly addressing any questions or concerns I had both before and during my stay.
The location of the rental couldn't have been better. It was conveniently situated near all the attractions I wanted to visit, yet tucked away enough to provide a peaceful retreat. Whether I was exploring nearby landmarks or simply relaxing at the rental, I felt right at home.
Two things I want to mention are that the bed is a tad small for two people and a full length mirror would have been nice. Those are my only two very small points of feedback.
Overall, I highly recommend this vacation rental to anyone looking for a clean, comfortable, and conveniently located getaway.
The Mansion was a great place to stay!  All the amenities needed for a great stay in Amsterdam.  Close to museums, canals, boat rides, etc.
Thank you very much. We had a great stay in your apartment.

Saskia’s apartment near Rembrandtplein is an absolute gem. The location bears proximity to tram lines, making the entire city incredibly accessible. If you want bars and nightlife within walking distance, Leidsplein and Central are less than 10 minutes away. In addition, Saskias apartment is incredibly well thought-out, boasting every amenity you could ask for. Saskia lives right next door and is very responsive in the event that you need anything. 10/10 would recommend!

Es war einfach nur toll! Saskia ist eine großartige Gastgeberin, der Ihre Gäste sehr am Herzen liegen. Trotz verspäteter Anreise sehr flexibel, Kühlschrank war mit Wurst, Käse, Eiern und auch Wein gefüllt..danke nochmals dafür. Das Apartment ist wunderschön und liegt sehr zentral direkt beim Blumenmarkt. Im Radius von 1,5 Kilometer sind Geschäfte, Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten einfach erreichbar. Uns hat es sehr gefallen und wir würden dieses Apartment jederzeit wieder buchen.
We had a lovely time staying at Karina's place. She welcomed us with drinks and allowed us the use of their boat to explore the canals. The place was immaculately clean and cozy.  Thank you!
It is a beautiful house, very comfortable and warm, and with a very nice view. The attention given by Karina is excellent, always available, highly recommended.
Durk is a great host and we enjoyed his beautiful appartement. His recommendations were very helpful!
Tanneke is a great host with a nice place situated in the city center area.

Jan’s place filled with little touches of joy! It is close to everything that we wanted to reach to and it was spacious and clean. The host was also very quick to response to any questions I had. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who would like to visit Amsterdam but don’t want to spend too much on transportation because it’s walkable distance to many spots in town.

Very nice centrally located apartment, enough space for 5 people. Reasonably clean and equipped kitchen. Ordering food works well and supermarket is nearby. Gave comment to the managers to provide dishwasher tablets because only one was provided which is not enough. Would recommend and come back.
The steep stairs were a challenge (even for a group of 5 guys in their 30s) but otherwise the unit came as advertised. We had a comfortable stay and enjoyed the location!
Our stay in Wouter's appartment was very pleasent. great location and value for money/ would highly reccomend staying at wouter's place :)
Rien à dire, hôte très accueillant. Logement impeccable en fond de cour mais avec accès privatif.

Je conseille vraiment cet endroit. Un lieu magnifique au bord du canal, à proximité du centre ville, de plus des vélos à disposition parfait pour se balader. Karina est très réactive aux messages, elle est la si nous avons besoin de conseil niveau visite. De plus, la chambre est très propre. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir!  Merci encore.
My husband and I had a truly lovely stay with Karina! It was a great spot, easy to navigate and super close to Amsterdam Centraal.
Fantastic loft space..huge! The photos don’t do it justice. Would definitely recommend

Lidia and Jean-Paul’s apartment is really nice, cozy and confortable ! They gave us a lot of good recommendations for food. It is perfectly located next to Vondelpark and tram stops. For those coming for the marathon it is a great place to stay, only 15 minutes away from the start/finish line !
Sehr schön, super zu erreichen , schöne Lage,tolle Gastgeberin.

Lovely place. Atmosphere and settings are great! We didn’t read the instruction as clear as we come from Australia. But everything is in there, including how to turn on the lovely
Fireplace/stove.
Extremely happy!
Karina is very flexible and accomodating with our baggage as we!!

Our host for this stay was Mea. She was very kind and courteous. She really pushed herself during the cleaning to get us home early. The house was very clean. She answered our question immediately. They also put ice cream in the fridge as a gift for us.  Considering the rental conditions in Amsterdam, it was reasonable in price performance comparison. The house has some limitations. These were also mentioned in the article, but it was challenging for us to encounter in the reality.  The stairs were extremely steep. We also had a hard time carrying our suitcases. It was stated that the toilet was in a separate section but there was no separate sink. We had to go to the bathroom to wash our hands. The bathroom did not have a real door providing complete privacy. Inside the house, there were no barriers between the bed areas to ensure complete privacy. There were small separators. Since we had taken the upper floor of a house, there was no locked door between us and the lower floor.

Karina’s houseboat was fantastic. Great location, walking distance to the free 5 minute ferry to Central Station and the heart of Amsterdam. Great local restaurant/pub a few doors down. Beautiful view and visits from lots of birds. Karina was also super helpful prior to our arrival in giving us tips on how to get to her location from the airport using public transportation. What’s not love?!
Great place in in the heart of Amsterdam. Loved the rooftop patio! Easy walking distance to great shopping and restaurants. Would highly recommend!
Lovely little find in north part of Amsterdam, very cozy atmosphere and close to city centre.

Super great location. Next to ferry terminal, minutes walking from city center. Cozy little boat house. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for a semiprivate space with kitchen and outdoor area minutes from the center.

Mauro’s place is perfect for exploring Amsterdam. It is centrally locates between city center and the Jordaan. The space itself had all the amenities we needed. The bathroom is a tad small but we made it work for the perfect location. I highly recommend staying at Mauro’s place.

Mauro’s place is the perfect place to stay for exploring central Amsterdam. You’re near everything and can walk everywhere in town. So many great restaurants, shops and tourist spots are all within walking distance.
The place has plenty of space, a shower that never ran out of hot water (a rarity I’ve found in Europe) and mercifully a washer and dryer that was perfect for finally doing laundry mid-trip.
I will definitely stay here when I return!

Yvo is really a kind person and offer me a lot of restaurant information.
The room is really comfortable and let me don't want to wake up.
Really nice location!

Mauro’s place was amazing! He let us check in early and it was perfect since we were coming back from a festival. He was very responsive and gave us clear instructions about the place.
