The place was just like the pictures and it made our stay in Amsterdam so much better. It was very cozy and clean and a perfect to place to stay and relax after a day of walking. It’s super close the the train station and there are a lot of good restaurants to eat and drink near it. Even thought it’s close to a popular area the place was nice and quiet at night. We loved Mauro’s place and we would definitely stay again.

Great location, perfect hosts who offered flexible check-in and check-out. A beautiful and well equipped apartment, and friendly tips for local transport and restaurants. Good communication prior to booking and during the stay, would definitely recommend.

Tim had his agent greet me, who was very sweet and provided the best local restaurant recommendations. His place was beautiful too, and in such a great location that was close to a bunch of restaurants, as well as walking distance to the tram. I really appreciated the manual Tim left and the delicious stroop waffles. Only downside was bringing our luggages up many flights of stairs, as the building has no elevator. Highly recommend staying here :)

Great location, and cute apartment. Kenneth even left some beverages in the fridge for us.
Two things to note: the bed is a futon rather than a traditional mattress bed and there is not a mirror in the bathroom. There is a full length mirror in the apartment that can we moved around for makeup/hair use.
Everything was great. The location, the house and the quality were extremely accurate. Thank you for your support and hosting. It will always be my first choice.
Happy for my stay.

Yvo place is in a great location. We were able to explore Amsterdam on foot and it was a great experience. The place is clean and quiet. Yvo provided great communication throughout the whole stay. He even picked our luggage up the stairs when it was delayed.
I greatly recommend Yvo’s place!
Kenneth personally couldn’t have been more helpful, and the apartment had everything I could need and more.
We had a wonderful stay here. The location is excellent and Kenneth is a wonderful host - extremely helpful, responsive and accomodating
Amazing place sparkling clean close to the tram station. Close to the center. Henkk was super helpfull .

Für uns war es das erste Mal, dass wir gleichzeitig mit unserem Gastgeber unter einem Dach gewohnt haben. Ich bin froh, dass wir uns bei dieser Reise einfach mal darauf eingelassen haben, etwas Neues auszuprobieren. Man merkte immer wieder, dass Henkk und sein Sohn an die Anwesenheit von Gästen gewohnt waren und selbst als abends mal der Strom ausfiel und beide an dem Stromzähler in unserem Zimmer arbeiten mussten blieb die Privatsphäre für alle gewahrt. Wir hatten das Gefühl, bei einem alten Freund zu übernachten, und es war völlig unkompliziert für uns, die Wohnung für ein paar Tage mit ihm und seinem Sohn zu teilen.
Die ruhige Lage und hervorragende Anbindung an die U-Bahn und kurze Wege in das Viertel De Pijp mit seinen vielen Restaurants sind ein weiterer Grund, hier wieder herzukommen.
Wir hatten jedenfalls eine wunderbare Zeit und zwei Speicherkarten voller Bilder aus Amsterdam und Umgebung im Gepäck.
We had a great time at Henkk place. Henkk is a wonderful host and a great person!

The location is wonderful, and the house is beautiful, but if you want to be able to feel at home in this city, this is NOT the home for you. We were told when we could talk, and how loud and for how long. The host lives above the space which has paper thin walls and the floors don't block any noise too. So, if you want the freedom to talk (at a conversational volume) after, say, 10:30/11pm... something you'll probably want to do after a long day of exploring a beautiful city so you can compare notes with each other and just share your excitement from the day, this is NOT the home for you to stay in. Our host cost us hundreds of dollars by kicking us out twice and changing her mind both times because she isn't able to handle even the smallest amount of noise after a certain hour. We did not yell, play loud music, or do any stomping around, but even so, it was too much and she contacted me at midnight demanding we be out by the morning. If you are traveling alone and plan to be super quiet and not talk on the phone or anything after 10pm, this may work out for you. But couples beware.

Thank you again for everything!
We appreciated it so much!

A beautiful studio room, with great location literally everything you need is just around the corner. Yvo made it easy with his spot on recommendations for activities and restaurants, definitely recommended:)
Great Stay - thanks a lot Ivo !
Tres belle maison tres agréable! Chambre très confortable et accueil très chaleureux! Au bord de l'eau, tres reposant en rentrant des supers promena des à Amsterdam!
Yvo’s place is well located, clean and near to everything. I really enjoy staying on his apartment. :) #recommended

Amazing!! One of my favorite nocarz's thus far. The space was perfectly clean and the bed was made each day. Snacks and drinks were available and replaced each day as well. The location was great and the 2 bikes available made my Amsterdam experience great. Parag was so nice and made check in easy. I would love to be back one time and recommend this space to everyone!

Der Aufenthalt bei Sonia war super. Die Lage war gut, in ca 30 min war Amsterdam mit dem Bus zu erreichen. Sonia war sehr zuvorkommend und die Kommunikation hat 1a funktioniert. Wir kommen gerne wieder.
Amazing experience on the old Janna historical boat. Nothing else to add than WONDERFUL.
Nur zu empfehlen!! Etwas außerhalb des Troubels aber die Verbindung in die Stadt geht Ruck Zuck! Wir würden jederzeit wieder zu Titus.

It was a very great stay at Jans flat. He is a great host! We planed 2 days more and it was ok for him! He told us what we can do on our trip in amsterdam. There were no difficulties! The kitchen was open for us.
Thank you! We'll come again!

We had a great stay at Jans apartment, we came as a couple and enjoyed it a lot, we had access to the whole flat and balcony, we were allowed to take food from his fridge for breakfast and make coffee and tea. He left before we got up and went to bed and turned off the TV immediately when we came home. He was very respectful of our privacy and helped us find our way through Amsterdam.
This place is the unique experience you’ve been looking for if you’re staying in Amsterdam for a couple days this place is perfect. Definitely recommend.

Pas de mauvaises surprises bien au contraire. Le logement est tel la description. Si vous rechercher un endroit tranquille pour passer un week end en amoureux c’est parfait. Quartier calme et reposant.
On peut s’y garer très facilement à prix raisonnable (pour Amsterdam). A quelques kms des grandes places.
Possible de tout faire a pied avec des bonnes chaussures :) .
Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour.
Great experience, had an overnight layover and it worked out perfectly. Very convenient for the transit to and from the airport and great neighborhood

The area was perfect to walk, ride the bike or use public transportation anywhere in Amsterdam. But then this city is made to be accessible for everyone without a car. Everything was clean and as presented on the pictures. We had to ask them a couple of times, if we could use the heater, since they live upstairs and are the only ones who can control the heaters. In a way it is pointless to turn it on on your own, because of the extra step of texting them. However they answer in a timely manner and we slept warm every night after we arrive from a day mostly exposed to the cold. The internet is slow, so I would not recommend this place for someone that depends on it or needs it during the stay. If you just need a place to crash at night, this is the place.
Just outside of the main centre situated in a quieter residential location. Lovely space with everything you would need for a short stay! Would recommend the Italian next door!
Todo muy bien excelente la atención y la habitación
Great spot! Super cute. Gina was so nice and friendly and very chill. Check in was a breeze. Walkable to a lot of cute restaurants and easy access to public transit

Si vous voulez passer un weekend chill, c'est l'appartement parfait. Situé à proximité de tout ce donc vos aurez besoin (courses, location de vélo, resto, bar et j'en passe). Également très bien desservi par les transports en commun. Nous n'avons eu aucune difficulté à se rendre dans le centre (environ 15/20min) tout comme pour revenir à l'appartement très tard le soir (2h du mat). A vélo, le centre est également à une petite demi heure. En ce qui concerne l'appartement en lui-même, la salle de bain, le salon et la chambre sont très bien (le lit est juste génial!), la cuisine est très bien équipée avec tout ce dont on a besoin pour un petit weekend, et la terrasse, my god, elle est immense! De quoi bien profité quand il fait beau sinon pour le reste, Petra nous a mis à disposition quelques infos utiles sur la ville, l'entourage etc et elle a été très communicative quand nous en avons eu besoin. Merci beaucoup Petra, nous reviendrons très certainement dans votre appartement.
Good place to stay, not too long of a walk from the city's best streets but far enough you can still get a peaceful rest at night.
Everything was good, would stay there again.
入住沟通便捷高效，房东很热情。唯一要注意的是房间靠道路，对噪音敏感的三思。
这是我住过最棒的BNB！离中央车站只需要5分钟车程，离巴士站只需要三分钟。房东非常热情好客，我到达时已经深夜，他来到车站接我。见多识广热情好客，这边还有一只可爱的猫咪Jo，非常可爱迷人，大家都会喜欢这里！
Wonderful and amazing place
Un joli week-end en plein centre d’Amsterdam , la péniche d’Elwin vous offre tout ce dont vous avez besoin, le quartier est calme et bien situé pour rayonner à pieds dans le centre d’Amsterdam .

It was a pleasure staying at Janeth's appartment. She was very welcome and ready to answer any question or request we had. The house was very clean, the kitchen fully equipped, the bed really comfortable and to conclude she did a really good job to make us feel like home...awww i nearly forgot the beautiful garden where we could take fresh air and the first sun. Thank you Janeth.

Castrum Peregrini was an amazing place to be spending our Amsterdam holidays at. The apartment is located in the centre of town with easy access to the sights, public transport and shops. The canal view is second to none. The hosts were very accommodating, and helpful. There were four of us staying at this place, all adults, and we all enjoyed it. I highly recommend this listing to anyone who wants to stay in the centre of Amsterdam.
Very noisy, you can hear everything through the walls. Also a dog never stopped barking and they forgot to give  us a bathroom rug. Very good location but a bit overpriced

We've been to Amsterdam many times, and this was the best rental experience yet. We loved the location and view of the canal. We also enjoyed being able to cook some meals for ourselves in the well-stocked kitchen. Thanks so much for a fantastic stay!

The BnB was in a great location! You're close to the metro, canals and multiple busy areas. Very easy to walk wherever you need to go, or head to Amsterdam Centraal for a trip. The area is loud, but we never had an issue. You can generally hear other guests come and go - for the most part people were respectful (that's on the guests and not the host anyways!).

I loved staying at Francesco's place. He made me feel welcomed and informed me of all the transportation and it was clear directions, enjoyed privacy, while at the same time knowing He was around if I needed something. Will recommend staying there + Tram is at the doorstep very convenient

Needed a night of quiet rest, so decided on this one. It was perfect - great host, clean space, and quiet neighborhood easily accessible by tram. Definitely recommend this place. Thanks for everything!

Francesco war ein sehr freundlicher Gastgeber. Unser Zimmer war sehr groß und alle Räumlichkeiten waren sauber und ordentlich. Küche Wohnzimmer und Balkon durften wir mitbenutzen. Seine Wohnung ist super gelegen, eher ruhig außerhalb der Stadt. Innerhalb 15 Minuten kommt man mit der Straßenbahn vom Zentrum direkt vor seine Haustür.
The apartment it's cozy and well located, very good bed and shower. close to the main attractions and museums in Amsterdam. The host was very punctual, nice and helpful.

Highly recommend this apartment! Lovely, clean and cozy apartment and Fleur was very accommodating and helpful. I would definitely stay again in Fleurs apartment. The location suited us perfectly as not only were the apartment and surroundings beautiful but we also had the city on our doorstep.
Het huis van Fleur is zeer centraal gelegen, vlakbij rijksmuseum. Voor wie kan tegen wat rumoer van de straat een super locatie. Zeer netjes en verzorgd.

Nie Wieder! Komischer Gastgeber.
Es ist so schlimm, dass ich nach 20 Minuten die Wohnung verlassen und mir ein Hotel für 150 Euro/Nacht gebucht habe.
Hygiene ist ein Fremdwort in der Wohnung, Bettwäsche dreckig.

The place was good enough, Francesco was very responsive and also was able to check in earlier. We had a few chats and he gave me some good tips about the city. Bus is also a 3-4 minute walk. Thanks for a wonderful stay!

Wir waren 4 Gäste in drei Zimmern. Alles war tiptop sauber und aufgeräumt. Ein tolles Bad mit Dusche und Badewanne war uns allen sehr angenehm.
Das Handling war super freundlich, ja sogar freundschaftlich und aufmerksam. Die Gegend isr super ruhig und trotzdem gibt es in der Nähe tolle Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und einen tollen Bäcker mit den besten Croissants, die ich seit langem gegessen habe. Gerne wieder!!

We had a great time staying at Fleur's apartment!  It was a little loud the first night, but the earplugs provided worked great.  And we really appreciated the recommendations and tips left by Fleur and previous guests.
Hans has a lovely, cozy home away from all the noise of the city center. We really appreciated having a washer and dryer and being within walking distance of all the sites.

Great spot in a great location, highly recommended! It is in a traditional Amsterdam home so the stairs are a bit tight if mobility is a challenge, otherwise it’s an amazing location with a great host! A+
We had a great stay here. Amazing communication throughout and some really nice touches and ideas for the visit!

Alojamiento en casa típica de Amsterdam. muy bien ubicado. Fleur ha sido una buena anfitriona. La vivienda por la noche algo ruidoso, sobre todo cuando la gente ata la bicicleta a la valla de la casa. Fue en Navidad, supongo q en otras épocas será mas tranquilo. Recomendable.

Fleur’s place was perfect! She greeted us at her home and was very accommodating. She gave great tips on places to eat in Amsterdam. The space was little, but was perfect for two people. The bed was so comfortable which was nice after a long day of walking. There is some noise from a bar across the street, but it isn’t that noticeable and Fleur warns you and also provides earplugs. The location was perfect and central and it was easy to get to the tram or walk around. Would definitely stay here again!

Glendon was a very accommodating, open and considerate host. He gave me useful tips on places to visit in Amsterdam and how to get there. No curfew, but keep it quiet after 10 PM. The beds were very comfortable, and the apartment is right next to the tram that takes you directly to the city center and central station. Very convenient location. Just knock on his door if you need anything.

I had a delightful time at Glen's place. It is both quaint (cool in the hot weather, too!) and quite convenient. Regret that I was short on time and did not take advantage of the little workspace in the back of the garden. But the kitchen and outdoor table work really well, and the room's outdoor access was also welcome. Recommend!
Great place, super location, nice Amsterdam experience. Merel is a very nice host!
Glendon is very helpful and informative. I enjoyed my stay completely. Highly recommended.

The location was great, a short tram ride into the city and under an hour from the airport. lots of food places close by.
The bathroom is really small and separate from the shower room, both of which didn't feel private enough as they're in the hallway. No electric kettle so have to use the stove or coffee maker in the kitchen.
But overall a pleasant stay, host was really friendly, plenty of breakfast items and fruit available and location was ideal.

Glendon is a wonderful and welcoming host and he is extremely easy to get on with.  He is very helpful and informative about what to do in Amsterdam. His apartment is clean and tidy. I would highly recommend staying with Glendon as your host.
We enjoyed our stay at Fleurs
Thin walls, dirty room, inadequate heat, spoiled host. Only good thing; room is very near to center.

We had a great stay at Valerie's place. Her apartment is quite charming and cosy and the location is one of the greatest things about it! We could find pretty much everything within walking distance from us - two tram stations right down the street and only one tram ride away from the city centre. The neighborhood is relaxed and has everything you might need, from a bakery, supermarket, clothing shops, nice bars & rests. to the Foodhalen, a super trendy indoor food hall just across the street, where you can find food stands of all kinds. Not to mention an outdoor market happening every day with lots of fresh produce right outside the building. We didn't get to meet Valerie during our stay but she was very responsive and helpful regarding any questions we've had. All in all we felt like it was a pleasant stay and we'd definitely stay at her place again.

Nienke was one of the most hospitable, gracious hosts I have ever had on air bnb! She was great with communication, provided transportation details and when we arrived a whole day late due to a horrible flight she immediately offered to extend for an extra day. The apt is easy to find off public transportation and a very cozy, house. We were greeted with everything we needed, from wine, strawberries to croissants and orange juice in the fridge. The apt is perfect for a couple or solo traveler. The back porch is surrounded by greenery and the perfect view to start your Amsterdam mornings. I highly recommend nienke’s beautiful  home & when we return to Amsterdam cannot picture staying anywhere else, thank you again!

Yvette's place is INCREDIBLE. So spacious, so clean, such a fantastic eye to detail in every room.
Yvette's communication was brilliant throughout.
We were so comfortable in the house, and even opted to stay in one night, rather than go out into town!

Ms. Nieke is a great host. She is very friendly and helpful. She even put some groceries in the fridge for us. We loved the balcony of the house and the neighborhood. We really enjoyed our stay there.
Amazing, I totally recommend it.

We had a very pleasant stay at this nocarz. Not only were the hosts very friendly and welcoming, but had left some refreshments that we certainly enjoyed, which made us feel at home.
We reccommend this place to anyone looking for a local gem 🌟

Wouter was a fantastic host. He was available to greet us on arrival, flat was clean and tidy with space for us to keep our stuff. Wouter gave us lots of advice about where to go and recommended a local food hall which was our favourite part of the trip! The flat was further out from town than we expected but easily accessible by the regular trams with lots of local places to eat, drink and shop. Even though  he was away while we stayed he stayed in touch the whole time to check everything was okay! Super star host and a great place to stay to explore Amsterdam!

Wouter es un anfitrion excelente, super amable y atento, nuestro vuelo se retraso y nos espero hasta las 2am!! Todo el tiempo estuvo antento a como estabamos y a nuestras necesidades. El dpto super amplio, con todos los utensillos para cocinar y bien conectado al centro de la ciudad. Las fotos son tal al dpto. Super recomendable! Saludos wouter!!muchas gracias hasta la proxima!

Mirjam’s house is perfect for anyone who is seeking accommodation outside of the city centre yet wants to stay in an area that can be easily reached by public transport.
The room is very cozy and the bathroom comes with everything you need.
The communication with Mirjam was very smooth and we felt more than welcome at her place. We would definitely stay with her again.

Ideal apartment for a short  stay in Amsterdam. Very functional apartment, clean, well-equipped. Proximity to Dam Square and other main places. Mirjam is available and responsive and his instructions to access it. Highly Recommended!.

Our stay was wonderful, the apartment is great, beautiful canal straight out the lounge room window, sweet little hammock on the balcony out back. Joekenel had someone waiting at the apartment to let us in and give the a run down and had plenty of maps and tour discounts on the dining table to help get around.

Nicolette was very helpful and quick to respond to any questions we had. She left lots of great information and recommendations for the area and detailed instructions about the house and it's appliances etc.
The apartment is in a convenient and quiet location, feels safe and has everything you need for a short or long term stay.
Visitors should note that this is a home and the owners belongings are in the closets and cupboards so do not expect a lot of space to store your personal belongings.

Everything was just perfect! Amazing location, just a couple of minutes from all the museums and attractions, wonderful host - absolutely no problems, we got some really good advice from Lora, and great communication. I strongly recommend it! :)

Il nostro soggiorno di tre giorni è stato molto piacevole. Il fatto che la casa sia un po' fuori è garanzia di tranquillità. L'appartamento è veramente molto carino e Fabio simpaticissimo e disponibile, grazie a lui abbiamo fatto un mini tour di Amsterdam nord e abbiamo potuto vedere la caratteristica zona dei mulini.
Excelente anfitrión, muy amable y me dio muy buenas recomendaciones de lugares. El lugar impecable
Manolis, Eva, and Kobe were wonderful hosts! The apartment was exactly as described. Stairs were definitely a challenge, but the location more than makes up for it!

The apartment is beautifully decorated, very stylish. The location is great, we hired bicycles for 2 days, the centre is at 10min cycling and there is also the option to take the tram, the stop is literally opposite the road. We had a fantastic stay at Roderick’s apartment, it’s perfect for a couple or 2 people. I would definitely return if I am back in Amsterdam. There was a nespresso coffee machine which was great for breakfast. Roderick was really welcoming when we arrived and the recommendation (bar, restaurant, supermarket) were great. Thank you for having us. Camille and Juliana
Very nice apartment in great location. Lora was very responsive, and the flat was spotlessly clean when we arrived which was much appreciated. Thank you Lora.

Ellie's place is wonderful. Very cozy and very clean. The house is clearly loved and well taken care of. We did have to wait an extra 45min for check-in but we didn't mind at all as it got us on our feet and around the city rather than stuck unpacking. Our host even took our bags into our room during that time. We were greeted by snacks and lots of smiles. A great place for a quiet couple or a group of 3. Location is SUPER ideal. We were a 15min walk from almost everything. Coffee shops and restaurant all around. We got a perfect taste of local and tourist life. Thanks again Ellie!

we had a wonderful moment! Helen was always available. the place is clean, peaceful and disconnected from the city but still it was si easy to get there. i recommand to have a bike, for sure! but also with metro was great.
Lora’s place was exactly as described.  It was very clean and she was a great host.  I would highly recommend it.
Lovely home, fairly close to the tramline and a supermarket. Quite a lot of stairs as the home is spread out over 4 floors

The house of Angie is very nice, very clean. The pictures show the reality. The beds are very comfortable. There is everything you need in the house. The neighborhood is quiet and family friendly. The tram is only a few minutes away and you can get fast to the city center and the railway station. I recommend her place!
A very good nocarz which is located in the center of Amsterdam. The host is very helpful and responsive. Check in time is flexible and it helped lots. Thanks

What can I say about a Bob and Sietske, they are amazing hosts! From beginning to end they were like family and our experience could not be any better. From the nice welcoming gifts to Bob’a morning coffee and their genuine care and interest in us, everything was amazing. I’ve stayed at a few places in my time and they are true Superhosts. Thank you again, we will definitely be back!
Great stay in a clean and comfortable room, good accsess to center of Amsterdam, especially kind and courteous host. Thank you very much, Sietske and Bob !! Hope to see you again.

Appartement idéalement situé en plein centre et pourtant sans aucun bruit!
Décoration très recherchée rendant le lieu très chaleureux
Vraiment idéal pour 4 personnes
Les balcons sont un vrai plus pour des déjeuners au soleil !
Top !

Despite having to cancel my trip last minute, Lora and Klaas were so helpful and informative about the restrictions and guidelines in the Netherlands. I was very disappointed to be unable to stay but it was made much easier by guidance and advice from them.

Super appartement cosy et moderne !!
Et juste à côté de transport en commun.

Un apartamento muy confortable y bien situado. Esta a 15 minutos del centro.
Buena comunicación, checking muy fácil y la limpieza del apartamento correcta.

We would definitely stay in this location again! kith and kin were super responsive and helpful with our arrival, our flight was delayed and a late check in was no worries as we were able to self check in. The place was beautiful and quiet during the night
Amazing spot! Thank you!!
Tout est conforme à l’annonce
Séjour très agréable, l'appartement d'Aldo est très beau et bien placé!

My husband and I loved our stay with Daan! He was very friendly and gave many great tips for us to make the most of our short stay in Amsterdam. His place was very clean and the location was awesome (it was just a few minutes walk from public transportation). Daan was also very helpful in finding my scarf I accidentally left at his place and shipping it to me.

Daan's place could not have been more perfect for two young travellers. The place was so easy to get to and a bus journey away from the centre in a lovely area. The apartment was spotless and has everything we could have wanted. We felt so at home, and the garden was a beautiful touch. Most importantly Daan was a wonderful host. So attentive and made sure to give us any tips where we needed it. We felt so at ease and I would recommend staying with Daan to anyone coming to Amsterdam. Thank you Daan.

This is a very nice beautiful apartment with all the amenities required. My family felt right at home and this would suit families as well as couples etc. Lora communicated well and made us feel very welcome. Would definitely stay again.

Liliana was a pleasure to stay with! She met me at the bus stop and showed me to her home. The room perfectly fits two people and was clean and nice with a pretty fall view. She had all amenities ready for us. It is a little difficult getting back to the place at night, but there are busses you can take. It's abot 20 minutes from Amsterdam Central.

I had a fantastic hotel like stay at Liliana's (one of my best i would say). Liliana is a thoughtful and caring host who made sure that i was alright throughout my stay. The room is large and clean. The place is a short bus ride away from Amsterdam Central Station. Would highly recommend this for any visit to Amsterdam and would definitely stay here again!

Liliana is a very friendly and very kind person who thinks about the well being of the occupants, the accommodation is really good, clean and very convenient for public transport, getting to Amsterdam is very easy
I recommend

הדירה מאוד נקיה , כל אמצעי תחבורה במרחק של כ3 דקות ו20 דקות נסיעה למרכז.
החיסרון היחיד שלא היה באמת גינה או מרפסת למרות שרשמו בביקורות שיש .
הבעלים ענה תמיד בזמינות מאוד גבוהה .
Liliana was a very kind and attentive host!  Everything was as described and we had a great time!
Great place 👍
Daan was responsive and the nocarz was very clean and nice. Also it was close to transportation. Would recommend!
Really enjoyed my stay!
Je souhaite, facile d’accès en vélo … quartier chouette et tranquille…
Neat and tidy, and close to supermarket. Recommended!
Nice room. 30 minutes from the center of the city. Be prepared to share a bathroom with the host.

If you are a solo female traveler like me, you would feel like home here. I couldn’t meet Liliana, but his son Raul explained me everything about the apartment and he gave me recommendations about some places nearby:). I found everything perfect, very comfortable,clean, private, public transport very well connected to city centre. Thank you very much:)

Great location, quiet and peaceful. Near public transport and easy to reach Central Amsterdam. Flexible check-in and -out. Liliana and her son were always friendly and very helpful. We had no problems at all and can definitely recommend this place!

War ein super schöner Aufenthalt bei den beiden :) Würden immer wieder kommen :) Lage ist super man braucht nicht lange bis nach Amsterdam centraal. Die beiden sind super nett und sehr zuvorkommend. Sehr empfehlenswert die Unterkunft :)
Todo muy bueno

Ton was a wonderful host. The room was very cosy, the location was convenient for public transport and the breakfast every morning was wonderful. Ton and Will were generous, kind and full of helpful information. They went above and beyond to make sure that we had everything we could need or want. Was a great experience overall, cant recommend enough!

Habitación en departamento de Liliana queda en Ámsterdam norte, se debe tomar un bus y el metro para llegar al centro de la ciudad sin embargo es muy fácil no es para nada un problema demoras unos 30 minutos en total. La habitación muy limpia con todas las comodidades necesarias y un excelente recibimiento por parte de Liliana con muchos dulces y absolutamente todo lo que pudiésemos necesitar, se nota mucha preocupación por sus huéspedes. El baño es compartido con ella y su hijo pero esto tampoco fue nunca un problema.
Volveríamos a alojarnos en otra oportunidad. Recomendado.

El apartamento cuenta con todo lo que se indica en la descripción y es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Liliana y Raul son muy amables y atentos, lo recomendamos al 100% y sin duda, volveríamos a hospedarnos en este apartamento. Estamos muy agradecidos por la atención brindada ☺️
공항에서 매우 가깝고 시내에 나가기도 편리한 위치에 있어요.  욕실을 같이 써야하고 침실이 다 이층에 있어서 조금 신경이 쓰이기는 합니다. 하지만 조식이 제공되고 환경이 좋아서 가성비가 높은 숙소입니다.
Liliana was very helpful and kind. I'm glad we stayed at his place. The nearest bus stop is a few minutes away, and you can quickly get to the center.
Excellent stay. Thank you!
Was working at a nearby university for the week. Location was perfect, and less than 10mins walk to Rai where you can catch a tram or metro to the centre.

The location is perfect, really accommodating and make the trip better.
Rutger's place is very nice for a short stay in Amsterdam.

Peter was a brilliant host in every way.

He answered a few questions that I had very quickly which was useful as I booked for my wife and I with very short notice.
His directions were really helpful and accurate.

When we arrived we found some wonderful cheese, meet and biscuits that had been left for us (and loads of it) which was really good !
It's a great house not far from the centre and enjoyed staying there
very much.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Emil. L'appartement est très joli, propre, calme, et assez bien situé. Emil est accueillant, agréable et très disponible. Merci beaucoup Emil :)

Great location on the water and close to the city. Plenty of restaurants near by and close to the train.
Houseboat is quite big and plenty of room.
Get a little bit of city noise and sounds of the train at night , but that's to be expected and all part of the stay.
Would definitely stay again

Rutger ist sehr sympathischer und freundlicher Gastgeber...
in Zukunft gucke ich erst ob er noch ein Plätzchen frei hat bevor ich wo anders buche... Danke Dir und ich komme gerne wieder...

My stay at Emil's place was simply unforgettable , his apartment is cozy and filled with an atmosphere that instantly makes you feel at home.
Emil always pay attention to his guest's comfort, he was ready to help, provide guidance and offer valuable insights about Amsterdam.  His apartment location is very convenience in transportation , to the central train station only takes around 15 minuets by tram. 
In short, I definitely recommend this place 😋

We had an amazing stay at Arthur’s place. His cozy apartment, with a great location will quickly start to feel like a “home”, even just for a few days.
Arthur is also very kind a friendly host, always willing to help. 🌟
We had a great week!
Séjour parfait, Chi a été très réactif à mes messages. La maison se situe a 15min du centre. Tout était impeccable. Je recommande fortement.
Myself and partner had a wonderful time and plan to come back and stay in the near future.

We booked the place for my sister's hen party. We didn't spend much time at the accommodation but it was plenty of room and pool table and darts was a good fun. Roof top area was great too. Chi was very helpful and responded very quick. I highly recommend the place to stay and hopefully we will be back.
Super helpful hosts. The boat is comfortable, warm and easy to find and the bikes are a super great asset! We rode around everywhere :-) quiet location, clean and friendly nocarz. Highly recommended
Floris place was great! Everything was accurate, he was very responsive to. 100% recommended.
Wonderful hosts, Great house boat, awesome location! They went out of there way to find us parking and to make us feel at home! We loved our stay and will return! Thank you so very much!
The apartment was nice and cosy, a bit cold tho. Very nice and peaceful neighborhood. It's a bit far from centrum, but theres easy to move around with busses. Ilana was very friendly and helpful.

Nous avons réservé ce studio pour une semaine. Il est parfait pour un couple, il était très propre ! Le lit est en hauteur et très confortable, il y a un micro-ondes et une bouilloire. Il n'y a pas d'endroit"salle de bain" mis à part une cabine de douche. Les toilettes et un petit lavabo sont en dehors du studio mais privatifs, ce qui est appréciable. Ilana a beaucoup communiqué avec nous avant le départ, nous avait laissé des snacks et une bouteille de vin à notre arrivée. Elle nous a donné beaucoup de conseils vis à vis des transports, des lieux à visiter, des endroits où manger... Ses conseils de très bon goût nous ont été bien utiles ! Mis à part une commode, il n'y a pas vraiment de rangements (penderie) pour les vêtements etc, mais c'est suffisant pour deux et pour une semaine. Le studio est très bien situé, dans une rue calme, le métro est à deux minutes et à 10/15 minutes du centre-ville. Nous recommandons ce logement !

We had a lovely time at Ilana's. Although we did not get to meet her, her friend welcomed us and Ilana had everything set up in advance. The room is very pretty, very clean and comfortable. It is only a 45 min walk from the center of Amsterdam. We would absolutely recommend !
Nous avons passé un très bon moment chez Ilana. Bien que nous n'ayons pas pu la rencontrer, son amie nous a accueillie et Ilana avait tout préparé à l'avance pour nous. La chambre est très jolie, parfaitement propre et confortable. Il faut juste 45 minutes de marche pour atteindre le centre d'Amsterdam.
Sehr schön, sehr sauber, coole Lokation! Klein aber sehr fein! Gerne wieder!!
A very cozy and nice house, well connected with all kinds of transport and a very pleasant deal !

Our stay at the garden was very lovely. Carlijn and Magdi were great at giving us every detail we needed for our arrival and our whole stay. They apartment was very nice and clean. Everything went very smoothly!

Carla has been a wonderful host..!
Breakfast was delicious. Great privacy. Warm reception. Very helpful.
Couldn't have asked for more!
Thanks a lot Carla for being the perfect host.

A very nice accomadation with a pleasant terrasse.
Available bicycles allowed us to walk around and discover Amsterdam in a few days.
Thanks Carlijn and Magdi for your welcome !

L'habitation est très propre à nôtre arrivée, nous disposons de tout le nécessaire (serviettes, draps) et des bières nous attendent fraîchement dans le frigo :). Possibilité de cuisiner dans le logement.
Nos hôtes sont très serviables et là pour répondre à toutes nos questions.

This was a great place to stay right before we had to head back to the airport, as it was close to Schiphol but still private and residential. We were met at check-in with a key and lots of helpful info, and it was easy to find from the Lelylaan train station. A short walk to the Rembrandtpark, very nice! Comfy bed, spacious shower, easy access to the city center via public transport, and nice outdoor space for morning coffee. Only wish our flight wasn’t so early the next morning so we could have enjoyed it more. Would absolutely recommend to those who already know Amsterdam pretty well, as this neighborhood is predominantly residential and it’s nice and quiet with lots of young families. I’d say this is not for those who want a lot of partying and nightlife in their stay, but that worked out well in our favor.
Perfect place to stay in Amsterdam. Two metro lines nearby, great view and being awaken by ducks in the morning is a little dose of perfection.

Im Großen und Ganzen eigentlich sehr zufrieden. Sah aus wie auf den Bildern und das Einchecken ging echt gut und schnell.
Problem war nur das die Fahrräder für kleinere Menschen nicht passen, die Vermieter Ober uns von morgens bis Abends unnormal getrampelt haben, war etwas unangenehm.
Lage muss ich ehrlich sagen war nicht die beste aber könnte natürlich auch schlechter sein.
Es war nicht ganz sauber, wir hatten noch den Einkauf des Mieters vor uns im Kühlschrank und man hat allgemein gemerkt das es nicht ganz sauber war. Vermieter sind zwar echt nett muss ich aber nicht noch einmal hin…
Carla is a lovely host, cosy light room and with Carla's breakfast makes a stay in Amsterdam a real bargain. Location is in a beautiful and quiet area. Can only recommend a stay with Carla.

a estadia foi ótima! a casa é um amor, bem organizada e limpa, tem espaço excelente para duas pessoas!
notas: eu e meu namorado chegamos perto da 1h da manhã em Leylann e de lá eram 15minutos caminhada até o nocarz, não aconselho fazer isso a noite, o caminho foi bastante escuro, o que torna difícil se localizar.
tirando isso, a localização do nocarz em relação ao centro também é boa, o metrô é próximo ou ir de bike é bem fácil, existem locais para alugar bicicletas próximo.

Nos encantó la estancia en la casa flotante, unas vistas hermosas en una zona tranquila para caminar por las mañanas. Sin duda nos volveriamos a quedar aquí.
Tomar en cuenta que el baño y regadera están en la recamara principal pero para nosotros no fue problema.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Amsterdam, ce logement y a fortement participé. Les vélos à disposition, proche du centre-ville, logement équipé comme il faut.
Parfait
Des hôtes et co-hôtes très sympathiques
Je recommande

Great stay! Was not cold at all inside, despite it snowing outside. It felt like there was perhaps under floor heating.
Easy location to get to and from downtown for a 10 euro Uber.
Bikes looked good, but it was too cold for us to use them.
Beautiful river views from the window.
Only downside is the WiFi was pretty much nonexistent unless we were in one corner of the place.
Great stay and I would do it again!
Cristina was the perfect host. She met us on arrival before letting us enjoy a wonderful weekend at her beautiful apartment. Highly recommended.

Martin was amazing!  From greeting us when e showed up to making sure we had everything we needed as well as checking in on occasion.  The place was perfectly located among many shops & restaurants in addition to being close to many major attractions around town.  Everything is in close walking proximity.  The Rembrandt house is 5 min away, Train station 10 min and other major attractions 10-15 min.  It was nice to have the local grocery store just around the corner and they did take credit cards which was not the case at many others around town.  The room is open with two beds, tv, shower, bathroom, etc but the best part was the cozy terrace where we spent time having drinks at night or coffee early in the morning.  Lastly, our 2.5yr old had fun with the cat in the house that would come visit.  Overall, we'd highly recommend staying here and look forward to going back.

Carla is an amazing host; she's super lovely and proposed to do breakfast for me; so nice.
The room is just perfect, with good illumination and great size, It's all good!

Place was as expected and more - a really great stay - the room/apartment itself was great, really cool features, amazing views from the balcony/windows and location is as good as it gets in Amsterdam, been to Amsterdam a couple of times and this was our best stay by far. Host and his family were super friendly and welcoming and offered some great advice for local hotspots.
Highly recommend this stay for anyone looking, we’ll definitely be rebooking as soon as possible. 10/10

Los libros, las plantas, la luz y la buena energía que tiene la casa nos ha encantado, un lugar fascinante.
Es de los mejores sitios en los que he estado y Cristina ha estado siempre pendiente y atenta.
Sin lugar a duda volvería
Regina is absolutely wonderful and the place is a gem. We will definitely try to book again for future trips and recommend to everyone we know!!

Beautiful place with Amsterdam Charme perfectly located in the city center. Regina is very welcoming and the place is equipped with everything needed to have an authentic and local city experience! Very much recommended.
Great spot for a weekend get away. Loved it

The flat is cozy, special (in a good way), clean and I would strongly recommend to stay with Erik.
He is a very helpful and open host with a lot of ideas what to do to see Amsterdam.
Thank you Erik!

Fue súper quedarme en la casa de Erik. Es a solo 15 minutos del central station y puedes experimentar por unos minutos viajar en el ferry. La zona es muy tranquila así que uno puede descansar de todo el ruido de la cuidad. Todo estaba muy limpio y organizado. Lo recomiendo
Fantastic place! Comfortable bed, hot shower, plenty of space! Located right next to the Albert Cuyp Market and pleassant cafes, restaurants, and bakeries. Wonderful stay, Highly recommend!

Location is fantastic with easy access to tram lines, great restaurants, and beautiful parks and Museumplein not far away!  Karin is very responsive and helpful in providing info, tips, etc!  The space is great; lots of room and great amenities!

Fantastic nocarz experience. Erik was a great host with lots of local info which really made the trip easier and more enjoyable. Nice and clean apartment with everything you need. We even got some rolls and croissants in the morning!
We will be booking again...
Thank you Michiel, you have been such a great host. Beautiful apartment in a very nice location. We enjoyed our time there as much as we could. If we come back, we'll give you a shout for sure! Top!

It was a great stay at Erik’s place. He is such a nice and friendly person. Also he is a great host, he left for us daily a pair of crossaints in the morning and also wine and some fruit in the room. Really nice details from him. We can truly recommend this place to stay in Amsterdam!
The apartment was perfect for our stay, lovely place & quiet neighbourhood, with a short walk and ferry-trip to the city centre. Really enjoyed our time there and would have stayed with Erik again!

Erik was a great host. He waited for us to check în (the flight was delayed). He is very friendly, he even invited us to ho go for a swim.
He gave us useful information about the city, we did not have to use the GPS around the accomodation.
He welcomed us with wine and fruits, also offered pastry products in the morning, to go with the coffee.
I am happy we chose to stay at Erik.
Perfect location, spacious, partially renovated, nice flat. Communication with Yara works perfectly.
Joost is a great host and his place is unique. Well-equipped, location is excellent. Nice balcony for fresh air and a cosy inside for a great stay.

This quaint and homely apartment was perfect for our stay in Amsterdam, the apartment is walkable to most locations and uber or public transport is efficient for other circumstances. The hosts were lovely and went above and beyond to make us feel at home. The bed was extremely comfortable and the facilities were great. I highly recommend this apartment to anyone planning on visiting Amsterdam.
The location and facilities were perfect, I would definitely recommend it to anyone who's looking for a lovely apartment stay and we will hopefully be back in Amsterdam soon!
It's a wounderful apartment in the very heart of Amsterdam, me and my friends hade the best time and would love to go back! Tomas was very kind and helpful and easy to comunicate with!
Es war alles super. DasHausboot ist sehr schön und sehr sauber. Das Frühstück war sehr gut und wir hatten eine schöne Zeit :)

The flat is very comfortable we had an amazing stay in snow-covered Amsterdam! The bath is really nice. Agnieska left us some tips at our arrival which was very appreciate. The heater was programmed and a bit low for december That was maybe the only thing to change! Thanks for everything
Nice, modern clean apartment. I had a very comfortable stay. I didn't meet Agnieszka but the communication was great and easy. Highly recommended.

Stephanie’s delightful apartment was ideally situated in a lovely location just outside of Amsterdam city. Stephanie was an excellent host and made time to tell us about lots of the city’s attractions as well as the local area and the brilliant Gollem’s bar a short walk from the apartment.
My friend and I had a wonderful time and would highly recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to stay in Amsterdam.

Awesome apartment. It is even better than in photos: spacy, very clean and well equiped. Stephanie is very open and nice person - met us and explained everything (helped to rent bikes and gave very good advices about museums). Apartment has very nice balcony and it is central location (5 minutes with bike to city center). Also Stephanie is very flexible - she allowed us to check in very early. Also nice that kitchen has coffee, spices and even butter/bread/milk. Definetely we’ll be back

The flat is in the perfect location you can walk to all attractions and get around the city very easily. Dennie is really welcoming and accommodating, his bar and restaurant suggestions were spot on for what we were looking for! we couldn’t recommend this place more!

Das Zimmer liegt in einer wunderbaren Gegend , sehr zentral, leise und sicher. Der  persönliche Empfang und die Betreuung während des Aufenthaltes ist vorbildlich! Ich kann nur "Vielen Dank für Alles" sagen.

It was the first time for me and my boyfriend in Amsterdam! We stayed only two nights in the house of Eleske & Dennie. Everything was Perfect! You can reach the house very easy by bus from the airport and its located very central in the beautiful neighborhood Jordaan. In this cozy room you will definitely find everything you need! Eleske & Dennie are perfect hosts! They always have good recommendations and try to help you with everything!
All in all: We will definitely come back - maybe once in summer ;)
Thanks so much for Hosting us!
Had a great pizza recommendation. Very good location

Klasse Gastgeber,
Check In konnte früher organisiert werden das auschecken verlief auch sehr entspannt, Tipps Tricks survival map 😃 alles war gut organisiert hatte ein Ohr für alle Fragen
Zur Lage ist genial direkt in Zentrum
Das Zimmer schön und sauber
Sehr netter Gastgeber wenn mal wieder Amsterdam ansteht werde ich das im Hinterkopf haben.

Communication with Greg is perfect.
His place is very easy to get to by public transport. When you arrive you get a friendly welcome in a nice apartment. It's a pretty room, with (access to) everything you could need.
Perfect place for one in Amsterdam. Recommended for sure.

Greg was really cool about the keys, even though I missed my flight and arrived 6 hours later to what was initially planned.
The room was spotless clean and the rest of the apartment too. 🤗🤗
Greg was very welcoming. And the place was tidy and very clean! A cozy place to stay even for a long period.

We loved staying on the Stella Rask! Everything was clean and exactly as pictured, and we were able to easily walk everywhere from it (Centraal Station, museums, restaurants, etc.). I would highly recommend staying here.

Apartment was great - clean and tidy and great for a short stay in Amsterdam for 2 people. It was a short bus ride (or 30-40 minute walk) from a lot of the sights. Richard was a great host and extremely responsive and helpful. Would highly recommend.

Die Wohnung war in einem sauberen Zustand und auch sehr gut gelegen.
Also für einen entspannten Urlaub ist die Wohnung ideal oder natürlich auch für eine kleine Truppe (wie bei uns der Fall) wenn man mal auf Pirsch gehen will.
All in all was a nice flat
Wibout was very helpful, we could let the  luggage when we arrived, even it was too early to get the flat. Thanks again.

Super accueil. Janine et Rik sont super dispos avant et pendant le séjour, et répondent à toutes nos questions. Nous étions 5 adultes et même avec une seule salle de bain, pas de souci.
Belle maison, hyper bien située au calme. Dans un quartier neuf, qui permet d'avoir une vue d'Amsterdam hors secteur touristique. Il y a tout dans cette maison car Janine et Rik y vivent.
Vous allez adorer la vue sur la mer et prendre vos apéros sur la terrasse derrière.
Et si vous aimez les chats, alors vous allez être servis : ils sont adorables, très calins et pas du tout embêtants. Si vous n'aimez pas les chats (comment est-ce possible ?), ils ne viennent pas vous voir.
Bref, enchantée de ce séjour.
Eine sehr schöne Unterkunft. Super Standort, nur ein paar Gehminuten zur Altstadt. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Hanco war persönlich da und jederzeit erreichbar.
It’s a clean and well localized place.
Good value for money, bed was comfy. Room was smaller than expected however would recommend for a short stay to see the sights as the location is perfect. Very friendly host

The apartment was very nice, exactly what you can see in the pictures. The hosts were very nice, communication was accurate and quick. I would recommend staying here, the host gave great instructions on public transport etc which we found was essential during our trip. The balcony was a nice area to chill and smoke, which of course is another benefit as a lot of people don't allow this.
Only down sight was that we had to keep the noise to a minimum after about 10pm due to neighbours, which we did respect, but would've been nice to have some music playing on the balcony when it was late. (this is a very minor quarrel, I would say this place is 5 stars)

Thank you Ronit for your kind attention and predisposition to resolve concerns. The apartment was very clean and complete for a very good stay.
Privileged location with easy access to the RAI convention center area and less than 100 meters from the TRAM that takes us to DAM.
I recommend it 100%.
thanks

Very pleasant boat, with modern decoration. We didn't see Rinze a lot because he works, but we can exchange with him very well!
We hope to come back soon in his boat

Yuri was one of the best host i had, if you make a question in 1 minute he answer,he was always on line, kind,helpful, i didn't meet him,but Yuri's lovable neighbor welcomed me and gave me the keys and showed the apartment.Wifi fast,wonderful and modern apartment i loved stay there,recommend 100%.

I could not recommend this stay enough, the host was amazing, the location was perfect and the houseboat itself was great! The perfect size for us and very cozy and clean! I would definitely stay again!

This was the first time we rented a boat house on nocarz and boy we were glad we did!
A unique experience of course if you like to live a little differently!
The space was nice and cozy and Rinze was a fast responder with helpful answers to our questions. If you need a fully equipped kitchen this place is not for you. But a simple wine and cheese evening while looking at the boats passing right by your window is an experience I truly recommend.

Super logement : propre, fonctionnel, situé dans un quartier très sympa, proche de tout à pied, au calme. On a passé 4 jours au top !
Rinze est un super hôte, disponible, accueillant, plein de conseils et d'adresses. L'arrivée peut se faire en autonomie. Nous reviendrons assurément. Je recommande

Everything was amazing! This stay was very unique and Rinze was an awesome host who gave great recommendations. The houseboat was clean, comfortable for two people and great location. Only 10 min walk from Amsterdam centraal. Highly recommend this stay - even in winter months.

Casa molto accogliente con giardino, molto apprezzata da me e il mio amico.
In casa c’era tutto ciò di cui avevamo bisogno.
Bon séjour, logement au cœur d’Amsterdam.
Julia was more than helpful. She let us check in early and gave amazing recommendations. This is my spot for my future Amsterdam visits.

Maarten was a great host. The photos do not do this apartment any justice. It's gorgeous and very spacious. Its on the top floor and you can see vondelpark right in front of you, which is literally a 5 min walk.
The apartment is very close to the city centre and airport! It also has a 7 min walk to a mini supermarket if you need groceries. The two cats are extremely friendly and will love you if you feed them. I defiantly recommend this apartment to anyone.
La maison est très propre et spacieuse. Elle est située sur une route assez passante mais il y a un arrêt de tram juste en face qui permet de se rendre dans le centre d'Amsterdam en 4 arrêts.
I loved the area as it was quiet and surrounded with beautiful streets. I highly recommend staying here!! Swans come right up to your window!
Beautiful place in a beautiful location

Jeremy's houseboat is stylish and very clean. It was good to have proper cooking utensils and nice crockery and cutlery. It would accommodate four people easily, without tripping over each other as the spaces are a good size. There were also condiments for our use, which was nice. There were magazines about Amsterdam and a welcome cold drink waiting for us when we arrived. The houseboat is in a lovely area - we alternated between walking places and catching the tram, which is two minutes walk away. There are plenty of eating places and other fab shops close by. It was slightly noisy at night, but not too bad overall. (We come from the bush so are used to total silence at night.) Communication was fast and friendly. I recommend Jeremy's houseboat.

Tidy, clean, amazing location and surprisingly spacious for 3 adults and a 1 year old. Fab communication. Slight smell of smoke. Sheets could have felt fresher. Heating turned off and on automatically at slightly random times but was turned on when I asked. Overall a great stay.
The place is a very nice apartment with so much beautiful yard. It is perfect for peaceful staying in Amsterdam.
We had an excellent stay on this house boat. Several good bars, cafes, and a market close by. We had the large window open constantly, watching the boats and birds go by. Highly recommend.
Excellent house boat - really recommend it!

Greetings
The experience was stunning , this place is very cozy , it has all what you need from the kitchen stuff to the WC .
You can open the window and give food to the new friends that you going to make because is just so sweet , the ducks and others come to you to ask you food and if you give everyday in the same time they come to you to ask you , that was a stunning experience for me .
Is very easy to get there from the amestradam central station the place is really central you have a lot of stuff around mostly the street of vintage shops that was my favorite part . To go inside you put the code to open the door outside of the boat and also and
to go to your room .
I always wanted to have a house boat experience and I loved it.
Rinze very nice and polite . He makes you very comfortable and he is very welcome. I needed to leave the nocarz earlier because of the Virus Covid -19 and he completely understood and it did not try to mess everything around that was very valuable for me to watch really cool .
I totally recommend this place .
Kind regards
Ricardo Nunes
Ifigenia is great. Don't hesitate to contact her in Amsterdam
Would definitely recommend staying here! Perfect location - walking distance from the train station and many restaurants & bars. Loved waking up and looking out at the water each morning!

This was a really special place to stay.  I could hardly pull myself away from the giant opening windows as I watched the boats and birds come and go on the canal.  Rinze was really great to work with and communication/check-in was seamless!  Great and unique opportunity in Amsterdam!
Absolutely wonderful stay!  The location was perfect, Rinze was super helpful, and the stay was just incredible.
Tout était parfait!

Un muy buen lugar, justo como las fotos, Atanas muy amable, atento y dispuesto a ayudar con cualquier información que necesites. Aunque un poco retirado del centro lo compensa con una parada de tranvia a 30 metros de la casa y una tienda de conveniencia a menos de 100 metros. Muy recomendado!
Although we stayed for one night we thought it was a lovely, homely apartment, we would definitely be coming back for more nights.

The location was perfect—tons of good restaurants, easy access to city center, right across from public transport and in front of the Albert Cuyp Market, a few blocks from a canal cruise and the Heineken experience. The studio was great for what we needed—comfortable, clean, and cute. Boy was an excellent host—we definitely recommend his place and would stay there, again.

Rinze was an exceptional host, and the place was exactly as pictured. I had concerns about potential odors from staying on the canal, but there were none. It was actually a delight to watch the ducks swim and the boats float by. The location is fantastic—close to cafes and grocery stores—yet it was peaceful and quiet at night. Highly recommended!
The place was perfect, exactly like the photos. Rinze was attentive and so helpful. The area is amazing, feels really safe and is walking distance to everything. We will definitely be back

Lugar limpio y agradable, zona segura y cómoda, cercana a los principales museos y con acceso al metro en la esquina.
Atanas muy amable y accesible.
Muchas gracias

Nora's apartment was great. The area was nice with lots of great food and bars near by. Winkel is a cafe 5 mins walk away and I had the best apple pie I have ever had when I was there. Apartment was clean and comfortable. Simple and nice deco. 5 stars for sure. Highly recommended.

Loved all the amenities, the washer and especially the espresso maker and coffee that was provided. A very nice touch. Very steep stairs to the fourth floor, we are both 60 and considered fit, so it wasn't an issue for us. Very clean, and Ewout was great at responding quickly and taking care of the other party in our group when our plane was delayed. Would definitely stay here again if ever in Amsterdam.
Very friendly and responsive hosts! Location was very accessible but a little noisy.
Had a great time at Lagos' home! Would definitely come back and recommend. Thanks Lago!

My daughter and I stayed here and had a wonderful stay! It was an easy 15 minute walk from the train station and the location was very central. The apartment is great - very clean, comfortable and cozy. We really appreciated the coffee and treats that Nora and Renee put out for us and there is also a wonderful cheese shop (they vacuum packed cheese for us to bring back home) and a grocery store literally across from the apartment. There is a little noise from the neighborhood, but when we closed the bedroom door it was quiet and we slept really well. The beds were very comfortable and can be together like a king bed or separated a bit as twin beds. We would definitely stay here again - both the location and the apartment were perfect for us!

El lugar es tal cual las fotos, tiene todo lo necesario. El anfitrión tenía muy buena comunicación, lo único incómodo son las escaleras ya que es en el último piso y también la escalera a la cama que puede dar un poco de miedo de caerse dormido, pero lo avisan así que no fue sorpresa, de resto la zona es muy linda y accesible! Tuve muy buena estadía!

O espaço oferecido por Vladimir é muito bom! Bem localizado, fácil acesso ao transporte público fica bem perto da rodoviária, centro e uns 20 minutos do aeroporto. O Vladimir é uma pessoas fantástica, sempre muito atencioso com os detalhes e bem estar dos hóspedes.
The place is a pretty convenient distance from the city via public transport. Vladimir is polite. Just do not use the laundry room without permission.

Gretha was an outstanding host! As well as providing helpful information of to get around, she also provided us with some milk, bread, tea, coffee etc. The apartment was in a great location and was really stylish and comfortable. 10/10 would book again.

Laurens En Petra’s place is just a perfect location to many sites and things to do in Amsterdam! The place was nice and clean.  The drinks in the fridge was a nice bonus because it was so HOT during the unexpected heat wave during our stay. The home was way better than expected!

Es war ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt.  Gretha war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.  Das Zimmer war sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet.  Am besten war die Dachterrasse.  Die Anbindung zur Straßenbahn war gut zu Fuß erreichbar.  Vielen Dank Gretha.  Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
A great house in a great location! The perfect place to party and have fun with all your friends in a cosy house where nothing is lacking.

Perfect location. Almost everything is in walking distance. 10 min to Central Train Station. The room was clean and cozy. Only hangers were missing so we just used a chair :)
Eva is very friendly and helpful. Check-in time is flexible.
It was great experience.

Eva’s place is a perfect for a weekend getaway. Overlooking the canal and most sights are all within walking distance from the room. Very friendly people would definitely book again on my next trip to the dam.

Mark is a very good host, if you need anything he will answer you about the house and also about the city
If you want to enjoy the city and make party it's a very good place
fun place

We absolutely loved staying at Jolijn’s place. Her house is located in a wonderfull neighborhood which is walking distance from some of the most common tourist spots and also very accesible via public transport. The apartment also had everything we needed. We highly recommend it!

Why would you stay somewhere else?!
Kristin made everything easy for us. I had our travel times wrong and she still made it work. The house is beautiful and located so close to Vondelpark. I went down for coffee every morning and she is in between two tram stops. The bed was so comfy, I overslept the first day!
If you don't like stairs this is not the place for you, but then neither is Amsterdam because the who place is stairs. You will need to walk up some narrow stairs to the bedroom, but once you get there, it's so worth it. The views from the balcony are beyond! The bath is big and deep, so great for soaking.
Truly, I would book here again and again.

An amazing space, great for single or couples....location right near park, quiet street but right off a main Street with great shops, restaurants and grocery. Would def stay again! Pack light or ask to keep luggage downstairs, the climb up is quite a lot w/ regular size luggage.
Very nice loft in a good location on a quiet street. Highly recommended

Nuestra estacia en el apartamento de Kirsten fue maravillosa. El espacio es único y hermoso. Los techos altos con vigas de madera, muros de ladrillo y un mobiliario con estilo, han hecho que disfrutemos nuestros días en Amsterdam. La ubicación es perfecta, situado en una zona céntrica pero lejos del ruido de la ciudad.
Sin duda alguna, volveremos a disfrutar el hospedarnos ahí en un próximo futuro.
Ha sido una magnífica elección en nuestra visita por esta ciudad.
Agradecimiento total.
Saludos cordiales desde California,
- Beatriz y Zev Johnston.

Jan and Desti 's place is in a good location,around 20 minutes walk from city centre so we didn't need to use public transport. Their provision of bikes is a great idea and way to explore the city. They very kindly provided us with food and snacks ( even beers and wine!) which was a nice surprise. There are a few guide books for Amsterdam in the  room which were of great help to us. The only downside is the size of the shower room which is tiny but other than that it's been a positive experience all round.
Walkable distance to public transport which is all you need to get around Amsterdam. Suzanne, their friend was very friendly, helpful and hospitable. Thanks again

Kirsten's place was a great choice for our stay in Amsterdam. Plenty of bars, restaurants and coffee shops nearby and it was very easy to access both Central Amsterdam and the airport via close-by public transport. Kristen was friendly, communicated well and was flexible for us. I'd happily recommend Kirsten's place!

Highly recommend. Jan & Desti are quick to respond and excellent hosts. Their home is on a quiet street and they stock your kitchen beyond what I expected. They also have a great little guidebook for the neighborhood with excellent restaurant suggestions and tourist tips. If I’m ever back in Amsterdam I would definitely stay again!

Wijnand’s place was what we were looking for - away from the crowd yet close to everything you want to see! Communication was great, the place as described and shown on the pictures! I would give 6 stars to Wijnand’s hospitality!

Great hosts, very responsive and helpful, and great self contained place. The room is in a quiet and safe residential area close to public transport. There are some restaurants nearby with great options for breakfast and dinner. The oranges and biscuits left for guest felt like a sweet treat.
Really close to Amsterdam central and cute appartment. Eva was really helpfull ad reactive. Thank you!

beautiful apartment just few minutes from the central station. You can find everything you need and have a great terrace! Nada is a friendly host and very kind I would come back in this apartment!
Thanks Nada
Excelente lugar para quedarte en medio del Barrio Rojo, muy agradable el recibimiento

Tanya is an excellent host. She took care of the special request I had about my stay, picked me up from the bus station (it was late night), helped me set up the bike and gave me a lot of travel suggestions. The location is also very nice. The ferry to the central station is about 25 mins walk, but in a nice scenic route. I enjoyed my walk to and from ferry every day. Tanya provides you a bike so it is not a problem if you don't like to walk. I think this is better than staying in the city. Overall, one of my best nocarz experiences.

This 2 bedroom apartment is located conveniently, 8 minute walk to the Rijksmuseum and museum square and just a round the corner from Frans Halsstraat with a large variety of good restaurants and wine bars to choose from. e
Each bedroom has a comfortable bed and ensuite bathroom. it was surprisingly quiet at night despite the central location. the apartment is furnished in style and has everything you need. i would highly recommend this place for a visit to this vibrant part of Amsterdam.
Tanya was zeer vriendelijk en flexibel en maakt de lekkerste koffie!

Tanya is een geweldige gastvrouw. Ze reageert steeds snel en duidelijk. De kamer is netjes, net als haar badkamer en keuken. Ik had een heel rustige, fijne nacht. Met het openbaar vervoer ben je zo in Amsterdam of in de gezellige dorpjes ten Noorden van de stad.
Great place, walkable to the city center, comfortable after long days exploring, and a kind host.

My friends and I really enjoyed staying here. The neighbourhood is nice and safe. With the bicycles provided by the hosts, you can reach anywhere in Amsterdam within short time! Supermarket is not far, and the kitchen is fairly well equipped. The apartment was clean and tidy and a very nice place to stay :)
Amazing home, so comfortable and bright! Location was perfect only 10 minutes from centraal!
Kirsten’s place is in a great location and very convenient to get around.  The bed is comfortable and there’s a large tub which was nice! Overall a very pleasant stay in a quiet and central location.
Fantastic Location. Lovely studio. Beautiful neighbourhood., Flowers and Chocolates were a lovely welcoming touch..
Very spacious apartment. Stairs to the apartment were steep.
very comfy, clean, and a wonderful location with some very nice hospitality touches. host was friendly and helpful and accommodating. very cute bnb. would highly recommend!

Absolutely amazing stay. Cosy, clean and relaxing. Public transport is a 2 minute walk away. Very close to central and the museums but has the tranquil quietness of the outer city. Supermarket a 5 minute walk was cheap and handy to get to. 10/10 would recommend to all coming to Amsterdam. A beautiful view of the river jordann. Great place to stay for couples. I can't wait to come to Amsterdam and stay here again. Thank you so much
Gezellige nette en schone kamer op een bijzondere plek en leuke locatie in Amsterdam!
Perfect single or couples spot. Just far enough away from heavy tourist area, but close enough to enjoy. Would stay there again!

Posizione perfetta! A due passi da tutti i musei e comodo anche per i mezzi di trasporto
Appartamento fresco e pulito! Ha tutto quello che serve

Judith's studio is a really convenient space in a central part of town, with easy access to sites like the Anne Frank House and Centraal, as well as all the canal tours. Judith was especially helpful and accommodating when my wife and I fell ill during our trip.

Dorien and Tom's houseboat is an absolute dream in the middle of Amsterdam.
With a view of the river from the bed and a real boat feeling, you still have every luxury.
The furnishings are very loving and stylish. We would be very happy to stay here again.

Very nice stay ! Tom is very responsive and super helpful.
We stayed 3 nights with my girlfriend to visit Amsterdam.
The view in the morning is amazing.
This flat is not appropriate to cook but there is a lot of restaurant in the neighborhood.
We will come again for sure.

Ferry and Annette with her daughter are very nice people and we had nice chats together.  Also it is very clean. Nevertheless we where not really satisfied with the room. No window with chanel sight, not good enough tools in the kitchen and the bed was too narrow and not enough comfortable. Even it was not clear to us if the price is for the room or we have to pay more as we came as a couple.

Such a nice and lovely place to stay.
The rooftop was simply amazing! And Finn was a super friendly and nice host!
Thank you very much!
Finn was so helpful and nice.  Excellent location. Comfortable bed. Loved the expresso maker!  Finn really made us feel at home in Amsterdam.

The location is really great, very close to the city center, the bed is very comfortable and the roof terrace is amazing. We had some chilly mornings thanks to Amsterdam weather but overall there was a very nice experience. Finn is very polite and helpful and we had a great vacation staying here.
Nous avons été contents de pouvoir laisser nos bagages avant et après l'heure de prise du logement de façon à bien profiter de notre temps.
Ferry eas welcoming and outstanding. Great place located in a central location. Clean, comfortable, peaceful. We realllly enjoyed everything about it!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Malou was amazing! The place was clean and close to the center of everything. It was easily accessible and the perfect place for anyone who wants to be immersed in the city.
Nice place to stay
Schöne Wohnung in Top-Lage!!!! Gerne wieder!!!

We've had a lovely stay at Sjoerd and Nanna's place.
The apartment is in a great location, very nicely styled and so light and spacious!
The pictures really don't do it enough justice.
Yet the main attraction must be Sjoerd and Nanna's outstanding hospitality and care.
Thank you for a lovely stay!
Beautiful apartment, peaceful and great location. We had a lovely weekend away and it couldn’t be nicer.

Would come back here at any time! A perfect cosy houseboat, great and spacy terrace with beautiful views, all quiet and idylic, plenty supermarkets and restaurants/bars in walking distance, a warm welcome and immediate assistance when we had questions - just amazing!

Echt een super leuk, schoon en opgeruimd huis met een heerlijke tuin op een top locatie in Amsterdam-Noord aan het water! Diverse speelmogelijkheden zowel binnen als buiten, zo liggen er bv twee bootjes voor de deur en ook de vishengels lagen meteen klaar voor gebruik. En als je wilt ben je met hun fietsen of openbaar vervoer zo in hartje Amsterdam.
En als dat nog niet genoeg reden is om te boeken, de bewoners zijn ook heel vriendelijk en gastvrij. Zo stond er een leuk welkomstpakket voor ons klaar met allerlei Amsterdamse lekkernijen. We hebben echt een top week gehad!

Er war sehr schön dort. Der Pipowagen ist super gemütlich und das Frühstück mit Liebe gemacht. Auch der 25-minütige Fahrradweg nach Amsterdam rein war nicht schlimm, da man durch eine wunderschöne Gegend fährt.
Amazing host! Do not hesitate to book this wonderful appartement!!

What a beautiful experience! This place is a gem.
I loved the houseboat and dock, it was very hard to leave. Everything was spotless, comfortable, and the beautiful plants made it feel like home. Thanks for the luxurious retreat!
Just as advertised. Perry knows what he is doing when hosting. We hope this apartment is available when we next visit Amsterdam.

Wir (3 junge Frauen) haben unseren Aufenthalt in Lisettes Wohnung sehr genossen. Wir wurden herzlich empfangen obwohl wir 15 Minuten Verspätung hatten. Die Wohnung sieht so aus wie auf den Bildern und ist wirklich sehr schön. Lisette hat uns immer sehr schnell Antwort auf unsere Fragen gegeben und der Kontakt mit ihr verlief reibungslos ab. Zum Zentrum gelangt man sehr gut mit den Öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel aber auch zu Fuss erreicht man schnell die Stadt und sieht das malerische Amsterdam. Wir sind Lisette sehr dankbar, dass wir ihre Wohnung benutzen durften und würden sie jederzeit wieder buchen!
Joel's place is excellent, the apartment is beautiful, the area is quiet and safe at night and it's easy to take public transportation. He is an excellent host.
Great host, very nice place, superb location!

We had a very pleasant and confortable experience with my friend staying at Joek's. You can really tell he loves meeting people and make them feel at home. I noticed he even has a guidebook with the history of his area and must see/do in Amsterdam so that was really fun and original to read.
Joek was always very thoughtful and helpful and would definitely love to stay with him once more. He even took me to the airport as there were several strikes when I was in Amsterdam and that's a gesture I will never forget. Thank you Joek!

Beautiful home close to so many little shops and restaurants. Also very close to the Anne Frank house museum which was a plus. Beds were comfortable, which is always something I appreciate while traveling. Overall, great stay in a great home.
Great Location and very stylish accommodation. A great host whom is very accommodating.
Parfait, conforme à la description, appartement très agréable, belle terrasse, calme, propre… Location idéale. Mirjam est très sympathique et réactive, tout s’est très bien passé, je recommande !!
N'hésitez pas cette 1 adresse au top à tout point de vue

Me and my girlfriend were there for two weeks and we really enjoyed our stay. Flat was nicely prepared, clean and well equipped. Location is great - two groceries nearby and center in a distance of 30 mins by walking. Communication with host was accompanied by his friend and everything went smoothly. Recommending for everyone!

Harm's place is in a wonderful area, plenty of good transport and also walking distance to many things. The room has a very nice view and the overall apartment is lovely. The bed is very comfortable. Highly recommended.
Incredibly cool space with large windows and stylish living area very close to Vondelpark, as well as lots of restaurants. Very quick responses. Loved our stay!
Super !

The property has a prime location at the corner of Vondelpark, very convenient for reaching key targets in Amsterdam. It provides the opportunity to stay in a typical Amsterdam house of the 19th century, with a very pleasant „observation“ point over one of the main streets.  It is very well equipped and comfortable for a family of four.

הדירה היתה נהדרת! מיקום מושלם ליד ה- vondelpark ו-6 דק' הליכה מה- Leidsplein. מסעדות וטראם במרחק של כמה מטרים. ובתוך הדירה - כל מה שצריך: נקיה, מרווחת, מיטות נוחות, כלים לארוחות קלות, מכונת נספרסו, מקרר, מגבות, סבון - הכל! מוג'ה מארח מקסים, זמין מאוד, נותן הסברים מפורטים וטיפים מושלמים. בוודאות נחזור עוד פעם להתארח אצלו!

Harika bir konumda, oldukça özenli bir ev.
Moja çok ince ve çözüm odaklı bir ev sahibi.

We had a wonderful time staying at Harm's space during our trip to Amsterdam! It really felt much more spacious than the pictures show (we were pleasantly surprised!), and the view from the room was beautiful and the room felt bright and sunny. You get an entire kitchen and bathroom to yourself, and the rooms feel very private. Just be careful of the stairs as they are very steep, although this was not a problem for us :) Harm was very hospitable and a pleasure to meet, and made himself available through phone.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'appartement de Sinuhe qui est typique d'Amsterdam : des escaliers très raides pour y accéder (voyagez léger si vous le pouvez) et une vue traversante sur les deux cotés du bâtiment (rue d'un coté et cour intérieur de l'autre).
Comme Sinuhe et sa famille y vivent toute l'année, vous vous installerez véritablement au milieu de leurs meubles et de leurs affaires (rangées bien évidemment). Les équipements sont donc tout à fait adaptés et il ne manque rien pour passer confortablement plusieurs jours de manière très agréable. Nous avons particulièrement apprécié la terrasse même avec un temps mitigé.
