Nous avons eu d'excellents contacts avec Sinuhe avant notre arrivée qui nous a donné des conseils notamment pour se garer facilement et organiser notre arrivée avec Samara.
Un conseil pour les lève-tard (dont nous faisons partie) : les rideaux des chambres ne sont pas occultants et la rue peut parfois être un peu bruyante (surtout en cas de passage du couloir aérien de l'aéroport au dessus de la ville). La lumière du matin vous réveillera donc certainement assez rapidement si vous y êtes sensible.
Notre seul regret ? Leur chat était en vacances avec eux...

Located in a typically Amsterdam house (which includes it's typical steep stairs) this place has everything you need for a comfortable stay: one bedroom, small two piece bathroom and kitchen, all located in an amazing central neighbourhood near the canals. But the best part for sure was our host: attentive, thoughtful and very quick to respond to any question, Harm made our staying in this city that much more enjoyable!

Really nice place for big groups, very quiet area . The accommodation has one terrace and a rooftop one very pleasant. Only a minor issue is the fact that there's only one bathroom (with two showers next to each other) Otherwise the apartment has all the key elements needed for a weekend between friends.
A luxurious and large appartment along a peaceful canal, easily walkable to Dam Square and other major sights.

Irene was a very communicative host, which is super important to me. The nocarz was very nice, and the neighbourhood is lovely. It's much quieter than the downtown area, but public transportation is super accessible so it's still easy to get around.
The only issues we had were with the shower, and with check-in. Since Irene uses a third-party to manage the nocarz, we were communicating with another person to be let in, and they ended up being over an hour late. We had to sit on a curb during a really bad heatwave while we waited. At least the person was very apologetic, which helped make up for the wait. As far as the shower, whenever we would flush the toilet, it would back up. This meant the whole nocarz smelt like sewage. Since the place is a historic building, there are no windows that open, meaning we had to just deal with the smell. They were able to send someone out to fix it the next day, but it ended up backing up again later that day. If you book this place, I would recommend messaging immediately about this, and following up if it ever backs up again.

Melvin's place was absolutely perfect. Modern and cosy. Everything you'd need for a short stay and more than enough room for a couple. Definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in Amsterdam since the tram to and from the city central stops right outside his apparetment and with a view- an all round bargain for what you get.
You will constantly be amazed at how gadgety it is and what it can offer to make your stay in Amsterdam pure luxury.
MAJOR PLUS: The Speakers: produced godly sounds
Thanks Melvin!

Harm gentilissimo e disponibilissimo!
Zona tranquilla e sicura.
Per noi perfetto.

Jantine's studio is beautiful. We had a wonderful experience. The neighborhood is lovely, with restaurants and little coffes stores. She was very caring about our arrival and departure. I highly recommend her
Harm’s place is a true Amsterdam experience! He is very helpful and responsive and everything was in order.
Ed is very good host. He explained everything about the city. Highly recommended!
Großartige Lage - man ist schnell in der Altstadt und in ruhigen Parks!

I highly recommend Beca’s place! The location is awesome, the place is very cool and clean. She’s an awesome host, the communication with her is very easy, she recommended us things to do and she’s  very nice
Everything was fine maybe the house should be cleaned more.

Merci à Beca pour son accueil chaleureux !
Beca est une artiste et nous a fait découvrir son milieu !
Je vous remercie encore pour cette expérience à bientôt

Becca was an extraordinary host. She welcomed us warmly and provided us with many facilities. Even when we failed to follow instructions due to listening error, she was very understanding of us. My mom and I really left very grateful.

La actitud, y la hospitalidad de Becca lograron hacernos sentir tan cómodos como en casa, nos abrieron las puertas de su espacio invitándonos a ha sentirlo como nuestro.
La ubicación del lugar es cercana al centro, y tiene conexiones de transporte público muy cercanas.

We had an absolutely wonderful stay. Myrthe and her family were so welcoming and accommodating. The place was clean and felt so homely. The location of the house was perfect. We couldn’t have asked for a better holiday. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone wanting to visit Amsterdam

We have been in Amsterdam many times and this was our best experience. You can’t beat the location (5 minutes away from central) and the lovely quiet neighborhood you’d be staying in. The best of both worlds: you can go and have fun and rest at night without the noise from the street. If you are worried about the ferry: don’t. It never takes more than 5 minutes to cross, sometimes just 1. The room is fantastic, comfy and nicely decorated. The only problem is: you might want to stay and live there!
Absolutely loved the location of Bas’ place! This was such a quiet and peaceful community, loved the local bar “Ons” (sp?). Super clean place and so easily accessible via ferry.
We had a great stay . It’s so easy to get from schiphol airport to Lens place. Len was very helpful. Ideal for a couple who would like to explore the city & beyond.

We had a nice brief stay at Juul's. There is a lot within walking distance, renting bikes made the whole city feel easily accessible, and the airport metro is one block away. Great location to explore from and hosts are quick to reply.
Their place is really cute and in an excellent location! The hosts were super nice and everything went really well!
Len was a very helpful and responsive host! The location is private yet within easy walking distance of the Rijksmuseam and the metro. Patrick was also very friendly!
Affordable place for a short stay

As we wanted to stay close to family living in Amsterdam Noord, this was the perfect location. Room was spacious with fridge and coffee/thee amenities.
It was on the 2nd floor, and we had quite a bit of luggage, but the host was very friendly and helped carry our stuff. Having access to the common kitchen was great for breakfast, only the kitchen supplies could use a little upgrade (eg more cups and chairs, a watercooker)
Overall a great place for our purpose, would definitely stay again!
un studio cosy, bien équipé, moderne et situé dans un quartier calme et proche du centre des restaurants et bars du Pijp. A ne pas manquer

We were from out of the country and not big city people.  Mik and Isabelle gave us clear instructions on how to get their by train and metro which was so easy.  Then their place was off the busy street and super quiet.  We were able to ride their bikes to one fun vegetarian spot and then walk to a super yummy spagetti spot for our dinners.  They loaned us their bikes and we rode to a park for a pic nic and to the heinechein brewery museum then left the bikes locked up out front their and took a boat ride to a very high building where the boys were able to swing on a swing that takes you out over the canal and gives you a bit of a thrill.  I kept my feet firmly on the ground up there.  Mik and Isabelle made the going out and doing so much easier and enjoyable for us.  Our best stay in europe.  Thanks both of you.

L’appartamento è in una buona posizione, molto comoda per raggiungere la zona dei musei o comunque la Metro in pochi minuti.
Manuel è disponibile ed accogliente, ma allo stesso tempo rispetta la privacy. Nel bagno abbiamo trovato tutto quello che può essere necessario e anche di più! Il letto è molto molto comodo e si riposa come re!

A clean, spacious and light apartment, including a good sized shower room, clever compact kitchen area, and a great view for people-watching.  Excellent position. Easy walk to the museum quarter, Concertgebouw and beautiful Vondelpark - for more people-watching, as well as herons and storks - and loads of restaurants and cafes all around (including the best, just downstairs, friendly people and amazing apple pie!)  15 minute tram ride to the old centre/station; get tickets from the driver or the machine just outside the apartment.  It was all as good as we hoped and we had a great stay thank you!

The apartment is wonderful! Very bright and airy. The beds are actually quite comfortable! My only note is that there are quite a bit of stairs in order to get into the apartment, just something to keep in mind if you are bringing lots of luggage or if you have mobility issues. Overall the apartment was GREAT with a perfect location and lovely atmosphere.

We really enjoyed Foppe's place. It is really quite yet close enough to everything so we could explore Amsterdam walking. His place is very comfortable and the little kitchenette allowed us to prepare some food and tea at home. He was very easy to deal with and helped us with parking and other useful information. I would highly recommend staying with him.
Clean, cozy studio. Mik was easy to communicate with and very responsive. Great location and the free bikes got us all around the city. Thank you!

Excellent location.
super nice host!

Foppe's studio is perfect. It is located in the city center, near everything (tram, train station, museums, shops, ...). It's nicely decorated, the bed are confortable and there was enough room for three. Foppe is really kind and convenient with the check-in and check-out. You can go there without hesitation, it's the place the stay in Amsterdam.

This place was exactly what we needed for a 2-night stay in Amsterdam. Although it’s not in the centre of town it’s still a convenient and pleasant walk/ ride to all the main tourist attractions. The studio was neat, clean and private and access was super easy.

It was pleasure experience
True Amsterdam feeling and atmosphere
Casa molto carina ed essenziale. A 15 minuti di tram dal centro di Amsterdam. Posizione comoda in quanto le fermate sono proprio ad un passo da casa.

Hôtes très accueillant ! Nous avons passé un super séjour. L'appartement est très confortable et à proximité de la zone des musées, et dans la rue du marché.
Nous les remercions encore pour ce séjour. L'accueil était parfait.
Our stay was great! Rick was very welcoming!
The owner is very kind and gives you all the necessary informations about Amsterdam.
The room is quite close to the city and it is really comfortable. The host responds quickly to the message which is a good point if you need anything. The check-in and the check-out were easy.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Manuel. Le logement est conforme à la description, bien placé et très confortable. Manuel donne de nombreux conseils et nous a accueilli chaleureusement. Nous recommandons sans hésiter.

We enjoyed our stay at Nicole's home. It is modern while still feeling cozy. Her home is located in a great neighborhood, with a nearby train station, restaurants, and a couple grocery stores.
Nicole also worked with us when we had a last minute change to our itinerary, and her communication was always quick. Nicole's home is definitely going in our favorites folder!
Tutto bene

Great location, lovely host, neighbors are very friendly and nice walk from everything we wanted to do, quirky apartment easily fit three people.
Thanks again Suzanne!

We had a very pleasant stay in the 'Pipokar'! The wagon was perfect in size for our 4-person family. Great with the loan of bikes. The bathroom was spacious and really nearby.  The breakfast was world-class!

The place is nearby a farm market and also near foodhallen for only less than 5 minutes walk. The king size bed is really comfortable. The place is clean and bright. Johan replied message promptly and early check in was available, which helped me a lot. It’s a very cozy place to relax and feel at home in Amsterdam. Highly recommend!

An absolutely stellar performance from a host....
We came to Amsterdam in some beautiful autumnal weather for my partners birthday and it was made so special by Lisette and this beautiful apartment. On welcome we had a special birthday surprise, and the apartment looked just as lovely as in the pictures. It was an easy place to find ( instructions given were very clear) and central to anywhere you might want to visit. We did a lot of walking through the city although if you don’t want to tire your feet the metro is only a 2-3 min walk from the apartment.. this is a very comfortable and relaxing space with anything you might need on hand.. the rooftop terrace is a lovely added extra and I imagine it would be great in the summer! I’d recommend this apartment to anyone 😊

The location is good. Ten katemarkt is just at downstairs and opens from 9am to 6pm. It's easy to get something to eat there. Two minutes walk to Foodhallen. I love the neighborhood, it's a good place to experience the local vibe in Amsterdam.
You can take tram 13 and tram 17 to the central station if you plan a one-day trip to other cities. No need to transfer, which is great.
This is a very cozy place, Johan has a good taste in house decorating, which made me feel like home.

Small but very well located room in the center of Amsterdam, we were able to visit everything by foot from the apartment. Rebecca also suggested us a few very good adresses to eat and drink nearby. It's a good place to stay a few nights in the city

Our group of 3 stayed at Gautier's place for a weekend. The place was close to everywhere we needed to be and Gautier was extremely accommodating. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting a hassle free trip!

Barak was really helpful, was available for any question always.
The apartment fit our needs and was clean and nice.

We can really recommend this appartment! We stayed here for 5 days, and found the location perfect for exploring Amsterdam. Close to everything, but still in a calm and nice area. The appartment was also nice and clean. The host was helpfull. We would stay here again :)

Séjour au top chez Jennita !
Jennita est une hôte très sympathique avec sa famille :)
Le logement est vraiment calme, reposant avec tout ce dont on a besoin pour se détendre grâce à son jardin.
Bon rapport qualité/prix
Je recommande totalement !
À proximité de station de bus & du quartier De Jordaan !
Muchas gracias Jennita ! :)

My daughter moved to Amsterdam tu study, so we were visiting and found this fabulous property.
The size and distribution is perfect.
Towels and linens are first class.
The neighborhood is wonderful.
It is on the ground floor, which is a blessing, you don't want to go upstairs with luggage in a Dutch staircase.
Isabel and Olivier were very nice hosts.
I am definitely coming back on every visit to my daughter

Eleonora was incredibly sweet and welcoming from the start! She showed us around the apartment and explained everything in detail. The apartment was beautifully decorated and had everything we needed. Its location was perfect, with easy access to the tram and public transportation. We loved exploring the nearby shops and restaurants. Eleonora was a fantastic host who made us feel right at home. We can't wait to return in the future!
Wunderschöne, gut gelegene Wohnung, sauber, schnelle Antworten, sehr freundlich.
Maarten was an excellent host, extremely accommodating and anyone who has a spaceman helmet tv as an ornament is alright by me.
Very friendly host and a lovely apartment. Nice location and great communication from the host. Would definitely love to come and stay here again! 💙

Perfect location, all attractions nearby, a local market and supermarket just around the corner (so you can buy delicious food for breakfast and dinners). Great cafe selection around.
Amazing host, we had my mom coming without knowing much English, but they were totally fine there and warmly welcomed.
Apartment is not big, but looks exactly as on the pics. So for 2-3 people will be comfortable.

15 out of 10!!! Chris made our stay so easy and convenient. Everything, from allowing early check-in and late check-out (we were fortunate there was a vacant day), to checking in with us to inquire whether we needed anything, to providing great recommendations and directions, Chris was very responsive. His home provided everything we could need for our 4 day stay. Comfortable King size bed, wonderful modern bathroom with tub and shower, fully equipped kitchen with a really cool faucet that provides instant boiling water for tea. The location was walking distance to many of the sights. We would not hesitate to stay at Chris’s home again if we are lucky enough.
We had a great weekend and recommend the boat highly! The kids loved it too :) Thanks Marcel.
perfect

Et rigtig dejligt sted. Meget roligt og trygt område. Meget nemt med offentlig transport til centrum.
Marcel var meget venlig og god til at komme med tips og ideer

Karoll's home is very charming and modern. Clean, neat and spacious enough for a family of four. The area is extremely walkable, with excellent transportation access and many excellent restaurants and shops. Central Amsterdam is a short tram or metro ride away. We highly recommend this listing.

Michelle and Victor were gracious hosts as they were super communicative every step of the way and provided us with a flurry of travel suggestions to make the most of our time in Amsterdam (there's even a brochure rack in the room). The room itself is clean, nicely appointed, within walking distance of a tram that gets you into Centraal Station in 15/20 min, and comes with all of the amenities one might seek in a wonderful home base. They were especially sweet to load the fridge with refreshments and snacks which cemented their knack for hospitality.

We stayed at Anouk's place for 2 nights while in Amsterdam and had a wonderful time. Anouk communicates very quickly and is available for questions. Her place is about 5-7 minute walk to the metro, close to nice restaurants and bars, and about 5 minutes from a place to rent bikes which is what we needed.
The place is clean and the cats are nice and cause no trouble. I recommend staying here.

O studio da Michelle e do Victor é muito limpo, privado e confortável. Apesar de ficar fora do centro da cidade, é muito fácil chegar lá (menos de 15 min de tram/elétrico). Para quem procura uma experiência mais autêntica de Amsterdão, é fantástico poder ver um pouco do dia-a-dia dos locais.
A comunicação com eles foi sempre fácil e rápida. Eles foram muito amáveis ao receber-nos e ofereceram snacks e brochuras sobre os transportes e atividades na cidade.
Se tiver oportunidade, faça um passeio pelo fantástico bairro deles e visite o Bagels & Beans recomendado pela Michelle (experimente o Cinnamon Raisin + Walnut & Honey creamcheese, é maravilhoso!).
Recomendamos plenamente este alojamento!
She was a great host and a lovely little place to stay!

Janine and me really enjoyed our stay at Michelle's and Victor's place. It was very cozy and clean. They had everything we needed. Victor was very friendly and gave us some good tips where to go in Amsterdam and he made it possible to check-in earlier, which was super nice. The room even has a fridge and you have the opportunity to make tea or coffee. We definitely would recommend this apartment and would come back. ;)
Janine & Johanna

I enjoyed every day of my stay in the apartment. The apartment was clean, comfortable and very nice. Even when it was rainy days and decided not to go outside, it was absolutely ok staying at place drinking coffee and reading books. The apartment is located in De Pijp borough with many nice restaurants around. Michiel is very supportive and is one of the best nocarz hosts I ever met. Does his best to ensure that his guests feel themselves comfortable.  Will return for sure next time I am in Amsterdam.
Wonderful hosts . Wine , beer and breakfast provided. Very good location .  Would book this place again!
Thank you both for the nice and uncomplicated stay! We will be happy to come back, the location is simply perfect.
We had a great time in the apartment. It was well furnished and clean and we had everything we needed. We get even space for our bikes in  the hall.
Great location! Quiet area, many shops and food.
Michelle è stata una Host premurosa e disponibile . La casa corrispondeva alle aspettative . Carina , essenziale , ordinata e in posizione comoda per raggiungere in centro in biccicletta

Thank you very much Katrina for your warm welcoming and your good energy!
The chamber was very comfortable and calm with a copious breakfast.
We had good moments at your Island and we would come back for sure if we plan another Trip in Amsterdam😊

Kristina was a wonderful host! She was very friendly, kind, and helpful. The space is a great size, clean, and is very conveniently located. Definitely would not mind staying here again! She also provided lots of different guides and maps that were helpful to look through.

Kristina is a wonderful host! She even lent us her 3 bikes!
One of the best features : it only takes 15 min (walking to station + metro) to reach Centraal Station.
Thank you very much for everything!
Lolla, Maïmouna, Nevena

We thoroughly enjoyed our houseboat stay. The location was convenient with nearby tram stops and very central to many sights. It was clean and quiet which we really appreciated. This will be our go-to place when we come to Amsterdam. Thank you Mary Ann for your hospitality.
Nice stylish place, close to the city centre. Jeffrey was friendly and quick in communication
Had a really nice stay at Jeffrey's! Perfect location and thought-out details. Very comfortable beds!
Great location, comfortable place, relaxed and fun. Jeff was very easy to communicate with - quick to respond and informative. We would stay there again for sure!

Grande maison typique, tout confort.bien équipée, on s y sent très bien.facile d accès avec le tram.Jelte est soucieuse de notre confort.un très beau séjour, avec le soleil donc on a apprécié la terrasse...top

Great location and a beautiful boat. a bit cramped as one would expect fom any boat but the roof deck and overall experience were worth it. we had one night where the other guests came home late and made a lot of noise putting their bikes away but otherwise no complaints. Oh, and the shower has a frosted glass window to the living area so make sure you're staying with people who are ok with that!

The houseboat was lovely, a positively quirky experience, the location is absolutely fantastic and a wonderful spot to people watch and see the canal boats going past. Bente was very lovely and on hand, if we needed anything.
We had a really wonderful stay. Amsterdam I will be back.

Super fun place, excellent host, and a great location, just wished it had a sink in the bathroom with an outlet and a blow dryer. After a long international flight it would have been great to have a more comfortable/usable bathroom space. Aside from that, the place was so fun to stay in for a few nights. Our kids loved it!

Emplacement parfait! Les hôtes très aimables, discrets et serviables
Merci! On a passé un bon séjour!

None of the pictures were representative as far as what they had place was actually looked like. He blamed it on being a boat. He should have better pictures to alert. People have never been on a canal boat.
Renter beware, not what you think. We stay at the hotel across the street. I saw a couple people climbing on the boat just because they’re looking for views and luckily, we’re not staying there.
Tjakko’s place is great. Trendy, clean studio in the heart of Amsterdam. I would stay here again.
Would highly recommend this stylish and comfortable apartment. Tjakko is a great guy and very keen to help and make your stay very special!
Great location and somewhere different to stay was lovely! Close to everything and really easy to find. Really clean and comfortable could have stayed longer!

The location is great, the flat is perfect, everything you would need for your stay.
The owner is cool person , highly recommending !

This is an excellent place. Ben is a perfect host.Good communucation & timely response. Apartment as described. Spacious, well appointed, very comfortable, and the location is outstanding.
Will stay here again for sure.
Barry
Los Angeles, California
May 2017
Thank you so much for everything, we had an amazing time :)
Great time

The accommodation is in a side street and is nevertheless very centrally located and it is still very quiet. It is in short walking distance everywhere in the Hotspots of Amsterdams Life.
The check-in was very well done. Joannekke and her neighbor are two very nice people.

Very nice and pieceful place with lovely old painted windows in artdeco-style mix with modern fashion facilities. Situatied in a calm and green oas with the canal across the street. Levi was such a nice person we had cold beer when we arrived on this hot day. Levi was a great host highly recommended. Greetings from Anette and Thord

This place is great.  Very well located, right in middle of the city.  There is a bakery, restaurant, and bike shop right downstairs, and a supermarket at the corner. Highly recommend renting bikes.  The room was very clean, large, and comfy.  Tjakko was a great host and responded to all questions quickly.

Awesome experience of staying! The apartment is quite, clean and safe. The facilities looks very new. The owner Joanneke is super friendly and helpful. The location is super convenient which is 10 mins walking distance apart from the Amsterdam Centraal Station. The main shopping street is just next to the apartment.

A perfect place for our family to stay in the heart of Amsterdam. Joanneke was a welcoming host and went out of her way to find a travel  crib for our baby. The apartment is cozy and comfortable, with an ideal location for access to Amsterdam Central and for exploring the city. The kitchen cupboard was a clever way to have space for preparing breakfast and take away dinners. We hope to return and stay here, we had such a wonderful visit! Highly recommend.

Excellent stay at Levi’s as we were passing through Amsterdam. Super cute and quiet neighborhood near Schiphol and the Vondelpark, and we used the included bikes to explore more of our favorite city. Bed was comfortable and we had everything we needed. Thanks!

Levi is a super warm and generous host who greeted me personally, who walked me through the space and showed me how the bikes worked. Really enjoyed the stay in this quiet cozy studio right across from the beautiful canal.
The house is well located and an exquisite example of a canal house. The hosts were generous in how they had set it up for us.

Clean and nice room at a great location.
Joanneke was super responsive and helpful as well.

Joanneke’s place was wonderful. It was in a great location close to parking garage, transit, shops, activities, restaurants etc. The apartment was spacious and quiet despite it’s central location. Joanneke was friendly, responsive and welcomed us in person for check in. Some highlights were the beautiful patio, high ceilings and excellent water pressure in the shower. The kitchenette was also a nice feature, allowing us to keep some wine, snacks and make coffee or tea in the mornings. We would absolutely stay here again!

Beautiful and luxurious apartment with three floors including the roof terrace, from which you have an amazing view of the Amsterdam city skyline.
The neighbours' roof terraces are right next to the own roof terrace. Unlike in the pictures, there is no railing cover so privacy could be improved. For rainy days there is a small roofed balcony.
It is 5min walking to the grocery shop and 12min by tram to the city center.
The apartment was very clean and tidy, although there could have been more room for clothing storage.
Appart à la cool, bien calme, proche d’Oosterpark et quelques arrêts de tram du centre, je recommande.

Richard's place is just renovated, clean and practical. It's located in a quiet neighbourhood but you can reach the city center very easily by tram. Richard is also very friendly host and easy to communicate with!

L’appartement de Levi est super top ! Il est super serviable, à l’écoute et disponible. Il a même changé un vélo pour qu’il soit plus neuf et les deux vélos sont inclus dans le prix de la location. On a pu y déposer les valises avant le check in et les récupérer également plus tard que le check out. L’appartement est tel que décrit, le long d’un canal, zone calme qui fait du bien et bien desservie par les trams pour aller dans le centre et aéroport.
Rapport qualité prix parfait. Bonne literie. Avec une belle bouteille de vin pour notre arrivée.
Je recommande à 1000% !
Levi was helpful and at the flat when we arrived, nice location with the trams about 5 minutes away to get to the town centre. There are also 2 bicycles to get around on.

It was only a few days at Richard's house, but definatelly worth it. Good coummunication by tram to city centre, big, clear room and a very kind host. We had a really nice stay there and we reccomend it to everyone.

The room was not suitable for a business trip,
There was no wardrobe or clothes closet but only a clothes hanger. There was no separating bathroom door from the rest of the room. They didn't have a clean set of towels, just a bath towel. when I asked they gave me.
There was no coffee machine as mentioned, only a dirty water kettle.
The windows/shutters are old and leak a lot of heat.
It had no shutters or blinds, just some decorative shades that covered 3/4 of the windows.
There was no autonomous heating air conditioning, so on the 2nd day of my stay, when the temperature dropped sharply, I asked for the radiator to be turned on. However, the radiator started working on the 3rd and last day of my stay due to a breakdown, as the host explained to me.
Margret is a great host and human being. The place is excellent, well positioned in the city and very quiet!
Great place! Very convenient location. It was everything we wanted for the short trip.
Nice room and nice people

Michelle’s place was fantastic. The apartment (and many amenities) were exactly as described and pictured in the listing, and the neighborhood was fun/hip and easily accessible from the tram. More importantly, Michelle was a responsive and communicative host who also happened to be a lot of fun to hang out and chat to in the evenings! Would recommend to anyone looking for a fun, central place to stay in Amsterdam.
Appartement très bien pour le court séjour passé avec ma compagne

It was a lovely room with a king size bed. big windows that lets in lots of light in the room. Basics such as towels, shampoo and body wash were provided. Got a shelf in the fridge to use and could use the pots and pans to cook simple meals. The place was really close to the metro station and a supermarket which was really handy.  Really nice and friendly hosts- would stay again.

Le séjour dans l’appartement de Michelle a été très sympa, situé au bord de quartier Jordaan les accès au tram ou bus sont faciles. Michelle est une personne très ouverte qui aime l’échange et est surtout réactive même en cas de soucis technique.
La localisation permet d’être à bonne distance des quartiers à visiter grâce aux lignes de tram .
Chambre très propre ainsi que salle de bain partagée . À une prochaine …
Michelle’s place is lovely and in a great location, you can get pretty much anywhere within 20 mins. Michelle was welcoming and kind, we fully enjoyed our stay :)
总的来说，还蛮好的！

Shuchen's apartment was great! It was clean and in a perfect and chill location with many cafes, shops, and restaurants. It was walking distance from anything in the center, and was nice and quiet, but close enough to busy streets with great restaurants, coffeeshops, and bars. The rail was very close-by as well, leading you to wherever you need to go in the city. I stayed there on New Years, and it was even a great location to see fireworks from all angles! Thank you Shuchen :)
Greate 😍
非常有特色的船屋, 設備一應俱全, 舒適乾淨有家的感覺. 女主人詳細介紹並提供零食及食物的招待, 讓人感到賓至如歸. 距阿姆斯特丹中央車站走路約25-30分鐘, 但輕軌和公車可達, 交通便利. 附近有超商林立, 若有烹飪需求亦相當方便. 好評的住宿體驗, 如家庭出遊等值得推薦.

Tjakko is a great host, very helpful and gives good recommendations. The place is located in the city centre, has a lot of character, is very clean and the bed is comfortable. The welcoming bubble is a great 🍒 on top!

Tjakko is an incredible host! The appartment is really beautiful, and the bed is particularly confortable. Tjakko includes little attentions all around the appartment: little chocolates, typical dutch waffles, etc. wich was very pleasant. He is also very flexible for the check-in and check-out time.
Tjakko, we would like to thank you sincerely for this incredible stay! Hope to visit again soon...

Jackie is a wonderful and welcoming host. We have everything we needed and had especially enjoyed the cool patio during the hot afternoon. The place is at a very convenient location with tram station and a supermarket within 3 minutes walk.
We would not hesitate to come back here, a highly recommended place. Thanks, Jackie.
Jackie is a very welcoming host. Place is clean and homely. City centre 20 minutes on the tram, perfect location.

Richard ci ha accolto ed è stato super gentile, fornendoci indicazioni.
L’appartamento è perfetto per trascorrere qualche giorno ad Amsterdam, la cucina aveva tutto il necessario per cucinare.
Consigliato!
lovely apartment, great location. would highly recommend

Her ne kadar Tetske ile tanışmasakta güzel karşılandık. Ev keyifli, rahat ve kullanışlı. Dolabındaki yiyecekler ilk gece için kurtarıcımız oldu. Bizi kendi evimizdeymiş gibi hissettirdiği için ayrıca teşekkür ederiz.

Nous avons vraiment apprécié l'accueil, la gentillesse, le sourire et les conseils de Jacquie.
C'était vraiment un séjour agréable.
Le studio correspond bien à ce qui est décrit et l'endroit très agréable et calme à quelques minutes de l'arrêt du tram qui vous emmène en 15 minutes au centre ou à vélo en 30 minutes.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Jackie. Le logement est calme et très bien situé, la station de tram à 2 min à pied permet de rejoindre le centre-ville d'Amsterdam très facilement. Le quartier possède toutes les commodités accessibles à pied (courses, restaurants, boulangerie avec de supers bons produits 😉, magasins de décoration, etc...). La communication avec Jackie à été très fluide et réactive, nous recommandons ce logement et nous reviendrons avec plaisir !

Lisa was a wonderful host! She was very nice and gave us many recommendations for the Amsterdam area, showing us everything on the map. Everything was very clean and problem-free. The center is about a 20-30 min walk but it is a very pleasant walk. We didn't need transportation at all... Highly recommend!

This is one of the best Air BnBs I have ever stayed in. We loved every minute of our stay. The apartment is full of natural light and furnished beautifully - minimalist but super cosy with the pellet stove. It was the perfect base for us to explore the city. The apartment has its own staircase so it's almost totally private, although the noise does travel so you have to be quiet in the kitchen and living room at night.
Jesper, Ellen and Yara were very welcoming and charming - great hosts! Would definitely stay again. Thank you! :)
Sehr sauber, super freundlich und sehr hilfsbereit. Immer wieder gerne :)

We spent a really wonderful three nights at Remke’s house. The house is lovely and light and in a great location; a really nice, quiet neighborhood that is only 15 mins by tram to the centre. We had plenty of space and had everything we needed for our stay; Remke even found a cot and changing mat for my baby which was a huge help! We also enjoyed getting to know, and take care of, the two cats, Timmie and James. Remke was also very quick to respond to my messages. Would highly recommend to anyone wanting to spend time on Amsterdam and stay in a real family home 😊
L'appartement est très agréable et vraiment bien placé. Tres facile de rejoindre le centre et les musées soit à pieds (20 a 30 minutes) soit avec le tram tout près. Je recommande.
Sanne’s place in Amsterdam was perfect for a quick stay! Had everything we needed and was comfortable and safe. Location and communication with the host was great too!

This apartment is such a lovely place, very well decorated, well equiped and clean!! Well situated, we've been in different places by walking just few minutes!! Alexandra was not on place but as she's kind, she booked an agency to gave us keys. We spent a very good time in this beautifull town. I recommend Alexandra's apartment. It was great!!!

Jasper is a friendly host, warm and welcoming introduction and will show you exactly what you need to know about the City. The house is in a great location near to the centre and a 2 minute walk from the tram stop. The house itself has everything you needed we couldn’t of asked for anything more - Overall, it made the perfect holiday home and we were able to enjoy our holiday to the max! I highly recommend this house definitely worth the money.

We enjoyed the novelty of staying on an Amsterdam house boat and loved sitting on the dock overlooking the canal, however one item to note is that this is a lived-in home when not rented out through nocarz and signifcatnly more personal effects and belongings were left in the home than I would have expected for an nocarz rental and which were not reflected in the listing photos.
Patrick's studio was comfortable and  in a great location, within steps from lots of bars and restaurants and transit stops. Highly recommended!
Sanne a été très accueillante, très gentille et très réactive en termes de communication, son logement propre et pratique
Although our stay was short, Patrick provided us with great hospitality and a perfect place to stay. Thanks again!
Specious apartment, good location and Maarten very helpful.

We had great stay at Maarten's apartment. It was in a great location with a lot of shops and bars. A short tram ride to the city centre.
Maarten was a great host. Very easy and fast to communicate with.
Beautiful home in an excellent location! Heidi was a welcoming host and helped us plan out our trip.

דירה במיקום מושלם, בשכונת פייפ. קרוב להמון מסעדות ובתי קפה וליד הפארק, ועם זאת שקט ורגוע.
החדר נקי, נעים, מרווח ומעוצב. המיטה נוחה ומפנקת.
פטריק היה זמין לכל שאלה, השאיר רשימת המלצות בחדר למסעדות, בילויים ומקום להשכרת אופניים.
מומלץ בחום!

Our stay at Patrick and Ilin’s studio was fantastic. The studio was a perfect size for two people. It was very clean and well organized. The location was fantastic. Very close to the older areas of Amsterdam, just a few minutes of walking. There were many great restaurants and bakeries in the area with good recommendations in the binder provided at check in. We really enjoyed Olive and Cookie which was less than a 10 minute walk away and had vegetarian food. We’d recommend getting there before 5 though because they only sell what they make for the day and it’s all delicious. There’s also a market just a few steps away with many good options stretching for several blocks. With the window closed at night in the studio it is very quiet and you don’t notice how close you are to the busier areas. Patrick was very responsive throughout our stay and we felt very welcomed. If we’re in town again we would definitely stay there another time.
Very comfortable and clean studio as described. Great area with loads of restaurants! Enjoyed just strolling around looking at great architecture. Really easy to get to from Schiphol.

Sandra was very helpful prior to our arrival with help on transportation Along with places to eat, bike rental and good shopping areas. The apartment was exactly as the pictures and very homely. There is a great tram service at the end of the road which took us into the centre, so easy to reach and yet peaceful and just far enough away from all the noise. The apartment was spotlessly clean and very well equipped. We would def recommend and 100% like to visit again in the future. Thank you for a lovely stay

Alojamiento estupendo. Bien comunicado y en un barrio con vidilla y tranquilidad.
El anfitrion genial!!!!!

We really enjoyed Our stay. The location was outside of the busy area and felt really safe. The neighbourhood was beautiful and had all you needed near by. We walked to the museums and core areas of Amsterdam each day and that worked great for us. It was about a 30 min walk.
The place was super clean and comfortable.
Communications with the host had a couple issues but nothing that made things not work out with the place. I would recommend.
Ideal stay in Amsterdam; great location, could walk/bike everywhere. Everything was super clean and easy check in. Views are AMAZING of the canals.
Perfect journey, perfect place, perfect host.

Très bon logement à quelques minutes en tram ou métro du centre ville , propriétaires aimables et serviables
Sautez vite sur l occasion !

We really enjoyed our stay at Tahier´s studio. He is a great host, very easy to communicate with, and friendly. Even though we had to make a very last-minute booking, he was able to prepare the studio and helped us with everything we needed. We highly recommend :))

Tahier is a perfect host, he is very helpful, friendly and kind person.
His space, in the center of Amsterdam, is cozy and beautiful and one of the cleanest space I’ve never been so far.
Highly recommended space !!!

Beautiful flat in lovely location.  I would highly recommend this place to any family travelling to Amsterdam. It is an easy commute to city centre and we loved the proximity to Vondelpark while also appreciating the fact that we were out of the tourist hub.  bike rentals are easy and tram stops are super convenient.  great value for a family visit
The location is perfect as it is a short walk away from the major action of the shopping and eating areas. The space is incredibly large and private.
Très bon séjour dans ce mignon chambre/studio. Le quartier jordaan est vraiment idéal et typique.

Wir hatten eine sehr gute Zeit in Amsterdam. Die Lage der Wohnung ist perfekt. Besonders auch für ein kurzes Wochenende. Der Markt, die Cafés, die Geschäfte und Restaurants - alles Fußläufig erreichbar.
Besonders nett fanden wir, dass die beiden uns Ihre Räder zur Verfügung gestellt haben. Das war wirklich super und wir konnten das gesparte Geld für andere schöne Dinge ausgeben. Vielen Dank nochmal. Und wie gesagt, wenn ihr mal nach Köln kommen wollt, meldet euch! Liebe Grüße

A lovely room, located a stone's throw away from the Vondelpark.
The neighbourhood has everything you need and boasts a number of great eateries, including several wonderful breakfast places.
I really enjoyed staying here as it was well connected to the city but also provided a nice and calm resting place after a day of work or sightseeing.
As an extra bonus the building looks out over a canal.
The room is very nice, with a comfy bed, some storage space and a small table for eating or working.
The adjoined private bathroom is also well equipped.
Upon arrival the room was spotless and the host had left a series of reminders and recommendations that were really helpful during my stay.
Jady and Eva were very easy to communicate with and made check-in/out painless.
I would 100% recommend staying here during a visit to Amsterdam.

Great location! Can easily walk to everything. Quiet street that is close to everything you need and all the streets you do want to tour.
Comfortable beds in room and living space. Has space for your luggage/contents. Fast wifi.
There was no soap for bathroom or paper towels when we stayed. Host was aware but same never delivered.
Gute Zentrale Lage,Sehr sauber

Jantje and Peter were very welcoming and the accomodation was great, just as described.
The area was a more quiet suburb of the city which was lovely and relaxing. Amenities nearby were great with supermarkets, subway and trams easily accesible.
Really enjoyed the stay (and the wine)!
Charlie and Keeva were extremely friendly and helpful!

Das Zimmer von Annette liegt praktisch im Zentrum. Alles ist zu Fuss gut erreichbar.
Das Zimmer ist grosszügig und praktisch eingerichtet. Leider war das Zimmer nicht ganz wie gewünscht sauber, so hat auf dem Nachttisch noch ein altes Pflaster vom Vorgänger geklebt und im Badezimmer war der Duschvorhang so dreckig, dass er auch ohne Aufhängung dort gestanden hätte. Zusätzlich war beim Check-in noch etwas nicht ganz klar. Wir kamen um 20:10 Uhr an und mussten noch 30€ für ein zu spätes einchecken bezahlen. Dies war auch kein Problem. Was uns geärgert hat war, dass das Zimmer noch nicht bezugsfähog war, da die Putzleute noch da waren und das Bett noch nicht bezogen war. Unsere Meinung, wenn wir schon 30€ für ein Late Check-in bezahlen müssen, wollen wir auch direkt ins Zimmer und nicht noch auf die Reinigung warten müssen.

This is a great spot to stay in Amsterdam.
Host is really kind and explains me many good places to visit.
Room is clean and warm.
This area is not noisy, and good to stay
Great host, ideal location and reasonably priced. I would recommend this apartment and host to anyone wanting to visit Amsterdam.

À l'exception de la salle de bain qui est très petite mais fonctionnelle, la chambre était très bien et très propre. Il est très bien situé. Annette nous a écrit un mot de bienvenue et nous a laissé une bouteille de vin et des biscuits. L'environnement est calme et les lits sont confortables. J'y retournerais sans hésiter.
Beautiful appartement, the room was perfect for 2, the bed sooo confortable. Very easy access from the center of Amsterdam and very nice host. Highly recommended!

Really it was more than what I expected
It’s was amazing really thanks a lot for everything
Regards

We had a nice stay at Charlie's flat. The bed was very comfortable and the location was great. Charlie was lovely and waited up for us to arrive after our flight was delayed. The highlight was definitely getting to meet his adorable dog, Mr Cash! The only thing to note is that there is a big window in the door to the bedroom and no lock, so if the single room is also in use, the space doesn't feel especially private.

Das Zimmer befindet sich im oberen Teil der Wohnung. Die Terrasse ist schön, vom Zimmer kann man auf die Terrasse blicken. Neben dem Doppelzimmer befindet sich noch ein Einzelzimmer, welches ebenfalls vermietet wird.
Das Bad teilt man sich mit Coco und Keeva und mit dem weiteren Gast (falls einer vor Ort ist).
Nicht weit weg von der Wohnung befindet sich die S-Bahn Station, mit der gelangt man schnell und einfach ins Zentrum. Nur ungefähr 2 Minuten zu Fuß braucht man bis zum Aldi.
Pasamos una estadía increíble! Super recomiendo este alojamiento, la comunicación con el anfitrión fue muy genial y la ubicación excelente también! Sin duda volveríamos!!
nice place nice people
Great experience! Definitely would recommend and come back again! Everything is as described 👍

This place was adorable and looked like the photos. The view is fantastic, a bit of the canal and a bit of people watching. The location was perfect for us as well and walking distance to most major attractions. Kobe and Eva were also very welcoming and provided a lot of helpful information about the city as well as a basket of snacks and drinks. Just be warned that there are steep and narrow stairs both up to and in the apartment and the ceilings are a bit low, which could be an issue for some. We loved it though and would definitely stay again!

Magnifique appartement … excellente situation en plein coeur de jordan et tres calme … tres grand appartement , incroyable deco .. tout le confort possible … on s y sent tres bien .. et les hotes sont super sympas .. pier et evelyne … on y reviendra !!😉

You will love staying at Marieke and Danny's modern house. Its very stylish and really well decorated and a fabulous place to stay for visiting Amsterdam. We could cycle into Vondelpark within 5 minutes of leaving their house. Great hosts and great communication.

Perfekter Aufenthalt in Amsterdam!
Ich hatte einen großartigen Aufenthalt in der Unterkunft von Eva und Kobe. Die Wohnung war sauber, gemütlich und genauso wie beschrieben. Die Lage war ideal, um Amsterdam zu erkunden, und die Kommunikation mit den Gastgebern war immer freundlich, schnell und unkompliziert.
Eva und Kobe waren unglaublich gastfreundlich und haben wirklich dafür gesorgt, dass ich mich willkommen gefühlt habe. Ich kann diese Unterkunft nur wärmstens empfehlen und würde jederzeit wieder hier übernachten!
Vielen Dank für die tolle Erfahrung!

Small but nice apartment in best part of town, directly behind the Albert Cuyp market. Only real downsides are the limited amount of warm water in the shower and the absence of a comfortable sofa, should be there for €140 per night imho.
Great place and a great hostess, we would love to go back next time

The apartment is in a quieter, residential area away from the hustle of the inner city. Excellent transport links or if you like a walk, then takes approx 30-40 mins to get to the centre. Very stylish decor and with enough space to be able to spend some time there. to relax. Susan was a lovely host -  quick on communication and flexible when our plans changed. Great place for a weekend away!
cat hair a little annoying. and Amsterdam is so expensive but the place is fine and as described

L'appartamento è vicino a Oosterpark, nella zona est di Amsterdam, facilmente raggiungibile con la metro. La casa è spaziosa, luminosa, ed ha anche un bel giardino. Abbiamo soggiornato in quattro nell'appartamento di Michel e ci siamo trovati benissimo, non abbiamo avuto nessun problema né per il check-in né per il check-out, né durante il nostro soggiorno. Siamo stati accolti da Vincent, persona simpaticissima e disponibilissima a darci ogni tipo di informazione sull'appartamento e sulla città! Grazie Michel!

Ambiente romantico adattissimo per una coppia .
Veramente lodabile l'ospitalita' di Daba.
Wonderful place and a great host!!

This is a very clean and well located apartment. There are two full private bathrooms, great for two couples and a deciding factor for us. It's only a block to the nearest tram stop and an easy walk to cafes, shops, and attractions.. and the Amstel River! One should be aware that, in typical Amsterdam fashion, the stairs are very steep, though these have good railings and treads. There were very minor issues which were dealt with promptly.
This is a very central location, but quiet and safe, like much of Amsterdam. We had a grand vacation.

Marion and Curtis  were excellent hosts! Marion worked hard on getting us a refund on our OV-chipkaart, transportation card. The neighborhood is peaceful and quiet. I found a small restaurant that had Soto Soup! My favorite and there’s a new bakery with delicious everything. The town is new but in a couple of years this will be the place to be. Hopefully it won’t lose its charm.
appartement très calme avec vue sur canal . Literie et équipement de bonne qualité.

Donny was a great host. I had a 5 hour flight delay, but he made sure I was able to get in despite the late arrival
Good size studio, nice balcony and literally 30-60 secs walk from the metro into centraal!

Dana’s place was picture perfect. It was such an incredibly unique experience. The boat was beautiful and it was exactly as described. Dana was so lovely, she gave us amazing recommendations and we really enjoyed getting to know her. It’s about a 25 minute walk to the main area and red light district. We walked everywhere, we loved the walk into town. It’s very east to get to and you can even walk from Amsterdam Centraal. We will definitely be staying here again when we are back in Amsterdam. Absolutely amazing!
The boat was absolutely adorable and exceeded our expectations. Perfect for a true Dutch experience! Very quiet and private at the end of the dock. Dana was extremely responsible and kind.

We absolutely loved our weekend stay in Miriam and Norbert's apartment.
It was perfect for us ( family of four) , in a great location and an amazing use of space.
They were lovely hosts , always easy and pleasant to communicate with.
I would highly recommend it and look forward to returning!

Stylish apartment with beautiful views over the canal, plus in a central location - very good value for money! All main attractions were a short walk away. Highly recommended for 2 friends (or couples). We had our own sizeable rooms, and although there wasn’t a lounge area, we utilised the main bedroom with canal views, as there was plenty of space. Make sure to check the key pick-up location beforehand - it’s a 15min walk from the apartment.
Great place, great location, and a great value. Joost's place is pretty reflective of the listing, and the pictures are accurate. The location was great, and our stay was extremely comfortable.

We loved staying here. Excellent location. Everything was perfect.
We wished we would have planned more days.

Superb location, very clean and inviting, quiet, cozy beds (the best first nights sleep I’ve ever had in a new bed), thoughtful fruit and wine in our flat... we loved our time here. Would absolutely stay again!
Expect a clean, furnished, homely stay here. It's central to almost everything but doesn't feel too busy outside

If you’re looking for an affordable, 2 bedroom apartment in the city-centre, you’ve come to the right place. Location is excellent, and it’s truly a privilege to stay in a canal apartment. Would stay again!

The place was absolutely beautiful! Joost was easy to coordinate with. Very close distanace to lots of restaurants, bars and city center. Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a quiet, cute place to stay that’s just a few blocks away from the fun!

We really enjoyed Ivana & Martin’s townhouse. It was a perfect base for our exploration of Amsterdam with our two school age sons. Easy walk to the the 17 tram, very comfortable bedrooms, spotless bathrooms and wonderfully equipped kitchen. Ivana and Martin were wonderful hosts. We highly recommend their place for a family or two couples.

Me encanto el lugar en todos los aspectos, la cama deliciosa, la ducha perfecta, la ubicación del lugar excelente para ir a los museos y para tomar tran, y Atanas es una persona muy amable, respetuosa y me dio mucha confianza.
Amazing place and location! This was my first time at Amsterdam using nocarz and I strongly recommend Joost's place to anyone who wants to live like a true "Amsterdammers".

Hello guys, thanks so much for a great stay. The fact that you can walk from the railroad station and restaurants and bars are everywhere. People are friendly… Just an all-around great place to be will stay there again in fact, will be back for the last two days of our trip.

We recently spent 3 days on arrival in Amsterdam and 2 days at the end of our trip. The apartment was perfect for us even though there was no oven or microwave as I didn't intend on preparing any meals when there were restaurants and bar in every direction. The beds were so comfy and everything was spotless. I can't say enough about communication and checkin. I wish every vacation rental operated in this way with the entry code at the door. Thank you so much Mariam and Norbert for the ease and kindness of booking as well as our stay. We would recommend this apparent and would certainly stay there again in the future.
Vicki Jones

Stille og hipt område af Amsterdam, på passende afstand af det alt for turistede centrum. Og alligevel centralt, og med gode restauranter og indkøbsmuligheder lige om hjørnet. Værelset var rent og pænt og funktionelt, og værten høflig og serviceminded. Lidt dyrt i højsæsonen, men det gælder jo alt i Amsterdam. Kan varmt anbefales.
Host disponibile e paziente. L'alloggio come da foto, pulito e funzionale.

Great location, lovely view of the canal and easy to walk everywhere from the flat. The main room is a good size, well furnished and has some attractive period features. The bathroom and kitchen are both well equipped.
Excellent location in the heart of Amsterdam. Clean and modern. However, it’s quite small and the ceilings are quite low.

It was easy to find and parking is not too far. Easy to enter and check in was all good. The place was smaller than expected. The beds are rather small for two grownups. It’s a cute place But more for two adults ( not to tall) and f.e. One child. There is no kitchen although there is a water boiler and coffee maker and milk frosting matching which was perfect! The street and area are good and nice to walk around
Beautiful place, great location
Excellent rapport qualité - prix. Appartement coquet à la périphérie d'Amsterdam très bien desservi par le métro. Très bonne adresse à retenir.

We stayed 4 nights at Atanas´place. The communication was very good receiving a message after the booking and a few days before arrival with useful tips about public transport and parking. The room and the whole flat was very clean.  There is another room for visitors in the same floor, with whom you share the toilet. The hosts live separate but in the same house. The direct neighborhood is quiet, public transport and nice bars and restaurants are in walking distance 5-10 minutes. We highly recommend this place!

It was a very clean and nice appartment in a very cool area around amsterdam centre. Atanas was also very kind and helpful and we met him personally. We had all essentials we needed and also a coffee machine was here, which was very nice in the morning. Everything worked fine so we would definitely recommend this accomodation. Will come again!

This was just about the best stay i ever had with nocarz. The Apartment is perfect for young People as another guest also wrote. In this Apartment you get so much more for your money since we were provided with all kinds of foods and Drinks and even a Motorboat to go into the City with, which imho is the best way. It made the whole Trip really awesome to have such a dedicated Host. I Really hope that many others will have the Chance to Experience such a great time.
This is a great place to stay that is centrally located in de Pijp. Very clean and modern accommodations.

Great place, had everything you need; shower towels fridge coffee and tea, great location! can easily walk or get the metro or tram in to the centre. Jurjen was great and always responded quickly, even letting us leave our luggage while we waited for our flight, would thoroughly recommend!
A very nice place to stay in a peaceful neigherhood!
Spacious, beautiful and clean apartment in a good location. We felt very welcome there and had a good time!

Super logement pour découvrir Amsterdam à 25 minutes du centre à vélo
Je recommande ce logement

We absolutely loved staying here! It was spacious, beautiful, and so comfortable. Everything was within a 30 minute walk, and the location was beautiful and peaceful. Roeland was out of town, but his daughter Charlotte met us and graciously helped us get checked in and gave lovely local tips. They even provided a packet of delicious syrup waffle cookies as a welcome! There was also a small ac unit in the living room area, which was GREAT because the weather was warm. We had a fantastic time here and would highly recommend!
Magnifique appart, bien situé, super terrasse

We spent a weekend at Tirza lovely mini penthouse. The place is bright and clean. We really like the large balcony.
Location is great, close to city center but still very peaceful and quite.
Great place, great location.
Was really good!

Nous avons très bien profité de notre séjour. Le centre, les musées, les restaurants étaient accessibles à pied en marchant un peu ou en tram.
Martin s’est montré très flexibles sur notre heure d’arrivée et a gardé nos bagages pour nous permettre de profiter de la journée le jour de notre départ
Je recommande! Merci
Very good host who made our stay very pleasant and comfortable. Highly recommended to other travelers
Very nice room. Clean and cosy, warm. I was concerned to be on the ground floor but the street is literally so quiet it was a pleasure to sleep there. Decent windows as well. Cool place

Glendon’s place is super comfortable, felt very safe, and was a perfect location for exploring Amsterdam. He had lots of amenities and excellent local recommendations. Would definitely stay here again!

Glendon is a marvelous host, incredibly kind and going beyond the reasonable effort to make sure that I could get there and get in despite a last-minute change due to injury on my part. Thank you, Glendon!
A great host!!
Very nice people, great advice about local bars, restaurants etc. Great location.

Nice place in a great location. Mike and Naara were responsive and accommodating hosts and we very much enjoyed our stay.  No early/late luggage storage available but there are nearby places that you can use to store your luggage if you arrive before check in time.
Great space, location and host. 10/10 would recommend. Would gladly stay again in the future.
Top!!

Die Lage ist Top und das Zimmer ist schön eingerichtet. Der Chek-in(&out) mit der Schlüsselbox hat sehr gut funktioniert. Leider ist beim Duschen fast der ganze Boden im Bad nass und im Studio ist zwar eine Kochplatte, nur leider weder Topf noch eine Pfanne. Also die Küchenaustattung lässt sehr zu wünschen übrig.
Jedoch ist der Deckenventilator an heißen Tagen sehr praktisch.
Alles in allem waren wir recht zufrieden.
Fin leilighet i utkanten av sentrum med flott hage. Hyggelig eier:)
Loved the place, very comfortable and inviting. Amazing location.
Great spot!
Just stay here! Excellent location and wonderful apartment!
A very cosy and beautiful family house that makes you feel right at home.

THIS is where you must stay in Amsterdam! Unique, wonderfully welcoming, comfortable, and accessible. Don’t look elsewhere. Joke and Gerard will help with whatever you need and take you in as their own. Great experience and the creative construction is not to be missed!

Inge's place was fantastic! It was clean, homely and stylish which all made for a lovely trip to Amsterdam.
She was also super quick to respond to any queries we had before and during the visit.
Absolutely perfect host!

Justin's place is nice, and has a lot of nice personal touches. The appartment is confortable and well located (close to tram and us stops). Justin was a caring host who was always reachable. We really appreciated.

The place is very nice.
Quiet neighborhood and good location. Close to lots of touristic spots (by walking) and easy to go everywhere in the city (well served of public transports).
Confortable room.
I would certainly stay there again if I return to Amsterdam.
Awesome cozy place in an great location! Perfect starting point for all the daily adventures exploring the city.
Had a great stay on the boat while in Amsterdam! Location was amazing and enjoyed sitting on the deck during the day and at night. Would stay again!
Very fun way to stay in Amsterdam! If we had needed assistance (which we didn't), host was available on other side of houseboat which was reassuring.  Thank you for the stay!

Another honest to god review for our cool host Evert. Great location with bars, food, shops and a tram station within 50 meters with 7 and 17 that brings you practically everywhere you need to go. There is a full equipped kitchen, bathroom and many more amenities that aren't available in most BnB. Good space even for a family of 4.
Alles was perfect naar wens, heel proper. Helemaal niets te klagen!

Patrick's place was amazing! It was even better than we expected! There is a very nice park nearby and a street market with all the essential Netherland "must eats". The IAmsteram sign and other museums are all walking distance too, but we took the tram often since it's so easy and there are a couple of stops right by his place. The apartment itself is so clean and beautiful. The bed is huge and very comfortable. We couldn't be happier with our stay!
Very interesting, lovely art pieces in the space. Our kids loved the cat. Thanks!
Sehr interessante ausgerwöhnliche Künstlerwohnung. Toller Garten. Netter Gastgeber. Etwas weit weg vom Zentrum aber wir kommen gerne wieder.
Cool apartment, good location, great town
This place has a great location, wonderful hosts, and lots of charm.

We loved this place. Super stylish with everything you need. The kids enjoyed swimming in the stream at the bottom of the garden and there is a nature reserve & city farm perfect for walks, cycling and exploring. The metro was only 10 mins walk away and so easy to get into the very centre of Amsterdam. The bath also had an jacuzzi in, which was an added bonus.

The apartment was lovely, quiet and very well appointed. The neighbourhood was fantastic and you can walk to many great places including a local daily market.  Fantastic local restaurants.  Our fabulous hosts, Patrick and Ilin, took the time to make recommendations and helped us with our baggage.  They also have a binder to guide you.  The stairs are very steep so if you have mobility issues it may not be the place for you but we definitely recommend this apartment.

This is a fantastically-positioned apartment - so close to one of the central canals in Amsterdam, and well-positioned regarding restaurants and coffee shops. It's a really wonderful base from which to do explorations of Amsterdam!

What a lovely little basement bolthole in a perfect location to explore Amsterdam. The place is very compact as you would expect from a basement apartment. Getting inside just made us laugh as we sat on the stairs to unlock the door.
Important to understand is that if like me you are over 182cm (6’0 foot) you will struggle to not hit your head on the beams but you can manage for a short stay.
Jelka was great to communicate with and flexible in terms of checking in or luggage storage options.
And lastly, look out for the cyclists in amsterdam - they come fast from all directions which is really challenging walking the streets. My wife got cleaned up by one of them!
We had the best night ever. Lovely appartment, super market around the corner, nice neighbourhood and a wonderful host! :)
We had a wonderful experience.  The room was as photographed.  Cozy and sweet.

Fantastic location. Could
not have been better.
The apartment is a lovely space at the top of its building with a little terrace which was great! I really enjoyed staying here and Milly was very helpful and friendly, even when we left late!
Great view! Beautiful & specious apartment! Loved our stay there!
Perfect location!!!!

Sandra was awesome! She was so accomodating...she even got me two extra pillows as Im 8 months pregnant and need a bit of support. The place was clean and very very comfortable. We loved staying here! The fireplace is amazing!
Mari’s house is a very typical Dutch stylish house. Neat and clean place. Cozy and comfy
I highly recommend this place
Very nice accommodation. The tram stop is very close and the apartment is very good. The host is very kind and attentive.

L’hôte qui m’a accueilli était Samy.
Très sympathique, qui prend le temps de donner plein de conseils sur les choses à voir et visiter à Amsterdam.
On n’est pas beaucoup resté à l’appart sur notre séjour mais le lit était confortable, la chambre propre ainsi que les communs.
Bonne continuation à Samy et sa famille ☺️

Todo excelente. Muy buena ubicación, limpieza y comodidad del lugar. Adicionalmente destacar la ayuda de samy para recomendarnos que hacer en la zona, restaurantes buenos y económicos, ayudarnos con el tema del transporte y rutas. Hasta hizo unas llamadas para reservarnos una mesa en restaurante.
Todo perfecto
Al irnos nos dio instrucciones muy claras de como tomar el transporte al aeropuerto e incluso nos permitió dejar nuestras maletas en el apartamento mientras recorríamos durante el día para pasar a buscarlas cuando nos fueramos por la tarde. Muy muy amable y buena voluntad. Recomendado

Beca is a really nice and helpful host
The location is close to a tram station that get me to central station in 20 mins
And it’s close to the west part of Amsterdam.
It’s not far to cycle to Rijkmuseum and VondelPark.
Definitely will come back
Thx Beca
Beca was very  nice, friendly and helpful.

Beca is an amazing host and human being. I really enjoyed staying at her place, the room is so quiet and clean, public transport at 3 minutes by walk and since there you can easily reach the downtown or the airport. Definitely, I will recommend her and hope to visit her again in the future
a really awesome guest

I stayed at Bec’s place for a few nights while I was exploring the city. I needed someplace just to crash at night after a busy day of wandering the city and Beca’s place was perfect. She was flexible and helpful with check-in, welcoming and friendly, and her place was comfortable and clean.
Great location as it was away from the business of Amsterdam. Beca was a super nice host and was very accommodating with checking in.

It’s a beautiful home in a really wonderful neighborhood. The city center is about a 15 minute team ride that is easy use and is nearby the home. The canal outside is beautiful and can be seen from all windows. The house is large and modern and easily accommodated our 5 person family. Grocery store is a nearby walk and even shorter bike ride if they were made available. It was clean and all expected amenities were provided...sheets, pillows, towels etc.

The house is beautiful, with a super landscape.
It was a pleasure to stay at Anya's house

Je recommande l’appartement d’Astrid.
Très bien situé, fonctionnel et joli à la fois.

We were kindly met on arrival and shown to the lovely apartment. Location was great, really near the foodhallen in Oud West and ideal for taking the tram into the centre. The apartment was modern and nicely furnished with very comfortable beds.  Edu came to greet us and communicated well. I would highly recommend this apartment for a family or two couples whom are comfortable with the joint space.
Super Lage....in 10min. im Zentrum und doch ruhig gelegen. PERFEKT für einen Amsterdam Trip.

アムステルダムでボートハウスに泊まりたくて宿泊しました。駅から歩いて10分以内、お部屋はお洒落なダブルベッドとテーブル。シャワーとトイレもとても清潔です。
薔薇やおもてなしも嬉しくて、朝は船上で景色を見ながらコーヒーを飲んだり、とにかくゆっくりできました。
Great place to stay at for visiting Amsterdam. Convenient location, unbeatable value, spacious floor plan, friendly hosts. 10/10

We hebben, met onze kinderen, een fijne paar dagen gehad. Wat voor ons de allergrootste plus was, is het terrein waarop het appartement zich bevindt: de kinderen hebben heerlijk buiten kunnen spelen en de kippetjes eten kunnen geven. We komen graag nog een keer terug.

Mark’s place is really ideal for anyone who wants to visit Amsterdam while also being able to enjoy some calm and peaceful moments by the amstel river! Its distance from the city center offers the perfect opportunity to take nice walks and explore the city and its canals.
We definitely highly recommend the place to anyone visiting Amsterdam!

We highly recommend Mark's place if you are planning a visit to Amsterdam.  The apartment is nice and the view is wonderful.  Plus you are only 15 or 20 minutes by metro to Centraal.  Mark is a great host and was very attentive to us.
Super hospitalité : souplesse dans horaires arrivée et départ. Très arrangeant et accueillant. Je te recommande vivement

The accommodation is clean and comfortable , also pretty good location!
Train station super market and a lots of cafes are close by. Can highly recommend.
We loved staying here! It was perfect for my daughter and me, such a lovely spot. I miss the views from the front windows!

Come descritto dalla sua presentazione, Maarten è un host molto disponibile ma allo stesso tempo ti lascia i tuoi spazi facendoti godere la vacanza al massimo. L’appartamento è molto ordinato e accogliente, letto alto e comodissimo.
La zona permette facili spostamenti a piedi ed è ben attrezzata per spostamenti tramite mezzi (noi abbiamo preso metro, bus e tram).
Il check in e il check out sono molto flessibili, cosi da farti godere a pieno tutto il periodo prenotato.
Consigliatissimo.
N
Clean, quiet and well equipped, Jesses’s room is a perfect place to spend the night in Amsterdam !
Great, quiet location, with plenty of room!
all a plus

Nice townhouse near metro.. Many students all around.
Recommend )
Jesse’s place is really nice and comfy. It is right next to a tram station so it is really easy to get everywhere around the city.
Chambre agréable pour quelques nuits à Amsterdam, cependant la chambre est en sous-sol donc il y a du bruit le matin.

Excellent séjour !
Jesse est très attentionné et très amical.
Son appartement est idéalement connecté au centre-ville.
Et très chouette parc derrière les immeubles !
Nice accommodation, quite close to the center by tram or foot.
Nice, clean and stylish accommodation in a nice and trendy area! We can highly recommend Debby’s place to travellers who want a nice stay in Amsterdam!

This is the perfect studio style nocarz to stay in! Von began communicating with me early with helpful tips to arrive to the location. She greeted us, gave a tour, and answered our questions. The apartment is located in a great area: close to restaurants, attractions, and night life. My  only regret is not being able to stay there longer. Thanks!
Very good

Debby’s place is really cozy. Felt very homely and inviting. Cleverly renovated attic. Small fridge and coffee machine. No cooking facilities but located next to a beautiful food/street market and famous Food Hallen of which we highly recommend. Within 20min walk to all the important Amsterdam sights/attractions. The infamous stairs up to the studio were certainly a challenge with our luggage but we did also pack for a 5 week holiday so wouldn’t be a problem for those travelling lighter. Great proximity to the amazing Vondel Park. Would certainly stay again.

Great place.
Very spacious and clean.
In an amazing neighborhood. You have everything in the block.
Only con is that you are right on the street (ground floor). I loved it because it felt even more special to close the door and be where everything is happening. But at night you might wake up from someone walking by.
Nevertheless, I will definitely choose this place again when I come back.
Von is amazing too

nice little loft, better to go as a couple because there is not much privicy. to take a shower you have to close the curtain to the living room. the flat is very humid .
but we had still a nice time the location is great!!
The apartment is clean, beautifully furnished, conveniently located, and the landlord is very warm and gracious. Amsterdam is an amazing city!
I enjoyed staying here and hope I will have a chance to visit again.

Wir waren übers Wochenende in Amsterdam und haben nach einer Unterkunft gesucht, die gute Anbindungen hat und gut zu erreichen ist. Beides haben wir mit der Unterkunft gefunden.
Die Lage ist gut, Bus und Bahn sind fußläufig zu erreichen und die Unterkunft war sauber.
Amazing room and view, really clean and bright, would definitely recommend!
great apartment
Jeroren’s spot was lovely, looks exactly like the photos and was super homely! great location, v good access to public transport and most central spots are within a 20 min walk
This was a great place in a very central location with access to sights and public transportation. The host was very helpful as well as responsive. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Wunderschönes, liebevoll eingerichtetes nocarz, sehr sauber und mit allem was man braucht.
Das Appartement ist in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße gelegen, mit perfekter Anbindung zu mehreren Tram-Linien und auch zu Fuß sind viele tolle Cafés und Restaurants schnell erreichbar.

We enjoyed our stay very much! The apartment was spacious and clean!
Thank you for hosting us!

Die Lage der Unterkunft ist sehr schön und in der Nähe eines Parks.
Beim Check-In gab es Unklarheiten mit dem Putzteam somit konnten wir erst später einchecken. Sonnst hat es uns gut gefallen.
Great stay, Dabby was a great host and the property was lovely
Erg net en fijn verblijf gehad. De kamer zag eruit zoals op de foto’s en heeft zeker aan de verwachtingen gedaan, meer dan dat zelfs. Leuke buurt om te verblijven.
Wir hatten zu zweit eine wunderbare Übernachtung in diesem tollen Appartment. Sehr zentral und dennoch ruhig gelegen, sehr geschmackvolle und liebevolle Ausstattung. Wir haben es sehr genossen.
o quarto anunciado por Debby é como nas fotos, limpo, organizado, aconchegante e bem localizado. estamos muito satisfeitos.

In the difficult city to find the accommodation, Carolien’s place was just more than I have ever expected.
She welcomed me to one of the room in her beautiful apartment which made me feel like I was in the picture book.
Thank you Carilien again for making the time in Amsterdam memorable!
Très bon hébergement!
Great place!!

Lovely clean place, personally we found it to far out of town for our desired city break. We personally would want to be much closer to the centre to make ease of seeing more and have long options on how late we can stay out with out having to pay for taxi etc
Amazing unit, looks great and is in a perfect location. Easily accessible by tram and Emilia was a great host

A great host and apartment in an even better location. You share a toilet with the host but this is not a big deal as he is hardly home. Communication was fast and smooth and made our trip amazingly simple. Would recommend!
Neat, small place with amazing location!
Altamente consigliato
Amazing place to stay

We had a wonderful week in Amsterdam at Laura’s and Emiel’s!
A few blocks from Vondelpark. Near two tram stops and a quick trip to the canal district, train station, and rijkesmuesum. Or a good walk if you are so inclined. We are walkers. Outside the tourist zone you are in a true Amsterdam neighborhood. We were thrilled at the international restaurant and cafe options within a few blocks. A perfect escape for two thank you.
nous avons passez un bon long we grâce au logement. bon lit, chambre propre et bien aménagée. Accès facile. Nos hôtes étaient réactifs et attentionnés. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
Merci Kris de vous être si bien de mes parents. Ils sont revenus enchantés de leur séjour.

Good location, the room is prepared to get everything done and fast, also really clean. The people nice as I expected for the previous messages that I've got. I recommend definitely to stat with them.
We had great stay in Joshua and Marteen's place. The appartment is not far from the center by bike and pretty close from great parks.
Buen anfitrión, lugar agradable para personas jóvenes. No adecuado para adultos mayores. Tiene todo lo necesario para un viajero. Agradecemos sus servicios.

excelente anfitrión. el alojamiento corresponde de manera precisa con la descripción y el precio. detalles de buen gusto en el lugar.
nos encantó
Todo bien. Excelente ubicación y trato. La conexión a Internet inestable.

What an absolutely beautiful place to stay.  Gijs pulled out all the stops to make his beautiful boat as accommodating and welcoming as possible.  Located not far from public transport and the inner city of Amsterdam, was the ideal place for a romantic getaway for two. Would 100% recommend and I’m sure I’ll be back in the not so distant future.  Excellent stay :)
