Excelente ubicación, es perfecto para un par de noches.

Joshua ist ein toller Gastgeber. Sehr nett und freundlich. Das Zimmer war sehr klein, hatte nicht die ausgeschriebene Ausstattung, war aber okay für uns. Die Lage ist top, man kommt mit Bus und Bahn innerhalb kürzester Zeit überall hin.

Joshua este o gazda prietenoasa si saritoare
Mi a placut mult de el

We had the most amazing stay at Gijs’ place! It was even better than expected – thoughtfully designed to maximise space, cleanliness was pristine, and Gijs even left us some local beers and snacks to try which was very appreciated, such a thoughtful gesture! We felt right at home. Also worth mentioning although it was very cold in Amsterdam, the boat felt perfectly warm at all times. It is a bit of a walk into the ‘main’ part of Amsterdam but the bikes provided are an easy/quicker option of transport. Worth it for the experience of staying on a boat like this in such a beautiful location. Gijs was very communicative and accomodating,  I cannot recommend this nocarz enough. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️  Thanks again Gijs, we hope to come back one day!

One of the best nocarz’s we’ve stayed in! So comfortable and cosy in winter and we really appreciated the extra things like coffee and beers waiting for us when we arrived. The bikes also made it so easy for us to venture into the city when the weather permitted
Clean, beautiful and unique stay. Would definitely recommend. We had a wonderful time, Gijs was always very helpful. We would definitely stay at Gijs again in the future.

Belle chambre, bien placée à l’extérieur d’Amsterdam centre mais très facilement accessible en transports. La chambre est confortable, la salle de bain également bien que partagée.
Seul bémol pour nous, l’insonorisation. Tant au sein de l’appartement même, que dans l’immeuble : on entend
tout. Nous nous sommes retrouvés avec des voisins très bruyants, en pleine soirée disco qui a duré une bonne partie de la nuit.
Pas de chance pour nous !
very responsive and helpful hosts. great place to stay
Amsterdam gehört zu den teureren Städten, ist aber schön und die Menschen sind entspannt. Auch Joris war ein entspannter und freundlicher Gastgeber. Vielen Dank für die schöne Zeit.
Clean, well located and well organised. It felt like coming home.

Flavio's place is in a great location. It is about a 30 minute walk from the train station. Cute neighborhood with picturesque scenery along the way. The bedrooms are roomy. The bed and pillows are super comfy.
Just a note, the stairs up to the bedroom are fairly steep so those with mobility issues take that into consideration.
His back patio is lovely with a couple of big trees in view to watch and listen to the birds.
Flavio is quick to answer questions and is so helpful with anything you might need!
Had a great one night stay in Amsterdam!
Everything was clean and nice!
It's quite a comfortable place with a balcony, and a convenient place near a train station.

Great apartment. Beautiful location.
Spacious , light , warm and gorgeous mornings /evenings spent on the patio.
Crisp, clean linen. Tidy home.. No washing machine but laundromat 2 minute walk around the corner.. grocery, restaurant all amenities 5 minutes away..
Close to all modes of transport or 20 -30 minute walk to all destinations crossing spectacular canals..
Wonderful stay.. would definitely return..
1 tip be prepared for numerous stairs.
Great Host.
Everything was great.
Det er et virkelig hyggeligt sted. Det var nemt at finde og vi havde fået en god guide via nocarz. Marrigje havde gjort lidt ekstra for at vi følte os godt modtaget.
The location is just wonderful - and having the use of bikes made the city easily accessible - we felt like locals!

Très bon emplacement, nous avons fait tout Amsterdam à pied. Arrivée facile grâce à la boîte à clé. Attention la chambre est accessible par des escaliers très pentus et étroits. Chambre très agréable et propre, avec lit confortable et lavabo privé (attention à l’eau qui s’écoule difficilement). Le quartier est bruyant et les rideaux sont non occultants (lumière le matin). Salle de bain partagée petite et pratique. Derya est réactive par messages en cas de besoin. Ravie du logement dans l’ensemble, nous avons passé un super séjour. À refaire, merci !

The room location is perfect for exploring the city centre, due to the location it can be loud at night but we had no trouble sleeping. The room is small, just the bed and sink but we didn’t expect otherwise.

De woonboot is een mooie vondst vlak bij alles in Amsterdam. Het water over en direct in de natuur. Het uitzicht is geweldig. Water, roeiers, vogels. Heel fijn om hier te vertoeven. En bedankt voor de attenties !
A wonderful place: Flowers, water (calming the mind), cat, friendly host.

Dit was mijn tweede keer op de woonboot van Marrigje. Met mijn collega konden we fijn ontspannen na lange dagen werken. En op fietsafstand van werk.
Ruimte van alle gemakken voorzien. We hebben goed geslapen en hadden beide eigen badkamer.
In de achtertuin lopen kippen in een ren en woont een meerkoet-echtpaar. Aan de voorzijde roeiende sportievelingen in de Amstel. De locatie voelt als natuurlijk buitengebied terwijl je op fietsafstand van bruisend Amsterdam bent.
Wij komen graag terug.
Very nice place, well furnitured and cozy. It has convenient transportation nearby with direct bus to city center. Highly reccomand.
Grundsätzlich alles ok, zentral gesteuerte Heizung, nicht entfernte Feuchtigkeit der Fenster; sehr netter Service für Trockner, Waschmaschine u.ä. Fragen

We has a wonderful stay at Suzanne's studio. The location was great, and she was a wonderful host who really thought of all the extra little touches to make the place look great and feel very welcoming. We were able to walk most places we wanted to go, and otherwise, there was great tram access all over the city. Lots of great restaurants nearby too, and Suzanne was very helpful in providing recommendations.
Heel aangenaam verblijf
A house that fully complies with the ad, a host that helps.  It is a peaceful (at january) neighborhood, very close to public transportation.  Perfect for a small vacation.

Great little private spot, great location, only 3 stops from central station, everything you need is there in the flat and if not the flat owner Frank will accommodate you no problem. Very helpful man.
Quick and immediate communication. I would suggest it, very good value for price

Ottima posizione, abbiamo raggiunto molto velocemente il centro di amsterdam. Frank è molto disponibile e ci ha sempre aiutato. L’ alloggio era impeccabile ed era tutto perfetto. Raccomando sicuramente
Nuestra estadía fue muy grata, la habitación super cómoda, lo recomendamos.
Big & comfortable bed in a nice neighborhood. Emil was very friendly and check in and check out were easy. Recommended!
Jan was super attentive to all of our needs and was very friendly. It is in a quiet spot so it isn’t too noisy but it only takes 10 minutes to get into the center.

The room offered by Emil is simply beautiful and comfortable, with no need for any improvement whatsoever. The bed is large and comfortable, the balcony is quiet and peaceful and the cupboard and tables are great too. The location is the only slight drawback, being a 15-20 min journey from the centre, however I believe a person booking the property would already be aware of this. Emil is a gracious and friendly host who made us feel right at home! I would definitely recommend it for people looking for a long term rental or just for relaxation.
Super accueil de la part du propriétaire ! Appartement très propre et bien accessible Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour à Amsterdam :) Merci Emil !
It was a great experience in this comfortable studio. This location has easier access in bus and you can move easily. Jan and Michelle are great hosts.

Mooie ruimte, lekker balkon erbij.
Bed sliep goed en de verduisterende gordijnen waren heeel fijn.
En niet onbelangrijk Emil is een leuke, vriendelijke host. Hij denkt met je mee en zorgt dat je een goed verblijf hebt!

Great place, near of Amsterdam center and also the beach.
Bus and tram near of the house and no to long for going some places in the center
Nos recibió Emil con mucha amabilidad, pudimos lavar y secar la ropa, Emil nos ayudó!! El hospedaje es cómodo lo recomiendo

Justa has a lovely place in a perfect location! The apartment had everything we needed - well stocked kitchen, clean linens, comfy bed and lovely living room with an amazing view over the large canal. Although we were there in winter we still got to enjoy sitting in the sun on the balcony in the quiet courtyard.
Justa was super friendly and gave us great tips for things to do. We would definitely stay there again!

Absolutely nice place, even if not quite an apartment! I think in the description it should be specified that these are rooms occupying an entire floor, but that they are not an apartment with its own key. The rooms are lovely and well furnished. Everything was as specified in Emelie's presentation. The host was very kind with us and gave us extra availability. We communicated with the host through messages (unfortunately, we've never met her), and she was very responsive.
Lovely apartment on the outskirts of Amsterdam with good transport links would definitely recommend!

Willemijn's place was one of the cutest nocarzs we have stayed in. The house is in a pretty little town not far from the center. The house was clean and Willemijn was sweet and charming. We would love to go back some day.

Emelie’s place was perfect for my family vacation in Amsterdam! Our bedroom was big, bright and had a wonderful view of the old town. Really appreciated the 2nd bedroom and bathroom. The washer and dryer came in very useful!
Emelie was wonderful - quick to help out with any questions I had about travel, parking or anything.
Would highly recommend and hope to return soon!

Perfekt für einen Städtetrip! Die Unterkunft ist top und es fehlt wirklich an nichts. Madalina ist eine tolle Gastgeberin und steht einem jederzeit für Rückfragen zur Verfügung. Kann ich nur empfehlen!

Madalina's accommodation is very clean and super cozy. The location was perfect for us. I've never had a more idyllic walk to the metro than here.
The information we received from Madalina in advance (and also during our stay) was great. I have rarely received such well prepared information.
The equipment of the accommodation left nothing to be desired for our needs. Getting in touch with Madalina was uncomplicated at all times, very nice and by no means intrusive. My only regret is that we couldn't stay longer. We will definitely come back and would be happy to recommend this accommodation.
Thanks again for hosting us!

Amazing location, with an amazing host!
Laurens might have been the best host we’ve ever had at an nocarz. He greeted us at the apartment, gave us a quick tour, had a bottle of wine and some local snacks for us, and even had a map of the neighborhood with some suggestions on what to do. After he left he sent us a tour guide with recommendations for things like restaurants. We ended up basically going to every restaurant (with vegetarian options) on his list - they were all fantastic!
We went to Amsterdam with two young kids (5 and 7) and there was so much to do. The food was fantastic, the museum was fun, the boat ride was great, there’s a park right next to Laurens’s place that has a large area for the kids to play (it even has a mini zip line). Amsterdam ended up being really great, and Laurens’s place was perfect - highly recommend!

We were met on arrival by Laurens and were given all the information we required for a comfortable stay and the biscuits, wine and juice was very appreciated. Lauren’s apartment was in an area with easy access to all the attractions of Amsterdam. The apartment was very clean and comfortable and we enjoyed our stay. Thank you Laurens.
Great place, location exactly what I was looking for and Derk was very friendly and easy to contact.

Hele mooie woonboot! Heerlijk weekend gehad. Super goede communicatie, erg gastvrij! Sjoerd en Jason waren makkelijk te bereiken en konden koffers overdag laten staan zodat we nog een extra dagje in Amsterdam hadden. Ook een lekkere ochtendduik kunnen nemen, ondanks het matige weer. Heel erg bedankt!😊😊😊

We had a wonderful time at Udi’s place - very cozy, yet plenty of room for 4 people.  The apartment is remarkably quiet despite being in the middle of a very popular walking district in Amsterdam.  Close to everything, clean, charming, and convenient.  Udi was a responsive, accommodating and friendly host.  Would definitely recommend!
A really good place to stay, if you are looking to get value for your money. It’s clean and have a very good location close to the centrum 👍🏼
Merel est une hôte idéalement. Très réactive et très arrangeante. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour!

Die Unterkunft selbst war makellos. Allerdings wäre es super gewesen vorab zu wissen, dass der Gastgeber selbst in dem Hausboot mit wohnt und man nur einen kleinen Teil zur Verfügung hat. Es war ausreichend, aber das hat das Problem mitgebracht, dass morgens es sehr laut aus der Wohnung war und abends sehr lange oben drüber auch. Sehr sehr schade. Außerdem waren die Flugzeuge morgens sehr laut. Das war auch vorab nicht ersichtlich.
House of Thi Vân was great, amazing view, and great attention from host. You can go without a doubt.
Cooles Hausboot, etwas kleiner als erwartet aber sehr liebevoll eingerichtet!
Great stay
It was Amazing Thank you for Everything

Super logement dans un cadre paisible et conforme à nos attentes.
Excellente communication avec les hôtes ☺️
Nice place, all the facilities we need. A bit darker in the room and limited view to the outside, but nice :).

Great place really close to the metro...
Wonderful sleeping with waves of the river....
You’re going to discover a wonderful house boat, simple and warm with a great location. A lot of ballads and museum visits can be done walking.

Thi was so helpful and always communicated efficiently.
Studio is comfortable, nicely located, right next to Vondelpark. You can also spend some time swinging on your chair, watching the canal.. and the endless people biking & biking : )

Couldn’t recommend this air b&b enough if you’re heading to Amsterdam! Such a perfect location showing the local side of the city with a tram stop nearby taking you straight into the tourist areas. It really felt like luxury staying here we had a great time and the host was so friendly with great replies! Also the place was so well stocked up with everything you might need which was great
Thank you so much for hosting us, we will definitely be back!
Everything in this place was perfect. Great location with close by dining. 10/10 must get

Emplacement exceptionnel de cette belle demeure sur le Keisersgracht. De l'appartement la vue sur le canal est très belle. La chambre est très calme. La literie excellente. Et surtout la décoration et le design font tout le charme du lieu. L'accueil de Matériels est excellent

This place is best for anyone who wishes to stay close to all touristy areas and at the same time live through the actual Amsterdam area.
Their place is stylish, excellently set up and spacious (unlike most other options).
Best of all the hosts are amazing and welcoming.

Fantastic little apartment on the outskirts of town. Very comfortable although the bathroom door is made of glass and you will get to know your partner very well.  Other than that we had a lovely stay and made use of the chrome cast.
Nice location and quiet
el apartamento estaba impecable y tal cual lo descrito.

Everything was very good and we spend wonderful time in that comfortable apartament in peaceful area. Contact with owners was easy. Apartament is clean and the backyard is nice. Quiet place to rest after visiting the city. Perfect connected  with Amsterdam Central Station. We want to came back there certainly. :)
We had a lovely stay! Everything was perfect and we can’t wait to visit again. Great location, charming decor, and all the necessary amenities!

Es war immer ein "nach Hause kommen"; wir (ich und meine Tochter) haben uns jeden Abend darauf gefreut, in einer tollen Atmosphäre den Tag ausklingen zu lassen. Danke für Ihre Hilfe für uns autolosen Chaoten! Von den Nachbarn gab es sogar spontan einen freundschaftlichen Knutscher :D Wir würden sehr gerne wieder kommen. Thank you!

Paul’s place is a great location to explore Amsterdam. It is located in a pretty and peaceful neighborhood. The unit itself is wonderful. It is as attractive as the photos show. Very well decorated and a great use of the space. The rainfall shower is delightful at the end of a long day. There are at least five tram lines right out the front door. If you prefer to walk, you could be at Dam Square in less than a mile. Paul is a responsive and very friendly host. When I had a problem with the coffee machine, operator error on my part, he addressed it within minutes. Don’t hesitate to book this wonderful unit.

Outstanding hosts! Very responsive. The location was one of the coolest neighborhoods in Amsterdam. Paul responded to questions with a friendly tone in real time. He spoke/wrote well in English. The space was trendy, comfortable, and clean. Appreciated perks were provided, such as Nespresso coffee, wine, chargers, and a second set of keys. It was private. We hope to return the hospitality should the couple ever visit where we live.
Very nice location !!!

Es war ein sehr schönes Apartment. Mit viel liebe zum Detail es war alles vorhanden was man gebraucht hat.
Jeder zeit wieder ein Aufenthalt hier!!
Good location
We really liked the room, it was spacious and clean, all we needed

Casper was a terrific host - very responsive and helpful.  His place was a great space and a great location.  Close to the Metro, grocery, shops, restaurants and easy to get to all of the Amsterdam attractions.
Location was amazing. The room was a good size for 3 people. Sharing a bathroom with the host is not ideal, but otherwise the host was very nice and it was a great stay.
Beautiful apartment. Sanne is really lovely and answers all of your question. The apartment is very clean

El alojamiento es super grande. Tiene la desventaja de subir 3 pisos por escaleras muyy empinadas y estrechas. El alojamiento esta super bien equipado. Solo se comparte la entrada con el host. Tiene un gatito muy amoroso! Esta cerca de tranvias, buses y trenes, unos 15 minutos caminando. Tiene dos terrazas super lindas con vistas muy preciosas y buen lugar para descansar.

Lovely place to stay for a weekend in Amsterdam. Barbara and her family were very friendly and welcoming. The private rooms were on the 2nd floor with some lovely balconies.
Unfortunately the weather limited our use of them and it did get quite cold. We still had a great couple nights there as a place to rest between the busy streets of the city.
The place was very nice, Barbara was very helpful and accommodating, and her family was very nice.
Was a great Stay and both Rogier and Nicole were very welcoming!
Apartment with large balcony at top floor. Super clean
Eine wunderschöne und gemütliche Wohnung. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt. Alles war genau so, wie beschrieben.

Amazing place, perfect location.
People who want to live like a real dutch have to choose this appartment
Sehr zu empfehlen. Lieben Dank.

Nice rooftop with a good view of the Westerkerk church bell tower. It was lovely! Sun was very helpful with check in and recommended us a nice place for our first dinner. The place is clean with spacious (for European standard) shower. The big windows helped with the Amsterdam gloomy weather and the complimentary coffee/tea paired well with a relaxing morning out on the rooftop. Even though the place is deep in the Canal Belt, Uber can pickup/drop off most of the time if you don't feel like walking, however, beware of traffic during rush hour. Another note is just like all other Amsterdam houses, this one has a very steep staircase. It's a fair tradeoff for the rooftop view but just make sure you're ready to walk the stairs.

Nice clean place with an amazing balcony. Amenities are well done, however I did have problems with the blinds and the front door can be a little hard to find.
Expect a lot of steep stairs to climb to the room, so if your not great on stairs it’s worth noting.

Everything worked out perfectly. Roy is super friendly. The communication was really easy.
The location of the accommodation ist perfect!

Great location, generally pretty quiet at night despite being near plenty of shops and restaurants. Grocery store just around the block too.
Everyone mentions the classic stairs so we were prepared for them and didn’t have a lot of luggage. It’s well worth the climb; the room is a great space with the outside deck being worth it just for that.

Faiza's home is a fantastic appartement well located in Amsterdam, very close to the city center.
The apartment is clean, bright, well maintained and with an amazing roof top.
Faiza was a great host who welcomed us warmly and Floris was great to arrange the checking / checkout. All in one a perfect nocarz, I was there for a Trade Show, but would definitely like to come back for leisure.

My husband and I stayed at Sun’s place for our honeymoon, and it was perfect! The location was great, we could walk to most everything we wanted to do. The rooftop terrace was the highlight of the place for sure! Only complaint was the stairs, which you are warned about when you book. Just be aware that they are difficult to climb with heavy luggage, but it’s doable! If we ever come back to Amsterdam, I would love to stay here again! :)
Netter Kontakt und super Wohnung in guter Lage.
Très bien
Everything. It was a wonderful experience
Apartamento muy confortable, acogedor y céntrico. Muy atentos y agradables.
Laurens ist ein sehr netter und auch höflicher Gastgeber welcher sich sofort auf Nachrichten reagiert kann ihn nur weiter empfehlen. Check in und out war mehr als leicht.
No complaints, super helpful and friendly host! Smooth sailing.

Great location and great apartment!
The stairs were very steep which did shock me but Laurens assisted us by carrying our bags up the stairs which was great help. The apartment was very clean and had a good view from the top. There was orange juice and Prosecco in the fridge which was great. He also gave us heaps of recommendations of where to eat and a map of how to get into the city. Great stay can’t fault it to anyone
Great place to stay in Amsterdam. Everything we wanted to do was no more than a 30 minute walk away. Most was within 15-20. Clean room and helpful host.

First I will say that the room was very clean and it was in a beautiful setting 3 minutes walk to Anne Frank House.
Now for the real story...
Lars seemed friendly and communicated well with us by text...but we never met him. We dealt with his neighbor/partner, Marcel. Marcel was as rude a person as I've ever met. There are several rooms in this building and Marcel gave us completely incorrect instructions to our room inside the building and then made us feel stupid for his mistake! Then when we came back later, we had a terrible time opening the outside door. It was our silly mistake. We simply turned the key left (like most locks in the U.S.) and it opens to the right. We finally figured it out and Marcel comes down the stairs and said " Is the lock broken or just your brain?" We couldn't believe he was speaking to us that way! Then we looked back at the door incredulously and he said "Staring at it won't make it work better!" We were both dumbfounded!
One more thing... The room is a block from Westerkerk Church. The bells ring every 15 minutes all night long! We didn't sleep a wink all night!
Nice room with good location excellent directions from host to use public transport ect.
Amazing rooftop terrace 🤯

Very uncomplicated check-in process, everything went smooth, good communication with Robert who is a very friendly and attentive host.
The roof terrace has an amazing view on the westerkerk.
La chambre est superbe. Lumineuse et bien située dans Amsterdam! Proche du tram et des commerces.

Super comfy appartement, feet roof terrace, and friendly host! Perfect location right next to local markets.
I warmly recommend.
We had a great stay in a lovely room with a gorgeous roof terrace!! Perfect location and lovely host.
This is a lovely place to stay and in an incredible neighborhood full of good restaurants, beautiful canals, and in the heart of the city. We loved it!
Dobra lokalizacja, czysto, akustyczne mieszkanie i wspólna toaleta na korytarzu

Logement parfaitement situé permettant une visite du centre entièrement a pied tout en ayant un accès facile aux transports en commun.
Décoration très soignée avec toutes les petites attentions bien venues comme l eau et les petits gateaux.
A recommander.

This place is amazing! Beautifully and thoughtfully designed, top notch amenities (in our family's opinion, the quality of each one was really great from the linens to the toiletries to the snacks and drinks, everything!) and really great location. There was a booklet and other guides that give you recommendations on what to eat, do and where to go. The space was just right for the 3 of us that we could comfortably move around and we were even given the option to utilize the outside hallway for our bags which was a plus. It's so convenient too because it's near shops and transportation plus you don't have to worry about carrying your bags up flights of stairs because it's literally on the ground floor. If we are ever in Amsterdam again, will definitely book Ralf and Karin's place as long as it's available.
It was perfect!

Everything was absolutely perfect. Sleeping on a houseboat is a wonderful experience. The hosts where flexible in dealing with our wishes (like checking in earlier) and very caring and warmhearted people. Communication worked perfectly. Thank you for a marvelous time in Amsterdam!

Un appartement impeccable, lumineux, très beau et bien situé à dix minutes de vélo du centre et de toutes les attractions principales (Musée Van Gogh, maison d’Anne Frank...). L’appartement se trouve à côté d’un marché alimentaire dans un quartier calme et agréable. Silvia et son mari son très sympas, disponibles et arrangeants. Merci encore pour ce week-end génial.
Great house in a very nice local neighborhood.  Silvia is a very kind and attentive host.  Would highly recommend to anyone!

On the boat you do not have much space but it is very comfortable and you have everything you need. The location is perfect. It is close to the city center but still very quiet and relaxed.
David is a very helpful and friendly host with good tips for things to do in Amsterdam.
The appartment was amazing! We had a really nice stay!

Myriam and wim were great! They responded and accommodated us greatly. Loveeeeeee it!
Location is close to station! Just be sure if you're using google maps to follow the directions completely even if it seems like you're walking on the street. After arriving to the place, the directions made sense.

Great location
Room needs a little TLC
The communication was very easy and he was very nice and friendly!!! :)

Très bel appartement dans un quartier très sympa à quelques minutes du centre d’Amsterdam !
La communication est très facile avec Freek et Lisa et nous avons adoré leurs recommandations et leurs petites attention !
Je recommande vivement et nous reviendrons avec plaisir

Sebastian and Jan-Geert are exceptional hosts. Their space is gorgeous and the decorative touches, plus the fresh flowers, made it a magical place to stay. It is located above a pub with 40+ beers on tap from the Netherlands and a little cafe that has the best croissants in Amsterdam. The location is wonderful, Sebastian and Jan-Geert are the best hosts you could hope for, and the apartment is gorgeous. It was an unusually warm week in Amsterdam and they went above and beyond to make sure our air conditioner was working properly so we could stay comfortable. The washing machine was a little on the fritz, but they went ahead and did our laundry for us which was such a nice thing for them to do!  If you decide to stay here while in Amsterdam it will help make your trip even better.

Sebastiaan is the best possibe host! The apartment is very well equiped, very clean, full of warmth, Sebastiaan was very helpful, kind, attentif and we had a great time at   his beatiful place. Thank you so much, Sebastian

Sebastiaan was an absolutely fantastic host. Communication was perfect before and throughout the trip and he was so welcoming when we arrived!
We had mentioned we were visiting Amsterdam for our anniversary and there were some very thoughtful touches made to the apartment such as an arrangement of roses, a bottle of bubbly and fresh fruit! The apartment itself is beautifully decorated with extremely stylish decor, perfectly clean, and contains all the amenities you could need! Aside from its beautiful canalside location, it's also very conveniently located to Amsterdam Centraal station and metro and tram stops, but the main attractions in the city are no further than a half hour walk away if you choose to! Winkel 43 and Jordaan market in particular are no more than a 10 minute walk away!
In short we had an absolutely fantastic stay at Sebastiaan's apartment and would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone visiting Amsterdam. We hope to be back soon! Thanks Sebastiaan!

Sebastiaan is a great host who spoiled us with fresh flowers, chocolate and refreshments on arrival and his place is just fantastic, clean, tidy, cozy and central and close to all the attractions. We would love for him to host us  again next time we are in Amsterdam.
Appartement très bien situé, décoré avec charme, tout confort. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'accueil avec le mousseux dans le sceau de glace et les fleurs fraîches.

Ce séjour était très agréable. La péniche était confortable et conforme à la description. David a été réactif, attentif et soucieux de notre bien-être. Je vous recommande ce logement qui est assez proche puisqu’il se situe a proximité du tramway.
David's boot ligt op een prima, rustige locatie dichtbij een tramhalte.
David was a great host! The room was small but comfortable to stay in. The sink and bathroom are inside the room and a fully functioning toilet is next door. Towels and morning coffee were provided.

A very cosy stay. David was very easy to contact and super responsive.
A great location with really accessible tram routes.
Would definitely recommend.

This is a canal house that was built in the 1600’s in Amsterdam
-antique furniture fit the period . The apartment had interesting decor and there is a good view from the main floor window. Since the unit is on the top floor you need to climb stairs to get to the apartment and there’s a narrow staircase to the bedroom upstairs. Sebastiaan was a perfect host and was accessible and responsive. He welcomed us and went the extra mile to provide fresh flowers and champagne. He arranged for a taxi for our ride to the airport. The location was within walking distance to the museums. The neighborhood felt safe and quiet. We enjoyed our stay!

Sebastiaan was a wonderful host, communicative and welcomed us with some champagne! The place is charming and had all that we needed for our trip. We also appreciated the host for having us leave our luggage the next day for late checkout since there was no guest arriving. That allowed us to spend some more time in Amsterdam without worrying about luggage storage. Thank you for the stay!
Great place 👌 cool boat
Nice location, wonderful quiet neighbourhood with good spots near by. The apartment had everything we needed, spacious and confortable. Wim has very thoughtful. Thank you for a nice week!
Really good and comfortable place to stay.

We absolutely loved our stay at Nadine's place. The space is beautiful, scenic, and overall a very special way to enjoy Amsterdam. Although it was a quiet space, it was still very close to central Amsterdam. We would definitely stay again (and wish we had stayed longer!).
Nadine is a kind and professional host. The stay was lovely and bed was super comfy. it was my best stay in Holland

This is the PERFECT place for a couple or 2 friends to stay at to experience the house boat life in Amsterdam. Location was beautiful and close to everything. The place was cozy and the bed was super comfortable. Nadine and Edwin were perfect hosts. We hope to be back!

Nadine (and Edwin) are the very reason nocarz has super host! They're thoughtful, helpful and facilitate an amazing experience. They're some of the most accommodating host I've stayed with. You're not booking a space, you're booking time with friends. These people are amazing!
Tolle Unterkunft in toller Lage! Für uns perfekt :-) danke an Nadine!
Very nice stay in a pleasant setting. Transport is right next to the accommodation. Clean accommodation. I recommend it!
Wat een heerlijke plek. Zonnebaden op het voordek en wakker worden met fluitende vogeltjes. Zo centraal in Amsterdam, maar totale rust. Echt een aanrader!

Nadine and Edwin were really helpful and super prompt. Our planned trip to Amsterdam happened to be the first day of lockdown but still glad we managed to experience this amazing stay! It was comfortable, quiet and still convenient to get around.

Patrick was a great host and whenever we had a question he replied instantly. The location was fabulous and was close to very nice bakeries and nice restaurants. The only problem was not having a toilet in the bedroom, however, a toilet was very close by to the room. Overall, a fabulous place and I would recommend this place to everyone!

Patrick was great! Everything matched the photos and I love that we were given a sink in the room. Sharing a bathroom with other guest only got hard when you came home from a fun night out and really had to use it (lol) and it was already in use. Other than that we were so cozy in the blue room. Would totally stay here for a short stay again. :)

Das Zimmer war schön eingerichtet, es gibt sowohl einen Kühlschrank als auch eine Kaffeemaschine und einen Wasserkocher. Auch der große Kleiderschrank war sehr praktisch. Das Bad war sauber als wir ankamen.
Die Lage ist wie beschrieben, mit der Metro ist man innerhalb von 20-25 Minuten in der Innenstadt von Amsterdam. Alles in allem war dies ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt & was Amsterdam angeht auch nicht so teuer. :)
This place is very convenient when visiting Amsterdam. It is very easy to get to the metro station and to be in central Amsterdam.

The room was very clean and cute. Very comfortable bed with the TV facing it, which is great after the whole day of walking and exploring. The location was very close to the main sightseeing and if not there is a tram station 2 min. Of walking away. There is also a supermarket nearby which works till 10 PM which is also very convenient.
I recommend staying here to anyone who wants to explore Amsterdam comfortably :)
Thanks to Simon for always keeping in touch and recommending places to visit in town!

Too expensive for such a small space and with 30mins to central Amsterdam. Didn't feel that safe the first night, not knowing what kind of neighbours we had. But nice surroundings, quiet neighbourhood. Got disturbed by the other people renting in the same place. They got in late at night one night, washing dishes in the shower room after 10pm. Some got in at 4am one night. But quiet the rest of the time. The room felt damp on the floor. Comfy beds. But we tried to spend as little time there as possible.

Vyborna cen, kusok od  metra (cca 5 min.), ktorym sa da dostať do centra. Malá útulná izbička, čistá, prichystané uteráky, wc a kúpeľňa praktické, voňavé a čisté. Dalo sa zaparkovať za domom, čo je perfekné. Kúsok boli potraviny (od 8:00 do 22:00). Určite odporúčam, pre nenáročných turistov, ktorý nepotrebujú extra služby. Možno by bolo super, keby pribudla možnosť prístupu do kuchyne uvariť si večeru. Inak na prespanie, hlavne keď je človek väčšinu času, je to super.

Très mignonne péniche, nous sommes restés une nuit et c’était parfait !
Pour ceux qui hésitent : le bateau ne tangue pas du tout! ;)
The house is perfect, well located, and way big enough for six adults. Everything went well. John was available even though he was in vacations. I recommand!
Enrico was very friendly and welcoming, perfect central location and lovely and clean room and pretty apartment. Exactly what we were looking for!

If you want an experience on a houseboat, this is a great spot!! The location was a little removed from the main busy part of Amsterdam, which was perfect! We could walk to the action, but not need to hear it at night. The area has a neighbourhood feel which was lovely too.

Sind sehr zufrieden gewesen.
Gerne noch einmal.:)
Freundlicher Gastgeber und alles sauber 👍🏼
Everything was perfect! Nice quiet location and the bonus drink was so nice!
Excelente ubicación y atención del anfitrión sobre los lugares turísticos, limpieza buena y ambiente muy tranquilo.

Wir waren von Freitag bis Dienstag in Amsterdam und haben uns für Piet‘s Unterkunft entschieden, weil die Lage einfach super war und der Preis vergleichsweise angemessen. Man ist zu Fuß schnell in der Stadt und erreicht öffentliche Verkehrsmittel und Museen fußläufig. Der Vondelpark ist quasi nebenan ebenso wie zahlreiche gute Cafés und Restaurants. Uns wurden zwei Fahrräder zur Verfügung gestellt und es gab zahlreiche Tipps für Ausflüge und Foodspots (großes Dankeschön an René - De Luwte war großartig!). Man hat gemerkt, dass die Nachbarschaft dort sehr eng miteinander ist und wir durften sozusagen ein Teil davon sein, was den ganzen Aufenthalt sehr viel „familiärer“ wirken lies. Das Appartement an sich ist etwas hellhöriger, grundsätzlich war das aber nicht weiter störend. Uns hat es insgesamt sehr gut gefallen und wir freuen uns auf unseren nächsten Amsterdam-Besuch :-)

Was a great location in a quite alley with private entrance. Easily walkable to city center, local parks, restaurants and shops. The host was very helpful offering a bike for transport, local recommendations and great communication. Looking forward to staying here when I return.
It was worth it, excellent location, Lucio was attentive. I recommend!

Great place, super host. Rene was attentive and welcoming. He had great suggestions for local eats (try Cabrón). The apartment is recently renovated, clean, and modern. Very comfortable. Location is very convenient to trams 3 and 4 which will connect you to the rest of the city. Close to the river Amstel which makes for very nice long walks, runs, or bike trips south.

Exceptional on all levels - would give more stars, if possible.  Room had everything a traveler could need and more, while being stylish, spotlessly clean, and comfortable - very cozy bed!  The bath robes were a nice touch as well.  Simon has hospitality experience and it shows in all the best ways - he was responsive, helpful, kind, and offered thoughtful tips about the city.  Location is perfectly central with trams a few steps away and major museums and restaurants within walking distance.  Overall a wonderful stay and would certainly book again on my next visit to Amsterdam!

A great place, tram right on the square to the station, great room and bathroom and separate toilet. Great communication from the host and wasy to find. Only downside was the noise from bars at night, kept us up.

Check in and out was quick and easy once we connected with Carla.
Detailed notes at check in were very helpful.

Thank Adriano for allowing us to stay at your place over the Holidays. We had an amazing time. Thank you for communicating with us regularly before and during our stay. The location made it easy for us to walk around and experience Amsterdam like a local. The house was comfortable and the amenities made it feel like a home away from home. The bottle of wine you left for us along with the other welcome information was appreciated. Thanks again.

Was thrilled to stay at Simon’s place again during my recent visit to Amsterdam. I know that I can always expect a clean and comfortable room in the heart of the city within walking distance of great restaurants, shopping, and museums.
Will happily stay at Simon’s place again for future visits - thanks for being a great host!
We loved the location and the access to everything. The neighborhood is calm and quiet in the evening.

Excellent location, walking distance to everything. Nice and clean place perfect for 2-4 guests. Lovely large balcony. Pierre met us and gave us so many amazing recommendations. Will definitely stay here we we visit again
I absolutely loved my stay! The boat is one of a kind, cozy, and lovingly decorated. I loved the gentle rocking at night. I was right in the center of town and walked everywhere I wanted to go.
Had a great stay, very quiet area. Very welcoming and nice hosts.

El apartamento esta en excelentes condiciones, mejor que en las fotos. Muy limpio y ordenado.
Se encuentra en un barrio residencial bien ubicado, aunque queda hacia la periferia, muy fácil acceso hacia el centro de la ciudad, tanto caminando como en bicicleta.
Lo que haría notar seria el dormitorio, el cual no se aprecia en las imágenes, es muy pequeño, no queda espacio hacia los bordes de la cama, por lo qué hay que saltar para entrar en ella, ademas de un colchón demasiado blando.
Aparte de eso excelente apartamento, Aleta muy hospitalaria y atenta.
Recomiendo totalmente este lugar.
Just lovely :) xx

We had a wonderful time staying at Nikki's place. You can tell that the space is well loved and taken care of. The bed was so comfortable, which is important for us.  The kitchen is well stocked and she's very hospitable. We'd happily stay here again!

We hebben een heel aangenaam verblijf gehad en Hans is een heel erg fijne gastheer die zich helemaal inzet om jouw verblijf zo goed mogelijk te laten verlopen. Het bed was trouwens ook heel goed, gezien ik rugproblemen heb is dit een echte meerwaarde.

Raffaele's place was really good,
Perfect location, the flat was comfy
For 4 adults, the host was helpful and very communicative.
Definitely recommended!
Hans' place is in an amazing location. You're close to it all. Hans is a lively and interesting host, and his place comes with great amenities, like food, discounts, and free bikes!!

This was one of the best nocarz experiences I’ve ever had.  Everything was great, five stars!  Hans is friendly and humble, he makes sure the guests feel easy and comfortable.  The location and bikes make my stay so much better.
Molto carino l appartamento ma un po' sguarnito per pratiche comodità.. Appendiabiti, posti d appoggio, cuscini
Small apartment in the hip Jordaan area. Quite spartan, but everything is there. Good wifi. It has as a small outdoor smoking area.
Lenneke’s place was cute, clean, and in an amazing location! Lenneke was always very quick to respond and very friendly. We really enjoyed our stay! Thank you :)
Great location and  getting in/out was very easy

Henry was a great host and was very helpful and quick to reply. The washer/dryer are in an upstairs apartment and were accessible upon request. We were able to leave our luggage in the upstairs apartment after check out as well. The location is amazing, just outside of Centraal Station. It was quiet at night. The room was serviced daily with snacks replenished. Thank you!!
El apartamento es estupendo, tiene todo lo necesario y está muy bien comunicado. Nos ha encantado

You struck gold if you booked this air bnb. It’s in a quieter area, but only a few tram stops from some of the busier neighborhoods of Amsterdam. It’s not far from a square with shops and restaurants as well. There are also two grocery stores nearby. The place is very nice, comfortable, well maintained, and quiet (just what you need when returning from the activities Amsterdam has to offer :-)). The hosts are both VERY responsive and helped with suggestions and logistics. I felt at home the second I walked in and didn’t want to leave. I highly recommend this apartment.

We were truly shocked by Hans’ hospitality and kindness. He was ready every morning to serve us coffee and he had fresh bread every single day. Also, he gave us very helpful information about the city and even offered us vouchers for a canal tour that we really enjoyed. We had a lovely experience!
The view over the Pijip neighbourhood
We had great stay here. Hans is an awesome host who really makes you feel welcome. The room was perfect for our needs and exceeded expectations. Would highly recommend. 😊

Outstanding Host!! The boat was as described, very clean, private, and relaxing. Keep in mind this is an antique boat with narrow steps and the living/ sleeping area is a experience in its self. The boat describes its self and those who care for it... IDEAAL!!  :)
Fun to stay on a house boat. We enjoyed being right on the river. The location was great. Place was spacious and clean. Terrific host
Great flat! Everything you need. Leon is a friendly and helpful guy!
A very spacious, tastfully furnished apartment in a very lively neighbourhood quite close to the center. It‘s the perfect spot to stay.

We had a lovely stay in Amsterdam and absolutely fell in love with the De Pijp neighbourhood. Mark was a fantastic host, pro-active, very responsive and accommodating. We’d absolutely come back for a visit!

We loved staying at Kevin’s flat in the Rivierenbuurt of Amsterdam. Very quiet yet walking distance to cafes, coffee shops and restaurants as well as to the metro.
Tea and coffee available as well as a compact bathroom with a great shower!
Situated on the fourth floor, the views were great!

My husband and I stayed here for our first visit to Amsterdam. It was such a wonderful stay. The bed is extremely comfortable and we were able to get great sleep. The home didn’t smell like fragrance or chemicals which was a relief not to bother our sinuses. We weren’t sure how the kitchen cabinet would work for us, we were pleasantly surprised. It was amazing. We didn’t cook necessarily but we used the stove to heat up soup. We also used the tea kettle loads. Bathroom is beautiful. If you’re tall the toilet closeness to the sink is tight.
Apartment has great lighting, minimal but homey decor, and lovely plants. Located on the top floor and stairs are quite steep. We had many suitcases but managed fine.
Location is great.m and felt safe. We did take the train some being cold and it’s about 10 min away. Loved walking and getting use to our area. Trevi’s Italian food nearby, Coffee district, Nook coffee, De Aanzet food shop etc.
Will be back! Kevin and Chantelle are amazing!

My partner and I came across Kevin’s (and Bianca’s) BnB while looking for a place to stay while vacationing in Amsterdam and that find really made all the difference in our love for this city. It was so nice walking along the canal and seeing the boats (and ducks) every morning. The neighborhood was quiet and felt safe to walk at night. Don’t get me started on the restaurants too haha. Kevin was amazing at communicating and was always there for us if we needed anything. He made checking in/out so smooth, and really take a look at that recommendation section because there are some absolute gems there. Will return to Amsterdam and hopefully to Kevin’s again!
we enjoyed our stay. very comfortable and nicely decorated.
Ottimo soggiorno in una casa tradizionale olandese in una zona residenziale molto bella. Cortesi e disponibili i proprietari.
Ellen’s cute studio was perfect!  Loved how clean everything was! Can’t wait to come back to Amsterdam!
Had a great stay! Would definitely stay again and recommend!!

Had a wonderful stay in this flat! The hosts were very responsive and answered my questions promptly when I had them. They also had a beautiful Christmas tree that I enjoyed over the New Years Eve weekend :) fantastic location near Centraal Station and to all other sites! Would love to come back!!
Another fantastic stay! Amazing location, would highly recommend to everyone.

Great studio with everything you need to feel right at home. The space is well laid out and the attention to detail is apparent. Beautiful and peaceful outdoor deck area for morning coffee, evening dinner or just watching the sunrise/sunset. 10 out of 10 will definitely recommend if your staying in Amsterdam!
You will be right where you want to be at this studio apartment- in the middle of canals, restaurants and museums!   Ellen will help you with any questions!  Enjoy!

The apartment was very comfortable, with a nice position near the center and easy to move also outside the city with public transfer.
Morgan and Brad were alaways available and fast to reply for every our requests. We had a very beautyful holiday of 5 days in Amsterdam and we are grateful for all the hospitality received.
Lovely little studio!

This place was perfect for me during my 3 day stay in Amsterdam. The location is walking distance to pretty much everything and close to a lot of excellent restaurants and shops. Lenneke was a great host who responded to my questions promptly and helped out when she could. The space is on the smaller side but it has everything you need and the appliances/furniture is quality. Lastly, the check-in/check-out process was very easy. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to others.
Excellent home base for a big family group! In a lovely, quiet part of Amsterdam — very easy to take public transport to city center.
Péniche 5* l’endroit est charmant, très propre. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés. C’est idyllique. Merci pour tout
Great host! Easy communication and very nice room. I would not hesitate staying at Peter's place again.

The room is very nice, the area is quiet but it’s easy to reach the city centre (15 mins by tram). The room is  equipped with everything a guest can need, the only fault was the lack of a door dividing the common areas from the guest’s one, which caused a little lacking in privacy, since the host is always home.

Super fijne kamer.
Heel mooi en rustig gelegen aan het water, rustige omgeving en stille buren.
Peter is heel gastvrij, vriendelijk en gemakkelijk te bereiken.
De stad Amsterdam is gemakkelijk te bereiken via een P&R op 5 min. van het huis waar je voor 1€ kan parkeren.
Mooi en zonnig terras en ruime kamer. Er is niet echt de mogelijkheid om zelf wat te koken en afwassen in de lavabo naast de wc. Maar in de buurt kan van alles afgehaald worden.

We totally loved staying at Albert‘s wonderful houseboat and already miss this very special place. It was so comfortable, clean and spacious. The area in which it is located is just perfect for sightseeing trips to the center of Amsterdam. The communication with Albert was also very professional and easy.
We can highly recommend this unique accommodation and really hope to come back one day :)

If you want to experience an authentic Amsterdam stay, then this houseboat is it!
Location is great, communication with Albert was really good!
We definitely loved our stay there!
I would Highly recommend.

hôte très accueillant avec en primes de très bonne adresse dans Amsterdam.
logement très calme et très chaleureux. je recommande très fortement Peter.
au plaisir de se revoir
Aurélien et Cécile

This place is absolutely beautiful and easily accessible with the tram. The bed is big and comfortable, there's a nice balcony and the room had everything we needed.
Peter was a great host. He explained everything and made things easy for us.
I can definitely recommend this place for everyone out there :)
Fantanstic spot and Annette has been super helpful and let us feeling like at home. Totally recommended.
Alloggio come nelle foto, bellissima posizione, centro raggiungibile in 20 minuti di tram
Judith est une hôte très sympathique et disponible. Le logement est très bien situé, merci pour le séjour !

We had a great time at Cornelis flat. It was located very central and you could walk everywhere. Cornelis was extremely friendly and helpful. We would recommend this apartment because it was clean and comfortable.
Es un lugar estupendo, la mejor ubicación, porque está en pleno centro pero igual en las noches es super tranquilo. Muy seguro, buenos atardeceres desde la ventana.
Perfect spot. Smack in the middle of everything. Walk to work, walk to play. Thank you for having me.

Really enjoyed our stay at Marcel's flat - You have the upper three floors of his lovely home to yourself with a fully equipped kitchen and a very comfortable bed. We particularly loved watching the canal from the windows and coffee on the top deck. Thanks Marcel!

Die Unterkunft von Eva ist sehr zu empfehlen. Es ist genau in der Stadtmitte und dazu sehr günstig.
Alles ist reibungslos abgelaufen.
Gruss Sammy
We had a beatiful stay at this studio! very clean, cozy and the bed is super comfortable. We loved it.
Every thing was amazing
Evin konumu çok iyiydi. Sadece tuvalet gerçekten küçük.
Superbe appartement, à proximité immédiate du tram et du centre.

The perfect base to explore Amsterdam from. Close to the tram stations making it easy to get around. The apartment is also in a good neighbourhood that feels safe and has lots of great restaurants.
The apartment is very homely and comfortable, though the staircase is steep it is worth it for the feeling of cosiness and the interesting view of the street.
Would definitely stay again!

Ideal location, close enough to get to everything touristy and far enough to get a break from everything too. Tram stops just outside for easy access to many places or you could walk.
Foodhallen is a short walk away and there are lots of parks/nice canals nearby. Big AH 5 min walk away which is a big plus!
The flat is light, airy and very cosy and it’s not too warm or too cold, just right. Overall good value for money.
Monique is friendly and attentive with a good eye for detail. We will definitely be back :-)
Good spot, easily walking distance to town, good tram service right outside if needed, nice and cosy space. Stairs are abit steep with 20kg+ luggage.

Super ked af komme frem til en bolig der var meget beskidt og med pletter snavs og hår flere steder. Decideret råd og kondens i mælkeskummeren på værelset og et vindue der ikke kunne åbnes, så luftcirkulation ikke var en mulighed.

Great place in the city center, but just far enough to be spared the most obvious tourist traps. Wolvenstraat has fancy shops, some restaurants, and a nice cafe open late. More importantly, it’s an easy walk to anywhere.
The room is nice, and was nicely furnished. Noise is not a problem, despite being above shops. One warning: Amsterdam has mosquitoes, so remember to close the windows at dusk, or you’ll be up in the middle of the night swatting them.
Het was boven verwachting... fijne ontvangst, flexibel in afspraken en een mooie schone en ruime kamer!  Daarnaast op een perfecte locatie.. Wij zijn dik tevreden en komen zeker nog een keer terug!
Excellent location, fantastic hosts, great communication. Rare gym in the perfect spot In Amsterdam and the hosts were friendly and accommodating

מיקום הכי מטורף שיכול להיות.
הדירה יחסית נקייה ויש מקום.
אבל - יש משהו כמו 20 מדרגות קטנות שצריך לעלות וזה מאוד מורכב עם מזוודות אבל בסה״כ פעמיים (הלוך + חזור) אז לא נורא.
מנקים פעם אחת (ולא כל יום) ונותנים מגבת וחצי לאורח..
The perfect location!! Mariya was wonderful to work with, the space was clean and quiet. Absolutely no complaints, would definitely stay here again.
Room is cosy and bathroom are clean. Room is litteraly two min from public transport and neighboorhood is very quiet and safe also by night. We were on concert at Ziggo dome and it's 15 min walking.
Max's house is beautiful, she is spacious, very clean, very comfortable, in a very peaceful area and very well located. We had an amazing week's stay. Everything was perfect, I recommend!
Super

I had a really good time at this place. The place was very clean, I had no problems during my visit and the metro station is quite near so you can travel wherever you want. The room has its own key so you can lock the door to keep your belongings while you’re out. I really enjoyed my visit while being confortable. I truly recommend this place to stay.
Muy bueno!
Although I only stayed for a little while, I can say that I had a good stay. Hosts seemed nice and accommodating and the location is only a couple minutes from the nearest station
H responded quickly, and he was very hospitable. Everything was clean. Great place!

Absolute perfect location on the beautiful Flower Canal (Bloemgracht) in the lovely neighborhood the Jordaan. This apartment on the ground floor is lovely and clean and within walking distance to everything. There is a shop to rent bicycles right down the street, and a grocery not too far away. You can enjoy the many neighborhood restaurants near the apartment, or wander other neighborhoods. There are two bedrooms with a private bathroom in each. You really feel like a local when staying here. Absolute recommendation!
Great stay! Would highly recommend staying here!

Richard's place is well located near to public transport and the sites. The apartment is bright and stylish. Richard met me personally and was very flexible to accommodate my arrival and departure times. the facilities are all good and the apartment was clean and tidy on arrival.
We had a safe and good stay im M‘s room! Public transport were very close to us and parking was also very gentle. I can recommend it for anyone who wants to get something flexible. Thanks M

Week-end organisé à la dernière minute, Géraldine a été très réactive et nous a très bien reçu.
Nous avons passé un super week-end. La Tiny house est top, dans un lieu calme et dépaysant et proche du centre-ville.
Nous recommandons chaudement !
Had everything we needed for a few nights stay in Amsterdam! Mr M was helpful and made sure we had no problems. 😁
Miriam was very nice and caring. The apartment is unique, has great interior and everything you need to enjoy your stay in Amsterdam.

The kindness of Rob was seriously one of the main highlights of my trip to Amsterdam, as not only was he extremely responsive to any queries of mine, but was also so very hospitable to go out of his way to provide us with the most delicious and rich of a dutch breakfast in the next morning alongside with a presence of a clean and comfortable bedroom for us to relax in after a fun day of activities in Amsterdam. Though short of a stay of only a single night, it is with confidence to say that i would be back again to his accomodation in the near future. Once again, thank you Rob for the memories!
loved our stay here, houseboats are the way to go in Amsterdam and this one was perfect!

This houseboat was so cute! Spacious for 4 people, right in the center of town.... easy to cook in... rocked gently to sleep every night... we felt like the world was rocking slightly as we walked to museums and climbing gyms. Which we all found fun and funny.

We had a lovely time with Ed & Faouzia! Ed‘s little bike-tour was perfect to see Amsterdam from a different point of view. He was very helpful and made our stay in Amsterdam a bit more special. The charged OV-chipcard and the basics in the fridge were just an extra that we didn‘t expect. The easy access to the bikes and the fact that Ed fit them to our height for us was also great. The apartment was exactly as expected and all amenities were provided as mentioned in the listing.
Estuvimos cuatro días. Cerca del centro. Zona muy tranquila. Ed y si mujer muy amables y pendiente en todo momento de cualquier cosa. Recomendable, volveríamos a ir...
Parfait

Philip is a very nice host. He is kind and easy to talk to. The place is very clean and has a comfortable bed. The house is a ten minute walk from a subway station, so it's easy to get to the main places in Amsterdam from there.
I really enjoyed my stay, great location, peaceful and easy to get to central Amsterdam. The room is comfortable with a nice desk to work from. I felt very welcome at Philip’s house!
It was an incredibly pleasant stay which I enjoyed very much. My only regret is that it wasn't longer. Thanks, Philip !

Karen’s place was a really style cute little place to stay at and was very relaxing m. It has everything you could possibly need. The ferry port (NDSM-werf) closest to the apartment is free to catch to and from Amsterdam Centraal which was really useful.
Great cozy place near Leidseplein

The location combined with the quality of the host
Makes this the best place to stay in Amsterdam. Close to everything and Marc gives you complete insight into things to do while in Amsterdam. He is definitely the AmsterMAN!!!!

Ireen voelde als een Heel fijne en warme gastvrouw. Bijzonder om haar leefruimte, die ze  vol vertrouwen overdroeg te mogen benutten. Zeer bijzondere plek in Amsterdam, ik voelde me een deel van de stad maar ook toeschouwer vanaf het water. In de bui van het schip een geborgen basis, avontuurlijk, voorzien van alles, bijzonder. Het is 10 min lopen over de brug naar de tram alwaar je in no time in het centrum bent. En die wandeling over de brug is ook meer dan de moeite waard. Leve de paradijsvogels en hun paradijselijke ligplaatsen. Liefs MOnique

Enjoyed our stay at Marc's place in Amsterdam.   You are directly on one of the canals!    The space is well appointed and Marc added a door that allows easier access to the main space for one of the bedrooms.   Easy to walk to all of the sites and if you don't want to walk you can ride the tram.    With the tram (above the ground public transport) just hop on any one of them and there is a person that will take your payment (credit cards are fine).  This person is  not the tram driver but you will see them once you board.    It was a little intimidating at first because the locals are tapping their cards as you board.    Marc has great restaurant recommendations (we ate at Cafe George twice) and any other questions you may have about Amsterdam.  He responds immediately.  If we ever make it back to the Netherlands I wouldn't hesitate to stay at Marc's again.

Marc's place on the Leidsekade is fantastic!  Situated on an elegant curve of the outer canal, the property is within close proximity of everything while being secluded in a quiet part of the city. Marc has fabulous recommendations: boats, bikes, restaurants, bars. We really enjoyed out stay here and would highly recommend this place to anyone seeking a wonderful experience in Amsterdam.

Irène est une hôtesse très serviable. Elle est aux petits soins avec nous. On peu lui demander tout ce dont on a besoin, elle nous le prête avec gentillesse. Elle parle Français Anglais Allemand et Hollandais. Formidable

Apartment is in a great location and is very central & the host is very helpful. I can confirm both beds are extremely firm and comfortable and had a great nights sleep.
There is only a microwave and fridge and no cooker or sink so you may have to eat out and store snacks.
The shower is also quite nice but was sadly only given shampoo and not shower gel.
The only other small issues were that you are unable to control the heating so it was a bit of a pain when cold at night time as I didn’t want to disturb the host. Lastly the Wi-fi appeared to be off during the night and we could not watch movies online.
Other than that it is a great location and was able to walk everywhere but to the airport. The host is also happy to recommend any places in which your thinking to visit.
I think the issues mentioned dan easily be rectified and if they were I would stay again.

It was nice staying at this place. Great value for money in every sense!! Clean, stylish bathroom. The bed is very comfortable and spacious. The heater works great! By car Amsterdam can be reached in 25mins. Easy access to Paul's property. Paul is friendly and responsive!

The host was very good helpful since the moment we arrived and helped us to check in, extremely friendly, the place was super central and quite from other areas ,, I recommend this flat to everyone coming to Amsterdam
Great place
Cozy apartment with a great location and very friendly hosts. Thank you for your hospitality!
We had a pleasant stay, clean and right in the center. Easy check-in and out. Very friendly.

Tineke was wonderful. She really went out of her way to make us feel welcome even bringing us milk for our coffee and printing out directions to get to the airport bus. The studio was immaculate in fact everything looks brand new. The neighborhood is gorgeous and convenient to everything. I would definitely stay at the studio again and highly recommend it as a home base in Amsterdam.

It was a very nice stay at Pauls home. nice room and a perfect super host. The arrival just started with a nice update of all necessary questions against the city by beer and wine. Because of the location it is a very good point of starting tour by bicycle tours. The ferry is very close. Perfect stay in a private room with own bath. Only the street is a little bit noisy, but this was after a long stay in city not a problem. Thanks to Paul and his wife.
Tineke was a great and detailed host. Room was very clean and perfect location.
We had a great stay. Location is very good, on a beautiful street and walking distance to many attractions. Comfortable stay in lovely and very clean apartment. Thanks

It is the best way to spend your time in Amsterdam. In the heart of the hustle and bustle of it all. Photos do the boat no justice. The deck was the best place to sip wine watch the sun set, watching the nightlife emerge sparking new energy for the next adventure only a short walk away. The boat's location is great. We had no trouble wondering around seeing all the sights pubs and restaurants. It is truly a special place and we will return hopefully soon. Thank you for a wonderful experience.
Great boat. Love the art work. Great location.
The communication was good and everything was easy. Rob is really hospitable. I would come back to stay in his room everytime.
Несмотря на очень поздний заезд(4 утра), Роб открыл нам практически мгновенно.
This is a gem of a place. It is beautiful, relaxing and a lovely space. Splinter was incredibly helpful and our stay was perfect. I would highly recommend staying at Splinter's!
Great and tidy place. Rob's a great host, the room's mattress is a godsend and the breakfasts are killer! Definitely recommend!

Overall a great experience. Rob is a kind and helpful host, he made us feel right at home and extremely welcome at his place. The price and location are very fair and on top of that easily accessible by public transport. It's also close to AFAS which makes this the perfect place to stay the night if you have a concert to go to. I would definitely come here again!

Marlijn’s house boat was quaint but extremely spacious for two folks, with a big and clean bathroom, bigger than most hotels. The location itself is extremely convenient, with a bus stop at less than 100 m and Amsterdam Centraal at about a 15 mins walk. We appreciated her responsiveness, nice touches like keeping coffee and overall making us feel comfortable. And it was a different experience having your morning coffee on the deck instead of some hotel lobby. Would definitely recommend for a unique experience along with convenience.

Very clean,modern and spacious apartment with good access to public transport! A plus is that supermarkets are within 1min walking distance and that Oleksandr is very fast in terms of communication. Would definitely recommend it!

Henry was an awesome host! He was so helpful and offered some great tips about the area and must see spots. The bed literally felt like a cloud and as it was our first stop in Europe we felt incredibly comfortable!

There is a lovely flat.
Samy is nice host.
It was the first my solo trip.At the first time,I felt really nervous.
But,He gave me a lot of information.
It really helped me.
There is close to Tram station.It's usefull.
I'd like to come back to Amsterdam and stay there again.I really recommend. Thanks.
Netter Typ, tolle Wohnung, Toilette war sehr klein aber sonst war alles gut.

Samy who lived at the accom as well, was very friendly and accommodating.
However, when I initially booked I was going to be a bit late for check-in due to my flight time. Chafia was not flexible with this, so I had to change my flight to suit them. Which I felt, was not very accommodating.
If are just after a place to crash in a reasonable spot on a direct tram route to Central station, it ticks the box.

My partner and I absolutely adored staying at Sebastiaan's apartment. Check-in was super easy, and Sebastiaan met us in-person once we arrived and it was so lovely to meet him. Everything about the apartment was perfect - the location, the decor, the nearby restaurants...everything! We have stayed at several nocarz's and Sebastiaan's was the best by far, especially in the cleanliness department (his place was spotless when we arrived). We hope to be back in Amsterdam soon, and would 100% stay at Sebastiaan's apartment again. Thank you so much again for a comfortable and lovely stay!!! :)

Youri’s space is beautiful, clean, and modern - one of my favorite spaces I have had the pleasure of staying at! I was unable to meet Youri as well, but he was always quick to respond, and was very helpful with local tips.
His parents (who are now my favorite people in the world) met us for check in, gave us a quick tour of the flat, and met back with us for checkout. They were the nicest people, and were super understanding with our delayed flights and other travel difficulties. Would definitely recommend!

Mathilde s apartment is lovely. The view on the canal with the sun shine is amazing. Very clean and well equipped. The area is really nice, next to the park and some bars with terraces. Walking distance to the center of the city. And mathilde was very conciliant with check in/check out. I would highly recommend mathilde s apartment!

Ellen and her family were great hosts. Four of us spent 2 nights in this beautiful old house and we had a really great time there. Everything with Ellen and her family was fine and uncomplicated. Ellen's husband Enver welcomed us on the first day and showed us the house and handed us a whole folder with great and helpful information about the neighbourhood and Amsterdam in general. Dear Ellen, dear Enver, again many thanks for the great time in your lovely family home!
Hans was a great host and he introduced us to everything in our section of the boat. It was a lot of fun and it was in a perfect location.

We had a nice stay at Simona’s. The appartment is very fonctionnal, the bed and linen are really comfy. It’s near everything by foot but the street is quiet. Perfect for a couple, we even came with our baby!
A great experience with Hans, was very easy to check in and the room was exactly as advertised - I’d recommend to anyone considering booking this nocarz to go ahead with it!

Super nice host. Here you can feel the Amsterdam flair. The houseboat lies in the centrum of Amsterdam, only 20 minutes by foot from the central station. We didn’t need any tickets for metro or tram, everything is near by foot. Check in was super easy, we wrote the host when we will arrive and just ringed the bell. He showed us everything and that was all. He lives also on the boat, but you hear and see nothing. He let you alone, but if you have some questions, just ring the bell.
The room was clean, the heating worked, it was cuddly warm.
We will come back.
Ottima posizione, molto silenzioso, ideale per coppia o  per persona sola. Precise le informazioni  date prima dell’arrivo.

We love staying at Hans’ boat house. It’s only 4 minutes walking to tram 4 direct to go to Central station. The view of the canal is just awesome day and night. Highly recommended if you want to experience living in the boat house at Amstel canal.
Die Lage war gut und das Apartment sauber.

This is a warm modern Dutch house in the heart of Oost close to great bars, Reston’s, green spaces etc
I’m a sucker for a hammock and they’ve got one in the living room. <3

This was a great spot to explore Amsterdam and the surrounding De Pijp neighborhood is full of restaurants and shops.
The flat was lovely. Clean, bright and spacious. There is a bit of noise from the bar next door but it was never a problem for sleeping. There are a lot of stairs so plan accordingly.
Omar gave us two fantastic dinner recommendations and kindly let us drop our bags of early so we could go on a tour we'd booked.
aanrader!

I had an incredible stay on Hans’ houseboat in Amsterdam! The boat was cozy, clean, and well-equipped, offering a unique and peaceful experience right on the water. Waking up on the houseboat with beautiful canal views was unforgettable. Hans was an exceptional host—friendly, accommodating, and quick to respond to any questions I had. The location was perfect, close to everything yet tucked away enough to feel serene and relaxing. I would highly recommend staying here! Thank you, Hans, for a fantastic stay!
Great and clean location in the center of Amsterdam. Highly recommended.

Die Unterkunft war super und die Gastgeberin sehr freundlich. Das Bett war unglaublich gemütlich und die Lage einfach perfekt. Alles war sehr Sauber und es gab viel Tee zur Auswahl und einen kleinen Kühlschrank um ein paar Snacks zu lagern. Und wer sich ein wenig Therapieren möchte, kann sich einfach in ein kleines Bällebad legen - super entspannt und echt lustig! Ich kann es nur weiterempfehlen! Würde immer gerne wieder kommen. :)
Die Unterkunft war sauber und gut eingerichtet. Der Standort war auch sehr gut.
Perfect location, highly recommended!
Idéalement situé.  Proche commerces. Facile d'accès .
Too lactation and great communication from the host
Great stay. Nice and close to the metros and easy to get to Amsterdam central. Thanks!

This is, by far, one of the best nocarz experiences I've ever had. The cozy houseboat is cuddled in the heart of the Jordaan, within walking distance so many amazing things to do. The view is absolutely stunning, bursting with Dutch charm. Inside you'll find a relaxing bathtub (perfect for the end of a long day of exploring), as well as a small work area and a minifridge. Anita also provided daily suggestions for things to do, and was always just a message away if I needed help. Needless to say, I plan to come back to this gem often.
We could have spent the entire day just sitting at the window watching the boats pass in the canal! We loved it.

Catherine was a great host. Great communication running up to booking. Met us at train station to take to us flat, pointing out places of interest along the way.  Flat was clean and in good location. Every thing you could need was provided.
Probably the coolest and most unique experience one can have staying in Amsterdam. These unassuming boat houses are the perfect way to experience the city.
Amazing

What a great unique place to stay, a little bit of hustle and bustle, so great for people watching. Great shower, nice kitchen, separate little bed alcove and some sitting space. Easy access to property with app so nice and easy. Little bit awkward for car access because it is smack on the bridge (obviously, a fact that escaped us until we arrived, I know...) so plan your parking if you drive, there are spaces at the top end of the Vondel Park that are a short walk away. I recommend this place !!

Beautiful accommodations in a great neighborhood. Walkable to all tourist sites and very close to Amsterdam Central. Henri was very responsive to all communication. Would definitely recommend and stay again.
Everything about Mel and Henri’s place is perfect. The location is fantastic. We would recommend this to everyone.
Great place!

Nice apartment, well-equipped and clean. Easy access to city center with public transport within 3 mins walk. However, those who enjoy quiet sleep may be disappointed. Neighhbours kept doing repair work early in the morning which was very annoying for us. We couldn’t get in the house on the first night as the keys didn’t work. The host came rescue in an hour though.
Very cozy place in a great location with a lovely host. My favorite was the bed in the window. Highly recommended.
Lovely guy and good host, was just unaware from the description that the accommodation is shared with another guest room and only one bathroom between the two. Other than that would recommend
Reallohn good apartment for a short stay in Amsterdam. Central and not too loud. Ekaterina was really nice and helpful. Thank you.

Es relativamente cerca a los principales sitios turísticos de Amsterdam, tiene un anfitrión muy amable y atento a que te sientas bien.
Puedes pedir permiso para cocinar algo y ahorrar un poco de dinero, agua caliente, sábanas limpias, todo a nivel general muy bueno, lo único un poco complejo son las escaleras que son un poco empinadas, esto se complica para mujeres con maletas grandes y pesadas.
Lo recomiendo a nivel general .

My experience in this place is really good. The host is very welcomming and happy to help if there are any problems. The room is good for staying more days and all utility's are in good state for use. Would definately recommend others to stay in this place.

Bon descriptif de l'appartement, bien pour 4 personnes ne comptant pas manger sur place. Une terrasse sans doute agréable à la belle saison.
Bonne communication avec Erik.
Le tram passe à coté et peut vous emmener dans le centre en un quart d'heure.
Le coté négatif lors de notre séjour:
A notre arrivée, le chauffage et l'eau chaude ne fonctionnaient pas. La chaudière a fonctionné plus ou moins ensuite puis plus du tout pour notre dernier jour : pas de chauffage et douche à l'eau très froide...

Great apartment on a quiet street! I spent a few days here as a solo traveler and it was perfect. The room is small but functional. The location is great if you want to be close to the action but not in the middle of it. Note that there is no elevator and the stairs are typical for the Netherlands (narrow and steep). There are transit stops nearby where you can swipe on and off with your credit card as well. I’d definitely stay here again!
Highly recommended
A really charming place!! We spend a lovelly week-end!

La habitación es bonita cómoda y limpia, la ubicación es muy buena, tienes cerca todo, Ekaterina fue muy amable, nos recibió antes de la hora y al día siguiente, pudimos dejas nuestras cosas guardadas y regresar por ellas en la tarde, muy buena anfitriona, lo recomiendo! Bonito lugar y cómodo
Ekaterina described her listing very well. The location is a huge plus. Communication was very good; and check-in/out were extremely convenient. A good Value for Money.
Siri’s place is in a convenient location and has all the basic amenities you could need for an overnight stay.
The best!!!!
Nice apartment. 20-30 minute walk from the centre. Quick responses from host but a bit pricey.
Tolle Unterkunft in einer tollen Lage. Ideal für ein Wochenende in Amsterdam.
Beautiful place, perfect host. Would book again, an again.

There’s a reason Ric has so many positive reviews—he’s a great host! Extremely friendly and was there to walk us through the apartment and provide places of interest. Would stay here again when I’m in Amsterdam!
Such a cool spot to stay that really makes you feel a part of Amsterdam.
