We had a lovely stay on Kaptein Rob’s houseboat. The place was better than described and Rob was really helpful with lots of advice and tips about check in and what to do. The place is better than described and we can’t imagine doing Amsterdam any other way in future!
We had a great stay and everything was just like the description. Our host was very helpful and friendly! The house was very clean and comfortable! Thank you!

Mathilde is very welcoming person! She was always ready to give an advice or to help. We enjoyed our stay in Amsterdam! The room was very nice and we had all necessary things. The bed was very comfortable (it is really important after the whole day walk), we liked the transport accessibility of the apartment (the tram and the train are very close to), so it is very simple to go to the center of the city or to visit the neighbourhood. We recommend the Mathilde's room for your journey !

Great pleasure to be at Mathilde ´ s home.
Well located and comfortable bedroom.
I recommend

Very nice room, super close to Schipol airport (only 5mins by train) and about 20 to the city centre. Everything you might need is already in the room. The room is just a little cold but the duvet is very warm ☺️
Thank you for such a wonderful stay at your beautiful place. It was perfect and every detail was thought of. Overall AMAZING - we would stay again and suggest this to friends traveling. 5*****

Jack and Semira are fantastic hosts. they are very kind people and made us feel at home immediately. the room was very spacious, with a full kitchen, living area, bathroom and outdoor space. we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Thanks again for your hospitality!

Amazing house, we booked an air b&b, hoping to experience the city by its own culture, and what we got from Arjen was exactly what we were looking for. Not only was the house cozy, the location was also spot on. In the city center, & with walking distance to Central station, we had quick access to all the great restaurants and famous destinations. Of course, you can’t leave out how helpful Arjen was to us. He took us around the city the moment we got to the house, leading for us to find some restaurants that only locals knew about. We will definitely recommend Arjen’s place if you are on your first visit to Amsterdam!

Nicht nur ist Fleur super, das nocarz ist es auch. Alles war super sauber und Fleur hat sich auch gut um uns gekümmert.
Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und den Preis aufjedenfall Wert.
Auch die Tipps von Fleur waren mehr als hilfreich.
Wir haben uns mehr als nur Zuhause gefühlt.
Gerne wieder! <3
12/10
Really nice host and the apartment was great, we felt right at home. It is 3min from the metro which takes 10 minutes to get to the center. Would book this again!

Such a lovely apartment in beautiful surrounding. So nice being right on the water. Apartment is small but really great space saving ideas. Might be a nice idea to put a gate between respective parts of the patio area but not a deal breaker. It also would have been nice to meet Ethel but the rest of the family were very warm and friendly. Lovely stay in beautiful surroundings.
We enjoyed our visit in this nice and clean place. Ethel was very nice and helpful.

I'm glad I chose Ethel's studio for my stay in Amsterdam. Loved the area - peaceful, beautiful, walkable, easy to get to central station in the city center and also to get to the airport.
The studio is casual but elegant and has everything you need for a short stay. It will suit one person or a couple. It was clean, has its own entrance and super comfortable.
I would definitely stay here again.
Beautiful house, great location on a quiet street close to the main centre. Would stay again.

We booked Yannick's nocarz for 4 nights in July and enjoyed our stay. The location is excellent; it was easy to explore Amsterdam on foot. The room is tidy and comfortable, with a well-stocked kitchenette, and the shared bathrooms were clean. Yannick had great recommendations, responded quickly to our messages, and let us store our bags for a couple of hours after check-out so that we could explore the city before catching a later train. There is no self-check-in option, so make sure to communicate clearly about your arrival and to arrive on time.
Ótima estadia- cama e almofadas super confortáveis, check in muito fácil. Ótimo para uma estadia de fim de semana.
Anneke's space is perfect for relaxation, comfort and reliability. It is also super clean and she is a very discreet, laid back and pleasant host. I highly recommend her!

Anneke's place is really great. She let me in, gave me the key and left me to my own devices. I would highly recommend her place for a short stay in Amsterdam. It was the perfect place to rest and recuperate after exploring the heaving city. Her flat is super modern which you can see from the stunning bathroom. You're also able to work if need be as there is a huge table. Her place is located in a quiet suburb just north of central but it is still super connected and easy to get back and forth from via, bus, metro ferry or even walking.

Ha estado todo fantástico. Helen es genial! Su apartamento es perfecto para pasar unos días. Esta cerca del tranvía y con él llegas rápido al centro. También tienes cerca el supermercado y sitios para comer.
Cuando hicimos la reserva se preocupó mucho por todo y es muy atenta, contesta rápido a cualquier duda que tengas.
Nos recogió en el aeropuerto cuando llegamos, nos dejó comida típica de allí.
Así que sólo nos queda decir que es maravillosa y que la recomendamos totalmente!! Si volvemos a Amsterdam (que seguro que lo haremos porque es precioso) repetiremos sin lugar a dudas!
Muchísimas gracias por todo Helen! 🤗🤗
Great flat great host
Really peaceful and confortable place!
Great place and location

We found the location to be central to our needs.  There were plenty of community amenities including restaurants, arms and grocery stores close.  Ken was very helpful answering questions about transportation and directions and recommending area businesses.  We especially like being on the ground floor and did not have flights of stairs to climb.
Kes is a great host. Communication and recommendations were great. We really enjoyed our stay at his place.
The house boat was both unique and a perfect way to experience central Amsterdam. Close to everything and very comfortable can’t wait to visit again!
Prachtige boot op mooiste locatie in Amsterdam!

Schönes, ruhiges Zimmer
Saubere Bettwäsche
Kes war äußerst freundlich und gut zu erreichen.
Alles hat einwandfrei geklappt!
Die Innenstadt ist mit einer kurzen Fahrt mit der Tram zu erreichen.

We really enjoyed our stay here! The apartment is clean, spacious and comfortable. We found the city centre easily accessible with public transport. The same goes for the airport. Sascha was very communicative during the whole process and provided us with some good tips about what to do and where to go. We shortly got to meet Sascha’s roommate Jasper who is very friendly and helpful. Would definitely like to come back here some time again!
Die Wohnung liegt perfekt, ist sauber und ordentlich und wirklich leise. Hat super für unseren Aufenthalt in Amsterdam gepasst.

Great location, great cinema room for the raining days and amazing hosts offered early check in and late check out which was greatly appreciated. Loved the walk and quick ferry to town, 10 mins to all the action and great local market.
very nice apartment with convenient location

The location of this nocarz is great! In a very central place, yet on a quiet street so it’s both safe and not noisy people. The room has charm and is clean. The shared bathroom wasn’t so bad either. Only important thing to note is that the stairs to go up are tight (as most are in Amsterdam) so be prepared and not bring big luggage!
Bedsheets weren’t clean

Wow!! This is a must for if you are staying in Amsterdam. Franka’s mother was so accommodating and what a wonderful place to stay. We have just spend a long weekend on the boat and it’s about a 20 minute walk from centre of Amsterdam. Lovely location and so peaceful. We can’t wait to come back already. Boat was clean and welcome from Carola was lovely, thank you again for completing our holiday and making it an amazing experience.

Nous avons passé un bon séjour (3 nuits) dans le logement que propose Puck. Tout était fidèle à la description de l’annonce. Le logement se situant dans une ruelle, il est à l’abri de l’effervescence du quartier rouge situé à proximité. L’emplacement est super et permet de se rendre en tous points de la ville rapidement (nous avons tout fait à pied). Attention tout de même (comme cela est précisé dans l’annonce), le logement se situe au 3eme étage et est accessible par des escaliers pentus.

Es lindo, en lugar súper céntrico. Pero muy cerca del barrio rojo, por lo que en el sector te encontrarás con mucha gente fumando marihuana. Adicional, las gradas son demasiado estrechas para subir con maletas, el baño al ser compartido, muchas veces está sucio por el otro huésped, y debes tener mucho cuidado al salir del baño a la habitación, si pisas mal te caes por las gradas. Por lo demás, muy bien.

Myself and my boyfriend stayed here for a weekend get away, and it was so easy. From check in to check out Marloes made sure anything we needed was looked after ! The location was lovely and quiet and although a bit out of the city was very easily accessible via public transport (we got the 48hr tickets). I would definitely recommend this place for any couple looking to enjoy a chill weekend away :)
Eine geräumige Unterkunft in toller Lage.

Really thanks for your goodness, advice about the city, for the perfect and clean house, and for the amazing place where we had possibility to feel more like native than like tourists.
I hope to see you again, thanks again.
We had an excellent time - very friendly and a lovely apartment in a great location. Would highly recommend. Thank you!
We recommend nice apartment!
Place was great! Walkable and close to everything we wanted to do. Very steep stairs but wasn’t an issue for us. Amsterdam was so fun and hopefully we will be back!
Lovely apartment in an excellent location.
Pretty as you can see but more than that, the host was super nice!

Beautiful, spacious, inspiring space and wonderful hosts!
I traveled to Amsterdam on my own (I'm a middle-aged woman). I was looking for a space where I would feel supported and safe, where I would both be comfortable to work at home and also easily connected to Amsterdam as soon as I left the apartment. This rental was perfect.

I cannot recommend Fleur D'Amsterdam enough! For couples or solo travellers like myself. Fleur is a fantastic host who welcomes you warmly into her beautiful home. Brilliant breakfast everyday. She was happy to help advise me on what to do, how to get into places and see the city so that made the most of everyday. I can't wait to book my next visit. See you soon! X
Amazing space, very very clean and fashionable/modern looking.  Ghost was extremely helpful with practical matters and tourist knowledge. Highly recommend.

My friend and I had a lovely time in Anne’s apartment. She was flexible with our check-in and gave very clear instructions about the apartment’s features once we arrived. Having our bags carried up the stairs was greatly appreciated. The apartment was comfortable and the quiet location was just what was needed. The location is also within walking distance of some wonderful restaurants and bars. Would definitely stay there again!

Wonderful stay in a beautiful appartment. Paulien was super helpful !
Would totally recommend :)
Ottimo alloggio, Alejandro molto disponibile!

We loved staying at this part of the city and Martijn & Kim’s place was a great home base. The main part of the room is quite spacious and well decorated. Our preferred route was bus 38 (which runs pretty often in the daytime, and every half an hour until around midnight) to the ferry, and then in a couple of minutes we'd be at Centraal Station - if you time it right, I'd say it's under 20 minutes and the view over the IJ river is an added bonus. We didn't have issues with the steet level location, but if you're not used to the noise of traffic/you're a light sleeper/sleep hot and want to keep the window open, this might not be the perfect place for you. We did sleep well (the bed is huuuuge) and had everything we needed for a 3-night stay. We'd happily come back. :)

Our stay @Levantus was just perfect :)
10 of 10
Booking, Communication, Check in/out were so smoove, just like you want to have it, like allways/everywhere
The boat itself is super comfy, so modern & beautiful, that you will fall in love Instant.
You get a cool & yummy breakfast + some sweet/cool stuff in the fridge, which was sooo nice :)
We really enjoyed it to the fullest and
It couldn't have been better.
A must book boat :)
Will come again.
Cheers
LiSi & Timm

The place is well connected by 3 metro lines and is a decent/peaceful neighbourhood. The room is better than expected with modern minimalist decor. The bed is VERY comfortable. Jimmy and Cheryl are a very friendly couple, very specific and detailed about guidance. Also the kitchen is well prepared and has everything one might need! I had a very restful stay in Amsterdam and would recommend this one for solo travellers!

Truly such a gem to stay here in Amsterdam! I was there for 3 nights and it was exactly as described in the listing. Extremely clean too. Jimmy and Cheryl were so lovely and made me feel very welcome in their home. They gave great local food and drink recommendations. And I also love the neighbourhood they’re in as it’s just a bit out of the centre core, but still very walkable and most important for me, nice and quiet. Lots of great restaurants around there as well as the park. It’s a super safe neighbourhood and close to the metro. Thank you for a lovely stay, and if I ever come back to Amsterdam, I’d definitely stay here again!

Roy & Xander were very helpful and communicative both prior to and during our stay, they were very welcoming and provided lots of information on what to do in Amsterdam. The boat is a lovely place to stay in a quiet and safe area but also local to the centre on a short bus ride. We really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend !

Was promised our money back two weeks before we were meant to go, as I had asked if we could cancel, so the whole time she had said that we were okay and we were going to get a full refund. Fast forward to the next week, she completely does a U-Turn and says she can not refund us, even though she had promised to give us our money back and the fact we are students with no disposable income made it worse, then to somehow put the blame on us. I cannot believe there is people in the world like this still, please do not book with this woman, she is dishonest and a fiend. I have messaged her several times being very amicable, however she has ignored my messages, so we will be taking legal action unless we can sort something out.

In this lovely room you get the full Amsterdam Red Light District experience..
love it all the way.
Small Bathroom, a tiny kitchen, nice bed, a cute seating area, with a gorgeous view to all of the roofs in the middle of red light district..

Jacqueline’s is a great host and her place is quiet and easily accessible to downtown.
The apartment is ground floor with high ceilings and adjacent to a canal.

Our stay at Jaqueline's house was wonderful!  She is delicate, kind, discreet and super organized.  An excellent hostess.  Being in Amsterdam, this accommodation is well worth it.  The breakfast is delicious, the house is always clean and quiet and the location is great.  If you like to enjoy the city walking, in 20 minutes you will be in the center, if you prefer to order an Uber and you are with more than one person, some rides will be cheaper than public transport.  definitely an excellent accommodation.

Le concept nocarz est à l'apogée chez Jacqueline. Un accueil chaleureux, des conseils avisés, un service au top ce qui vous rend le séjour très agréable. Chambre spacieuse et calme, petit déjeuner compris, bref que du positif !

トラムの駅からも近く、Amsterdamの中心までアクセスが良かったです。綺麗で可愛い家でした。Jacquelineさんはとても親切で、近くのおすすめや次に滞在する街のおすすめまで教えてくれました。またチェックアウトの時間も柔軟に対応していただきました。
またAmsterdamに行く際に利用したいと思います

very nice host! we checked in on a sunday and she kindly let us know that there is a market that only happens on the first week of sunday and we went! it was a lovely market 🥰
throughout the stay it was nice that she was contactable and i was able to use the washer was an affordable additional cost.
fan was provided as it was summer time! thank you
very lovely living room and comfortable sofa

The accomodation has everything you need for a holiday in Amsterdam. It is situated at aprox 12-15 min walk from the metro station Noord. The hosts are really nice and helpful,  everything was very clean.
lovely stay thank you, very cute house
Lo Studio ci è piaciuto molto, ben arredato, funzionale e per la privacy.  Ubicazione tranquilla e comoda ai mezzi pubblici. I proprietari sono persone gentili e disponibili.

Correspond bien à la description, avec la bonne surprise d'avoir un petit lit supplémentaire qui nous attendait pour notre petit garçon. Arrangeant pour l'accueil et le départ. La localisation dans le nord n'est pas un problème et a permis de découvrir une autre partie d’Amsterdam différente. Nous recommandons !
Ist einem die Lage der Unterkunft bewusst, ist sie ihr Geld auf jeden Fall wert.
Eine gute Unterkunft für ein paar Tage in Amsterdam. Metrohaltestelle Noord in 15 Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar, oder mit dem Bus noch schneller. Sehr freundicher Gastgeber.

My sister and I enjoyed our stay here while we were travelling overseas ;) the bikes are a great use as the city is a wee bit far but the bikes make it a great adventure :) would definitely stay again :)

Noa is a wonderful host, communication was easy and he gave us a lot of tips, his appartement is lovely and the breakfast is even provided. The flat is next to the center and he even gave us 3 bikes to explore the city. Thank you!

Martijn & Kims room is defenitely recommendable. The location is good and the room is spceous and clean. We rested well and enjoyed our stay so easily.
Check-in directions are clear and Martijn & Kim always responded quickly. We would visit again any time!
We loved the appartment. Close to the city centre
Gorgeous property in a lovely spot. Thanks for a great stay!

It was the perfect place to stay for a little break in Amsterdam. The location is amazing, we went everywhere with our rental bikes and it was so easy access.
The apartment has everything you need for a few days, it was very comfortable and clean. I would definitely recommend to book this place.
Die Unterkunft war genau wie beschrieben und die Kommunikation mit Martijn und Kim war sehr freundlich und unkompliziert.
Accurate, clean, cosy, and an amazing location!

Had a great stay at Mimi’s place - location was fantastic, and the room was very spacious, comfortable and clean - much better than it looks in the photos! The bathroom is lovely as well with a huge shower.
We seemed to have the place to ourselves apart from other guests in another room who we weren’t made aware of previously. The other guests were quite loud but we had no disruptions at all from the host family.
The only thing that could improve is to have the door lockable from the outside, as there is nothing to stop the other guests from entering your room which didn’t feel very secure. Other than that I would recommend staying here!

Great stay! Definitely recommended.
Cozy room, centrally located, comfortable bed, clean room and bathroom, big windows with street view, kind and friendly hosts.
A very lovley and quite place to stay. Not too far away from the central of Amsterdam and you can expect a very clean and well decorated Studio.
L’appartement est très bien placé, l’hôte est très réactif, super séjour !

Great location, our check in process was very easy and we loved being in the heart of Amsterdam with many things around to do. The room was great for its price and the host was extremely helpful. Would definitely recommend.
The apartment was really nice and in a perfect location, i would love to come back again !! The check in was really easy !!

Emplacement très central, pratique pour visiter la ville à pied.
Description fidèle à la réalité.
Modern and minimal apartment with great transport connections to Amsterdam City Centre. We will definitely be back!
Fantastic, adorable place right on the water. The breakfast is excellent, the hosts are very friendly and the location is very convenient and also peaceful. Great stay.
Good nocarz , a Little bit far from the heart of city center but Wende was very flex for our arrival , the room was clean and the view from the room is fantastic !

Due to a late check in we unfortunately didn’t get a chance to meet Mewis but the information he provided was incredibly thorough and very easy to understand and follow. Communication leading up to, and during our stay was excellent. The room is in a great location! You’re literally in the middle of the red light district but the room is quiet. You’re only a short walk to the 9 street shopping area and central to the rest of Amsterdam and all it has to offer. The room is clean, the bed is comfy, the shower pressure is strong (and hot) and Mewis has a helpful guest guide with local tips and tricks. The room is on the small side (common for the city) but a perfect spot to bounce in and out of during your Amsterdam adventures. Thanks Mewis!
Great place! The location couldn’t be better. :)
Es hat uns sehr gefallen und wir würden die nächsten Male wieder gerne hierher kommen! Sehr schöne Gegend, alles zu Fuß erreichbar. Das Zimmer war sehr ordentlich und sauber.

We had a wonderful stay! The location is within walking distance to lots of food and entertainment spots. Very clean! It was a little difficult to get our large bags up the narrow stairway, but we managed just fine.
Absolutely perfect - gave a real feel for Amsterdam. It was cosy and snug and had a real link to the city’s history. Being able to store our bags at The Exchange was very helpful as well.
We had a wonderful time at this wonderful place! Thank you so much for this perfect weekend
Sehr stilvoll eingerichtete Wohnung. Ein kleiner Garten ist ein Traum. Wir haben den Aufenthalt bei Robin sehr genossen. Lieben Dank für alles.

Amar’s place is located in a historical building in a super quiet neighbourhood, even though very close to the Central Station and the city Center, 10’ - 15’ walk each.
So it is perfect if you wanna go around by foot.
Last but not least, Amar is a very kind and helpful host.
I will definitely consider this place again when I come back to Amsterdam.
Great stay! My phone screen broke while traveling and Kevin was gracious and helpful. Great location.
Great location to see all of Amsterdam.  Super flat, ideal for our needs. Rutger is an excellent host and so helpful.
It was a little cold but that was to be expected during Winter. The only consideration would be to include a sink in the nocarz footprint.
Excelente alojamiento. Amar nos trató increíble y hasta nos ayudó a subir el equipaje. Volvería sin dudarlo

Charline was very hospital. We enjoyed her company and even went out for dinner with her and one night we made some dinner with her together at her place. She showed us nice places in Amsterdam. Thank you, we had a lot of fun.
Charlines' place is newly renovated and very clean. I can really recommand her place.

I had a great time staying with Charline! The room was as pictured, the bed was comfy (she even brought me extra pillows) and as a bonus, she has a handsome little dog! There is a bus/tram stop nearby, so there is no issue finsing your way there from the airport/ or getting to the city centre. There is also a supermarket in the building on the opposite side where you can withdraw cash. Charline always has time for a chat, maybe over a cup of tea? She was kind enough to get me some groceries in case I was hungry upon arrival. Great host!

Charline is an amazing host who takes pride in providing her guests with a beautiful and peaceful environment. Her place is well located in upmarket Amsterdam-Zuid, walking distance to public transport, cafes, shops and supermarkets.
Charline’s place comes with a stylish ensuite bathroom, Nespresso machine and friendly dog.
The bedroom is spacious with enough room for bags and a place to sit.
I’d love to return to her place on my next visit to Amsterdam!
A great view and a clean appartment nearby the centre.
Unique stay

My second stay at Charline’s beautiful place in Amsterdam. The bedroom is spacious yet cosy and has a nice view over the quiet Gerrit Van Der Veenstraat. Charline and her canine housemate offer a wonderful stay in affluent Amsterdam-zuid. It’s walking distance to a supermarket, public transport and a variety of cafes and restaurants.
Highly recommended.
Thank you:)
Great stay, thanks!
Perfect location with park just behind the corner. Beautiful apartment with many plants. We loved it.
Everything was great. Thank you for your welcome Marlot !
Loved our stay at Annemiens place, great location, lovely flat, very clean and light. Annemien sent over some great suggestions. Would recommend.
Fantastic view of canal and clock tower. Walking distance to really anything you would want to do! very private and quiet. Great place if you are looking to relax and enjoy Amsterdam.
Great stay, very clean, cozy and central. Jesse was very considerate, respectful, friendly and flexible. 5/5 :)

Had a lovely long weekend stay at Willem's place. It looks exactly like the pictures - if not better! Such a nice space to spend time in after a long day in the city. Very warm/cosy and lots of space. Right by the water too which is nice.
Will definitely be coming back, thanks Willem!

Très content de notre séjour chez Emiel et Louis ! Des hôtes accueillants et très réactifs ne négligeant aucun détail pour nous accueillir avec le plus de confort possible. Je recommande les yeux fermés 👍
👏👍 good host, nice place 👍

We loved our stay in De Pijp in Martin's flat. The location was great being walking distance from the market, good restaurants, the museums and the metro. Martin was the perfect host - we wish we could have stayed longer.

The location cannot be beat — central yet peaceful. The apartment is as spacious, attractive, and comfortable as the photos suggest. Caroline (Elise’s mother) was our host; she was easy to communicate with and kindly arranged for us to check in early. The stairs are steep, narrow, and twisty — but it’s only one flight (I’ve had far worse in Amsterdam!). I’d happily stay here again.
Bien placé, propre et cosy.

Amazing in how someone designed the refurbishment of this tiny historic building to maximize its comfort into a great hotel room! Attention to detail was impressive and effective! Little touches like providing terrycloth bath slippers to combat the cold tile floors, earplugs to combat the noise from outside, and two layers of curtains to allow the level of light and privacy a person could want was impressive! Bigger touches like the great mattress, pre-programmed tablet with local info, and seamless check in and checkout via my phone we're excellent. I can't say enough good things about this place, but there are some people who will not like it because of the unusual closeness to the public outside. Some people will not like having a busy city street directly on the other side of their hotel room wall, and some people will be nervous about feeling secure, but I had no such issue. I loved the feeling of being so close to the people of Amsterdam, taking pictures of the bikers and boats outside my window, but I recognize that no amount of excellent design could counter the nervous feeling I know some folks would get. But for those of us who crave an unusual experience in a beautiful, comfortable room made from an historic building, the SWEET Hotel system cannot be beat!
Very clean and modern studio. Great location, Nick and Mabel's booklet made getting the tram super easy. Peaceful location and easy check in/out. Will definitely stay again!

La péniche de Carien se trouve à 10’ de la gare,la rue longeant le canal est très très calme.
L’aménagement de ce petit studio est cosy,petite kitchenette,(café,thé ,sucre,confiture,beurre,lait),canapé,belle documentation sur Amsterdam,
salle de douche(shampooing,gel douche)télé et la chambre ds la cale!Charmant.Tout y est propre.
Literie impeccable
A 5’ d’un magasin d’alimentation .
Idéal pour 1 couple.
Carien est très agréable et réactive.
Petit logement mais très agréable et bien situé au cœur d'Amsterdam sur les canaux.

Everything was perfect. It was near the center (via tram), in a quiet and beautiful place. The price was fair (not expensive, not cheap), the hosts were  helpful whenever I needed them, and if nothing changes, next time I'll visit Amsterdam I'll try to book the same apartment.
Such a gorgeous apartment in a very conveniently located area of Amsterdam. The bathroom is a dream! We definitely hope to stay at Bas-Jan’s apartment again. Thanks so much! 💚

the studio was clean and quite big. it was a lovely stay. the host gave us some recommendations on what to see in amsterdam. and the communication was great.
the host asked what time for check-in and check-out fit us best and was really flexible.
Very pleased with our stay. Visited Amsterdam for our honeymoon and Eric's team made us feel so special. Room was very spacious and clean. Will definitely recommend this place to family and friends.

The apartment was just as described. Beautiful location with tons of walkable shops, bars, and restaurants. Great shower, comfy bed, nice dining/coffee table. The hosts were very responsive and caring, with very good, fast communication.
The only tiny issue was that there was no door to the bathroom, nor any other type of separation from the bedroom. So using the restroom could be uncomfortable for some people who aren’t used to that level of closeness :).

The room was lovely despite the challenge of hauling suitcases up a narrow spiral staircase. Comfortable bed, pretty room and lovely view of the canal and houses across the way. We arrived just in time for Kings Day — totally unplanned. On one hand we had a great view of the festivities. On the other hand as the day wore on it became torture. The noise was overwhelming. The trash and crush of people was mind boggling. A warning from our host about what it would be like would have been helpful. Also, the Wi-Fi stopped working and Joost was unresponsive to my requests to fix it.  I stay in nocarzs all the time —  It’s a great location and very comfortable but service should have been better.

Joost’s place was perfect for exploring Amsterdam!  It is centrally located in a beautiful old building right on the canal. You can walk everywhere but I highly recommend renting a bike. It’s a special city and the apartment has the perfect view to watch the boats and bikes go by. Also, there was a minor plumbing issue late one night, which Joost handled immediately. Super attentive and friendly!  We would definitely stay there again.

Nice flat and very nice Location.
It's expensive but you know - it's amsterdam.
Todo estuvo súper bien. Muy buen trato por parte de los recepcionistas, hasta hablaban español, nos dieron varios tipos.
Easy place to get to from the train station. Very walkable to everywhere in the city.

Our stay in Yvettes apartment was great! The apartment is lovely and very clean. It’s situated in a great area of Amsterdam and there are a lot of restaurants and really good transportation options.
Would recommend this apartment to everyone.

I HIGHLY recommend this Air BnB!! I stayed here with 2 friends. We are all females under 25 and we felt totally safe here. The location is unbelievable (you are literally next to the canal) and there are HUGE beautiful windows with an amazing view. It is soo worth the price. I would 100% stay here again!!
The house has a enjoyable view, it’s worth the price

Great apartment.
As some of the reviews mentioned the stairs are ‘fun’ but adds to the adventure!
Great location.

Wouter and Caroline’s studio apartment was great, the location was ideal and it seemed like a quick walking distance to most of Amsterdams major attractions.
Wouter was very helpful and always available for anything we needed, I highly recommend there studio apartment.
This audio is in a good Amsterdam centrum location, with many nearby restaurant and shopping opportunities.
Excellent location, friendly hosts, comfortable bed.
I had a great experience. The apartment was incredibly nice and location is unbeatable.
Good stay
Great place, very cute and very clean. We had a great time and Laura is really friendly!

There were positives and negatives to the houseboat. Overall, I felt this wasn't worth the hefty fee for a houseboat experience in Amsterdam.
Positives:
-Casper was very friendly and great at communication. He even brought us a microwave when we asked if there was one.
-The location was very central for getting around Amsterdam, and close to the centraal station.
-Beds were comfy
Negatives:
-The floor in the boat is not level, and more than just a little bit. Anyone with vertigo issues, be aware.
-There was construction going on right outside the boat (that started at 7:30am each morning) that meant we had no outdoor seating place. I wish we would have known this beforehand, I might have cancelled, as this was really the selling point for us.
-There are at least 2 other boats docked in front of Casper's boat, and both of them are rust buckets filled with junk. It certainly didn't add to the view. In fact, there is no view to be had. You can't see anything but the next rusty houseboat when looking out the portholes.
-3 of the 4 windows on the ceiling leaked quite a bit when it rained one day.
-The place gets quite hot in the heat of the day. There are 2 fans, but one of them is on a timer and turns off after 1.5 hours.
I don't mean to be too critical, but I have only seen 100% positive reviews about this boat, and unfortunately our stay was just not that positive.
Great place, clean, and awesome location! Check in and out was east and reception staff was very friendly. Would definitely stay there again!

Flott plass å bo.
Hyggelig personale, nært til både tog og sentrum.
Stille og rolig på tross av sentral beliggenhet.

We loved our stay at Laura’s place. Her houseboat is so special and cosy. It’s in a very cool family friendly part of town that shows you a different side of Amsterdam. The place has everything we needed and it was great being able to use the bikes! Thanks Laura
Very comfortable and great central location, super kind staff at the check in.

You want to stay @ a houseboat which is very comfortable, super Clean, really beautiful etc. also in a good spot to get from A to B and also has a super host, who is super nice, has so many good Infos and gives you a lovely Welcome ?
Then you hit the Jackpot with this boat etc.
We will def. come again, is was just perfect.
Thx a lot.
Alles einwandfrei, herzlichen Dank!

Good location, easy to get to central Amsterdam. Staff were helpful, the electric blind fell down and they fixed it quickly. The apartment was on the small side for what we paid, and there was no bathroom ventilation, but can't fault the cleanliness,  comfort or security.

Apartment in a great location, easily accessible by walking. The apartment definitely was too small for 5 people and lack of privacy. Take into account the difficulties of 1 bathroom between 5, although we knew it before booking so our own fault. The bedroom doors are thin and the sofabed was
uncomfortable, ended up sleeping on the sofabed as a sofa. The staff were really nice upon check in. The issue arose upon checkout. We arrived 9 minutes after 11am checkout. We had to wait a while for the lift with all the other guests trying to checkout using the 1 lift at the same time. The man at front desk was rude. He kept stating there was no space in the cupboard to leave our suitcases. We told him other staff stated we could as our train wasn’t until later, his response was ‘if you checked out on time there would have been space.’ He continued to be rude. Eventually he let us leave our things. Several people came down after us and he was nice to them. To us it felt like a race issue.
Alles war super. Die Unterkunft ist gut zu erreichen und hat einen herrlichen Blick aufs Wasser. Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt.

Overall, this was a great stay! It is a houseboat, with all of the accompanying quirks, but that’s what we wanted for our family’s visit to Amsterdam. The boat was clean and spacious enough for our family. Instructions to enter were super clear, with associated pictures. And, the location is close to a major metro and tram stop, which made it easy to get around. We enjoyed it!
Excellent location, close to everything but far away from the noise. The whole building was recently renovated. I would definitely stay there again.
St Christophers At The Winston is nice.

Very nice apartment, close to public transport. Modern apartment, nicely decorated, spacious feeling.
We had a wonderful time!

Foi tudo perfeito na hospedagem de Collin, localização excelente e espaço muito confortável, estávamos em 4 pessoas e fizemos tudo a pé, próximo a mercado e ponto de ônibus. Collin muito prestativo, nós recebeu e passou algumas dicas da cidade, voltaríamos com certeza!

Great place to stay if you’re on a budget and looking to explore Amsterdam. CityHub is a block from a major tram line, there are multiple bike rental shops nearby, and plenty of other shops and cafes within walking distance. The rooms are small but have just enough space and the bed was quite comfy. The employees were friendly and welcoming, too.
Nice place to have a good time directly in the center of Amsterdam.
Auberge de jeunesse très sympathique, idéalement bien située!
Great location, calm appartment, and staff was lovely! Thanks for this great trip

Очень чистые  просторные и тихие апартаменты в 5 минутах пешком от центрального вокзала. Удобные матрасы, вся необходимая посуда и кухонные принадлежности.  Очень отзывчивый персонал. Горячо рекомендую доя краткого визита в Амстердам
Great stay!

Maarten’s place was very centrally located in regards to a variety of many interests. It was very close to many museums as well as many other or the centrally locates attractions and restaurants. Sparkling clean, private, and prepared with everything you’d need.

Beautiful place in an ideal location. I’ve stayed at 10+ nocarz’s in the past year and this one was my favorite. Very clean, all brand new and the hosts were very accommodating. If you’re considering booking this, do it. There’s a ton within walking distance but is in a quiet area. 10/10!
We loved everything about CityHub! Such a cool idea and so clean. We felt safe and the staff was always so helpful. Definitely recommend!
Great place to stay! Fun environment and friendly staff!
Great place to stay! Very cool rooms and friendly staff! They have everything needed for a successful trip in Amsterdam!
Excelente ubicación, jasper muy amable, limpieza buena y el apartamento tal y como se ve en las fotos.

Not only the location is great (everything is nearby), but Maarten warm and caring welcome sets the ambiance to a nice comfortable and peaceful stay. We'll be back again when traveling to Amsterdam. Many Thanks!
The place is clean and the locations super. Good for short-term stay. you need windows after a couple of days.
Room is decent. Further out than expected 15 minute walk or so into the main areas

An absolutely loving, small apartment in a great neighborhood. Everything was how described. Patrick was very reliable, nice and helping. Really beautiful place in one of the best neighborhoods of Amsterdam. Check In and Out very very smooth and comfortable.

Very nice place, easily accessible from the airport and right by the metro. Apartment with a separate entrance lying within a 15-20min walk from many of Amsterdam's attractions. Inside clean and comfortable. The host very nice and helpful. Highly recommend.

Maarten’s studio was very comfortable and extremely well-located, only 10 minutes walk from the Rijksmuseum. Although being central, it is also quiet, in a beautiful 17th-century house, overlooking the canal. The studio is on the lower ground floor but was not dark when we visited in October. Maarten was very accommodating and let us leave our luggage after the check-out time as our plane wasn’t until the evening. Lots of great cafés for breakfast within a few metres and restaurants also close by. Would highly recommend.
fantastic location!! bit loud outside when you try to sleep but other than that fantastic
Un quartier tranquille, un endroit confortable. Des hôtes charmants. Que rêvez de mieux pour visiter cette magnifique ville?
Lovely host and lovely spot, highly recommend!

Wonderful stay. Location was perfect for us — very close to attractions and walkable to everything we wanted to do but not so in the middle of the crowd so it was quieter at night. Super clean and tidy apartment — nicely appointed all around. Would stay again in a heartbeat!

My husband and I loved staying at Noortje’s home during our trip to Amsterdam! Every detail in the apartment is stylish and you will love coming home to this place after spending the day walking around the beautiful city. Noortje’s communication was great leading up to the reservation as well as during our trip. Check-in/out was extremely simple.
De Pijp is a fantastic area and Noortje’s place is located near trendy bars, restaurants and shops. It is a great neighborhood to explore and also very convenient to walk/cycle/public transport around the city. We really appreciated that Noortje left a detailed list of local recommendations and information about the apartment. We checked out and loved many of her recommendations. We also loved the bottle of wine that was perfect to enjoy on our jet lagged first night 😊.
The one thing to note is that the bed is made up of two mattresses which are covered over by one top pad. I think for most this would not be a big deal, but for couples who sleep in the middle of the bed be prepared to manage feeling like you are in a “crack”. Noortje was totally forthcoming about the mattress situation when I asked before our stay. Other than that small thing, the bed is very comfortable and there are great blackout curtains to help you sleep in if you need to catchup on rest. I absolutely would still recommend staying in this place 100% and would happily return to this apartment during our next trip!

This is a great space  (larger than the word cosy suggests!) Ideal for a couple. Great neighbourhood with easy and quick access on trams to all parts of Amsterdam. Anneke was a responsive, helpful host and very flexible (eg she allowed an early check in and stored our luggage for us on our last day) The space is clean and modern. Strongly recommend and would definitively stay here again!
Super süsse Unterkunft. Ganz tolle Gastgeberin. War sehr unkompliziert und hat immer in kürzester Zeit auf Nachrichten geantwortet!

Super séjour à Amsterdam. Très bien accueilli par Amar, malgré la barrière de la langue. Nous avons su dialoguer.
L’appartement est plutôt bien placé, à 15/20 min du centre ville (de la place DAM).
Seul point faible, le lit... en contact direct avec le sol, car lit en mezzanine (un peu mal au dos le matin)...
mais sinon tout était top ! 👍🏼
Great Stay!
He is great, helpful, warm and kind host! We enjoy our stay! The home is so clean and smells so good. I highly recommend this flat to you! Thank you Amar!
I would recommend Amar's place to anyone. Very unique style and feel, and a great location. Amar is a very nice and helpful host.
we had a great experience in this place.
Erittäin siisti ja mukava. Henkilökunta oli erittäin mukava

My husband and I loved staying at Menno's place in Amsterdam.  The room is spacious and clean, the bed is comfortable, and the location is outstanding.  We were very close to great restaurants and transportation.  Also, our host gave us great recommendations for restaurants, and he responded very quickly to our questions.  We would definitely stay here again.
Amar was the greatest host. We would go back to the place just because of his hospitality
Excellent experience - fun place to stay and experience Amsterdam. Particularly happy with instructions and communication - could not have been better or easier!

I had a great stay here! A little far from some things but not too bad of a walk. Just be prepared to climb stairs! He helped us get up but we felt so bad they are very old stairs since the home is old itself. Other than this we had an absolutely amazing time.

Très agréables !
On a adoré !
A Faire et refaire !

Amar è davvero molto gentile!
Soprattutto molto disponibile.
Ci ha aspettato all’ entrata del palazzo per spiegarci bene come accedere all’appartamento, dandoci anche qualche consiglio su come muoverci nei dintorni!

Lage top
Freundlich
Klimatisiert
Schnelle rücksprache

Incredible apartment with an even better location . Simon was a truly great host! Meeting us with a massive smile and wealth of knowledge, Simon helped make everything a smooth transition and even sent us on our way with more of an insight into the local spots. The location of this apartment is what makes it so great. A quick walk to so many iconic spots, this apartment made for the perfect base to have while situated in the heart of Amsterdam. Perfect for a couple this truly was a wonderful experience.
Cute place with easy transportation
Location is fantastic, especially if you dare to take out a bike during your stay. Thanks for your easy communication and flexibility!

Menno and Simon’s place is even nicer in person than the photos.  It’s a lovely, large room with lots of light! The bathroom is huge and the whirlpool tub is a treat after sightseeing all day. Good shower, too, with ample hot water.  There is a large closet-with extra dishes and linens-for those of us who like to unpack ;-).  And the elevator is bonus if you’ve ever carried your bags up stairs in traditional Amsterdam buildings.  We really enjoyed the location with plenty of good restaurants and cafes close by.  We felt so pampered by our attentive host in this beautiful space!

This was our first time staying at a CityHub and we loved it! The entire process was super simple and there’s always someone at the front desk to help. The hub itself is pretty unique and everything was super clean.
Tem tudo o que vc precisa!!!
Everything was great, best shower I’ve had.

Ha sido un gusto poder alojarme allí. Fui con mi perrita, y todo el personal se mostró muy amable y cariñoso con ella. Nos pusieron muchísimas facilidades y, además, tuvimos lavadora propia en el apartamento.

Ce logement est idéal pour découvrir Amsterdam. L'accueil est très chaleureux. Le quartier est très calme et agréable. Nous avons découvert Amsterdam à pied principalement mais des trams passent juste à côté de Wittenberg. Nous y réserverions à nouveau sans hésiter !

Soggiorno piacevole e reso ancora più semplice dagli host, sempre pronti a rispondere alle tue domande e a dare consigli.
Camere come in descrizione, pulite e con l’essenziale.
Sicuramente prima scelta per il futuro!

lovely peaceful houseboat ♥️
Arie is a lovely attentive host.
Es ist ein sehr einfaches aber Gutes Hotel.
Everything was fine.

Silvana’s flat is my favorite nocarz I’ve booked in over 8 years of using the app. I wish I could convey how beautiful the flat is — the pictures do not do it justice. There is an overwhelming amount of space and light in the flat. The private rooftop terrace and the farmers market at the end of the block were wonderful surprises. Silvana herself is incredibly kind and thoughtful. I cannot wait to be back in Amsterdam and in this nocarz.
It was overall nice but it was little too far away from the center and the price was a bit high for sheering a bathroom and showers.
Excellent accommodation, really central location, the cutest car in reception and super friendly staff!

The place is so nice if you look for quiet place and also close to tourist places, Also using ferry was nice experience to me and is for free and Joost describe everything very will also he put paper with all recommendations for example best restaurant , where you can rent bike cycles , WIFI details
I love it

A great choice for a short travel, a cheaper option that still offers a necessary privacy (and enough space!) compared to the ordinary dorms. The place is surrounded by some nice restaurants with tasty dinners. It is easy to rent a bike directly from the Host, however, the city center is in a walking distance from the hub.

Lovely spot, perfect for two. Great location for where we wanted to go. Really enjoyed being near the canals and the neighbourhoods which were filled with cafes and shops. The room was clean and easy to get to. Jacquelien was friendly and made the whole trip super easy. Definitely would stay again!

Cozy appartement in the heart of Amsterdam, so top attractions are within walking distance. Great option for 2-3 days stay. David and Artem are nice hosts, and it felt like home.  BlendXL bar is right there in case you're interested. Nights are a bit nosy there, still with earplugs we slept like babies. (they were included) The mattress is so good!!
Had a lovely stay with David and Artem. Fantastic location to see everything in Amsterdam. We were provided with lovely coffee and orange juice! Thank you both for a fab stay
Artem is a very kind person! He told me everything without problems, and he was always available.

Le logement correspond tout à fait à la description. Il y a toujours une personne à l’accueil si on a des questions. La chambre et les espaces communs sont propres et vraiment très mignons. Le seul moins c’est qu’on entend les voisins s’ils ne font pas attention. Bon rapport qualité prix !
Had a great stay. It's a cool concept and makes staying for a night or two in Amsterdam a lot more affordable. Everything is very well run, with a lot of thought having gone into every detail.
esta muy bien ubicado, los host son muy amables y esta muy bonito.
Un super accueil, très propre, logement bien situé.

David and Artem are fantastic host. It isn’t just a place to stay in A’dam, much more & feels home.
The location is incredible and even we are in middle of the center, NO NOISE. The flat is tidy well equipped and easy to access everything. They even offer more than they write in their description: warm atmospheres, phenomenal convos about Amsterdam and comfy bed!
If I need mention something I did not like, it would be the case to leave this place and my adorable hosts behind. I hope I will return soon. Thank you so much. :)

Everything was as it was written and shown in the pictures. All the spaces are clean, tidy, warm and welcoming. You can do luggage drop off before and after check in, and there is always someone there to help you or answer any of your questions. I especially liked the common area, there are candles, nice music and board games and it’s such a warm space. The rooms are very spacious and clean, plus you get a robe, towel and hand towel. Everything is thought of at City Hub. If I come back to Amsterdam I would definitely book here again. Thank you!
N

The place is really clean and comfortable, more comfortable than you expect by the pictures. The the shower room and the toilet are very clean and organized with everything you need. The location is really good. It’s really close from the airport and the city Central Station. The staff was super friendly and helpful. There is a locker so you can keep your baggage before and after checking  in or out. I highly recommend and will return.
Aside from a little hiccup with my booking, everything was okay!
Nice
Excelente todo, muchas gracias Jacquelien.  Saludos.

Paul & Mariana’s place in De Pijp is wonderful. It’s centrally located in a hip neighborhood, very easy (5 min) walk to RAI and easy access to city centre.
Paul & Mariana were both in constant communication prior, during, and after my trip to ensure I got the most out of my time in AMS. They are wonderfully nice and exceptionally good hosts to make sure you have a wonderful time.
Their place is clean, comfortable, and well designed. I loved it!
We were warmly welcomed, the checkin was easy and uncomplicated. The apartment was super comfy and in a clean and quiet area. I would definitely visit again.
Perfect little spot in a great location!

Le logement proposé est réellement idéalement situé pour visiter l’ensemble de la ville à pieds ou en vélo. La propriétaire habite au dessus, ce qui en fait un atout majeur, elle est présente et disponible pour accueillir les voyageurs, elle est très avenante. Le frigo était plein de boissons et d’en-cas, très appréciables quand on a fait une longue route. C’est très propre, le lit est très confortable, et il y a une télévision connectée disponible. L’espace salle de bain n’est pas immense mais très largement bien pensé, et propose des produits de douche géniaux.
Petit bémol, à notre arrivée elle nous a prévenus d’un problème de chauffage, un seul fonctionnait sur les trois, et il dysfonctionnait le dernier soir, mais elle a promis de s’en occuper au plus vite.
Son statut dans les meilleurs hotes de la ville est largement mérité

Paulien's place is great! Very nice and quiet base in a great part of town to explore from.
Space was perfectly clean and tidy and nicely decorated.
Paulien is lovely and gives great tips and always responds to any questions you might have!
Good communication, easy, nice houseboat. Everything good. Hope to come back soon!
really beautiful apartment and super nice host :-)
Appartement super et très bien localisé. Nous avons pu profiter un maximum. Nous y retournerons à coup sûr !

The studio is just perfect for a couple looking for a nice weekend in Amsterdam! The location is just right, far enough for it to be quiet and peaceful and close enough for it to easily accessible from the city  centre on bicycles and public transport. Leo is an excellent host. He is very helpful and approachable. He put some beer for us in the fridge before our arrival, helped us with directions to places we wanted to go, even brought us the food we ordered through Deliveroo at 4 in the morning! :P He even went out of his way to mail over to our residence in Paris a sock we had forgotten at his studio! :) Thanks for everything Leo! <3
Ariel is responsible and friendly. Here is really a good place for short travel. I love the furniture in this house lol.
Wonderful stay! The location was perfect, and just the right amount of space for a comfortable stay. Loved getting to be on the water!
Great place, Amazing location and very sweet hosts
Un séjour très agréable. Le logement proposé par Léo est fidèle à sa description, pratique, calme et chaleureux, idéal pour un couple 🌈
no muy buena
Very good location great host
Good for one night stay! Everything was good  except the heater. So we had to sleep with the sweaters as it was cold due to rain.

la casa di lois è stata perfetta per il mio soggiorno, bella , grande e accogliente. posizione comoda per il centro. la casa è veramente stupenda e corrisponde alle foto.
lois è sempre stata reattiva alle mie domande
Nothing better than feeding swans first thing in the morning right outside your bed haha! Great location.

המארח מאוד נחמד, מאיר פנים
מיקום מרכזי ושקט
דירה נחמדה מאוד וספקה את הצרכים לי ולשלושת ילדיי הבוגרים

Amsterdam à l’avant-garde de la modernité : un endroit parfait.
Lumière, modernité, Venise d’aujourd’hui et confort.
Situé à 15 minutes du centre ville en prenant le tram 26, le logement est l’endroit idéal pour être au calme après les visites touristiques.
Les amoureux de l’architecture contemporaine y trouveront le top de ce qui se fait aujourd’hui.
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour en famille.
Famille PIQUARD
Peet’s spot was fabulous! The renovation was done really well and is a great use of space. The beds were comfortable and location was convenient too!

Staying on the boat was fantastic
We absolutely loved it
Dani was excellent
Thank you
Incredible location and amazing interior. Highly recommend!
We really enjoyed our stay!  It was so fun to stay in a historic house in the city. The trolley system was great and convenient with a stop right in front of the apartment.
Amazing host: very friendly and helpful. Nice flat, convenient for 4 people. Thank you!
Great location, lovely accommodation, very responsive host. Would stay again.
Recomended!

Lovely apartment, beautiful location. absolutely perfect for anyone looking for a nice place to rest in a great location in Amsterdam. would definitely stay again.
thank you Ard

dont think twice - do it.  single best nocarz experience ever for me... and i been at this while both as host and traveler.  Thomas has the gift, makes it look easy and that's when I know its not - some real smart things about this place - Thomas well done.  I will be back
Perfect room for a get away in Amsterdam! Will definitely be staying again!
Beautiful space and location! Raul was very quick to respond and the walkability couldn't be better. Lots to do and everything is close, including the train station. 5/5 stars.
It was a great location, and Emmy was a good landlord. The apartment was nice and clean but overall was just a bit too small for us.

Mitch ist ein sehr netter und unkomplizierter Gastgeber und das Zimmer (mit geteiltem Bad) ist gut eingerichtet (inkl. Wasserkocher, Kaffeemaschine kleinem Kühlschrank). Das Beste war das superbequeme Bett. Auch das Badezimmer ist modern  und sauber. Das Stadtzentrum ist relativ nah, zu Fuß nur ca. 30 Minuten. Alles in allem sehr zu empfehlen! :-)

Rob and Myrthe were very friendly and accommodating. They helped us carry our bags upstairs and even sent us a list of places to check out while we were in town. The place is located a 5 minute walk from the train station and close to many restaurants (some downstairs from the apartment). There are a few flights of stairs which was fine for us but may be something to consider if you have a hard time going up stairs. Overall this is a great place to stay and Rob and Myrthe are awesome hosts!
Chambre idéalement situé dans Amsterdam. Elle est fonctionnelle et dispose de tout le confort nécessaire pour vos séjour. Je recommande Roben et Myrthe qui sont des hôtes sympathiques et disponibles.
Nice quiet room, fine location, great communication with Mitch
perfect flat , i recommand !
Super séjour, Mitch est très réactive. Le logement est conforme à la description et très agréable! coin très calme, mais près de la ville. Mitch est très flexible c’est un gros plus!

Wat een prettig appartement! Voor 2 stellen ideaal. Twee prima slaapkamers met toegang tot balkon ( voor rokers erg prettig), een fijne moderne badkamer en een keuken en woonkamer in 1 gezellige ruimte; comfortabele bank en fauteuil. Kaarsen om te branden, Nespresso apparaat met voorraad cupjes, allerlei producten in de keuken die je mag gebruiken. Wij voelden ons meteen thuis. We konden eerder het appartement in dan aangegeven en idem voor vertrek. Julius reageert snel en is geïnteresseerd en flexibel. Een echte aanrader dus! De wijk is heel levendig en de plaats van het appartement rustig. Goede tramverbindingen naar andere delen van Amsterdam. Er stond ook een fles Prosecco klaar voor ons, heel attent.
Very nice Room direct at the water. Perfect and flexible hosts with many good ideas and lots of help. Aware of small details that make you life so much better.
Very friendly and warm host. Beautiful private space and surroundings. Easy to walk and get to tram to city center. Would definitely stay there again!
Beautiful interior and apartment

Unfortunately for us our stay was too short. We loved the houseboat.. in a perfect location just around the corner from the Hussle and Bustle of Amsterdam.
Absolutely loved our stay and hope to go back.
Thank-you Herman and Karen
Ett fräscht och fint boende i typisk Amsterdamstil. Kan verkligen rekomendera
We really enjoyed our stay at the Minerva. Can highly recommend it. It is a very quiet neighbourhood yet very central. Metro, restaurants, NEMO science museum all within 5 mins.

It was a nice small and clean room, close to the train station Amsterdam Muiderpoort, which offers a direct drive to the airport, which was great for me with all the luggage hehe ;) Mitch was a very friendly and helpful host, he gave clear instructions on where is the location and took care of the cleanliness of the bathroom which was shared with another tenant. The room is small but the bed is big and comfortable. A small fridge and a water cattle are a nice touch. It was very peaceful in the evenings and I could get a good night's sleep. I am very thankful to Mitch to let me bring my luggage a day in advance since I was moving from another town ... Also, dear Mitch, sorry I left the two bags of my stuff after I checked out, but I was in a hurry to catch a very early plane flight, so I hope it didn't give you and trouble and you just throw it out to trash :))))) Anyway, thank you very much and I hope to visit Amsterdam once again! Best, Valerie

Ein sehr sauberes Zimmer im modernen Stil. Die umliegenden Haltestellen waren zu Fuß innerhalb von 5-10 Minuten zu erreichen. Der Kontakt zu Mitch war immer sehr zufriedenstellend. Auch Tipps zu Umliegenden Orten hat er mir gegeben. Beim nächsten Mal in Amsterdam werd ich das Zimmer definitiv wieder buchen!

Wir hatten sehr schöne Tage in Amsterdam. Die Kommunikation mit Linda war ausgezeichnet. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet, gemütlich und läßt keine Wünsche offen. Linda hat uns sogar mit Frühstück versorgt und es steht eine tolle Kaffee Maschine zur Verfügung. Die Anbindung in die Stadt geht problemlos mit der TRAM Nr. 14 Richtung Amsterdam Central und zurück. Die TRAM ist von Lindas Wohnung in 5 min. zu Fuß zu erreichen. Ganz in der Nähe auch nette Restaurants für den Abend sowie Einkaufsmöglichkeiten für Lebensmittel &Co. Vielen Dank liebe Linda, es hat uns sehr gefallen. Herzlichst Theodora und Sibylle
Great place to stay with easy access to public transit and other great parts of Amsterdam!
Lovely place to stay with great links to transport. Communication was great and Ivo was very accomodating. Highly recommend!

We had a fabulons time in amsterdam in an amazing neighborood  (De Pijp) and in a great house ! Near to museum, typical and also cosmopolitan restaurants. What more can you ask for ? Thanks to Joanneke, its house is perferct for a family, we will come back with pleasure.
Martin & Ada are very welcoming ! They gave us good advices for our trip. The room was Lovely.

Félix was very acomodating with my arrival time. Always helpful, and very responsive. The place is very cute, exactly as pictured, with a private bathroom. Be aware you do go through the entrance of their house, so you have to be considerate. Location is the best : although in the middle of downtown, it is in a quiet street.

Le logement est très propre et confortable. Il se trouve à quelques pas des stations de tram et donc également proche du centre. Natalie est tres gentille et donne des bonnes adresses/ conseils.
Nous reviendrons sans hésiter
No response after flight canceled, no refund.

Hôtel tout a fait correct ! Les chambres sont bien, propre et remis en état tout les jours si on le souhaite.
La décoration est plutôt sympa. On s’y sent vraiment bien !
Pour ce qui est de la localisation pas de panique une bouche de métro est juste à côté
très bien   bonne adresse
Her place is definitely perfect. It has lovely location so it's both great for taking rest and enjoying tour. I strongly recommend her place.

Hi Sandra,
thank you very much for the wonderful days in Amsterdam, which we enjoyed very much. Your houseboat was perfect. Regards, Tom
It was a pleasant stay at Pamelas Home, it was super clean and cozy, the Breakfast was great and you are super fast in the City Centrum, I can highly recommend it!

A perfect apartment for 2-3 people in bustling neighborhood with mix of fine restaurants and tourist bars. Quaint canals and massive museums a short or longer walk away, with adjacent trams, boats, and bikes to ferry you wherever. Stylish living room overlooks great Asian fusion restaurant, with bedroom in back with balcony over back garden. Adam is a wonderful host: warm, professional. attentive. I'd definitely stay here again.
Great access to city center. Cozy flat. Really satisfied.

Sue's place was a fantastic stay.  It is settled in a beautiful neighborhood, with lovely and friendly people.  Access to the food hall, bike rentals and breakfast spots are super close and convenient.  The cats were a joy for our children to play with.  The unit itself was very clean, and felt very much like home.  It was an incredibly safe space and we were so happy to have stayed!

Tzahi was a great host. He paid attention to every detail in making my stay a pleasant one. He kept me informed of local events and regularly checked in with me to see if there's anything that I may need further. Thanks Tzahi!
The house was perfect for our stay and Sharon was so helpful and kind. Highly recommended!

Sharon's place is lovely and clean. However the locality did not work for us coming to Amsterdam for 3 days. It is quite a journey from the centre and if you are only coming for a short trip I would not recommend this location. However the house itself is very nice. And communication with the host is quick, helpful and informative.
De host reageerde niet op reactie via website of via app. Kussens waren vreselijk en dat zou niet moeten bij deze prijs. Social hub is wel heel leuk en de locatie ook.

Chambre tres propre et bien decoree.
Tres bien place. Jan est tres disponible pour toutes questions.

Der Aufenthalt war super, uns war nur zu Beginn nicht bewusst, dass wir gemeinsam mit dem Host in der Wohnung wohnen. Aber sonst sehr freundlich und auch tierlieb. In die Innenstadt waren es ca 30 min zu Fuß. Gerne wieder!

Brilliant location, very centrally located so not bad value for money. Stylish and cosy but everything is not in super new condition and need to be prepared for cat care etc. Eline was very helpful and responsive. No lock on front door to flat (only to the main building) was a downside.
Cozy, clean place with a nice location! Great for couples, close to market and around 12mins to the Amsterdam central station. Recommend!

Mijn verblijf bij Jan heb ik als erg prettig ervaren. Jan is een vriendelijke en intellectuele man waar je een goed gesprek mee kan voeren.
Ernaast was zijn appartement schoon, was het goed vindbaar, reageerde Jan snel en is hij ook flexibel als je bijvoorbeeld eerder wil inchecken.
Mocht ik weer een adres nodig hebben om te verblijven in Amsterdam, dan kom ik graag terug!

Location is perfectly set on the canal and central to so many things. Tillan offered a second fan for the heat, a cheaper place to park our car, and even where the closest grocery store was. I cannot speak highly enough for this location, as well as the hosts. The pillows were also so comfortable, I went and bought some myself!
Logement propre et hôte très chaleureux. Petit bémol au niveau de l'intimité avec la douche se trouvant dans la chambre et caché par un rideau transparent.

The apartment is ideal for a stay in Amsterdam. It is close to the centre of the city and very walkable.  Any other city sites are easily reached by tram. There is plenty of natural light with the apartment's large windows. Adam promptly responded to my questions. If you are staying for a while there are small supermarkets close by to purchase ingredients, kitchen and bathroom supplies. The apartment's stairs are very steep, which is not uncommon in Amsterdam.
Great place!! loved our stay, very central and peaceful.
El alojamiento de Rowan es increíble, la ubicación es perfecta puedes llegar a cualquier lugar caminando, y el lugar es precioso e impecable, muy recomendado!!!

Absolute gem of an apartment. With a rooftop terrace and a beautiful living room area, you’ll find plenty of space to relax in this modern spot. Central to most of everything and very easy to get around. The narrow flight of stairs definitely makes for a climb with a big suitcase but once you’re up there, totally worth every second.
👍🏻🙏🏻 Great place in Amsterdam. Mati was so nice. Place was super comfy and clean!

Cute and charming apartment in a lovely neighbourhood!
Claudia is a friendly and responsive host and overall we had a very pleasant stay in her flat.
A bit of maintenance is required in the bathroom because the water goes everywhere from the shower...
Flexible checkout, Nespresso machine and the fact it is absolutely walkable from the flat to the Centre/9 Streets are definite plus though so I would recommend it!

דירה מקסימה , מתאימה למשפחה של 4 , מקום נקי , מטבח מאובזר , מיקום נפלא בלב שכונה טרנדית , צעירה ושוקקת חיים. המארחים קיבלו את פנינו וסייעו בהעלאת המזוודות לדירה (קחו זאת בחשבון בכל דירה באמסטרדם). הדירה מוארת ונקייה , נעימה מאד בילינו בה שבוע שלם. יש את כל מה שצריך , מצעים , מגבות , מצרכים בסיסיים במטבח, מערכת מדיה איכותית . כיף גדול בטוח נחזור שוב

Words cannot do justice to what an incredible apartment this is. The location, the layout, the decor, the bath tub, the shower, the perfect and easy communication with Manon.
WOW!
Will definitely be back!
perfect location to explore Amsterdam and lovely host. Mati has been friendly and helpful and proactive to make sure that all goes well.

Es ist wirklich eine schöne und sehr saubere Unterkunft.
Ich würde sie auf jeden Fall wieder buchen!
Kleines Manko war die fehlende Kaffeemaschine, aber hier konnten wir uns mit Instant Kaffee aushelfen. ;)
Vlad was easy friendly to communicate with and the apartment was perfect for our needs and well situated.

Julia was an excellent host. She was really considerate and answered any questions we had. The flat was lovely and spacious. It is also well equipped.
As another reviewer noted the stairs are of the traditional Amsterdam style so were narrow and steep. Once you’re in the apartment though it’s very easy to relax and enjoy the place. It’s located close to some markets and some excellent restaurants and cafe.
Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable!

lovely house & sweet host !
I had great time in Amsterdam and enjoyed the stay.
Thanks to Nick and Yara's house, I could feel like living in Amsterdam :)
Hôte très accueillant et aux petits soins.

Couldn’t have asked for a more friendly and welcoming stay. The bikes were easy to hire and use.
The food was delicious and the chocolates were the icing on the cake. Thank you kindly for your hospitality. X
Ruben’s place is perfect for an Amsterdam weekend break. The location is perfect, in a great part of town with access to everything. Apartment super cosy and everything we needed!
Everything was amazing!

Le séjour chez Wilco s'est très bien passé. La maison est située à 15 minutes en Uber du centre d'Amsterdam. Sinon il est possible de louer des vélos chez Wilco. Le logement est moderne, il est très propre. Nous avions le petit déjeuner offert tous les jours. Wilco et sa femme ont été très accueillants et réactifs par message. Je recommande !

Wilco is an exceptionally welcoming and easy going individual. From the moment you arrive at the location he is very helpful and makes you feel extremely comfortable. The guest house is located in a very tranquil area just out of Amsterdam and is the best place to come back to in the evening to relax after experiencing the busy and culturally/historically dense city centre. Mornings are equally relaxing as breakfast is fully stocked every day and you even get the chance to pick warm eggs laid by the on-site chickens. The rooms are brilliantly modern and equipped, maintaining the highes standards of cleanliness and care. I thoroughly recommend staying here if you are a family visiting Amsterdam or a couple who do not necessarily want to rest in the hustle and bustle of the city. Thanks a lot for a great stay Wilco!

This was my first time renting through nocarz and I can only hope that I have the same experience with another nocarz rental. Marit was so easy to work with. Her apartment is very nice and has a great number of very unique features. Marit's communication was excellent! She was always very prompt in responding to my emails. You cannot beat the location of Marit's apartment. Great restaurants all around; close to the tram line; a wonderful view of the city from her roof top deck; and a view of the canal from the front window that is hard to beat! And very comfortable beds! According to my Fitbit sleep score, I slept really, really well! I would highly recommend Marit's apartment. I know the next time I come back to Amsterdam, I would stay at Marit's place again. And that is probably the highest compliment and recommendation I can give.
The apartment was good and in the good location!

Preis-Leistungsverhältnis hat überhaupt nicht gepasst. Mini Zimmer mit einem kleinen Bett zu einem total übertriebenen Preis. Sauberkeit (v.a. Im Bad ließ zu wünschen übrig ... einige schwarze Haare der Vorbewohner). Kein Infomaterial zu Sehenswürdigkeiten o.ä. Internet war teilweise sehr schlecht, sodass man mit dem Laptop nicht mal ins Internet gekommen ist. Zimmer sehr hellhörig, über Duschen, Übergeben der Nachbarn etc. Hat man alles live mitbekommen ... sicherlich gibt es bessere Alternativen!
Merci à Julien, accueil impeccable, chambre super.
Es una casa hermosa, súper cómoda y muy amplia. Los dueños de la casa fueron súper amables.
It was very cool being able to stay in a canal home while visiting Amsterdam. Julien is very quick with responding to questions.

diese Unterkunft war wirklich perfekt. Lou war super nett, wir haben uns direkt wohl gefühlt. Ihre Tipps waren sehr hilfreich. die Unterkunft ist super mit tram oder zu Fuß zu erreichen. der Park direkt vor der Haustür war unglaublich schön. Wenn wir wieder nach Amsterdam kommen würden wir jederzeit wieder dort übernachten.
vielen lieben Dank an Lou und ihren Mann und den wundervollen Aufenthalt!!!
Marie’s boat was extremely clean and comfortable. She was very communicative and made sure we had everything for our visit. I would stay there again!

Una piacevole e divertente soluzione di pernottamento per vivere Amsterdam in modo alternativo e sentirsi uno del posto. Marie è un'host precisa, gentile e sempre disponibile.
La posizione è ottima: a pochi minuti dalla stazione centrale e con una breve passeggiata si è subito nel centro città, ma senza confusione e rumori molesti.

What a fantastic stay 5*. We were greated by wonderful Guido, who showed us around the beautiful appartment, very quircky and the painting of the map of central amsterdam was incredible. The park over the road was spectacular in its autum colours and the ride into town on the trams was great. I have been to amsterdam several times, but usually stay central, so it was lovely to see another side to the beautiful city. Thank you Lou and Guido.

I would love to say a big thank you for their beautiful flat to Laura and Daniel. It was an amazing accommodation where we could feel comfortable and welcomed like in our own house. Everything was literally like in the description and photos. All nice and clean at a high standard. We also want to say a huge thanks to our host Laura, she was very kind and pretty with us, she explained in the smallest details how to find the building, how to check-in, she even helped us with a to do list in Amsterdam for those who are coming for first time here and also an amazing list of shops and restaurants in the area where we stayed. Thank you Laura for your contribution to our great trip to Amsterdam. I will confidently recommend you to everyone who will decide to visit Amsterdam.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à bord du bateau de Marie, une expérience unique et mémorable !
Le bateau est idéalement situé, à proximité de la gare, du centre-ville et des transports en commun (métro, tram).
Parfait pour 2 ou 3 personnes maximum, il dispose d’un lit spacieux et très confortable.
À noter toutefois que le canapé-lit est moins adapté pour une personne de grande taille.
Je recommande vivement ce logement pour un week-end à Amsterdam !
Beautiful house with a nice Garden. We enjoyed our Stay very much!

Our stay at Mark's place was so amazing. The house was very cosy and had everything we needed. The bed was one of the most comfortable beds I ever slept and I loved the curtains around it. The location was very close to the Amsterdam Center. Every 10 mins, there is a tram 3 mins walk from the house and it takes less then 10 mins to the center. We would definetely love to stay here next time we visit Amsterdam.
We enjoyed our stay here very much. Everything you may need is there, it’s a quick tram ride to Centraal, and Mark is very quick to respond when you may have a question.
We loved the elegant room and living space in the houseboat! Our hosts were helpful and good communicators and we enjoyed every day in Amsterdam.

Roma's house was awesome to stay in - the place itself was very large, with a beautiful kitchen and comfortable living space. Also very accessible - about 10mins walk to the tram stop which was super convenient for getting into the city. Thank you for a lovely stay!
Very nice house everything was perfect!

The perfect landing pad from which to enjoy all that Amsterdam has to offer. Beautifully decorated, and in the heart of the Jordaan, the apartment is on a quiet canal, just minutes from the bustle of the Centre.
Thank you for your hospitality, Camiel!
Very nice place to stay.

The place is wonderful and was perfect for our family of four. Our kids loved the jacuzzi tub, and we loved the roof terrace to enjoy some wine and enjoy the views over Amsterdam. It was easy to hop on the trams or just walk around the city. The apartment was spacious, clean, and modern and still very comfortable. We would happily book it again. Of course, being on the third and fourth floors, you can expect plenty of steep Amsterdam style stairs :)

Vinay’s place is in a great location in Amsterdam. Vinay was also great to communicate with and left clear, detailed instructions for check in. Great apartment with everything you need. Thanks for a great stay.

perfect place,  perfect host. The apartment is the basement of Karanne's home but very private with its own entrance. It was like a large comfortable hotel room with equipped kitchen and bathroom. Karanne went out of her way to welcome us with treats, gave us local recommendations and is very responsive.  place is very central, easy walkable to all major sights and to public transportation

Mijntje was a lovely host and extremely responsive from the point of booking, the house was just as described.
The neighbourhood felt private, peaceful and safe. Bus and ferry into central was easy and great value.
Fit 3 guests in well and gave us a home away from home feel. Instructions were so clear that it was no time before we were settled in.
Thank you again for sharing your home.

Joris was such a great host - extremely flexible with check-in and check-out and super helpful with recommendations and always prompt in his responses.
