The apartment is in a great location - not far from everything and some beautiful views from front windows and on the terrace.
Jesse was a great host - he responded quickly to my messages and even helped me carry my heavy luggage up the final flight of stairs.

A acomodação é excelente. O co-anfitrião Daniel foi uma pessoa muito gentil e nos recebeu super bem, apesar de ter se esquecido que chegaríamos naquele dia. Mas isso não foi problema, o local estava super arrumado, limpo e não tivemos problemas nenhum quanto a isso. A casa é bem localizada, um pouco longe do centro, cerca de 10 minutos do metrô, que foi o transporte que mais usamos. Não recomendo ir se não gostar de andar, pois próximo a casa não tem atrações tão interessantes, mas é um local sossegado, com algumas opções de restaurantes e mercados próximos. A acomodação é muito boa, confortável, limpa, com uma varanda muito aconchegante para tomar uma bebida, comer um petisco e fumar. Sem problemas nenhum com nossa estadia, recomendo muito. Único ponto a se observar é que o quarto é no último (terceiro) andar e as escadas são muito íngremes. Se tiver problemas de mobilidade pense bem, de resto com certeza irá atender todas as expectativas. Muito obrigado Jesse e Daniel.

The flat was spacious and comfortable. We had everything we needed for a few days in Amsterdam: a good kitchen, a big living-dining room and the rooms were comfortable.
However, the people at the reception were not very friendly.

It’s a nice house. I like the fact that we had a kettle and coffee in the room as I enjoy just staying in my room in the morning. Host is really helpful and ready to provide local tips! My only advice (but that’s a thing everywhere in Amsterdam) would be to get thicker curtains. That wasn’t too much or an issue now though because it was winter.
We loved the place. Great location, bright and loved the outdoor patio.  Mariam and Clemens were friendly, knowledgeable and very welcoming.
It was okay

Great value for the location and super clean! The bed is very comfortable, the couch less so for sleeping but totally fine. Really large bathroom which was helpful for sharing a room with 2 other people. The bathroom sink had a drainage issue while we were there, but I imagine will be fixed! Definitely recommend if you want to stay in the heart of the tourist area of Amsterdam, was an easy walk to most of the sights. Riksh was also really nice and gave good recommendations for local food!

A really nice apartment in a really great location.
The apartment looks exactly like in the pictures and everything is really clean.

hola fue muy amable y sienote me apoyo incluso con o volveré al final de mi viaje con ella le deje encargada unas cosas. al principio me costó entender la ubicación pero una vez qie lo hice fue fácil. esta a media hora de Ámsterdam y también del aeropuerto así que es buena ubicación

The apartment is in a great, safe area that is easy to find and has very good local amenities.
The space itself is really great, good size and very clean.
The check in was easy, quick and pleasant, with a lot of useful suggestions too.
I’d stay here again definitely.

logement propre, agréable et bien agencé pour la surface.
itamar a été très réactif à chaque demande.
et très agréable aussi.
Nous recommandons ce logement et cet hôte.
The houseboat is lovely, cheery, well decorated and in a great area. Really loved waking up to peaceful water, birds chirping and sitting in the hammock and soaking it all in.

Wonderful and homely location on the outskirts of central Amsterdam. Christina is a great host and very thoughtful in both the set up and her responsiveness. Very clean. Kind of quirky. Great for a city break.
Jacob is a great host. Very responsive and the apartment was really convenient and comfortable.
Nous conseillons grandement cet hébergement!

Je recommande fortement !
Pour nous première expérience dans une maison d'hôte et vraiment pas déçu.
Nous reviendrons 😊
Everything was perfect, thanks again!

Ce voyage à Amsterdam était génial et c'est grâce à l’accueil unique d'Ali et à ce magnifique appartement.
Tout était parfait. C'est ma meilleure expérience nocarz. L'appartement est charmant et très confortable.
La gentillesse de notre hôte est indéniable. Venez chez Ali, vous ne serez pas déçu.
Nous pensions être excentré. Mais pas du tout !! Le centre ville est très proche en tramway et ce quartier est à découvrir.
Bref, n'ayez pas d'hésitation: RÉSERVEZ !
This trip to Amsterdam was great and it's thanks to Ali and this wonderful apartment!
Everything was perfect. This is my best nocarz experience. The apartment is charming and very comfortable.
The kindness of our host is undeniable. Come to Ali's house, you will not be disappointed.
We thought we were out of town... But not at all !! The city center is very close by tram and this area is interesting.
To conclude, don't hesitate: BOOK!
Great place by the river. The room is delicately designed with lots of details, and the bus stop is right in front towards city center. Would recommend it to others!
Very good ^_^

Frank's place is great! You cannot beat the location for exploring Amsterdam. And, the view from the living room is excellent as you look out at the Amstel River and the National Opera and Ballet House.
There is a lot of room in the property. The bathroom is very modern with dual sinks. The only caution before booking Frank's place is that you must climb 3 flights of very steep stairs with narrow treads. If you have difficulty climbing, you might want to book elsewhere.
Frank made check-in very easy. Overall, you can't beat a stay at Frank's place!

English below
Tolle Unterkunft für einen Städtetrip. Die nächste Haltestelle war super nah an der Wohnung. Alles war sehr sauber und das Zimmer total gemütlich. Der Check-In war unproblematisch und die Kommunikation mit Guy ging immer total fix. Ich würde gerne wiederkommen.
Great place to stay! Super close to the next train station. Very, very, very clean and a great cozy room. Check-in was unproblematic and the communication was fast and friendly. Would come again.

After spending a few months traveling Europe this was our last nocarz and it was probably the best one of the trip.  Great location right on the canal with nice views from the master bedroom and the open living space on the next floor.  Projector was a nice added bonus for those rainy days.  Would book again!

Brigitte was a great host and met us on arrival with a warm greeting.
Really easy to find just a few minutes from the tram stop and only 20 minutes from central Amsterdam station on the tram. A nice reataurant nearby too if you don't want to travel in to Amsterdam to eat. The room is exactly as described and is a good price.
Would definitely stay again.
Was a great family friendly spot close to parks and good food and drink options.

I had a great stay here! The location makes this a great value for money. With a bike the center of Amsterdam is less than 30 minutes away.
Arley was one of the best hosts I've had too. He put a lot of effort into making this a great experience.
Quero só agradecer o lugar e lindo , Arley ótimo anfitrião super simpático e prestativo , sem dúvidas irei recomendar a estadia , e quando voltar em Amsterdam sem dúvidas ficarei mais uma vez aí ..

Ottima esperienza, tutto ciò che prometteva l'annuncio è anche di più. La casa è facilmente raggiungibile con i mezzi e la fermata dell'autobus è a pochi metri, la camera è calda e arredata con tutto ciò che può servire oltre a moltissimi snack a disposizione! Arley è estremamente disponibile e gentile, non si potrebbe chiedere di meglio.

Great place for a city break! Evgenyiia is very welcoming and the appartement is very clean and quiet. There is also a nice view on the south of the city, and 2 beautiful parcs around the building. My partner and I enjoyed a lot our weekend. Highly recommended !
Poem’s place is located in the perfect area. It is large and airy and felt like home. We enjoyed our stay there.

We had a very lovely stay at Fleur's place.
The house is very cozy and clean.
Definitely recommendable if you are planning to go to Amsterdam.
Belle appartement, bien situé à 5 min à pied d’une station de métro/tram.
Sehr toll eingerichtete Wohnung mit allem was man braucht:) sehr nette Begrüssung beim Check-in. Komme gerne wieder einmal :))

Jurney’s flat was a pleasant surprise during our trip to Amsterdam. The photos don’t do this place justice! It’s been decorated very tastefully and is a lovely place to relax. It’s also in a great location, which is walking distance to supermarkets, bars, cafes and a tram stop. I would highly recommend!

Très belle maison , très spacieuse  avec une belle luminosité, 10 min en voiture  au centre ville , tout est à côté (transports public , restaurant..) , l’hôte était très gentille et accueillante , je vous recommande  ce logement à 1000%

We really enjoyed staying at Kleopatra’s house !
Amazing green and quiet place for visiting Amsterdam.
The house is really close to bus, tram and Lelylaan station.
Kleopatra is a very welcoming host and got nice local tips for lots of things to do there.
We strongly recommend staying there without doubt!
Holly was a great host. The room was very clean and warm. She offers coffe, tea and snacks!
Wonderful place to stay for a couple of nights.
very kind and helpful! would love to come back
Pase un increíble tiempo ahí.  Es un lugar maravilloso y la atención de Holly es impecable.  Sin duda alguna me volvería a hospedar con ella.

Très bon séjour à Amsterdam.
Logement situé dans une rue calme et paisible, une fois dans le logement nous n’entendons rien qui vient de l’extérieur.
Il y a tout ce qu’il faut pour passer un agréable séjour.
Décoration agréable, tout est propre.
Je recommande +++ !
L’Hôte est très réactif au message et nous a aidé pour le parking etc…
Rien à dire nous avons apprécié le logement et du coup notre séjour.
Merci !

Tutto perfetto
Host molto gentile e disponibile
Posto originale e piacevole

Our short stay at Lianne and Jeroen‘s hideway was very special and the beautiful location can be highly recommended for everyone who wants to experience Amsterdam in a unique and fancy way.
The place offers all you can think of for relax and comfiness: the sauna is great, both bed and couch are comfortable, breakfast was abundant and prepared with love and the choice of bubble wines impressive.
The location is as well in a lively area with quite some restaurant choices and with good connection to the city center (13 min by tram).
Thank you both for everything!
We returned home happy and relaxed. 🥂
Comfortable , great , homly

we had a wonderful stay in this unique boat house, Lianne is a superb host and covered everything very clearly and informatively, we felt very at home .
The facilities ...( sauna and shower esp) where great perfect for relaxing and easy to use.
we did have to get used to living on a boat for the weekend which was fun , you can actually feel very slight movement which is a novelty! 😁 Lianne was a perfect host ...the breakfast was amazing perfect everything you need and we had breakfast at the Bagels and Beans which was very tasty 😋.
would definitely be back and give Lianne 10/10
thank you for having us
xx
Sarah and Ashley

Pim es un gran anfitrión! Estuvo pendiente desde días antes y fue flexible con el check in. Nos dio tips y respondió siempre a tiempo. El depa está muy lindo, con todo lo necesario y el baño como nuevo, hasta con tina ❤️. Está muy bien ubicado, solo no lo recomiendo para gente mayor. Como todos los depas en Amsterdam, las escaleras son angostas.
Appartment was in a very good location, just like described in the pictures.
Nice place, however unless you’re height is 5ft and under, you will break a bone trying to shower.

Die Lage der Wohnung ist optimal für einen Trip durch Amsterdam. Man ist mittendrin und es kann direkt losgehen. Die Wohnung ist sauber und hat eine schöne Dachterrasse.
Was uns nicht so gut gefallen hat, waren die dünnen und nicht bis zu Decke gehenden Wände. Geht jemand zur Toilette hört es jeder in der Wohnung. Auch kann die Badezimmertür nicht richtig angeschlossen werden, sondern lediglich mit einem Haken zusammen gehalten werden. Ein 100%er Sichtschutz ist es aber nicht.
Zudem ist das Gebäude insgesamt nicht im besten Zustand und die Geländer zu den recht steilen Treppen waren bei unserem Aufenthalt lose und locker.

Location is amazing. Right in the heart of the city! As for the nocarz, there are a lot of stairs and very narrow, so difficult to get up with heavy/big luggages. If you’re going with a group of people, keep in mind that there are no ceilings over bedrooms/washroom, so you can hear everything from living room/in bedrooms. Also, almost impossible to take a shower without getting water all over the floor, so unless you’re a bath person, quite tough to get clean. Finally, there is just a small mini fridge, so not able to keep a lot cold/prepare your own breakfasts/lunches.

The apartment is very cozy, however, the seems way smaller than in the picture.
Location is great.
Suzanne provide 2 towels per person, however, towels are small and the apartments are pretty cold , which makes it very uncomfortable to take a shower.
We faced the issue with the WIFI but it was fixed shortly.
Everything is great, the only thing is the size and the warm ness of the apartments
До помешкання добиратися з центру зручно. Поряд зупинка автобуса. Помешкання чисте і охайне. Спілкування з господарем приємне.
Jose was a great host, the space was as described and very comfortable. Would definitely return.

Echt een super tijd gehad! Een perfecte nocarz voor als je een paar daagjes Amsterdam gaat bezoeken. Wij hebben erg genoten van het vondelpark wat maar op een paar minuten afstand ligt, en met de tram ben je ook binnen 10 minuten bij station en bij de stad,echt een top locatie ! Erg fijne en snelle communicatie! Wij zijn erg tevreden over ons verblijf!
Excellent place with wonderful decorating and a great location!

Had a great stay at Suzanne's place. Amsterdam is a wonderful city and the Oud West area, where the apartment is located, is as promised quiet and beautiful, but at the same time only a couple steps away from the cities beating heart!
The apartment itself is small, but has everything you need for a short stay and you have the place completely to yourself. Everything was clean and true to the description. Self check-in worked without a problem! Suzanne also provided a lot of tips for spending time in Amsterdam.
The only thing to note is that the bathroom unit is very small, so keep that in mind, should it be a problem for you.
Will definitely keep my eyes open for the place, the next time I visit Amsterdam!

Suzanne was a great host for our time in Amsterdam. The studio was spotless and was great for the 3 nights we needed. Only a 10 min tram ride outside of the city which was better for us as we prefer things a little quieter.
Overall great place to stay while your in Amsterdam.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, Suzanne a été très attentionnée et très communicative, merci beaucoup.
Toutefois un petit bémol, le fait que le logement soit en ville et mitoyen avec le logement principal, nous entendions le bruit des enfants tôt le matin (6h30-7h00) ainsi que le bruit environnant mais cela n’a en rien gâché notre weekend.
Merci beaucoup
Virginie et Pascal

We really enjoyed our stay in Suzanne's place. It was just like the pictures, in a great location close to a tram and in a lovely neighbourhood. Check-in was very simple. Thank you so much! We would definitely recommend :)
Everything was perfect. I highly recommend Corine appartement. It is a beautiful place close to everything by walk but remain in a calm neighborhood. Corine was super reactive and very friendly.
Paula is an excellent host. This place is clean and comfortable. A perfect getaway spot in Amsterdam!

We absolutely LOVED our stay at this cosy space. It’s a great location, wonderful neighbourhood with some great spots to eat and walks, and easy to get around the city on public transport. Paula was a really welcoming and beautiful host to have met, and you can feel they have thought a lot about making the space have a special feeling to it. Would love to come back some day! Highly recommend :)
Very bright and clean apartment in a convenient location. Great having the balcony and views. The stairs up to the apartment kept us fit.
Thank you for the experience to sleep in a real vessel! Recommended!
Great place in a fabulous location!

MERCI A JOOST ET MAGGIE QUI SONT DES SUPER HOTES.. GENTILS , ACCUEILLANTS , TOUJOURS A L' ECOUTE..
EXCELLENTS PETITS DEJEUNERS COPIEUX SERVIS A L'HEURE SOUHAITEE.
BONNE LITERIE QUEEN SIZE . . STUDIO TRES PROPRE, LUMINEUX ET SPACIEUX AVEC TERRASSE, CALME BIEN DESSERVI PAR TRAM ET BUS .
NOUS RECOMMANDONS VIVEMENT CETTE LOCATION.
Our host was very kind and welcoming! The area was chill and very easy to get transportation to the city
Good place for a night
We had a lovely stay at Ester’s home. It’s very easy to get into central Amsterdam via tram.

C’est avec un plaisir énorme que nous avons découvert ce lieu, studio hyper bien équipé et très chaleureux. Amsterdam Nord n’est qu’à un jet de pierre du centre-ville et le traversier est gratuit. Stephany est très réactive et chaleureuse. Des petits gestes pendant le séjour constituent un vrai plus, le jardin est parfait. Bref on y retournera
jason was friendly and the accommodation is close to the city centre

Amazing experience! The unit is super-clean, well-appointed and cozy. Everything you need is just outside, trams, grocery and a little corner bar. The views of the canal from the sitting area are one-of-a-kind. Highly recommend!

20/10!! This location is what Air Bnb is all about. Jay was an amazing host. Made sure I had great directions, met me at the bus, and was very hospitable. The house is amazing and the room/bathroom are pristine. I could have stayed forever!! This stay will amplify your Amsterdam experience, no doubt.

Wir haben uns bei Marcel sehr wohl gefühlt. Eine helle und schöne Wohnung mit kleiner Dachterrasse und allem was man braucht. Die Wohnung hat Charme, ist geschmackvoll eingerichtet und leicht vom Bahnhof aus zu erreichen. Die Innenstadt ist fußläufig erreichbar oder schnell und unkompliziert mit der Tram. Marcel war stets ansprechbar und hatte immer schnell geantwortet, wenn Fragen aufgekommen waren. Wir haben uns sehr aufgehoben gefühlt!
Dank seiner Restaurants Vorschläge hatten wir in der Umgebung schnell leckeres Essen gefunden und es hat uns in den 5 Tagen in Amsterdam an nichts gefehlt.
Definitive Empfehlung, wir kommen gerne wieder!
Eventuell noch wichtig zu betonen: die Treppen können recht steil sein, das ist aber überall/häufig in Amsterdam der Fall. Je nach Fitness/Beweglichkeit sollte man das im Kopf haben :)

Die Wohnung ist sehr gut, in einem schönen Wohnquartier gelegen. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und Idris war eine nette Gastgeberin, die uns auch gut beraten hat, wenn wir als Touristen Fragen hatten.
Die Katze ist sehr sympathisch. :)
Vielen Dank!

We really enjoyed the location and the lovely design of the nocarz. It’s super clean and comfortable. Tessa is a nice host and gave us some recommendations for breakfast ans dinner spots. Only thing we would criticize is the bed for a couple, it’s kinda small and has to separated mattresses. And if you have a soft sleep you definitely need earplugs.
Had a lovely stay. Highly recommended

Super séjour chez Ronald ! Nous nous sommes sentis comme chez nous dans cette belle chambre ! Ronald est très sympa et très accueillant !
L’appartement est idéalement situé au cœur du très beau quartier de Jordaan
La super intention d’avoir préparé deux bières fraîches à notre arrivée 👌

Rien à redire !
Un petit appartement très bien situé, proche de tout, cosy 😁
Ronald est disponible, à l’écoute.
Je recommande fortement !
Logement facilement accessible par les transports en commun.
Top locatie en zeer comfortabele bedden!
Lovely flat but ( WARNING! Steep stairs, its almost a vertical climb. Going down them can be difficult/ dangerous. The bed was also a single ply of foam.
Excelente anfitrión, muy buena ubicación, limpio y cómodo. Muy recomendado!

Loved the location, great view in the room, beautiful surroundings, walkable location, had a blast in Amsterdam.
The only issue we had, is I wish the host was faster to respond (16 hr response time) because we had to pay and find somewhere to put our bags for the day since we got in at 9 AM. It would’ve been nice to drop them off at the nocarz because dropping your bags off with a stranger at a smoke shop is iffy and gave me anxiety the rest of the day. She, of course, is not obligated to help us with this, so it didn’t go against her rating, but just know if you arrive in Amsterdam early, you may not be able to drop off your bags.
cute place in a nice location
Stanza carina vicino al centro!

The host wasn’t helpful nor welcoming, but fair. As I had to cancel the remaining 3 nights till i find an alternative because the accommodation had long steep stairs, which wasn’t in the pictures at all, even though it was described but with the entrance stairs only, which is misleading.
My issue is i have an injury, where i can not use these stairs on a daily basis, imagine using it with my luggage. When I arrived, i tried to connect with the host and ask her to meet me with no luck, and i waited for her around 30 min as she said that she’s in a meeting that will finish in a second as per her statement (how would you schedule a meeting during a check in time for your guest!).
At the end, i had to try taking the steep stairs with my luggage and enter my room without even meeting host and still did not meet her even when i checked out, as she’s avoiding to face the issue or discuss it.
But she refunded me, which was fair from her.
I just wanna share my experience with you all.
Nice apartment in a lovely area. Great hosts!

Unser Aufenthalt in Amsterdam hätte nicht schöner sein können! Es war einfach großartig – so herzlich, freundlich und hilfsbereit. Sie hat uns viele tolle Insider-Tipps gegeben, die unseren Aufenthalt unvergesslich gemacht haben. Als wäre das nicht genug, hat sie uns auch mit Getränken versorgt und uns das Gefühl gegeben, wirklich willkommen zu sein. Besonders aufmerksam: Wir durften sogar ein bisschen länger bleiben, was unseren Abschied ein kleines bisschen leichter gemacht hat. Vielen Dank für alles, wir kommen sehr gerne wieder!

We only stayed for a night to attend a show at near by Ziggo Dome.
The flst is 20 min away from central with great access to key locations. Clean well maintained and very organised space.
Definitely looking forward to stay there again. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
Robin’s apartment it’s really nice, well furnished, recently renewed and situated in a great position. Highly recommend

The apartment is great and in a great location. Apartment is roomy, clean, comfortable and has everything you would need. Rene is awesome, super responsive and very helpful. I would highly recommend this apartment if it is your first time in Amsterdam! Make sure to try the croissant place downstairs, super yummy.
The houseboat is perfect and cozy with an awesome view up close of the canals. Very unique and memorable experience!

Freundlicher, hilfsbereiter Gastgeber.
Jan -Douwe war uns Gästen zugewandt und hat uns Tipps gegeben.
Thanks to Julie, for a wonderful stay at her property! Great location and seamless check in!
Carlijn was a very good host. The apartment was just as nice as it was described. The neighborhood was very convenient and the street was a quiet oasis in the city.
Good communication with Patricia and we would definitely recommend this place to everyone. It was a fun experience to have a weekend on a houseboat 😊
War alles top gerne wieder.

A fan would have been wonderful, it was extremely hot trying to sleep at night. TV reception in and out.
The host was very pleasant, helpful, and responded quickly.

We absolutely loved our stay at Patricia's place. I would definitely stay again. Everything was walking distance and lots of lovely cafes/bars near by. Patricia recommended we go to the market just outside the property on Saturday and it did not disappoint. This was my 13th time visiting Amsterdam but first time on a house boat and it was fantastic.
Great location in the middle of Amsterdam! We stayed Monday - Thursday and despite the wet weather was a great place to stay
Een mooie en schone kamer op een top locatie dichtbij het centrum! Zeker aan te raden. Komen graag nog een keer terug :)

Rapide, simple et efficace !
Arrivée très facile grâce à une boîte à clé. Parfaitement situé, ce qui nous a permis de tout faire à pied.
C'était notre première expérience dans un nocarz et rien à redire, je conseille cet endroit sans hésiter !
A lovely stay, walkable to many fun places & super comfy!!
Très beau logement dans un cadre unique ! Les hotes sont très sympas et à l’écoute. Je recommande !

Beautiful apartment in the perfect location. The air conditioning was welcome and worked great. The host had everything ready and the place couldn't have been cleaner. A very short walk to major attractions like the Amne Frank museum and the Rijkmuseum. We would definitely stay again.

We had a wonderful stay! The apartment was in a great location, close to lots of wonderful restaurants and stores. We didn’t use any public transportation, but there were many trams going by at the end of the street.
The apartment was very clean and spacious. The stairs were very steep, as expected in Amsterdam, but there was a stair gate at the top of the stairs for safety.
There was wine, soda and water in the fridge for our arrival, along with some snacks. A lovely touch!
We were greeted upon our arrival and given a tour of the apartment and shown the amenities. There was also a list of restaurant suggestions provided. The owner was VERY responsive whenever we had to communicate.
We had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend to friends and family if they visit Amsterdam. We hope to visit again in the future.

Absolutely gorgeous apartment with quality furniture, bedding, linens and kitchen. Complimentary beer and wine was such a treat. The host communication was 10/10, even coordinating transportation and folding our laundry. The ability to leave our luggage after the checkout time was just what we needed. My only recommendation for consideration of this apartment is that there is no mention in the description or clear photo of how absolutely steep and narrow the stairs are. Bedrooms are downstairs so it’s necessary to use them. If you are travelling with someone who is unsteady on their feet I would say take this into consideration.
Mijn dochters en ik hebben heerlijk geslapen in North, fijn gegeten in de buurt en een frisse neus gehaald in het bos voor de deur. De meisjes vonden het jammer toen het verblijf er weer op zat.

This was hands down the best nocarz experience we've ever had. Tess and Jay were more than accommodating and greeted us upon arrival as well as shared numerous recommendations for things to do around the city. We were especially appreciative of the snacks in the apartment which provided us a quick breakfast on most mornings!
The apartment was incredibly tidy and had a fun vibe. This neighborhood was ideal for us as we prefer to be slightly outside of the city center. There were so many great restaurants, bars and small shops by us we wish we could've kept exploring! Even though we were outside of the city center, it was only a 30-minute walk (or a couple of stops on the metro).
We hope to return to Amsterdam again and would definitely stay with Tess and Jay again next time!

A very nice and clean apartment located in a lovely place close to the park, restaurants and tram station. Tommy is very responsive and always happy to help. I recommend the place to anyone who is traveling alone or with a partner.
Great location in a very nice place! Although is a “private room”, it’s VERY private. You don’t have to walk through any other unit to get into your room!
Parfait.
Nice appartment - very chill host

If you are looking for a peaceful, original and comfortable spot not far away from city centre ( few stops with a tram or 30 min on the bike )This Is It!
We spend 6 nights at Jess place and we could not choose better. We had everything what we needed, 2 rooms with a little kitchen, terrace with stunning Lake View. Jess provided us with all the things we ask for: towels, soaps, extra lamps, nice cheese, fresh bread,fruits, vege, coffee, tea and much more. Jess is very knowledgeable and helpful. There was a very friendly cat and my son make a friendship with him. We lived around the local people and Neighbours were super friendly to.
We would like to Thank you to Jess for being an amazing host. She is professional and kind. We are so great full for her hospitality.

El alojamiento de Jess es maravilloso, seguro, amplio, limpio, y además una experiencia quedarse ahí. Está en tranvía a 15 min del centro (diría que menos) y es muy tranquilo, la casa se mueve cuando hay mucho viento y eso es genial.
Jess por su parte en una persona amable, preocupada y muy generosa.
Volveríamos si o si a su casa nuevamente !

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The apartment is cozy cute and just as described with market and restaurants right across the street. Location was wonderful. Beautiful neighborhood. Far enough away from the hustle bustle but close enough to walk everywhere. Burak very responsive and helpful. Elevators would be nice...I know I know....😉
Mireille’s apartment was clean and in a wonderful location.  Communication and check in were easy.  Would recommend to anyone!

Mireille was a wonderful host, she was really friendly and welcoming. The place itself was really nice and main centre was with acceptable walking distance. Do watch out for bikes if first time in Netherlands, seems they have priority.

מארח מספר 1 באמסטרדם
דאג לנו לאורך כל השהות ותמיד בדק שאנחנו מסתדרים ולא חסר לנו כלום
הדירה במיקום פצצה ונקייה הכל משופץ וחדש מאד מומלץ

The location is good. lots of restaurants and caffe places. few grocery places.
Check in was great and host was very helpful. we did like the place and location.
However:
The biggest issue for us was the fact that it was really really hot, and the fans didn't really help. AC for this type of apartment would be great, especially for the rate we paid. We had to open the window and had people right under talking at the night and smoking, not a great way to sleep.
the toilet really small and person cannot fit there normally.
We will recommend the place to stay as it does have a lot of pros. just few small things for us made it a bit less good.

Maikels nocarz is a beautiful apartment right in the center of Amsterdam. All the nice spots in the city center are within  walking distance, which is amazing. The apartment comes with amazing service and a lot of really nice recommendations from Maikel himself. Communication was great too, the owners are extremely nice people. We enjoyed our time a lot and we’re hoping to come back soon!

Simple two bedroom that was perfect for two couples on a weekend visit. Easily accessible by tram, in the Jordaan neighborhood, great communication. Very pleased with our experience. Host is quick to respond and allowed us to drop our bags before check in while the cleaning person was there. 5-stars!

The apartment is perfect for two couples visiting Amsterdam.
The location is great with easy access to the centre and Mireille was helpful throughout our stay .
Thank you !

Lenneke was a great and responsive host! The apartment is a cute studio style with a small fridge and very nice bathroom, plus a washer and dryer in the hall that you can use! We loved the location on a small, active street between two canals with a handful of restaurants and shops at your doorstep. We walked to all the sites on our list, with the furthest about 25 minutes away (the big museums) but there was a lot within 10 or 15 minutes. Because this is a street front ground floor apartment there was some street noise during the day but it was pretty quiet by bedtime. Also note, if you are modest, that the tub and shower are open to the apartment (the toilet is private) but this did not bother us at all. A great experience and a great base for exploring the city.

This place was great. The neighbourhood is very beautiful and quiet, and the room gave us a good amount of privacy. It's close to tram/bus stops, and has some very cute cafes all around it. Georg is a very flexible host, and responds to messages very quickly. He made some great recommendations and even joined us on an adventure. Very lovely person to stay with. I would definitely recommend this listing to anyone visiting Amsterdam. What a beautiful city!
Had a good stay

This suite is in a great location. Close to the train station and walkable. Restaurants and sites all very close, walked everywhere for my 3 day stay.
The suite has a comfortable bed and a good shower. I booked because I needed to do a load of laundry - however only do dark clothes as the washer stained my white shirts and dryer takes forever. It was nice to have a Nespresso but there were no coffee pods so you have to bring or buy your own. Milk in the fridge was nice. No microwave - so it’s basically a hotel room. There was no key to lock the door which wasn’t in the instructions. So owner had to arrange to get a key for me. A bit of a safety concern not being able to lock the door when out of the suite for the first 2 days. Bring ear plugs cause you can hear everything above and beside and every time someone comes in the main door you have to slam it to lock it. Overall a fairly comfortable stay.
Superbe accueil de la part de Sake. L’appartement se trouve près de la station métro pour se rendre au centre-ville. Le logement est magnifique, je recommande :) !
Logement agréable, chaleureux et hôte accueillant.
A lovely spot to stay during our week trip to Amsterdam. Thank you very much!!
great position for everything and very clean, would recommend.
Very functional and stylish studio. Excellent location. Lewis is an attentive and. generous host.

We very much enjoyed our stay in this pretty apartment.
It is beautifully furnished, the bed was super comfortable and the location right in the city was perfect!
We wanted to make the most of our stay and arrived before the check-in. However we were able to store our luggage in the bike shop right across the small street, which was very convenient. The owner was super nice and also gave great recommendations on what to do and where to eat in Amsterdam.
Our stay was very lovely and we can‘t wait to come back!

A nice little studio right off the beaten path. Lots of reasons to stay here. Plenty to do within short walking distance. Clean spot and very comfy. Within walking distance of the train station. Would highly recommend to anyone coming to Amsterdam.

A beautiful experience located at the eastern part of Amsterdam.
Lovely design. Communication was great. Sauna in a barrel on the terrace. Great design.
Small things to improve:
Bed and bathroom door sqeech.
Some sunbed chairs on the Terrace would be a big top up.
Would be happy to come back one day.
I would book again!!!

L’hôtesse est incroyablement professionnel, à l’écoute et douce. Top!
Nous avons adoré notre séjour!
Lovely staying on the boat, had a really nice weekend stay! Thanks

Location was lovely and the space was comfortable and fully matched photos. Minor dings on having to constantly clean the outdoor furniture to use. Bugs were obsessed lol. This is a minor ding since I’m not sure what the property could do, but I did mention at check out. Front desk staff were very nice and receptive. Overall, great place to rest my head, do laundry in the evenings as I explored the city during the day,

Incredible appartment. The place to be for a break of everything. Will definitely come back.
Thanks to all the staff
Great time here.

Willian's accommodations are just what's needed in Amsterdam - a clean and comfortable place to rest and recharge after a busy day taking in the city and its many attractions, all while allowing one to enjoy the charm of a not-too-busy-but-lively-enough convergence of two canals near the outer limits (singelgracht) of het centrum of the city. You are just a block away from tram lines to Centraal Station, and of course within walking distance of both neighborhood cafes and important sights (Westerkerk and Anne Frankhuis are a simple left out the building and walk to the end of the Bloemgracht canal). Well worth the money, and Willian will work with you to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

Wonderful apartment, great area. Everything is walkable or an easy ride with public transportation. The little balcony is great to sip your coffee and watch people. Willian, the host is very responsive and so helpful with everything. He let us check in earlier!!!! Will come back. Highly recommend.
Very nice place and host 😊

Super kamer op een ideale locatie om de stad te ontdekken! Top voorzieningen zoals koffie, klein ontbijtje, vouchers van 20€ voor een lokale koffie/koekjes bar. Enige nadeel was het lawaai van in de nacht van de tram.
Appartement très propre et spacieux. Communication facile avec les équipes. Résidence sécurisée

Highly recommend Eric’s place.  It was spacious, clean, and very quiet at night.  It’s an apartment-style hotel and Amy at the front desk was so lovely - pleasant and helpful and able to give us great tips and directions to everywhere we wanted to go.  The apartment had gorgeous views and big windows, but blackout shades to keep it dark for sleeping.  It’s right next to Central Station but there was no train noise at all.  A bit of a far walk from the main attractions, but we enjoyed that for the peace and quiet when we came back from our day - and it was easy to hop on the tram at the station or just enjoy a nice long walk back.  Would definitely recommend to friends and stay there again.
Great location. Small room but enough for two.
Eine wunderschöne Wohnung,  perfekt für die Familie. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und kommen gerne wieder. Sehenswürdigkeiten sind schnell erreichbar.
Nossa estadia foi ótima, localização perfeita e acomodações excelentes. Próximo da estação central com fácil locomoção
Great location and spacious apartment. Would highly recommend.
Very nice and clean bnb. Hans is welcoming and very kind. The location is great to visit the town centre on foot. Very nice view on the canal.
Tolles Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis, Lage direkt an der U-Bahn-Station Bullewijk, von der aus man sehr schnell in der Innenstadt ist. Der Gastgeber war stets höflich und gut erreichbar.

I travel frequently and have been to numerous places. Willem’s home is the nicest I have stayed at!
Spotless, gorgeous, recently redone building.
He gave us a warm welcome, pertinent information, and really added to our stay.
I cannot overstate how beautiful his place is and what a gracious, welcoming host he is.
Thank-you!
This is a charming place in a fantastic location.  The room was spotless and very welcoming, Willem extremely friendly and helpful. Great stay!
Our stay was great…perfect location on the canal.  Everything was walkable.  Willem was very responsive…even got us reservations at the restaurant we wanted.  Highly recommend

The house is in a very peaceful and quiet area where you can reach with 20 min ride with metro from Central Station. Lisa allowed us to check in early. Asked if we are okay after we checked in. She is a very caring host. Room and bathroom were super clean. Equipments to prepare coffee. It was all nice. Definietly recommended.

The house of Peter is pretty well located! He also lent us bikes: we were in the center of Amsterdam in only 20 minutes of beautiful bike ride, lovely!
The room is nice and Peter is super friendly and accommodating!!
Thank you :)

Der Aufenthalt in Lijnderdijk hat uns sehr gefallen! Die Gastgeberin ist sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich! Das Haus ist wunderschön und sehr sauber, man hat alles was man braucht.
Wir kommen sehr sehr gerne wieder !! :-)

This place is AMAZING. Beautiful home, and it has everything you need. Lots of natural lighting and the view you have is amazing. To top it off the host are so sweet and loving. Location is perfect. You can go to central Amsterdam ether by tram or bike. Or you can even just ride the bikes they provide you around the beautiful neighborhoods that surround you. Me and my wife loved it and we hope to one day return :)

This lovely tiny home was conveniently located to the airport, and has a lovely view! The homeowner was quick to respond, and was very accommodating by letting me use her hair dryer. I highly recommend this nocarz to other travelers!

Thedie is an amazing host! He was so helpful and his apartment was tidy, clean and perfect for our necessities. Its location is perfect too. The check-in and check-out were super easy, which as a traveller is very important!

This little studio is at an excellent location on a quiet and beautiful canal, yet very close to Central Station and lots of restaurants and bars. It's cosy, practical and nicely decorated. Will definitely come back!
Lovely place to stay, very kind and helpful host. Would definitely recommend!

Le logement était super, nous étions plongés entre confort et calme.
Je recommande grandement ce logement.
Apparemment très sympas , très belle terrasse et belle vue , équipement suffisant
Joyce was fabulous and her place is so perfect! Would not hesitate to stay here again.
The place was absolutely perfect. Very spacious and has everything you might need. It was fun watching the tour boats go by and having our lunch on the little boat outside.

The houseboat is remarkably well-equipped and perfectly in line with the description and the pictures. It is well-located, very close to supermarket, bike-rent shop, restaurants (I deeply recommend Oceaan, just few steps far from the houseboat). It is very easy to get downtown in a while by bus n43, and get to Museumplein by tram n7, and the night bus n89 stop is close. The neighborhood is quiet.
Kris welcomes you warmly, giving you all the best infos about the city and more, she makes you feels at home.
You couldn't ask for a better host and accomodation in Amsterdam.

Our Boathouse stay has been just right! It’s in a great location and very easy to get to, and having the use of the bikes was definitely a plus as we were avale to cycle
from the house to the ferry port then leave the bikes there.
Saskia is a wonderful host and very attentive, with great communication throughout.
I would definitely recommend staying here.
Thank you Saskia!!
El apartamento de Rob está muy bien ubicado y se puede ir andando a todos los puntos turísticos de la ciudad
We had a comfortable stay at Rob's place. Convenient to get to public transport  and supermarkets. Walkable neighbourhood. Rob was nice and responsive. Thank you for having us.

Très bel appartement très bien situé dans  Amsterdam. Le tram est proche et amène dans le centre, location de vélo dans la rue hyper abordable, lieu super pour visiter ! Appartemment propre, bien pensé, décoration très agréable ! Je recommande particulièrement :)
Sabine ist sehr nett und freundlich. Ist immer hilfsbereit. Sehr schone erlebnis am Boat.

Sabine was an amazing host. She knew that it was my first time in Amsterdam and she was so very considerate to help so much. Initially my stay was for two nights, I gladly extended because of her warmth and generosity.
I liked being on a boat! It would be a tight romantic spot for two, for myself it was perfect and all the space I needed. Well designed.
I would recommend it to anyone looking for a unique spot and great hospitality.
great location for a decent price!

Ficar hospedada no Conscious Hotel foi uma experiência incrível!
O local fica dentro de um parque lindíssimo e anexado ao hotel tem um bar com um ambiente super agradável, uma carta de drinks e comida de muita qualidade e ambiente tranquilo. Em um dos dias que estivemos por la teve show de artistas locais e foi muito divertido.
A localização do hotel não é tão perto dos pontos turísticos, mas tem transporte público muito próximo, o que facilita muito.
Sehr schönes Hotel in schöner Lage!
Really Comfy

Entièrement satisfaits de notre séjour dans cet appartement et cette ville magnifique.
L’appartement est très beau et décoré avec beaucoup de goût.
L’emplacement est parfait, le quartier est sympa, proche du marché.
L’accueil très chaleureux de Tanja, sa disponibilité et son sourire ont contribué à la réussite de notre séjour. Nous recommandons vivement 😊
Had a great stay at Conscious Hotel. Room was clean and comfortable.
Perfect location, superclean and just an amazing experience to live on the water!

Wir hatten, auch dank der super Unterkunft von Sander, eine unvergessliche Zeit in Amsterdam!
Vom ersten Kontakt an bis zum unkomplizierten Check-Out war die Kommunikation und Abwicklung mit Sander einfach spitze! Sander gab uns super viele Tipps und Empfehlungen für die Umgebung und Amsterdam City-Center.
Die Unterkunft hatte alles was man braucht und war super ausgestattet. Besonders die Dachterrassen, egal ob mit oder ohne Hot Tub, waren beim Sonnenuntergang einfach ein Traum!
Die Lage war perfekt um fußläufig in 30-45 Minuten in die Stadt zu gelangen. Umliegend waren super Restaurants und Bars.
Wir können die Unterkunft nur empfehlen und würden definitiv wieder kommen.
Lex molto alla mano e ci è venuto incontro per anticipare il check in. È sempre stato disponibile e reattivo a rispondere. l'alloggio splendido
The place served all of our needs….great location, great host
3 bedrooms is hard to find in Amsterdam & worked great for our family.  Loved the location. Leon is very friendly & responsive to any questions. Thx for letting us stay in your place Leon!

Wunderschöne Location,
Schnell in der Stadt dank Fähre

Very nice and clean hotel
Staff very nice and friendly
The best
Très bon rapport qualité prix
Super funky and hip hotel. Great location next to vondelpark. Was so grateful for their bike rental. Love having the café downstairs for the morning. . Staff was super nice
Great spot with friendly staff. Renting a bike with them is a great option.

This house is absolutely BEAUTIFUL! Perfect location, amazing garden, and the hosts were so so kind! There house is so great, with everything we needed. We forgot some things at their house and the hosts were kind enough to meet us to drop it off, which was so kind!
Thank you so much for your hospitality, I highly recommend this home!!
Excellent appart/hotel, rien à dire, génial

Malgré l’impossibilité de pouvoir échanger avec Tina le jour du départ, ce qui nous a fait perdre 1/2 journée pour récupérer nos bagages, tout s’est finalement bien terminé (just in time).
Le logement est propre, très sympa, avec une terrasse commune très agréable pour se reposer après de longues balades en ville.
Le lit est très bon. L’accueil chaleureux.

We had a great time at The Tire Station! The room was clean and very quiet. We were able to check in right as we arrived, so we were happy to relax for a bit before going out and exploring the city. It's in a great location and everything we wanted to see was within easy walking, biking, or tram distance. Some reviews have said that the shower water pressure is low but we didn't have an issue with it! Overall a great place to stay during our time in Amsterdam.
Very peaceful environment & good place to relax. Walk 15 mins to metro and quiet neighbourhood.

Tom was pleasant and accommodating. His assistance with the bags on the narrow Dutch staircases was much appreciated. The street outside is undergoing major construction for the next six months, but Tom helped us navigate it. It was a great location - we were around many small restaurants and enjoyed the residential charm of Jordaan rather than the hustle bustle of the city center. The apt was clean and well-appointed.

Jackie really is a good host, very accomodating (even took our luggage up the stairs), full of helpful suggestions.  The room was sparkling clean, has a wonderful view of the canal, and is located in a quiet, fun neighborhood.
A nice stay! Everything was really fine, the location is pretty central and the host is very prompt in his communication

This is a great  stay. So fun to be on a houseboat. Clean and as described. Very updated for a houseboat. Dim lighting so be sure to unpack/do make up during the day light but coziness is unmatched :)
A fantastic stay in a beautiful part of Amsterdam. Would highly recommend!
👍🏼good stuff

Emplacement idéal au cœur de la ville, tout était parfait, propre et accueillant ! Merci Jessica pour ta confiance , nous avons passés un super séjour dans votre nocarz qui cochait toutes les cases ! Seul point négatif : le simple vitrage laisse passer beaucoup de bruit

Excellent value at this budget hotel. Steps from the metro station
Clean place and a very friendly staff. Couldn’t ask for more at this price point

Tout s’est très bien déroulé. Dommage que notre chambre n’avait pas encore de thème, (mais c’était mentionné dans l’annonce) les autres chambres avaient l’air tres cool. Ne soyez pas surpris par le fait que la chambre soit très petite, c’est le concept :)
hotel not hotel was the perfect place for us on our dutch adventure. Kevin bacon is full of very friendly staff and delicious food. best pad Thai I have had in my life!
Chambre très bien, mais peu d'isolation
staff was very accomodating and the place was really beautiful
Great stay great location. I highly recommend staying here

I really enjoyed the stay at Rogier’s place. It’s very beautiful and located at the core centre of Amsterdam. Major streets are near the nocarz so it’s very convenient to reach the location via Uber. I recommend renting a bicycle if you are visiting the core city. There are a lot of bicycle rental places nearby the location. Also, there is a grocery store right across the street.
Conforme anúncio. Ámsterdam é cara, lembre disso. O local é perfeitamente situado.
clean, close and comfortable
Awesome, clean, fresh, spacious, unique, and friendly staff; will be back again for sure
was great!

JJ was a fantastic host and the apartment didn’t disappoint. Perfect location surrounded by nice restaurants and a convenient grocery store. JJ also made sure the place was well stocked with the basics — towels, coffee etc that made our stay easy.

What a great location! Walkable for all of the main attractions in the heart of Amsterdam and a short tram ride to the outer rim of the city. Larissa was a great host and the apartment was just as described in the posting. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Gorgeous apt. Super clean . Walkable to centraal. Efficient host. Loved our stay there

Wonderful place! We enjoyed everything about our stay here... the hosts were prompt to communicate, the location is perfect, great use of space in the unit, and a really beautiful view!! The only minor suggestion I would have would be to add a bit of lighting above the kitchen sink. We would definitely stay here again when in Amsterdam. Loved it! Thank you!!
Ontzettend fijn verblijf bij een heel toffe host! De ligging is niet ideaal om Amsterdam te bezoeken, maar als je voor werk rond de zuidas moet zijn is het ideaal. Heel goeie ervaring gehad!!

Genevieve and Alex were both very kind and helpful throughout our stay. The nocarz is located a 12 minute walk from the closest tram spot in a quiet neighbourhood with a grocery store down the road. The bedroom and bathroom are pristine and look exactly like the photos. We didn't run into anything problems sharing the bathroom/kitchen area as other guests were clean and respectful. Would stay here again if we return to Amsterdam!
Side note- the room is located on the third floor up some steep steps so if you have mobility issues I would stay somewhere else.

Lovely bright room and spotlessly clean shared bathroom. The little shared kitchen is well equipped. Although Genevieve’s house is about half an hour out of the city centre, the brilliant integrated transport system means this isn’t a problem. I really loved being in such a quiet residential neighbourhood with amazing access to green spaces - I went for a run around the nearby forest and park and it was lovely. Genevieve is a really welcoming host. Not so many cafes nearby, but I walked to the nearby shopping centre and found a nice Vietnamese cafe in the nearby shopping centre.  As a woman travelling alone I felt very safe at her place. Would stay again.
Beautiful place! Perfect stay!

Bunk is a very nice place to stay really liked the decorations, the great atmosphere and how cosy it felt in the room.  I recommend the place and will most probably come back here on my next work trip in Amsterdam :) Bedankt;)

Great apartment close to the metro and a quick walk to local shops, very clean and warm, friendly hosts who are always willing to help.
Unfortunately the apartment doesn’t have a lounge and the kitchen is very basic, but overall a great apartment and would recommend to others.

Cumple con todo, quizas pecan de veganos ahorrando presion de agua por ser un lugar "ecologista", y yo que fui en invierno sufri no poder darme una buena ducha de agua caliente para recuperarme del frio. Pero lo demas, excelente! La atención fue clara y justa!
The design and location of the hotel are great! Downtown and a modern look. We had a room at the ‘Overtoom’ street side which was quite noisy during the night . Other than that a good stay!
very confortable
Great place to stay! Very comfortable and great location next to different transit stops
Alles sauber und gut, perfekt für einen kurzen Aufenthalt
Lovely hotel with modern interior. Employees friendly and supportive All the time. Overall very good

Appartement très agréable.
Pour visiter le centre de la ville, à pied c'est un peu loin. Mais les transports en communs sont facilement accessibles et permettent de se déplacer aisément, les vélos restant quand même le meilleur moyen de déplacement dans la ville.
Attention cependant à la salle de bain, dont le bac de douche était très peu profond et débordait presque instantanément.
Le sol est en béton, mais pas froid, donc aucun soucis.
Le frigo est grand, permettant de réellement faire à manger sur place.
Bref, à recommander !
Good spot, nice and modern apartments
Great place to stay
Loved the stay. The staff is absolutely perfect. The place is stylish and relaxing. Best location. Room is comfy, and stylish.

Wir waren 1 Nacht im Bunk Hostel und es war sehr schön. Die Leute dort sind sehr nett, Check-In war sogar schon vor der angegeben Zeit möglich und das Zimmer sehr sauber. Man fühlt sich sehr wohl und das kleine Café/Restaurant ist sehr gemütlich und der Kaffee sehr lecker. Das einzige, das nicht so angenehm war, war dass im Zimmer Klo und Dusche nur durch eine etwas durchsichtige Glaswand abgetrennt waren, also vielleicht nicht ganz so empfehlenswert, wenn man nicht will, dass man alles hört und sieht. Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Doppelbett und wissen aber nicht wie die anderen Zimmer aussahen und ob das dort auch so ist. Insgesamt ist das Bunk Hostel aber sehr sehr nett und empfehlenswert, und es ist auch relativ schnell mit Fähre und Bus erreichbar.

My stay at bunk was awesome, clean, great location. It wasn’t in the city but a quick commute and you’re in the heart of Amsterdam. Bunk was exactly how they show in the pictures, even better in person. Would definitely stay again and recommend for couples and solo travelers. Privates rooms and bathroom with late night snacks ATT he vending machine. Supermarket near by and all.
Limpio
Nice place for a 5 days stay as 3
Good place. Nice and clean. I didn’t really like the vibe though to be honest.
Enorm goed verblijf gehad in The Bunk. Met de metro is het makkelijk bereikbaar. Daarnaast super vriendelijk personeel en heerlijk eten! We hebben zelfs een nachtje bijgeboekt! Dankjewel. :)

The whole place is a vibe, even if you don't leave the premises you will still find yourself checking out the place and hanging about in the library / restaurant or outside area. there's a coffeeshop nearby and very fast transport to the center of the city. the location is amazing and its definitely worth the bigger bunk / 1bdrm room.

Great location, great welcome, spacious room and perfect bedding, I had a great stay
The parking is a real plus
I will be back with pleasure
Schöne saubere Zimmer mit ausreichend Platz. Bisschen ausserhalb der City aber Bahn/Tram direkt in der Nähe des Hotels.

Nous avons été ravis par la beauté de notre logement. La décoration et le confort ont été de haut standing. L'emplacement est éloigné du bruit du centre-ville, mais facilement accessible en transport. Le quartier est paisible tout en offrant beaucoup de restaurants et de bars aux alentours. Notre séjour a été parfait du début à la fin, merci beaucoup !
Bello bello

Was uns gefallen hat: freundliche Mitarbeiter, hilfreiche Tipps für die Umgebung, vielfältige Auswahl an Speisen im Restaurant, Nähe zur Metrostation Norderpark oder zum Fähranleger, cooles Ambiente.
Was uns nicht gefallen hat: die Lüftung der Zimmer. Wir haben nicht so gut schlafen können, da die Regelung der Lüftung nicht so gut funktionierte. Dieses Problem sei dem Hotel bekannt und man wolle daran arbeiten.
Parkplätze sind vor der Türe in einem "abgesperrten" Bereich für 12 Euro am Tag zu mieten.
Oli mielenkiintoista yöpyä vanhassa kirkossa. Hotellissa oli hiljaista ja huone viihtyisä, vaikkakin pieni! Ruoka oli hyvää ja annokset kauniita.

Last minute booking for a weekend with 4 friends. Nice price for our student budgets! Great and fast communication with host. The apartment was ready before the planned check in time, which was super nice because our bus arrived early. You can access lockers to leave your luggage if the room is not ready yet, or if you want to leave your stuff after checking out at 11am.
Apartment perfectly clean, great design, spacious, with a little closed terrace that we used as a sauna when we came back after a cold day outside 😊 The view is on the highway but we got some nice golden light for sunset!
Very confortable beds, big bathroom.
Around 15mn away from the outside train station Amsterdam Sloterdijk, by tram or metro. Around 30mn away from the city center. For a weekend, take a 48 hours transport ticket (metro, tram)! 13,50€ 🙃
Note that you need to pay a 150€ deposit and 25€ of city taxes when checking in!
The apartments are ideal for short and longtime stays
Un buen lugar para descansar, cómodo para la familia
Enjoyed our stay, everything was clean the people were helpful and friendly.  Loved the style of the space, very nice!

We stayed at Citiden's place with my colleagues while on business trip and it was ok. Flexibility of checking is great advantage.
Quality of beds and sofa can be improved however :)
The standard room is a little small but other than that it was a great place to stay, I definitely recommend
Hat alles einwandfrei funktioniert , vom ckeck in bis zum check out. Einiges Manko: es gibt keinen Kühlschrank

Tolles Hotel in sehr guter Lage. Es liegt direkt an einem tollen Park, welcher direkt in die Innenstadt führt. Obwohl es gut angebunden liegt, hatten wir ein schönes ruhiges Zimmer zum Hinterhof. Perfektes Hotel für einen Städtetrip!
Ist in Ordnung

Superbe ! Je recommande ! A 5 min du bus 21 qui emmène directement dans le centre de Amsterdam. Un appart/hôtel très spacieux avec des lits juste magique (bon dodo garantie). Attention une caution vous sera demandé à l’entrée.

Need to show COVID vaccination card to access restaurant at this facility and every where else in Amsterdam so carry your vaccine card and ID with you.  Also, be aware that fire alarm in the rooms are extremely sensitive.  If you have a limitation in mobility get a room in the ground floor as you may have to vacate your room through stairway in the middle of the night due to the false fire alarm because someone decided to smoke in the room.  We stayed for 1 week and had to climb down the stairs at 1-2am in two separate occasions .
Soggiorno bellissimo unica pecca è che non per tutto accettano cash.
Great stay - would recommend!

Superb days at Bunk and the kids where so enthusiastic about the place too!
A short walk along the canal towards the boat and a 2 min, free, ride to the absolute city centre. Still a calm place to stay for a city weekend.

La literie est très bonne et la localisation également
Dommage qu’il n’y ait pas de chambre séparée.
La fenêtre fermait mal
Easy to find and good location for a small group of friends travelling to Amsterdam for football
Cool place, felt like a maze sometimes, but we found our place in the end. Missed a bigger bin in our room, but lovely and helpful staff and great food in the restaurant. Happy to come back.
Bardzo ciekawy obiekt w starym kościele , małe pokoje i łazienka,  doskonała obsługa, świetne śniadania , blisko przystanek busa i stacja metro
Good place for groups 💯
Great place to stay, good location for access to the centre, would highly recommend it 👍
N/a

Fantastic hotel - check in / out was super easy, the room was lovely and clean exactly as described on the website. Really friendly and helpful staff, and we were able to hire bikes from the hotel for the day. Definitely recommend this hotel and would stay here again in the future.
Perfect place for a perfect price
Perfect 👌

We were pretty disappointed in this nocarz. The check in instructions include stopping to get a key at a station that is nearly two kilometers away. While it is at a location near where you mostly arrive in Amsterdam, this process adds another step onto your day of arrival into Amsterdam. Additionally, after planning for this, we got a message to just meet the host at the nocarz to get the key and someone will meet us. Check out instructions include bringing the key back to the drop off location as well. Another step that is unnecessary for a day of travel. The space is compact, which is totally cool and works well. The bed however is rather loud with slight movement and keeps you up at night ( coming from someone who is a heavy sleeper)
If you’re in a pinch, this space will work, however, there’s plenty of better options out there
The pros of this space were the location. Really cute neighborhood with lots of options and a tram to other desired areas in Amsterdam

The room was basic but bed was comfortable and the shower was good. There were dirty marks on the ceiling and walls, the carpet was burnt. It’s in an ok location, most places are walkable.
The room was mostly quiet but we were woken every morning at 5am by loud banging noises- sounded like someone doing a HIT exercise?!
Very disappointed about time taken to refund deposit - completely unacceptable
They were great! Easy access to public transportation
Tutto perfetto
Absolutely loved our stay at Paula’s, place was immaculate in the perfect area to stay in Amsterdam, we had a great time Thankyou :-)
We had an amazing time at Prinsen suites with a great room and a crazy bathroom. Can’t wait to come over again in the city to book this hotel again
The staff are fantastic the hotel is beautiful, and the location is perfect. I will definitely want to come back here!!! Love it

Es war wunderbar in der Unterkunft von Birgit und Maurice. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen. Die Anzeige beschreibt die Wohnung sehr gut. Man ist sehr schnell im Zentrum oder im schönen Jordaan Viertel.

Great apartment, although be aware there is only one true bedroom, the other beds are in a hallway. The location is out of the way, although it is close to a tram stop. It was clean and comfortable and the hosts were very accommodating.
Perfect nocarz, every detail was thought of, and full of beautiful character. In a wonderful area, close to canals, transport, restaurants etc. The nicest nocarz we have stayed in!

Me and my husband had a tremensous stay at Benjamins place. His flat is super nice and cozy. It is in a pretty quiet and calm neighbourhood. It is pretty close to the centre, especially with the bike. Benjamin is super nice and helpful with all your needs. Looking forward to our next visit.

A great home-base for walking Amsterdam, and conveniently located next to a grocery store, night shop, and take-away restaurants. There's a 24-hour concierge on-site making check-in seamless. The room was clean and as-advertised, and had a good wifi connection and a tv with cable channels. Will definitely stay here again when I return!
Great location next to Vondelpark, Room was nice and clean.
Great location, very close to the metro. Nightlife and shopping area and excellent service!
Muy amablemente nos recibieron a la media noche. Personal comprometido con la atención.
great location, close to the Heineken brewery, museums and the center of town
Het bed was echt super! Heerlijk op geslapen!
Lovely hospitality
Alle waren sehr freundlich und geduldig. Bad war nicht so nice, aber sonst mega gut! Lage top top top
Everything eas great, best part ia the staff, they are all very kind and helpful.
מושלם, מושלם מושלם!

Great location! Easy walk to all of the things we wanted to visit in Amsterdam and really easy to get to from the airport. The steep stairs were a little difficult to get up with our suitcases so be prepared for that. Otherwise great place to stay!
Prime location!
Adoramos a eatadia, voltarei sempre que estiver em Amsterdam.
everything fine
Excelente ubicación. El personal muy amable.
Rigtig godt sted i et hyggeligt kvarter. Det er super nemt og hurtigt at komme ind til centrum. Der var rent, pænt og roligt
Great place to stay and if me and my mates wanted to visit Amsterdam again we would definitely stay here

Super location, next to all commodities.
This house has a lot of charme.
Easy and quick check-in.
Helpful host and perfect position in Amsterdam, we had a lovely few days.

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay at this nocarz for our time in Amsterdam. Our flight got in early in the morning, and the host was more than accommodating with our bags. She is extremely responsive and pleasant to communicate with. The nocarz was clean and had all we needed for our stay. It was in the perfect location to explore the city and everything was in walking distance. We can’t wait to come back.

A wonderful art house with incredible interior design, coziness and an authentic setting. An ideal place to relax and rest after sightseeing in the city. Extremely clean. Amazing place to stay in Amsterdam.
great spot - would stay again in a heartbeat
Nice place!

The boat is so fun to stay on! We had a wonderful weekend, the location was perfect and the amenities catered to all our needs. The deck is wonderful to sit on, and the beds cozy and comfy. The boat didn't rock either, it was very steady, so no need for motion sickness concerns
I recommend this stay!

Had a really great stay in Amsterdam, and being on a canal boat made it even more enjoyable.  The neighborhood was quiet and quaint and near to plenty of city life.  My hosts were very friendly and helpful, and the cabin had a nice little refrigerator stocked with beverages.  The bed was really comfortable, too, so I had a great couple of nights of restful sleep.  If I had one nit to pick, the guest entrance/exit was a little tricky navigate and had a very steep set of stairs.  It was fine for me, but older or less mobile guests might want to be aware.  Would highly recommend a stay here!

What a great location and wonderful experience to wake up on a canal.  If you plan on touring around or not spending too much time indoors - this is an ideal landing place in Amsterdam!  Wonderful people too. Thankyou.

Ubicación perfecta, la cocina tiene de todas las comodidades.
Bastante ruidoso y pasan tantas personas por allí que a veces lo dejan todo hecho un desastre, le faltaba una buena limpieza a todo en general.
Super nice place and people....perfect location
superb place located in the centre . The host is very helpful and amazing.  Even helped with our luggage since it is located on 4th floor. Totally recommended

Good location but please note that for each room he has there are really slanted and steep stairs you have to take up to each floor/room. With luggage it was difficult. Additionally it didn’t look like one room that he had had a bathroom inside the room. All was out across the hall. The room was cute once we made it passed the stairs

I had a short overnight stay before flying out of Amsterdam. The hosts were communicative and the check-in instructions very clear and helpful. It was a quaint nocarz with a cute view of the street. Everything was very clean and organized. I would recommend if you’re looking for a central location!

Andy was the host. He was very kind ans gentle. The room has a interesting view from the balcony. The bathroom and the room were clean and this is localed near from the central city. Thank you, I will return!

A distanza di giorni, ricordo la nostra meravigliosa permanenza ad Amsterdam...mi sono innamorata anche grazie alla splendida casa che Jan Bas ha messo a disposizione...deliziosa, elegante, romantica e fornita di tutto.
Bere il caffè davanti al canale ... ci mancherà!
Consigliamo vivamente
Elena e Paolo
Beautiful bedroom, super clean. The pillows OMG THE PILLOWS felt like resting on a fuc**** cloud. I almost left with it.
Estuve muy a gusto!
离车站半小时，离机场1小时，离梵高博物馆和国立博物馆3公里，酒店一样的服务

We stayed 3 nights in Rene’s suite. A very good deal, we loved it.
4 separate beds in two different bedrooms , perfect for 2 couples or 4 friends.
Thanks to Rene for his reactivity and disponibility.
Great place in the heart of Amsterdam. Rene was an excellent host who was very helpful.
Estaba muy bien ubicado para mis intereses. el apartamento estaba muy limpio y era igual que las imágenes
Charming apartment in great location.  Highly recommend!

Amazing little find out of the business of city centre yet still very easily reachable by public transport. Super friendly staff and nicely decorated rooms. We'd deffo come back here again. Highly recommend for the price and a big plus is they are eco friendly. Loved it.

Appartement très spacieux et bien équipé.
Manque toutefois un peu d’âme et n’est pas très chaleureux.
L’appartement était relativement sale (rien de flagrant au premier abord mais on pouvait voir que ce n’était pas nettoyé en profondeur).
Assez loin du centre-ville mais proche des transports publics donc quand même bien pratique pour visiter Amsterdam.
Excellent service , easy check in and check out . Very clean apartment !

We had an excellent stay at Pauline's place. Communication was great since booking, and the check-in and check-out processes were smooth. The place is even better than depicted; it is very spacious (so much storage space!), with a modern industrial minimalist decor, and all the amenities you could wish for, including a smart TV and my favorite, a washer (and a convenient drying rack)! In terms of accessibility, there is a lift, no stairs in the apartment, and a walk-in shower. Houthavens is about a 7-10 minute drive from the Old town of Amsterdam, or about a smooth 15-20 min bicycle ride. We were there during Amsterdam Dance Event week, and were able to walk to a few events, including the infamous Gashouder :-) The apartment is 2 mins from a charming cafe, and about a 5-10 min walk to bars and restaurants. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there and highly recommend this place! We hope to be back one day :-)
Apartment was clean and tidy with a nice walk into the centre.
Great stay at this hotel location. Awesome restaurant downstairs and friendly staff willing to help with any questions or recommendations.

Eles me aceitaram prontamente após minha outra reserva ser cancelada, o local era fofo e todo sustentável. Embora não fosse uma localização central e turística era bem fácil de chegar nos pontos turísticos com transporte público. Amei minha estadia com eles.
Amazing
Really enjoyed our stay here and our visit in Amsterdam

Don’t book if you are tall. Extremely low ceilings. Place is really cramped. At the same time, the unit is kept clean and is located next to a nice restaurant. Place is located outside of main attractions, which some main find to be ideal. It’s fairly quiet except for constant bikers riding under the windows.

Such a lovely and cute hotel! The room was stunning! Very cosy! The stairs are fairly steep and ceiling is low by the stairs so be careful but apart from that I would highly recommend this place! They also have a beautiful resturant and bar on the complex and the food is 10/10! Host has great communication. Only an 8 minute uber ride into the city centre and cheap rates too! You can drink the tap water there as it’s a green zone so that is a great feature!

Really nice, cozy house in a quiet neighborhood. Home is tucked under another residential home (was part of the upper home originally). Great floor to ceiling windows and door to nice outdoor space. Home is close to a forested area that is great for walking, running or biking. Great pub near by and two bakeries and a pizza place too. Also close to park with kid play ground. Home has a cute kitchen and a nicely remodeled bathroom. Only complaint was that we happened to be there on a hot couple of days (80+) and it was a little warm at night. Host Daan was great.

Marlen et Yannick sont très accueillants et très sympathiques.
Si vous avez besoin de leur demander des informations sur Amsterdam, ils se feront un plaisir de vous renseigner. Ils ont fait beaucoup de voyages c'est pourquoi ils sont très ouverts. Ce sont des super hôtes. Je les recommande sans hésiter.
Muriel - Septembre 2023
Very nice place. Clean, cosy, comfortable. Most definitely a chill place. We were happy to stay and sad to leave. Thank you!

Chris was a great host, very communicative and the place was really nice (even better than pictures), clean and with all facilities you could possibly want. The location is just around the corner from Oosterpark and also near to Wibautstraat metro. Would thoroughly recommend to anyone  wanting to stay in Amsterdam.
xx
A cozy and well located studio, easy reachable by public transport. A very good hub to explore the city. Comfortable bed and nice interior! Helen was very friendly and took care of all our needs.
Können wir bestens weiterempfehlen. Super Lage mit schöner Aussicht .
Its a lovely spot, right in the middle of the party, but you can just watch if thats what you want. Theres people-watching one side, and boat-watching the other side.

Helena was very kind, responsive, and flexible. She let us leave our baggages before check in time and after check out. She gave us very clear instruction.
Her house is located in a very lovely neighbourhood with canal view in front of the house. Her house can walkable to many interesting spot of Amsterdam and really short walk to convenient store. The room is very nice decoration with a minibar. Bath room is clean. Bed is big and comfy.
She prepare snack, some wine and every necessary equipment for us. We had such a nice stay at Helena house.
Very nice cozy space in the heart of Amsterdam. Be advised that some athleticism and flexibility is required to manage the hatch and ladder into the unit.
une bouteille d eau  à l arrivée serait bien
Great central location and the service team was very helpful. Small room but tidy, good choice for those looking to explore Amsterdam.
Great location: near the centraal station and close to restaurants.

Very helpful staff, the location area is cute 20 mins walk from the center.
The rooms are quite small, with no possibility to open the window (-1 floor)
But the beds were good and the room was clean.

Hôtel très sympa, très propre.
Hôtes très agréable, très gentille.
Nousad ins était super bien reçu !! Je recommande !
Very friendly and welcoming! the staff are super cool! Clean and trendy Would 100% return ❤️❤️❤️
It's a good hotel and the staff was very communicative and helpful. I enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend it to others as well
Great experience, super helpful and friendly and really beautiful rooms.
a nice place to stay on a walking distance to interesting places
בסדר.
perfect!! clean, in the middle of everything! and super nice host!!

Carolien was a super friendly and helpful host, that was very responsive when arranging a checkin time. The flat is as described, cozy and very well suited for 2 people. It is close to the city center, with a nice park and restaurants on walking distance.
Strong wifi and as-described accomodations. Can't ask for much more.

Zeker de moeite waard om heen te gaan
Goede serfice top

Located 3 minutes from a tram/bus station, across from a lovely pond and a yummy Thai restaurant and coffee shop. There's a rainbow plaza in front with lots of families milling around that provides a nice atmosphere. There's an albert heijn grocery store 2 min in the other direction if you want groceries, however the small rooms don't have refrigerators. The staff was incredibly friendly, and did refrigerate or heat my leftovers for me and were quite accommodating. It was a lovely little place I'd recommend if you want to stay in Amsterdam in reach of the center, but not immediately in the hubub.

The staff is very friendly and helpful!
The location is close to a lake.
The people in the neighbourhood were friendly and welcoming.
We enjoyed our stay. It is easy to go by tram to the citycenter of Amsterdam.

This was a very nice stay! The room is a bit small but honestly, It did not bother us because we spent most of the say out and about. The location is very nice, a bit out of the center but with many stores around and a tram stop with like 1 min distance that goes directly to the center. Free parking was a big plus, we were very happy and would come back any time! Ah, staff was also super super friendly and helpful!
Nice place :)
Très bel hôtel, très belle chambre
Great location. Clean place! Would recommend
Sehr gutes Hotel

Svitlana's place was a hidden gem, exceeding expectations.  I was with my 19 year old son, but most places for 2 people meant sharing a bed and I didn't want to pay the cost of a 2 bedroom. The studio was perfect for us. Excellent design and planned out to make the most of every inch with clever use of lighting. It had everything we needed and more. The bathroom felt particularly luxurious! There was a nice little bench outside with tall planters to give a bit of screening/privacy. We were attending a music festival nearby, so near Sloterdijk station was a good central location. 1 train stop to Amsterdam's Central Station (5 mins) or 2 stops in the other direction to the airport. It was also only 8 mins to walk from the station, so easy enough to do with our trolley bags.  The best bit was the late checkout. It really took the stress away on the last day, as we had quite a late flight. Svitlana was always on hand to answer any questions. Would definitely stay again.

Nice and clean studio practically located 10 minutes walk from Sloterdijk station in a quiet neighbourhood. There is also another bus and tram station at 10 minutes walking distance. Communication with Svitlana was easy. Highly recommended!! Thank you, Svitlana!

Die Lage des Hotels ist toll, alles kann man gut zu Fuß erreichen.
