Wir hatten allerdings ein sehr kleines Zimmer zwischen den Etagen und der Blick aus dem Fenster war auf die Hauswand nebenan, also kein direktes Tageslicht. Ich hatte das nach dem Check-in moniert und man sagte mir, dass man mal schauen würde, aber letztendlich ist nichts passiert. Das Bad war winzig und ungeheizt. Am zweiten Tag ließ die Reinigungskraft die alten Handtücher (die wir eigentlich weiter benutzt hätten) alle auf dem Stuhl im Zimmer liegen und eine kleine (volle) Mülltüte aus dem Bad lag auf meinem Koffer. Alles nicht dramatisch, aber bei über 400€ für zwei Nächte...

We had a good time in Amsterdam due to Roel's great service. The apartment is nice, but because there is no real kitchen for cleaning dishes, it's quite laborius. All of our questions got answered very fast and the apartment met our expectations.
Everything was super clean and neat. Location is right next to the tram which is perfect for transportation.
Midway between the airport and the city centre, very easy to get around. The rooms are clean and tidy. 👍👍
Cozy place really close to Vondelpark! Everything was great
The stay was okay. Location was decent as there were many shops and restaurants around and the tram was nearby.
Always a good experience.

The housing was very nice and Joost and his wife were super nice and friendly. We felt right at home! The accommodation is not even 6 minutes from the train and super accessible on foot. Thus, one is also very quickly in the city center. We also had bicycles for rent, which were also offered to us free of charge. We can only recommend the accommodation to everyone in any case! We will definitely come back again :)
Très bon séjour, hotêl très propre et personnel au top !
Très bon séjour je recommande

L’hôtel est extrêmement bien placé ! Dans une zone agréable et dans laquelle il fait bon vivre… Celui-ci est à proximité d’énormément de magasins et de l’arrêt pour le tram qui va directement dans le centre d’Amsterdam. Pour l’hôtel, malgré sa propreté, l’accueil très agréable et le parking gratuit, il est trop chère pour la taille de la chambre… De plus, le déjeuner n’est pas compris dans le prix ! On vous le conseil mais économisez bien 👍🏻
Super Hotel und super Lage von dort aus ist alles erreichbar

Good location, really friendly employees and a big benefit is also the free parking.
Breakfast is also worth the money.
Downtown is reached easily via the trams next to the hotel.
Very clean and tidy, friendly staff who always said hello.  Thank you
okay, in der Nähe von Geschäften und in der Nähe der Straßenbahnhaltestelle (zum Zentrum ca. 25 Minuten mit der Straßenbahn) können Sie Fahrräder mieten.  ruhige Zimmer, bequeme Matratzen.

an easy choice for people who want a great stay at the most convenient location. the room was clean and tidy, and loved the small gift gesture from the hotel.
our room was overlooking the canal which added to the lovely stay. definitely recommend
very good stay, comfortable and clean place next to tourist places
Everything was wonderful aside from the room was incredibly small. The pictures are inaccurately shown.

Sehr kleines Zimmer, aber für einen 3-Tage Trip absolut ausreichend. Sehr einfacher Check-In und Check-Out. 3 Minuten zu Fuß um zur Bahn zu gelangen, mit der dann alles zu erreichen ist. 25 Minuten ca. in die Innenstadt. Zimmer war größtenteils sauber. Das einzige Problem war das Bett. Schlafen war die Hölle und jeden Morgen mit Rückenschmerzen aufwachen vorprogrammiert.

Bien correspondant parfaitement à la description et à proximité du centre ville.
Hôte très à l’écoute et studio très agréable pour quelques jours.
Séjour au top !

Chambre très propre mais très petite
Manque un petit café ou thé dans la chambre ainsi qu’un frigo à disposition pour le prix demandé
Super convenient location and close to tram! It was also very clean and practical.
O quarto corresponde às fotos, a estadia foi agradável
accueil par le personnel de l hôtel très agréable.  Logement très propre mais un peu petit. nous avons eu du mal à trouver l entrée.
Es war sehr schön und werden noch einmal wiederkommen
Great stay, clean, great location. Room a bit small but when you are in Amsterdam you don’t need more since you’ll be out all day maybe night also 😂!
Wir wurden super freundlich empfangen und die Ausstattung auf dem Zimmer war gut.
Bon séjour dans cet hôtel
Soggiorno confortevole
Prima kamer. Klein en redelijk uit het centrum maar voor de prijs een goede optie in Amsterdam. Parkeren bij het hotel (gratis) is top, pluspunt! Goede communicatie vanuit host

Rooms are small, but if you are planning on spending your time out in the city and only really need the space to sleep, it's perfect.
The staff are all very friendly and the place has a nice relaxed vibe.

Die Unterkunft war super- sehr freundliches Personal .Schnelles Check in- alles gut.
Wir hatten allerdings unser Auto im ParkHaus QPark gleich nebenan abgestellt und leider haben irgend welche Leute unser Auto aufgebrochen und diverse Sachen geklaut.Das hat natürlich ewig gedauert bei der Polizei und so weiter.Wir sind leider nicht entspannt nach Hause gefahren.
Great place! Very close to tram stations and supermarkets

Le pire hôtel de ma vie.
Le pris payé est peux être le bon à Amsterdam mais j aurais pu payé 15 euros de plus par nuit et être dans un magnifique hôtel Centraal Park.
Trop bruyant, les portes qui claquent les femmes de menage qui parlent fort.
Machine à café dans la chambre certes mais même pas une bouteille d eau! Une honte pour l hôtellerie.
Des poils dans la baignoire, des cheveux dans la canalisation, des taches sur la porte de la salle de bain. Et la taille de la chambre est vraiment ridicule pour le prix.
D ailleurs c était une réservation par erreur et vu que le remboursement ne concernait que 168 euros / 437… j ai préféré venir. Mais je ne reviendrais jamais dans cette hôtel et ferait très attention les prochaines fois.
Bon séjour
De kamer was schoon en het personeel erg vriendelijk. De tram was op loopafstand en er waren veel winkels in de buurt. Een aanrader.
no geral tivemos uma boa experiência, porém, acredito que eles poderiam melhorar a sinalização indicando a localização do hotel e pelo preço o café da manhã deveria estar incluso.

Tres bon séjour. Hôtel à conseiller.
Le personnel est accueillant fait les efforts nécessaires pour se faire comprendre. Un plus pour Jean-Paul qui parle également allemand.
Station Tram à proximité et simple d'utilisation
2 petits points négatifs : quelques difficultés pour trouver le parking en arrivant et la propreté des rues qui est effrayante, beaucoup de déchets qui traînent. Mais l'impression de rues sales est générale dans tout Amsterdam. Dommage pour une si belle ville.
Nice and cozy room
Great hotel and location. Not in the city center but totally worth for the price. the hotel is perfect, clean, organized, the staff are very kind. I loved the stay and will definitely come back.

Séjour d'une nuit mais ce fut suffisant pour constater que le personnel de l'hôtel est très accueillant et agréable. La chambre était très propre, nous avons même eu de petits bonbons en arrivant, top ! La localisation est top également, pas en plein coeur de la ville mais les tram/bus sont juste à côté et vous rejoignez donc facilement le centre ! Merci beaucoup à toute l'équipe qui nous ont accueilli :D Je recommande à 3000%

Wir hatten ein paar sehr schöne Tage in Amsterdam. Die Unterkunft hat uns gut gefallen. Alle waren sehr entgegenkommend, freundlich, fröhlich und immer hilfsbereit. Wir können das Hotel sehr empfehlen.
Séjour très agréable, l’ambiance général de l’hôtel était top !! 😉 À proximité des transports pour rejoindre le centre D’Amsterdam !! Parfait 🌷💗

The Q-Factory hotel is an amazing place! It is located in a nice neighborhood and it is near to a train station that brings you to the city center in few minutes. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff is competent and kind. A very nice place to stay in Amsterdam!
Cet hôtel est agréable pour un court séjour à Amsterdam. Le nécessaire est à disposition. Les stations de tramway sont à proximité pour aller au centre ville.
Burayı kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum

Hôtel accueillant et correspondant à la description. Plus loin du centre de Amsterdam que ce que j’imaginais mais le tram au pied de l’hôtel nous y rend en 20min donc bien desservi tout de même. Hôtel propre et petit déjeuner super, je recommande !
great deal and very clean place
Good . thank you

The staff were incredibly welcoming and helpful! Our room was beautiful and clean. The breakfast was outstanding! Our overall stay was great! The hotel is located about 30 minutes from the centre but it is closely located to the bus stop going to town. I would definitely recommend.
Très beau logement, très propre. Hôte très agréable, présente en cas de besoin et donne des indications sur la ville.

They are amazing hosts and very responsive! They opened up their home which is within seconds of all restaurants, bars and the Canal! It was very clean and they left a welcome beer for us! We will deff visit again! BOOK NOW! :)
Der Aufenthalt verlief reibungslos. Alles war ordentlich und die Kommunikation mit der Gastgeberin war auch gut.
Great spot for a weekend getaway in Amsterdam! Would highly recommend
We loved our stay here!! Would recommend to anyone who wants to be central with everything only walking distance!! Amazing, thankyou
Great place, cozy and very comfortable bed!
Nice place, a bit far from the main city center, staff was okay
War ein toller Aufenthalt, alle sehr freundlich
We had a wonderful at Elske’s home. Very nice and personable. We are going back soon  thanks for everything Elske
Great location we really enjoyed both our stays with Elske.
A nice tiny place for sleeping, with nice vibes downstairs :)
This place was amazing! Walking distance to the center of town, and very near local shops and a grocery store with really good food and snacks. Very cozy place with comfy couch and beds! 10/10
The room was quite small but it was exactly what I needed: a place to sleep and hold my luggage on my last day of my trip. The location was GREAT and super walkable!

After a delayed flight and spending most of my day at the airport, arriving at Roberto's place was a nice change to something calm and quiet.
Roberto gave clear instructions and everything was as described.
Easy to walk, Tram stop is right outside and everything worked out perfectly.
Roberto's place is well suited for a casual visit, but also for a business stay such as mine for a quick 5 days.
What I did not expect, was the almost vertical staircase and I had a heavy suitcase!
But from what I learn, that is characteristic of many homes in the country.
It was the perfect place to come back to after a stressful day at IBC.
Hopefully I can book it again next year!

No início parecia tudo como era previsto, o quarto e a casa de banho estavam limpas, mas assim que entrei na cozinha a limpeza estava muito má. O chão da cozinha estava sujo, o lixo estava cheio, não dava para colocar mais nada, o que fazia com que a cozinha não cheirasse muito bem e havia imensas garrafas vazias na prateleira, o que não dava nada bom aspeto ao espaço!

Nous avons séjourné chez Patricia durant trois nuits et c'était parfait 👌. Le logement et dans un petit quartier résidentiel calme à quelques pas d'un commerce. Le métro et à 15 min à pied et de la vous rejoignez la central station en 20/25 min. Patricia nous avez préparé des serviettes, du shampoing/gel douche. Dans la chambre nous avions un petit frigo une cafetière et de quoi nous faire du thé. Patricia a toujours été très aimable et souriante (tout comme son petit bout de chou). Amsterdam nous a convaincu et bien Patricia aussi 😊. Au plaisir de revenir chez vous ☺️

El alojamiento está muy bien y muy limpio. Además de que Patrícia y su hijo son muy simpáticos y amables. Se preocuparon constantemente por nosotros. Si tengo que poner un pero, es la distancia que hay al centro, pero bueno son sólo 20 minutos en metro
Patricia warmly welcomed us, showed us everything we needed, we felt like home right away. We also got some recommendations about restaurants, cafe, places to see which was really nice of her.

Super hôtel avec des hôtes très accueillants!
La localisation est à proximité de tout: magasins, tramway, pharmacie,etc..
Les chambres sont très propres avec le strict nécessaire.
Je recommande fortement!

Nous avons été ravis de notre séjour chez Lila. Elle est charmante et son appartement est parfaitement fonctionnel et décoré avec goût. Nous nous sommes sentis rapidement à notre aise, comme si nous étions à la maison. Le secteur est évidemment très achalandé mais tellement bien situé pour les sorties culturelles (musées) et pour le Parc Vonder qui offre un oasis de paix dans la ville grouillante d'activités. Tout chez elle inspire l'harmonie. Le seul désagrément rencontré, mis à part des travaux majeurs de reconstruction, ce sont les clients du restaurant Dyonisos juste au pied de l'immeuble qui peuvent être très bruyants (parlent fort) en fin de soirée, surtout ceux et celles qui sortent pour aller fumer à la terrasse. Ça peut être désagréable, surtout le weekend. Sans quoi, pour tout dire on se sent chez soi et nous avons passé une semaine des plus agréable chez Lila. Mille mercis pour son accueil et sa gentillesse en nous assurant le meilleur des séjours au coeur d'Amsterdam. ♥️
Good and easy
Personal muy amable, excelente ubicación, muy bien conectada y segura!
Tina’s place was even more lovely then the photographs. We truely enjoyed staying here and the location was perfect.

We had a great stay at Tina’s room. It was clean with nice, big windows and a nice bathroom. A great location for exploring the city! And Tina was very proactive and responsive in her communication with us.
很棒，周围环境很好，有公园和运河，可以很方便找到咖啡馆和餐厅，

Wir hatten einen ganz wundervollen Aufenthalt. Das Zimmer war ein Traum es gab sogar ein Upgrade wo wir uns sehr drüber gefreut haben. Alle waren so freundlich und hilfsbereit .
Die Lage ist super ruhig und schön. Man ist trotzdem zu Fuß schnell im Zentrum (ca45 min)
Wir werden die Unterkunft wieder buchen wenn wir nach Amsterdam reisen.
très bon rapport qualité prix l hote est disponible sur place merci à vous
Sehrgut
Dobrá lokace, 30 minut tramvají od centra, parkování zdarma, pokoje čisté, menší ale dostačující.

Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen, das Zimmer war ausreichend groß, wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt! Beim leckeren Frühstück konnten wir uns gut für die Stadt stärken! Bis zum Bahnhof/Zentrum braucht man allerdings relativ lange, dafür ist aber die Straßenbahnstation quasi direkt vor der Tür!

There is no laundry service and the hotel is 40 minutes away from the center.
Everything else is excellent, I highly recommend it and I would go there again too.
Sehr sauberes kleines Zimmer. Gerne wieder.

Maravilloso hotel ubicado cerca al aeropuerto, en una zona con muchas tiendas, el staff siempre dispuesto a ayudar, y con la vía de 17 de tranvía a metros que te lleva hasta al aeropuerto o hasta el centro de la ciudad en minutos.

We loved our stay in this hotel. It was a great space and very clean. The check in was also smooth. The free parking is amazing! We used the #17 tram which is right beside the hotel to get into the centre of Amsterdam. We loved our stay and would recommend staying here.

Lieu très appréciable pour un week-end en amoureux, idéalement situé à 2 pas du centre
Une première pour nous sur une péniche, c'est une bonne expérience !
Zeker voor herhaling vatbaar. Keurige kamer, lekker ontbijt, restaurants en  supermarkten overal dichtbij. Personeel vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Gratis overdekt parkeren. Bedankt!
Really good house, Thanks Petra 👍

O hotel fica do lado de duas estações de traim, que vai para o centro em 25 min
Região calma, tem várias lojas perto, McDonald’s e um parque grande
O quarto não estava 100% limpo, tinha umas sujeiras em baixo da cama (arrastamos a cama), o box é aberto o que molha o banheiro e lá não tem suporte para guardar as coisas além da pia ser fora do banheiro e tinha bastante pernilongo então levem repelente
Mas de modo geral fizemos uma boa estadia, pessoal simpático e disposto a ajudar, lá tinha secador, ferro de passar roupa, no quarto tinha máquina de café
Ar condicionado funcionando, roupas de cama e toalhas disponíveis e boas.
E limpeza de quarto disponíveis diariamente (não usamos)

Lovely modern room with plenty of space for two people.
The location has to be one of the nicest places to stay in Amsterdam.
Also nice cafes and health food shops at the end of the street.
Would come back for sure!
Marloes was really nice. Always answered very quick and give all the information you need. The appartment was perfectly located for what we needed. I would repeat for sure
This was a great place to stay. The hosts were very helpful and responsive. Highly recommend!
Belen a été arrangeante et nous a bien conseillé sur les lieux à visiter ! L’appartement est grand et lumineux

Thank you for a fantastic stay! The location was perfect, close to everything we needed and easy to get around. The warm reception and smooth communication made us feel welcome from the start. The space was clean, comfortable, and well-equipped, which made our stay even more enjoyable. I highly recommend this place and would gladly return in the future.

Ein super schönes Zimmer,wie auf den Bildern.
Es war sehr kalt, erst 2 Tag funktionierte die Klima/Heizung.
Die Handtücher konnten wir niergends aufhängen, da es kein Hacken gab. So wurden sie immer feucht. Der Gastgeber wollte uns keine neue geben. Das war zum schluss sehr enteuschend...:-( sonst super:-)

Liesbeth is a fantastic host with a fantastic home. I felt an overwhelming sense of peace as soon as I arrived at her stay. I would absolutely recommend staying in west with Liesbeth, this is my favorite area in Amsterdam but also this is a truly outstanding host.

Great hotel for the cost and really friendly staff. it's a little bit out of the city centre but the tram into Amsterdam is quick and easy.
The only thing to improve the stay would be more storage/shelves for belongings, we had a three man room and struggled with where to put all our toiletries. Otherwise, a great stay!
Personnel très sympathique et à l'écoute. Je recommande.
Zwar etwas schwer zu finden aber wenn man erstmal drin ist sehr gemütlich, entspannt und ordentlich. Geparkt wird im gegenüberliegenden Parkhaus und mit der S-Bahn kommt man locker und Zentrum.

El lugar es excelente, tal cual se anuncia, éramos 4 personas, camas amplias, cómodas, una ventana muy grande para luz natural, método de transporte super accesible, personal super amables las 24hrs del día. Recomendamos!
Zimmer sehr sauber, Personal sehr freundlich. Achtung beim Buchen: Zimmer sind klein
在这间可爱的公寓完成了跨年，Leo提供的攻略手册超棒，每天睁眼看见窗外的树枝，无论是什么天气都让人觉得超级美好，是这次阿姆斯特丹之行的完美基石！

Leo’s place is fantastic! Despite the narrow staircase the loft is bright and airy and a lovely place to relax after a big day of walking around in Amsterdam. Leo himself was helpful and flexible with checkout which was very much appreciated due to our delayed flight. I would absolutely recommend!
Lovely room. One of the best locations in Amsterdam.
Everything was perfect :)

Excellent place, Leo was super helpful and friendly.
Just make sure you are prepared for the many stairs which are quite small so taking luggage up or down can be a bit tricky but overall an excellent place, quiet, peaceful with an outlook of some nice trees
Perfect location right in the center of the city. Good for four people. Good communication from Hank. Proactive and responsive to issues.
I have never stayed in such a peaceful and sweet home.  Really great and amazing.  You can trust with your eyes closed.  Angela is an amazing host.  Thank you for your interest and everything.
Very cozy apartment. Great location. It was a really good place to stay

Loved this place! Very central location. Staying on the water was the perfect get away. Only issue was the shower. When taking a 5 - 10 minute shower, it would start to seep out of the shower and on to the bathroom floor. We had a very short stay so this wasn’t a very big issue but definitely notable. Overall a great place and host.
Ps…there are many great suggestions of local attractions and restaurants recommend by the host that were great.
Very good stay in the city center of Amsterdam.
Very nice place . James is helpful and welcoming. A perfect stay. We recommend .

On a passé un week-end génial.
L appartement est propre et tres confortable.
Un grand merci a James. Il est disponible et très accueillant.
On.reviendra pour le prochain Ade.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt, das Zimmer hat eine gute Grösse und war sehr ordentlich und liebevoll vorbereitet. Die Gegend ist sehr ruhig und hat viele gute Cafés und Restaurants.
Wir würden, bei einem weiteren Aufenthalt in Amsterdam, dieses Zimmer nochmals buchen.
If the stairs don't scare you, this apartment is perfect for you! Great location, quiet, and the cleanliness is irreproachable! Thanks again to Anniek.

Beautiful loft apartment! Highly recommend staying at Laurens’ place - it is a beautifully decorated, spacious loft apartment with everything you need for a short or long stay. Lovely shower / bath tub as well. The location is a short Uber ride from central AMS.
Note that this is on the 3rd floor walk up (with additional stairs in the apartment to get to the shower room). Wasn’t a problem for us though!
Perfect location, intense night activity, not suitable for early sleepers 😁

Carmen was a great host! nice and friendly
And she make you feel like home form the start
We will for stay here again 😊👌
Host amichevole e disponibile, ottima posizione e qualità dell'alloggio.
Highly recommend this property. The host was amazing and the location couldn’t be better

Arno’s apartment was beautiful and a perfect location for our stay in Amsterdam.  My husband and I loved sitting by the window in the evenings enjoying the canal view.  The washer was also very handy to have.  The location was great with a grocery store nearby as well as easy access to public transportation.  We’d definitely stay here again the next time we’re in Amsterdam.

Alexandra’s place was spotless and beautiful. It was walking distance from everything and had more amenities than what was described. We enjoyed our stay over the Easter weekend. Alexandra was responsive and open. We particularly appreciated the generous check in and check out times.
Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber  , Er ist auch Kommunikative, der preis ist mega gut .

Wer eine kleine gebührliche Unterkunft, abseits des amsterdamer Trubels sucht, ist hier genau richtig.
Die kleinen ehemaligen Fischerhäuschen in Schellingwoude sind der Traum. Alles etwas beengten, was der Charme der Wohnung aber wieder weg macht.
Auto kann direkt vor der Tür abgestellt werden.
Mit dem Fahrrad kommt man super gut und schnell in die Stadt.
Ein sehr guter Supermarkt mit Restaurant sowie das Café ‘t Sluisje sind gleich in der Nähe.
Sehr nette und unkomplizierte Vermieterin.
Can’t fault the place absolutely perfect

One of the most beautiful apartments I ever visited. I love it!
The bedrooms are extremely comfortable and cozy, there is a lot of space, nice bbq veranda, huge dinner tables. Nearby you can find Good supermarket, bicycle rental office and many cafes

Cherry and Nick were the wonderful hosts who welcomed me into their home. The private room was much better than I expected, with lots of room for your own stuff and the most welcoming of cat.
The bed was also a great surprise as I don't think I've ever slept that well in another bed than my own.
Cherry and Nick provided me with a towel, some place in their fridge and told me I was free to use their kitchen, even though I didn't, it was nice to know the option was there.
Thank you!

Such a lovely place in an excellent location within short walking distance from all sights! Janna was an incredible host and gave us lots of great restaurant recommendations and travel tips. Thank you for a lovely weekend!

Klaas’s place was absolutely beautiful, spacious and comfortable. It was tucked down a lovely road just off a busier main canal road, we didn’t hear any traffic or noise from outside (except a bit of building work).
Great apartment! Super convenient location, extremely well appointed. Looks just like the photos. The shower was great and the bed was comfortable. When I go back to Amsterdam I will stay here again.

We enjoyed our stay despite some tricky weather in Amsterdam in January (which was to be expected), but I imagine in the summer months with some sun it would have been really lovely.  The location wasn’t as central as we had hoped but once we got the hang of which buses to take into the centre it was fine.  We had a small issue with the heating but the hosts were quick to help us and had great communication throughout.  Overall we enjoyed our stay!

Nice and cozy stay in a beautiful neighborhood- lots of cafes and shops and parks and museums nearby.
Place was very clean and stylish!
John was very responsive. The hot tub was nice and hot after a long day of walking. Bus stop 5 minute walk.

We had a wonderful stay at the Badhuis in Amsterdam Noord. The accommodations were perfect for our family of 4 adults. The beds were super comfortable and the living room/kitchen was really cozy. Super convenient public transportation to Amsterdam Centraal was literally steps from our door. We were able to rent 4 bikes from Minne with locks and lights for a fraction of the cost of renting them elsewhere. We could easily walk to the grocery, bakery, and a coffee shop. Minne and Mike were super helpful and responsive. I would highly recommend staying here if you want to be comfy.

Quaint street, very friend staff & great location to walk to all shopping & a plethora of restaurants. Service in the restaurant/bar area was fast & friendly. We were traveling as a family of 4…mom, dad, 13 yr old boy & 11 yr old girl. Everyone had plenty of room. We didn’t spent much time in the apartment but when we did it was comfortable & pleasant. Would recommend this apartment to anyone!
Great accommodation for the price! Very steep stairs but central location and was a great deal for what it was!
Top accomodation in super central location
As described and as the published pictures. Great location for the price. Great host! Ideal apartment for families of 4 or 5.
Thanks
Spectacular views and great location!

Beautiful and fun house with a wonderful rooftop terrace. Excellent location with plenty to do nearby. Great hosts, very friendly. Would
love to return!

Très bon accueil, espaces propres
Personnel bienveillant
Merci pour le séjour
It was good
Genau das was man erwartet. Top!
Algo vuesjas las instalaciones pero limpias. Es de agradecer el detalle del café
Au top, tout le centre à côté en tramway ! Super appartement

Great location! We could walk everywhere.  The apartment was clean and quite. We couldn't have asked for better communication and the package of places to eat, sightsee, etc. was super helpful. We would definitely stay here again.
Very fun and amazing stay right near the main things to see in Amsterdam!
Cas and the reservation was seamless and we had a great experience with booking on such short notice. I loved the area the property is located at which is in a great space to walk through the city.
Francesca was very flexible and communicative, and it’s a great location!
Great Apartment you can easily take the Train of the Bus to Amsterdam Central clean rooms Easy Check in.
Lovely apartment, not far from city. The’re trams and busses nearby. Tatiana has been good at replying - and her friend who helped with check-in was really sweet. I would go back ☀️

I can only say good things about this apartment and its hosts Joost, Sanne, and Sara. I spent there a fantastic couple of days with my girlfriend. We found everything beautiful and functional. The living room is comfortable and equipped with a nice TV accompanied by sound surround speakers, and lots of natural light. The kitchen is fully equipped, and the room and bathroom are exactly what we needed to feel at home. The balcony, well, we love balconies, was also a very good add up. Back to the hosts, Sara welcomed us in the best of ways, and Sanne and Joost were always very responsive and flexible regarding our questions/needs. We may try to come back!

I cannot recommend this nocarz enough!  The location was 10/10, the atmosphere was 10/10 and the hospitality was 12/10.  We were greeted by a member of the hosts team, Thies, who helped us with our bags and gave us incredible recommendations for our stay.  The accommodations were extremely clean and the decor was absolutely beautiful.  Will definitely stay again on our next trip to Amsterdam!
Very clean and spacious place, great location
Great place to stay
Great place and location quiet but close to central city.

Heerlijk verblijf gehad in hartje De Pijp op het mooie sfeervolle plekje dat Marly heeft gecreëerd. De ideale uitvalsbasis om Amsterdam te verkennen. De etage is met veel smaak, luxe en gevoel voor detail ingericht, ik werd er helemaal gelukkig van. Met respect voor je privacy, is Marly een heel charmante & lieve gastvrouw, die graag met je meedenkt als dat nodig is, makkelijk en snel communiceert en er alles aan doet om je verblijf zo prettig mogelijk te maken. Absolute aanrader!

Nice, clean, easy to reach.
Very close to the TRAM.
Means also quite noisy at night.
The location is great I'm the middle of the museum plein and within walking distance to the city center. Everything else easy to reach with the TRAM.

What an incredible spot, even better than we had hoped! Centrally located, away from much of the business & tourism but close enough that you're minutes away by bike/ walking to cute shops/bakeries. Beautiful light and amenities, and the balcony was phenomenal. The photos did seem to need an update, as most of the furniture has been upgraded, but at the end of the day this wasn't an issue since it was a VERY comfortable space to be in. We felt like locals with a perfect condo to experience Amsterdam from.
Definitely worth every penny. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay & end to our Europe trip, Paulina!!
Had a great time at Mar’s place, it was clean, walkable, and Mar was very attentive/responsive
Middle of the city , totally fine :)
Everything was perfect . We loved the appartment. Thank you!

L'appartamento di Tafary è uno dei più begli appartamenti dove ho soggiornato ultimamente, ogni dettaglio mostrava l'amore e la cura di Tafary per questo posto.
Ho adorato la luce e la vista che si godeva dal soggiorno! Indimenticabile
M was a great host. very responsive and gave clear instructions. Also, having the metro station so close made it very easy to get to everywhere we needed to go.
Good location. Lots of great restaurants and things to do in the area, but still fairly quiet at night. Would recommend 👍🏻
Great Location if you would like to be right in the Red Light District. Easy check in and check out.

Rutger und Carla sind sehr herzliche, unkomplizierte und großzügige Gastgeber. Rutger stand vor und während unseres Aufenthaltes für Tipps und Fragen (Parken, öffentliche Verkehrsmittel) zur Verfügung. Carla stellte uns selbstgemachten Likör und Marmelade bereit, worüber wir uns sehr gefreut haben. Zudem war die ganze Wohnung wunderschön mit Blumen dekoriert.
Wir konnten die Zeit dort vollkommen genießen. Die sorgfältige und geschmackvolle Gestaltung der Wohnung hat es uns leicht gemacht, uns sofort wohl zu fühlen.
Um die Ecke befindet sich ein gutes Fischgeschäft, was wir zusammen mit der voll ausgestatteten Küche sehr geschätzt haben. Cafés, Supermärkte, der Park Frankendael und die Straßenbahnstation sind ebenfalls in unmittelbarer Nähe. Alles ist mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln sehr gut zu erreichen.
Im Garten kann man beim Frühstück herrlich die vielen Vögel beobachten. Unsere fast erwachsene Tochter hat sich im Gartenhaus sehr wohl gefühlt und so ein eigenes Reich gehabt.

We throughly enjoyed our 4 days in the apartment.  Our host, Thomas met us on arrival and went above and beyond in assisting us as we navigated how to park a car in Amsterdam, and for that, we are extremely grateful.
We really liked the stay here. Apartment is well equipped and quite spacious. Warm and clean. And great if you want to cook yourself as well.

sehr schönes Appartement in einer sauberen und ruhigen Gegend Amsterdams. Zu Fuß oder mit den Öffentlichen kommt man sehr schnell ins Zentrum. Am besten nutzt man eines der Park and Ride Parkhäuser in der Umgebung, denn in den Straßen selbst ist das Parken kaum möglich und sehr teuer. Unser Gastgeber war sehr freundlich.

Lovely little spot in a very convenient part of town.
Host Enrico was particularly helpful in sorting out our accommodation last minute.
Would definitely recommend for anyone looking just looking for a simple placetk stay!
Very nice!

Bob and Menno are excellent hosts.  They are extremely responsive, friendly, very accommodating and provided great recommendations for restaurants, where to go, information about the city, etc.  The BnB is fabulous.  It is spotless, very comfortable, full of character and the amenities that you need and more.  It’s a beautiful house on a canal and I learned about some of its history from Bob and Menno during a chat.  Location is central and convenient but on a quiet street.  Bedroom is at back of the house so very peaceful.  It’s about 15 minutes walk (with luggage) from Amsterdam Centraal with easy link to Schiphol.  It is walkable to everywhere and close to many restaurants and attractions.  There are many interesting and unique shops in the area.  It was fun to just walk around the neighbourhood, even on a rainy day!   I highly recommend  Bob and Menno and this BnB.  Just book it if you get the chance!

This space was great.  It was clean, cozy and everything was as mentioned.   The bed was really comfortable and it was quiet to sleep.  Bob & Menno were really accommodating and easy to communicate with.  The location is walkable to everything.   Don’t hesitate, just book it!
Very nice but the options to have a single bed is a little confusing as it is 2 beds pushed together. Great location and host
It was our first air b&b experience and everything went really smooth, thanks!
Sehr gute Anbindung an die Metro, kostenlose öffentliche Parkplätze vorhanden. Gastgeber sehr freundlich und antwortet schnell und hilfreich.

Our stay was very lovely in the charming neighborhood of the Pijp! The apartment was super clean and cosy, we felt at home. We arrived late in the evening so Taneisha and Ramon organized a key for us which was very easy to find. We were in touch with Taneisha who was super reactive and asked if we needed anything during our stay, providing tips on things to do in Amsterdam. We only faced a small issue with the heater and the washing machine but this was super quickly resolved thanks to Taneisha so the stay was great! Thanks again!
Lovely accommodation and in a really good part of the city. The host was lovely and really cared that everything was going well for us.
房子就在红灯区旁边，非常方便便利，而且很安静。房屋干净舒适，一次很好的体验！

Merci a Anne-Marie pour sa réactivité et sa souplesse !
Elle a gentillement accepté que nous puissions arriver avant l'heure prévu du check-in
Le quartier est très calme, reposant.
Les deux petites terrasses avec vue sur le parc sont un plus non négligeable ! Il est très agréable de rentrer dans cet appartement chaleureux et bien entretenue après une journée à arpenter les rues d'Amsterdam

Leuk verblijf gehad bij Erwin! We werden goed ontvangen. We hadden onze fietsen mee en alles was daardoor zeer makkelijk bereikbaar!
Kamer zelf was zeer proper en voorzien met alles wat we nodig hadden!
We really enjoyed our stay at Pim’s place! The apartment is very clean and exactly as described. Pim was very friendly and accommodating. We would definitely recommend staying here!

Host was very helpful, friendly and communicated well. Felt right at home on the boat. Easy walking distance to all attractions. All the amenities and great facilities. Really enjoyed sitting on the deck with a coffee in the morning watching the boats go by on the canal. Highly recommended

We had a fabulous time on Jeroen’s houseboat in Amsterdam. It’s centrally located but in a relaxed area. The boat itself is very well equipped and comfortable. We absolutely recommend this as a fantastic experience for you and your family. Our kids loved it too!

Wir waren sehr dankbar das wir bei Jeroen gebucht haben.
Ein sehr netter Mann, hat uns auch von ihm und der Geschichte des Bootes erzählt.
Die Lage ist sehr zentral & trotzdem ruhig.
Rund um ein toller Urlaub (:
Pim was a fantastic host, very responsive and flexible.  nocarz itself was very nice, exactly what is described in the listing. Great location!

I highly recommend to stay at Gina's place! I booked for my family and she was really nice and helpful with them ✨ in addition to it the location is close to the airport and city center, I definitely will stay again in my next visit :).

We stayed at Gina’s place for 2 nights and it was lovely. It’s conveniently located to bus and tram stops, no more than a 5 minute walk, which took about 15-20 minutes to get into center of Amsterdam. Gina’s place is completely private from anyone else, so even though you are staying in their home, there is separate entrance and no shared spaces. The small fridge and microwave were convenient for us to make quick heat up meals. Would recommend for anyone staying in the Amsterdam area!
Great place, nice location, amazing host.
Our stay at Dianne’s place was wonderful. It was very quiet neighborhood with great restaurants and places within a walking distance. I would definitely recommend her place.
Great stay. Lovely room. Great location. Close to a metro station. Warm good facilities.
Jill's place was very calm, cozy and private. Although a bit far, it's well connected with the bus to Amsterdam Centraal. We were very happy with everything else. Recommend.

dirk has been so kind and accomodating. He's very available for help, and he has some good recommendation. the apartment is very well placed in Amsterdam and it's very clean , easy to access and beautiful neighborhood..
I strongly recommend it
Un excellent séjour passé chez Jill, elle a été très accueillante et bienveillante envers nous. Encore un merci à elle pour ce séjour, je recommande fortement !

Dirk was friendly and welcoming. The apartment is in the perfect location. Close to the tram and metro. An easy walk to the museum quarter. Could be a bit noisy at night as close to restaurants and bars, but this was expected given the bustling and vibrant neighbourhood. The room was clean and well furnished. We appreciated the coffee machine!

Emily was super helpful and accommodating, she was responsive and her recommendations were great! The apartment was so beautiful and the bed was just wow!! Emily does ensure that you’re okay with the narrow stairs before accepting the booking, but they are quite steep and quite narrow so keep that in mind definitely still worth booking though. The location was also very convenient and plenty to do around you. If you’re a TikToker you’ll love what just across the road too - Van Stapele Koekmakerij :)

Die Lage ist perfekt! Ich liebe den Ausblick, die Häuser und die Grachten. Auch im Winter ist es wunderschön hier. Die Wohnung hat alles außer einer Küche, aber es gibt unzählige Restaurants in der Nähe, man ist mitten in der Stadt. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und kommen gerne wieder!

Schönes Apartment.
Sehr Zentral.
Würde ich jedem empfehlen:)
x
Een heerlijk weekendje gehad, dichtbij Amsterdam met de metro en een super huisje op een rustige locatie dichtbij het groen. Vriendelijk geholpen door Don. Aanrader!

Appartement très bien équipé, très lumineux, bien situé, Cédric est un hôte très accueillant, à l’écoute, réactif, qui n’hésitera pas à vous renseigner en cas de besoin.
Si je dois revenir à Amsterdam je reviendrais dans le logement sans hésité.
Je recommande.
Great apartment and a great host at a unique place to stay.
Bien placé, même si la propreté des chambres laissent à désirer (cheveux, poussières)
Cumplió con lo que necesitaba, un lugar para dormir y tomar una ducha, es fácil llegar en metro, tiene muy buena ubicación, puedes hacer muchas cosas.
A beautiful location with a very communicative host! Cleanliness could have been a little bit better, but overall would definitely want to come back!
Really cosy appartement, I loved to stay here. I recommend 100% and Stephanie is such a great host, highly available. Thank you Stephanie!

This is easily my favorite nocarz experience! My husband and I had some wonderful days at the De Hoop. It's one of those stays you wish lasted longer. We loved how peaceful it was  but still being close to the city center, which was only a short ride away on the tram. De Hoop was easy to find and easy to access, Lydia and Uhuru were at the office that day. The communication went easy and they're both warm and friendly people. De Hoop was very charming inside, clean and practical. We loved the vintage style interior, we felt at home right away. The kitchen has everything you need for simple living. A small fridge for storing some food for breakfast and lunch. The coffee maker was great and very easy to use. The bed was comfy. We loved falling asleep and waking up to the sound of the waves hitting the boat. We enjoyed sitting in the wheelhouse with our morning coffee, watching life in the peaceful harbor and looking out over the sea. This is a place we'll most definitely be back to! 🥰
Ilana answered questions very fast and she was very friendly. Her apartment was clean and easy to access. We enjoyed so much :)

The studio is small but there are large and high windows that provide space. I regret that Daniel was not more flexible as we told him a few weeks in advance that we wanted to check out on a Saturday, instead of Friday as booked, but he preferred to give priority to bookings from Friday for potential weekenders. He waited until we arrive to tell us that the studio was booked on Friday and we had a find a hotel for the last night before catching our flight.
This is not what I except from nocarz hosts and in ever had this inconvenience with nocarz.
Sikkert fint

We loved staying in the studio, which is very functional and really cozy.
Poornima and Thijs are attentive and available hosts who are there for their hosts in a very responsive way, I have rarely had hosts like them. We were able to arrange with them to drop off our luggage when we arrived early in the morning in Amsterdam.
We thank them again for everything

We stayed at Frans’s for 3 nights in July. It was absolutely wonderful. Our host was extremely responsive and very friendly. She provided us with excellent recommendations and really went the extra mile for us. Would love to come back soon!
Nice apartment in a quiet, lovely neighborhood 2km away from the center.

Me and my partner loved the apartment, out of the hustle and bustle but at the same time walking distance to both Leidseplein and Amsterdam. Perfect for the solo or couple who want to explore for a few days.

We had one week  and really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is so nice and you instantly feel at home. The hostfamily is really great and helpfull with everything. I give my best recommendation to this place.
Lovely apartment. Especially the balcony, watching life go by below. Clang of the bell on the tram. Well connected with 3 and 4 tram. But BTW the stairs are long and steep, so you get your exercise!
For us this was a great deal not because of the $ but because of the common interests we shared while talking on the Aft Deck

This was a stunning place to stay with wonderful hosts :) the cabin has everything you need for a short or longer stay and is in a great location with very quick connections to the centre. Katarina welcomed us with lots of local recommendations. You can tell lots of effort is put into making this a lovely place to stay. The cabin is tastefully furnished and very homely and clean. Would love to come again and we recommend it to anyone who wants to stay in Amsterdam! Thank you both :)
Very happy with our stay. Beautiful kabin in a beautiful neighbourhood. We were gifted some snacks “op het huis”, which was very kind. Would highly recommend this kabin.
Great place and great host. Perfect location too!

Murat's place was perfect for our group of friends. It's spacious, stylishly decorated and offers a really nice rooftop terrace.
If you are planning to stay near the city center and in a very quiet neighbourhood it's the right choice.
Checkin as well as the communication with Murat was really fast and sophisticated. I would definitely book his place again.

Great place for a family. Kids loved their own bedroom and the games. Very easy to get in and out of the city. A big enough table to all have a meal together. Adults loved the space and escaping to the roof terrace. We had lots of sunshine and a few barbecues. Highly recommended.

Beautiful little house with everything you need in a peaceful surrounding. Only 10 minutes by bike to the ferry. Krokus was easily reachable for questions.
We had a wonderful time there.

호스트는 매우친절하고 빠르게 응답해서 소통이 원활했음. 숙소는 대체적으러 청결했고 위치 또한 좋았음. 근처 볼거리 먹거리가 다양하고 도보로 이동이 가능함. 다만 숙소가 운하근처 반지하여서인지 약간의 쾌쾌한냄새와 모기, 생쥐가 돌아다녔음. 첫날 모기에 물려 잠에서 깼는데 생쥐가 침대밑에 돌아다녀서 밤새 잠을 못잠. 아침엔 거실에 이리저리 돌어다녀 빨리 숙소를 나와야했고 외출하는동안 호스트가 무비트랩을 설치해주었음. 하지만 외출후 돌아왔을땐 생쥐는 살아져있었음. 생쥐에 대해 관대하다면 이 숙소는 매우 좋은 위치와 청결함, 친절한 호스트에 대해 추천함

ג'נט היתה נחמדה מאוד ומכניסת אורחים.
על אף שסוכם צ'ק אין בשלוש בצהריים. ג'נט אפשרה לנו מראש להניח את הציוד עד אז. לשמחתינו בפועל ג'נט קיבלה אותנו אפילו מוקדם יותר אחרי שהאורחים הקודמים יצאו מוקדם :).
הדירה נחמדה ושקטה, ממש על גדות הנהר. ממוקמת בקומה ראשונה, קרוב לסופר ולטראם למרכז העיר.

Mats’ home is beautiful and in a great location that is an easy walk to explore all Amsterdam has to offer. The apartment has beautiful high ceilings and gets gorgeous light. We loved Mats’ record collection and enjoyed listening to a record and having coffee in the morning before we set out for the day.

We had a wonderful stay at Richard’s nocarz!
Perfect location everything is easy to reach and the nocarz itself was super cosy and beautiful.
I can only recommend :)

Jannette was always there  when I needed and was flexible about the arriving time, the place is quiet and easy to get there from Amsterdam Centraal,  almost only surrounding the river. The place was quiet and had no issue with any of the neighbors,  the coffee machine was great to wake up and start the daily activities.  Great host with a quiet place just 20 min circa (walking) from museums, red district and central station.
Nice place, good location, very good communication. Definitely recommend.
Very quaint. Excellent location.

Die Wohnung ist gut gelegen im Quartier De Pijp und direkt an einer Bus und Tramhaltestelle. Das Quartier ist belebt und auch bei Einheimischen beliebt. Wenn gibt alles, was es im touristischen Zentrum von Amsterdam auch gibt, nur mit weniger Touristen und deutlich günstiger. Das trifft jedoch nur bedingt auf die Wohnung zu. Es fühlte sich lieblos an und ganz klar auf den Massentourismus angepasst. Trotz Heizung war es kalt. Die Küche ist funktional, doch ist die Sauberkeit nicht auf hohen Niveau. Schmudeliges Sofa, ein Bett, das gerade mal in das Schlafzimmer passt und die Bettwäsche ist nur ein Leinentuch, das dauernd verrutscht. Ich musste zuerst auch den Abfluss der Dusche reinigen, damit das Wasser nicht überlief. Die Wohnung ist sehr ringhörig und wenn weitere Gruppen einquartiert sind neben an oder oben, das wird es sehr laut.
Sehr schön ist die Nähe zur Amstel, an der man entlang laufen kann und das Stadtzentrum so wie den Stadtrand leicht erreicht.
Excellent location with gracious host.

Unser Aufenthalt in Arnolds Wohnung war ganz toll! Die Gegend ist nett und eher ruhig, trotzdem sind einige Bars und Restaurants schnell erreichbar und mit der Bahn ist man in windeseile im Zentrum. Check-In und Kommunikation mit Arnold liefen ohne Probleme, er hat immer sehr schnell geantwortet. In der Wohnung ist alles zu finden, was man so braucht und ein schöner Ausblick auf den Hinterhof ist inklusive :-) vielen Dank, Amsterdam hat uns sehr gut gefallen!

I was searching a place near RAI Conference Centre due to trade show. Melis apartment is 20 minutes by foot from there, it is really close. Nearby tram or bus to go to the museum etc. This what I wish to highlight is firstly the host. Melis is very kind and always responding with helpful guidance. Second of all flat has spirit, it is lovely and you feel like home.

Nous avons apprécié la disponibilité de notre hôte Charlotte, toujours très réactive, l'emplacement proche du tram, des superettes et surtout un très bel appartement bien fourni. Il ne manquait rien. Tout était bien pensé et pratique. Nous avons apprécié la petite terrasse où on a profité du soleil le matin. Il y a même un parc derrière la terrasse où l'on peut entendre les oiseaux. Super. Merci Charlotte. On reviendra volontiers.
Location location location… perfect location with good restaurants, market, public transportation in walking distance.
Enjoyed my stay with my family at Ruben's home. His home was a great place for us to stay during our tour of Amsterdam. The location was awesome and Ruben was helpful. I can't wait to visit again.

It was a great holiday! The house is lovely. It is well decorated, looks exactly like the photos. Its location is not in the centre but it is very close to tram and bus - like 2 minutes - so it is very easy to go to the city centre (like 15 minutes). It was a self check-in which was very easy and smooth. The host was helpful and easy to communicate. We highly recommend this place if you visit Amsterdam! :)

Wow! What a great value and exactly what Denis’s listing said - beautiful loft, street and surrounding area, and lots to do with some personal recommendations from the host. Denis was incredibly friendly and responding whenever I needed to ask questions about the space or how to get there. Very easy check-in/check-out process. Wish I could’ve stayed longer, truly!! Thanks for an incredible experience in Amsterdam!

I had a great stay at Denis’s place!
The location was wonderful and directions to get in were very clear.
The stairs are very steep, so could be difficulty with certain luggage.
.Thanks!

Es war ein super angenehmer Aufenthalt für uns! Ich kann jedem nur empfehlen, hier ein Wochenende zu verbringen oder sogar länger! Wir haben uns direkt wie zuhause gefühlt und sind abends gern in die Unterkunft zurück gekommen um dort den Abend ausklingen zu lassen, gerade wenn es abends überall sehr voll wurde! Der Kontakt war sehr freundlich und die Kommunikation einfach! Wir werden gern wiederkommen 😍
sehr schöne Wohnung mit toller Terrasse für einen gemütlichen Abend, modernes Bad , sehr sauber. Würde gerne wieder bei Toby buchen.

It was a great, but (too) short time.
Everything was close by and easy to reach on foot.

Very friendly hosts and a great location in the center of the action. These were the only king-sized beds we had in our entire 5 week stay in Europe! Much appreciated, and very comfortable as well. The place isn't huge, but it comfortable fit four of us (two adults and two teenaged boys) and our lugggage. It is well organized so feels spacious enough. Two fully separate rooms allow privacy for each room. Everything was clean and new. Although the unit faces the street, it is quiet inside. Only the front bedroom is on the street and there are good windows, so you can hear the tram going by but it isn't too loud. There is a microwave, toaster, and fridge. The hosts were very generous in how many coffee pods they provided. There is a short steep staircase to get down, but Ronny helps with luggage. Two bathrooms is always a plus! We enjoyed our stay.

Better than anything we could have expected! Marijke was an exceptional host, providing us with not only a stunning studio, but also tips about the city, treats (such as coffee and snacks), and even two bikes for us to explore the city during our stay. It was an extremely cozy experience and I highly reccomend it.

Frederik and Marit were a lovely host easy to communicate with. The house was in a strategic position (5 min walking to the nearest metro station) , easy to get motorway, in front of the Noorder Park which for us was a super plus ,because we are traveling with our dog and daughter ☺️ !
The house was well equipped for our needs , clean and peaceful.
Frederik and Marit see you again.
Many thanks
Giuseppe

We loved this spot! Loved having the whole house to ourselves. Loved having an outdoor space that was pretty and comfortable. Loved the decor! The location was so unique. One train stop from all the action of downtown but close to a beautiful park and a great ice cream shop. We also took a walk and found a wonderful restaurant/winery! The only negative about the place would be if you had a problem with stairs...we didn't...but there are a lot of them and they are steep! All in all, we loved staying here so much!

We had an amazing time at Lieke's cozy apartment. It has a comfy bed, a bathroom with rainshower head and a balcony. The apartment is close to several public tram stations and therefore easy to travel around the city. 20 min by tram or 15€ for an Uber to get to the city center.
Lieke was very attentive and helpful during our stay, she's an amazing host. We definitely recommend this stay.
Perfect location near the center. The loft is perfect for a couple days in Amsterdam. Would definitely recommend.
We loved the place - perfect for my 13 year old son and I ….

Logement très bien situé, à l’entrée du Rembrandt Park, écrin de calme et de verdure. A 15-20min en vélo du centre ville. Nous nous sommes instantanément sentis à l’aise dans cet appartement cosy, spacieux et lumineux.
Pim s’est montré très réactif lorsque nous avions besoin de lui. Encore merci. Vivement recommandé !

Freeks Wohnung ist wunderschön und perfekt für ein Paar oder alleine. Es liegt im Erdgeschoss und ist dadurch wunderbar kühl im Sommer. Die eigene kleine private Terrasse im Innenhof ist entspannt und lädt wirklich dazu ein auch mal einen Abend da zu verbringen. Es liegt in einem süßen Viertel in einer Top Lage und super Anbindungen. Freek ist sehr lieb und hat immer schnell geantwortet. Ich würde es sofort wieder buchen!
I loved this place and had a great time relaxing. Freek is wonderful and responsive.
Very comfortable home. Host was super helpful and proactive.
Very Stylish apartment in the best nieghbourhood. highly recommend!

What a beautiful place in a beautiful area! We loved the balcony with views of the Westertoren and the city. Ivar was so pleasant and helpful and communicative. We couldn’t have been happier with our stay at Ivar’s place and hope to come again soon!
화장실이 깨끗하고 메트로 도보 5분이라 매우 편리함. 숙소 주변은 먹을데는 별로 없음. 메트로타고 시내까지 30분정도 걸림
He was a great host! He allowed us to check in early and everything was clean! The apartment is in a safe location that has local transportation readily available.

Wunderschöne und gemütliche Wohnung, bequemes Bett, gut ausgestattete Küche. Perfekt für Remote working. Es gibt einen Arbeitsplatz mit höhenverstellbaren Tisch und Monitor, gute Internet Verbindung und der Esstisch bietet genügend Platz für einen 2. Arbeitsplatz.
Die Lange ist ruhig mit der Tram oder dem Rad ist man schnell in der Innenstadt
Très bel appartement idéalement situé. Hôte accueillant et clair dans ses instructions. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour et nous reviendrons dès que possible !

Valentijn's place is a great base for exploring Amsterdam. The apartment has been renovated and is full of high-tech gadgetry. But, the most amazing thing is the private backyard. There is a ton of outdoor space with multiple seating areas, shade, and beautiful flowers. We had nice weather while we were there, so we opened the doors to the backyard to enjoy the fresh air.
Valentijn provided a booklet with all the instructions for everything in the place and a list of recommended restaurants, bars, and stores in the area. The property is very close to all of the major museums in Amsterdam, and it is also very close to Vondelpark. It was easy to walk to many places or hop on the trams to go longer distances.
When we had a question about something, the response was almost immediate and the issue was resolved right away. There's really nothing negative about this property so we highly recommend it for your next visit to Amsterdam!

Loved it. Julia is a wonderful host and we really enjoyed our stay in her beautiful home. It is cozy, wonderful furnished and just perfect for a stay in Amsterdam. We would definitely visit Julia again.

Le séjour s'est très bien passé.
Francois était très réactif et le logement était parfait.

Britt and Guido are very amazing people, lovely and very welcoming, I didn’t spend much time in the house because I was going around the city most of the time but they were very reactive and always making sure to help if I needed something.
I would absolutely recommend this place since is very close to the tram station and metro station so you can easily reach all the points of the city!
Super accueil, facile d’accès quartier paisible et agréable tram juste à côté pour aller dans le centre.

This studio was the perfect home away from home. It's great for writers or anyone looking for a little peace away from the busyness of the city. Anca and Denis are wonderful hosts, I highly recommend this space 🙂
Me and my GF were suprised how nice the Apartmant was. We are very happy that we stayed at Alinas Apartment. We can only recomende it and, for sure, we will come back again. Thank you Alina !

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt im Bed and Breakfast von Simone und Patrick! Sie waren immer gut erreichbar und sehr freundlich. Die Anbindung an das Stadtzentrum ist mit der Straßenbahn auch gut. In weniger als 10 min ist man am Hauptbahnhof.

Beautiful apartment and adorable sleeping bunk room for kids at the very top of the building with a view. Maarten personally welcomed us and saw us out upon our departure. I would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for a peaceful, neighborhood location.

As a super host myself, I know all the work goes into creating a great experience for guests. Mary Grace April go above & beyond. Their home is just lovely. All the touches are there make for a perfect stay,  yet efficiently placed so the space remains spacious. The light and views from the room are wonderful. The bathroom the bed are divine. The renovated historic home is just a few minutes' walk from the central train station, yet so quiet, I slept peacefully. True the spirit of nocarz, Mary Grace is a wonderful ambassador for Amsterdam. She was friendly and full of advice. I can't wait return and stay longer!

Ralph is an exceptional host! His apartment was one of the best I have ever visited, exactly as described and perfectly clean, situated in an ideal spot for touring Amsterdam. Ralph was always available whenever we needed his help and provided us with the best advice!! It is guaranteed that we will visit again Amsterdam and this amazing apartment!

Whole experience was great - host Marianne were not in my face like some other air bnb hosts or anything very good hosts and accommodating especially with the keys and letting me check in way earlier then the actual official check in and very clean home.

My friend and I spent three days for a girlstrip in Amsterdam and  had the perfect location in the liev amsterdam suit. The location near the Metro-Station is great! The check-in/out was easy, the room very clean and cozy. The furniture is high in quality (especially the bed) and you can see the love for details in the decoration. The hosts are super kind and helpful. Thank you, we‘ll come back.

Erwins place was lovely to stay in.
It was in a beautiful, peaceful, safe and walkable neighbourhood. Everything was as described and the kitchen was well stocked with everything you'd need. Erwin was very helpful and responsive. It was clean and modern.
An easy 10ish minute walk to the tram which takes you directly into the city.
Would definitely come back :)

We had a wonderful experience staying in this cozy apartment. Great location with lots to do and see within walking distance. Hosts were very good with communication and helped us if we had any questions. They let us check in early because we had an early flight.
There are 4 flights of very steep stairs so be mindful with luggage.

Our stay was fantastic. Our hosts Marcel and Bente were excellent and very communicative. Bente offered us a huge list of a restaurant recommendations which was super helpful. The place was clean and homely. Marcel greeted us promptly and gave us a walk through explaining the interior of the boat. The location was gorgeous and on a very quiet part of the canal but still easy access to central. Cannot recommend them enough! Thanks for everything!

Rigtig godt sted. Nemt med offentlig transport.
Gode senge, pænt indrettet, lækkert badeværelse. Fede urbane omgivelser.
Fedt område at gå på opdagelse i.
Aline er rigtig sød og imødekommende.
Wonderful and responsive host.  The place was lovely and in a great location.  I would definitely recommend this to people new to Amsterdam or returning visitors.  Thank you!!

Hermoso hospedaje, incluso mejor de lo que se ve en fotos. La habitación es súper cómoda y grande y la cama muy confortable. Tanto el baño como la habitación están muy limpios y tienen todo lo necesario. Rescato detalles como el te, el café, y las galletas en la habitación así como mapas y libros de la ciudad. Jan fué super amable y nos ayudó mucho con sus recomendaciones. Es un excelente lugar, sin dudas volveríamos.
Lovely flat in a very nice and central area
Un apartamento grande con todo lo necesario para hospedarse. En el tren se llega rápido al centro

Petit séjours dans cette belle ville .
Je remercie Jan pour l’accueil et les conseils malgré la barrière de la langue pour ma part .
Quartier très sympa , on est très vite en centre ville par le tram ( simple et propre )
Je recommande

Wish we had longer to stay. There was more to explore nearby but we were incredibly jet lagged and just needed a good sleep! Jan’s place was perfect for that as it’s self-contained & quiet & the bed is super-comfy. There is a tram almost at the door & buses one block away.
Die Unterkunft war sehr sauber, gemütlich und ruhig. Können wir nur weiterempfehlen!!

Zoe was a super organised and very helpful host - we had such a lovely time in her beautiful apartment which was on a quiet street close to a big park, lots of nice bars/cafes and trams with easy access to the centre of town. Her apartment was even nicer in real life than in the photos! We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend staying here.

We had a great time staying at Carlos and Rob’s apartment. It was perfectly located and we were able to walk almost everywhere. The apartment offered everything we needed, including excellent kitchen facilities and a comfortable lounge area.
Carlos provided all the information we needed for our trip and kept in regular contact both before and during our stay. Check-in was seamless.
We met Carlos and Rob briefly and they were both charming and helpful, suggesting good local shopping and a number of restaurants.
We would highly recommend staying in one of Carlos and Rob’s apartments.

Josje has been a very kind and welcoming host to a beautiful house in Amsterdam. The house looks even better in reallife. The check in/out was very uncompicated and easy.
I can only recommend you to visit Josje`s place.
Jan was a wonderful host and the place was perfect for our weekend in Amsterdam!

Excellent nocarz for our week of remote work in Amsterdam. Beautiful, cozy, stylish apartment that felt like a home away from home. Close to a tram stop that takes you right into the downtown area, also walkable to Sprinter train for day trips and airport transport. Lovely neighborhood with restaurants and parks nearby. Supermarket right across the street for everything you need. Lovely personal touches by the host. Highly recommended!
Ruime en gezellige woning. Ideaal voor een uitje met gezin in Amsterdam.

My stay at Tom's place was excellent, was very kind and gave us whatever we needed, his wife and son were also very kind.
Felt at peace and really comfortable in the space.

Super lovely, exactly what we needed for our stay. It’s really close to a lot of things we wanted to do/see and in a really nice area.
Beds were super comfortable, extra blankets, I felt right at home.
Thank you Heidi and Tom ❤️
Very nice place and very friendly host. Reccomend it !
Hello!! Loved the place a lot!! Quite close to everywhere and there is a beautiful park close to it! Eline was so helpful and friendly and all the process went so smoooth

Wir hatten einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt in Suzannes Haus.
Das Haus war sehr sauber,mit perfekt ausgestatteter Küche und sehr nettem Hintergärtchen.Wir haben uns von Anfang an wohl gefühlt.
Vielen Dank!
Prachtig gerenoveerd appartement. Heerlijke kaas als welkomstgeschenk en fijne communicatie. Top locatie.
Very nice!

Thank you for two days. We’ve arrived so late because of the flight problems, but Peter welcomed us. We were so happy.
We could enjoy staying! We appreciate you.

Logement très bien situé à 5 minutes à pied d'un arrêt de tramway et 20min du centre ville en transport en commun.
L'appartement se situe dans un quartier calme avec des restaurants, des bars et des supermarché à proximité.
Très bien équipé et confortable.
Je recommande vivement Kristin, hôte très réactive et sympathique.
Un lugar muy práctico, fácil de encontrar, práctico para entrar y en la zona perfecta. El lugar es todo lo que necesitas, lo básico. Muy funcional para solo llegar a dormir.

Appartamento spazioso ma non pulito bene, molta polvere, pulizia approssimativa. Mancava l'asciugacapelli e quando l'abbiamo fatto notare all'host ce ne ha subito portato uno.
Asciugamani rovinate, lenzuola con qualche macchia.

Janine's place was nice, tidy and tastefully designed.
Janine was very responsive and very helpful over the phone!
Thomas is a really great host. Friendly and attentive. The room is cute and the mattress really comfortable! We slept so good. The house was really nice and welcoming.
correspond à la description mais cher pour ce que c'est
Great experience super easy and nice!

prima verblijf gehad, mooi uitzicht over het IJ en stad en station zijn op loopafstand.
Verhuurder goed bereikbaar.
Toegangspoort is savonds onverlicht, waardoor slot niet goed te zien is.

Location is great, close walk to the main strain station and to the center.  The accommodation is very comfortable, clean and is an overall good experience. I enjoyed it a lot and would recommend the stay to anyone that wants to enjoy a different experience.
Super !
Cool apartment, great location, lovely little balcony to have a drink or two. ;) Guillaume was easy to communicate with and a very thoughtful host. Would definitely recommend staying there.
todo fue según lo esperado.
Luli is an amazing host! The place looks exactly like in photos, it’s clean and the garden balcony is a treasure! The kitchen is very well equipped and we enjoyed spending time at the apartment.
Judith & Ivo’s home was beautiful and we loved the surrounding neighborhood. Oost is a lovely place and there are so many great restaurants / shops! Highly recommend. Thank you so much :)

Billy is a great host and his flat is just wonderful. It is on the ground floor and near to public transportation or you could even enjoy a walk to the center.
Overall, it is highly recommended and I would definitely visit Billy’s place again if available.

Great apartment in a great location.
Changwei was very responsive and easy to communicate to. He ensured my check in and out were smooth and hassle free!
Apartment has everything you need.

Good base to start our Amsterdam exploration. Very close to metro station, plentiful restaurants and safe neighborhood.
Emily is a thoughtful and helpful host. Thank you for the welcome food tray to start our stay!
Grandes hostes los del hotel que te reciben
Super appartement, mais pas de chauffage un 31 décembre ce qui nous à valu d'avoir froid.

-The host was really responsive and helped us out with with any questions we had.
The apartment looked exactly how to photos were shown. Generally clean and was located in the perfect area for transport into town.
It was fantastically located and really peaceful. We genuinely loved our stay in Amsterdam, and this accommodation was a huge part of the reason for that.

mieux que la description !
Frank est un hôte parfait qui nous a spontanément envoyé plein d adresses sympa, nous a proposé de laisser nos sacs après le check-out et a toujours répondu dans l heure à nos demandes.
La maison est très grande et joliment décorée.
Elle donne surtout sur un très joli jardin et est hyper calme.
C était notre 5eme séjour à Amsterdam mais sûrement le meilleur logement.
Merci et chaudement recommandé

Lukas was a super helpful host! Really accommodating and helpful (we landed really late into Amsterdam and he made accommodations so we could still check in even though it was super late). The flat was such a wonderful find, it’s in an excellent location, and the flat itself is gorgeous.

Elske's apartment is really very nice! Perfect for a couple and well appointed. The location is away from the busy city bustle but still easy to reach the city center, on foot 30 mins, on the bus 15 mins. Check in was easy and the apartment was as described on the website.
We decided to drive to Amsterdam to also enjoy outings to the coast and other areas, but be aware parking is very expensive. We used the Park bee app, (book up front, moderate cost in a park house, but cheaper than on the road) but Elske also informed us about the park and ride which is the cheapest option, but car is further away.
In summary a great relaxing week in a beautiful city, Thanks Elske.
適合2人住宿的空間，房間內非常乾淨

The space was nice and modern but some details were definitely left out. There is no bathroom door and it is very noisy (ceiling and walls are thin). We could hear every step they made and they also have a small child and dog that sounded like they were running around all the time. They also ran the laundry all day long and the laundry room is connected to this room. This meant you could hear it running and you could also hear someone right next to our room changing the laundry.

Kimberly’s listing was the perfect place for us to stay while in Amsterdam. The apartment was centrally located within the area, as well as, very walkable to local restaurants and neighborhoods close by to Jordaan.

Romina and Koen were super hosts -- responsive, friendly, generous with recommendations, and accommodating of our travel schedule. They left coffee and wine, which were much appreciated, and reached out before our arrival to make sure we had instructions and checked in during our stay as well. In a new city, it's great to have hosts like these!
The apartment was just what we needed and the bed was roomy and comfortable. The building is in a good, safe location, an easy walk from everything we wanted to see and do, yet quiet in the evenings. Nice view of a canal and good light, with pans and supplies for light cooking.
Others have mentioned the steep and narrow stairs, which are probably typical of any traditional Dutch building. They are difficult with a large suitcase.
Thanks so much, Koen and Romina, for the stay in your charming city.

Lovely home away from home
Peaceful neighbourhood
Beautiful views
Very responsive owner
Clean and bright
Very comfortable bed
Definitely will be staying again
Muy tranquilo, bonita casa y buen sitio
David is a very warm and friendly host, felt like staying at old friend’s apartment.

Excellent emplacement
Appartement bien équipé
David très disponible et réactif

Christiana & Spyros were accommodating and welcoming hosts. Instructions on how to get to the place and what to do around Amsterdam were very detailed, insightful, and delivered in advance.
The room is small but it has everything you need and more. Everything was spotless and in mint condition. They even left us an umbrella to use, which was really nice since it was raining for most of our stay. There was a warm welcome message and a nice sweet, tasty gift (Stroopwafels). The bed is big and really soft. During our stay, we felt at home.
Christiana and Spyros warned us about the narrow and steep stairs that lead to the room. This warning should be taken seriously, but help with the baggage by our hosts was much appreciated.
The location of the room is the best part. Almost everything is within walking distance, and if you are not a walking type, tram and train stations are nearby. Tips, from our hosts, about the most interesting spots in the city were very helpful.
Central location easy to find and walkable from any place, has everything you need for private space
The hosts were very helpful, and the location was perfect!  It’s a great gateway to central Amsterdam.
o quarto é muito organizado e Spyros e Cristina são muito solícitos, sempre dispostos a ajudar. adoramos a nossa estadia!
The perfect hideaway for a trip to Amsterdam. Super close to everything, but nestled on a quiet canal side street. It’s comfy cozy, and private. The perfect trifecta!

Prakash is a great host, quick to respond and alway in a good mood.
The accommodation is as depicted and is located on the first floor. There is a living room at the ground floor along with a big bathroom on the first floor, which is great. The area has a nice shopping area and the apartment is a walking distance to the metro station.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The location was PERFECT! The smaller bedroom is not really ideal for adults though, more for children. And it took awhile to find the bathroom but it actually ended up being a funny story for us when we did locate it 😂👍🏻
This nocarz was  exactly what we needed: very nice place, good location, good price and very clear instructions from the host.

Ilse was a wonderful host - very easy to communicate with and provided a great PDF with information on the place & suggestions for restaurants and attractions. Her house was so clean, bright and open. We absolutely loved staying and will be back again!
super emplacement, appartement fidèle aux photos, très très calme, je recommande

L'appartement était super, propre, bien situé. Mario a été très accueillant et les indications ont été très claires.
Je ne peux que recommander l'appartement.
Great place, great location!

Mario was a brilliant host, responsive, welcoming with loads of knowledge of the area. The apartment is in a great spot with the canals, the red light district and amazing bars and restaurants right outside the door. The apartment has everything you need for a group/larger family stay. The place was spotless and thoughtfully designed, it was great to have access to an outdoor area and the smoking room for those that wanted it. My only tiny grumble was that one of the bedrooms doesn’t have a door. There was a privacy screen provided but it would be useful if that was in the description. All in all it was a fantastic place to stay and I highly recommend Mario as a brilliant host. Thank you!
Riks was very kind and was flexible for my check in

What a wonderful stay! Achayla’s home is a true slice of heaven. The atmosphere is peaceful and calm, making it the perfect retreat. The house is well-equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Centrally located, it offers easy access to local attractions and amenities. The beautiful garden was an absolute treat and added to the overall charm of the place. Highly recommended!

Pleasant stay at Julia and Tom’s place. Super friendly hosts, all instructions and recommendations were in great details and diverse. The location is superb if you’re looking for a cozy and tranquil area which is also close to the city center.

We loved staying in Reinout’s space. It was so cute and was the perfect location for our quick trip.Reinout was friendly and very responsive. At check in he walked us through the space and told us to contact him if we had any questions. He also provided us with some light snacks and drinks upon arrival (which was so appreciated after a long travel day).
It’s on the fourth floor and their are a lot of skinny stairs but that’s a part of the charm, I think! (When in the Netherlands!)
I would love to stay here again.

Hugo’s place was fantastic! Completely matched the description and Hugo was a great communicator . And you can’t beat the location! It is within walking distance to so many great spots but also located on a quiet street. Great stay!

Everything was perfect and as advertised. The good number and variety of restaurants in the neighborhood more than makes up for the lack of a proper kitchen i.e. no cooking facilities in the studio. All very neat and clean and the location is perfect with a good supermarket just around the corner and the RAI convention center a 5 minute walk away.

The boat was a fan-tas-tic alternative to a hotel, that all taxi, food and grocery deliveries know to find the place, which makes it a really convenient place to stay. The metro is just around the corner which is a two stop ride away from RAI and one stop away from Zuuid.
Even in winter it was easy to warm up the cabin with the portable blowers. The host was easy to communicate with and we could have some promotional material for the exhibition delivered to his address, which changed our logistics puzzle into an easy landing.
Thank you

Location for Eva’s place was so fantastic. Right on a street of shops and cafes, great home base before going on our tours. The place was clean comfortable and nice, there were some utensils etc to use but I’d say it’s perfect for a short term stay. Very responsive and would definitely recommend staying here!
As others mentioned, the old floors and walls are slightly thin with the upstairs neighbors and patrons outside, but we had no issues with it. If you’re a super light sleeper like me, bring some earplugs just in case and you’ll be golden!

The Pearl of Amsterdam sits in a super chill spot. Nearby is a 4 way tram crossing so you can easily move about Amsterdam with tap 2 pay.  Within 5 minutes walking distance, you can find Cafe Ramona, Ikaria Park, Monk’s Coffeshop, a grocery store, and a laundromat. There were several other places nearby that were always busy. Compared to City Centre it was much less congested and comfortable to explore. Oud West is a fantastic neighborhood to start your adventure in.  It’s also approximately 10 minutes by tram to the Museum District.

La casa corrispondeva alle foto, la zona molto tranquilla, il balcone è molto confortevole, e anche i mezzi di trasporto sono facilmente accessibili.
Durante il soggiorno, ho riscontrato delle note negative che non mi aspettavo di trovare per il prezzo pagato.
Schöne idylische Unterkunft gut öffentlich erreichbar. Sehr empfehlenswert
Quite possibly the best location in Amsterdam, super clean and so quiet. Highly recommend.
