One of the best nocarzs we've ever stayed in. The room was exactly as described and had some lovely personal touches. Claire and Sven were wonderful hosts and gave us great local recommendations. The location is fantastic, with easy access to the rest of the city while still being quiet and private. We would absolutely stay here again next time we're in Amsterdam.
This was my favorite nocarz stay ever.  Thanks for having me!

Hannah place was superb. She was extremely hospitable and the place was spotless. Hannah is also understanding and made me feel right at home.
Easy walk to the main areas around amsterdam as well as close to the metro and tram.
If you’re looking to get the full Amsterdam experience you have to stay on a house boat! Lady Luck was cozy and comfortable.
Everything was great. The place is an very central location. The Wi-Fi didn’t work but Tim tried to fix it. I recommend this place for a few days in AMS.
Logement confort et agréable
Room was very clean and tidy , great to have Netflix , prime available . No hesitation to use again .
le logement est super mais si vous ne parlez que français cela sera compliqué de communiquer avec Jet

Iva’s place was absolutely lovely!! She and Wouter were super friendly, very flexible, and communicative throughout our stay. The studio is super clean and feels spacious, yet cozy. It was perfect for myself, my husband, and my dachshund Piper. It’s a nice, quiet residential area off the beaten path from Amsterdam central. It’s about a 25 minute walk to the ferry or there’s a bus line as well. The ferry is free and super easy to take to central station for exploring the city! We chose to walk to the ferry every day, which was definitely doable, but also long after a day of walking around the city. However it’s super easy to hop on the bus or book an Uber if you don’t want to walk. The surrounding area is under construction and in a few years I bet it will be super, super busy there when things are built up. There are a couple nice looking restaurants nearby and a really cute coffee shop that we frequented every day (Gentle Coffee). It was a wonderful stay!! Thank you!!

Great Week-end in Caroline's house which is beautiful and very cosy! close from the city center.
Caroline was always available to assist us and share good tips of the city!
Tutto come descrizione.
Room was as described. The bathroom is outside room and easy to use. Everything worked well.
Perfect place with an amazing patio. 10/10

Caring was a lovely host. When we arrived she greated us and showed us around the place. She was kind enough to give us recommendations for the area as well.
The location is on a nice off street but a very easy 15/20 minute walk from most activities. The markets are also right down the street Sunday and Monday which was nice. The area has a lot of great food!
thank you for the lovely stay :)

Super séjour sur cette magnifique péniche! Chaque détail est incroyable, plein de charme et l’endroit très dépaysant!
Merci pour la gentillesse de Maria et à très bientôt j’espère ;)

On s y sent extrême t bien dans cet appartement et Julia est très disponible ! Avec de bons conseils, comme si on se connaissait depuis toujours. Avec mon mari, on a adoré ce week end en amoureux. On a envie d y revenir avec nos deux enfants.
Rob’s place was a really great place to stay! Very close to everything Amsterdam has to offer.
Takk for oss! Vi har hatt en herlig helg og kan absolutt anbefale hjemmet til Nicole videre.

Wards place was basic but had everything you needed ... even some treats on arrival. also Ward allowed us to check out late due to our late flight departure so that was great that we could leave our luggage behind in the morning.
Beds were very comfortable. it was a good location once you figure out the tram system. as you are above ground and can see where you are going. it is more convinent than the metro subway (which is a longer walk to the place / however faster)

We had a lovely stay in Amsterdam.
The appartement is close to public transport and you have two different supermarkets near. Check In and Check Out was super easy.
Would love to come back one day!!
very central and easy to make  your way around the city. It's very clean and everything you need is either there or close by. Host was very responsive.

Go back in time and stay in a 17th century working home. Great location, close to Centraal Station, in the oldest part of the city, with an amazing view of the immediate area. Loved every minute. Rob was very helpful with a change of check-in upon arrival. Very happy with my stay.

Frank's house is an absolute gem! The contemporary design and impeccable furnishings create a truly modern and stylish ambiance. Every corner exudes cleanliness, making the stay incredibly comfortable. The outdoor space adds a delightful touch, perfect for enjoying the surroundings.
The locations is amazing, it's a prime spot that couldn't be more ideal, with tons of things to do in the area. Convenience meets luxury in the heart of the area.
On top of that Frank is an amazing host! Super easy to communicate with, friendly and ever accommodating.
We had the best time, thank you Frank!
Super central location about 3 minutes walking to the central train station, and newly renovated!
Really great place- calm, modern interior in a great location. Helpful host. Would definitely stay again. Dankjewel!

We had a fantastic time during our stay. Without a doubt, it stands out as one of the most beautiful nocarz locations we have ever experienced. The house exudes a delightful charm, with carefully selected decorations and furniture. One of the highlights was undoubtedly the underground floor, which proved to be an absolute gem, particularly during summer.
The house's surroundings were equally remarkable. The sprawling grass area in front of the property offers an idyllic spot to soak in the natural beauty of the rural setting. The house remained conveniently close to the city, striking the perfect balance between tranquillity and accessibility.
Overall, we were very impressed with our experience here. Every aspect surpassed our expectations, from the lovely house to the thoughtfully chosen decor, the underground oasis, and the picturesque surroundings. We highly recommend this house. Thank you Valentine & Coen for having us!

We had a great stay at Cecilia’s place in Amsterdam.  It is in a wonderful neighbourhood, with lots of great restaurants, coffee shops and bars. Good metro service and good walking location. Would definitely stay here again. Cecilia was very helpful with suggestions and responded really quickly to all messages we sent. She was also very kind and let us drop our bags off early on arrival whilst the apartment was still been cleaned. Super helpful hostess.

The nocarz was so nice, it felt just like home. When we arrived, we could already see the peaceful and wonderful surroundings around the place. Max was extremely nice, friendly and totally responsive. The place was spotless and really clean which made the experience worry-free. The kitchen had all the equipment anyone could need, which made cooking at home easy for one to do. The bedrooms were lovely, comfortable and peaceful. Max told us what to try in the neighbourhood, which expanded our knowledge of where to go, where to eat, etc. The fish were nice to look at and relaxing for the brain. The place couldn’t have been better, with its simple and easy way to change the heating to juxtapose the crispy winter weather outside. The projector was in perfect condition for a movie night, and everything felt so comfortable. Lastly, I had to mention how proactive Max is, whether it’s adding an extra bed, or sending instructions to use certain stuff, he would be quick and helpful. It was superb
We can recommend the Appartement to everybody!
Goed en schoon hotel, heerlijk overnachting gehad. Top locatie in de stad en alles lekker nieuw

L alloggio di Robbert si trova in una posizione perfetta per raggiungere comodamente le principali attrazioni della città. Robbert è stato estremamente gentile e ci ha fornito tutte le indicazioni e i suggerimenti utili per vivere al meglio l'esperienza. Ci ha consentito anche di ritardare il check out in assenza di nuovi ospiti.

Nina is a great host! She is flexible and she went out of her way to accommodate us. She was very responsive to our messages via nocarz app.
Apartment is a gem, clean and fully functional, and in a great location, near many key attractions (Albert Cuyp market, canal cruise boats, Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum.) Apartment is also near many excellent restaurants including some really great Indian restaurants and one excellent Thai restaurant. Several supermarkets are also nearby. We had booked apartment far ahead because of it's location, and we were rewarded by being able to walk to everywhere we wanted to go. Also close enough to De Pijp station, bus 65 and trams for those wishing to travel further than walking distance. Apartment has great shower, excellent bed and bedding, washer/dryer combo, plenty of space and is decorated nicely including several paintings, One of our favorite places.

LOVED this nocarz. Thomas was very understanding under our scheduling circumstances. The apartment was clean, home-y, and well stocked with essentials. He also has a great book collection! We felt very comfortable and highly recommend booking this nocarz!
Such a great stay, would fully recommend staying here
It was a great location and a lovely space. The windows were big and bright and let in lots of light.
Beautiful spacious apartment. Matched the photos & description. Great location. Celene was responsive about our wait to check in & flexible about check out time.
Endroit très agréable et calme, très bon séjour avec des hôtes accueillants.
Todo muy limpio, transportes cerca, buena comunicación y el gatito nos hizo compañía. Un 10!

A magical place! We loved spending a few days here where we could easily disconnect and be in touch with nature.
The flat is super nice, comfortable and has everything you need to relax (the bed and view were the best part!). It is a few steps from the lake, so if you like swimming, you can easily do it every morning. It is also only 20 minutes from the centre of Amsterdam.
Also, the communication with Bart & Manon was very easy, the check-in was fast & smooth.
I highly recommend this place, and if we can, we will definitely come back!
Top
Logement bien situé dans un quartier agréable et fidèle aux photos
В целом комфортно, но на данный момент далеко от магазинов и кофейных заведений
Excellent location, spacious comfortable apartment, great host, close to transit lines.
In a part of town that was new to us, making it to explore the area south of the canals, while still being near downtown. The apartment was a wonderful homebase.

Birre a Super Host  - her apartment was a wonderful retreat in the peaceful outskirts of the city yet also extremely well located near many nice and interesting restaurants and shops footsteps away from the apartment.  Birre was incredibly welcoming and accommodating, always providing us excellent communication and instructions. Her very clear and regular communications we very much much appreciated to access the apartment. Birre provided very kind and generous welcoming touches inside her extremely clean and spacious place, and also provided great recommendations and neighborhood tips. The apartment has amazing natural light and spaces (top 2 floors of building), and is a wonderful location accessible to everything within a few min walk to public transport where you can be in museum and central city area within 10 minutes by tram. With so many positive aspects, I highly recommend Birre's very special apartment!
Modern location with lots of amenities.  Try the Turkish restaurant nearby.

Le logement est l'équivalent d'une chambre d'hôtel, pas très grande, c'est neuf, propre mais un peu excentré car à 15/20 mn à pied du métro pour rejoindre le centre, sinon il y a un bus qui emmène au métro
la salle de bain manque d'éléments de rangements pour poser sa trousse de toilettes et accrocher les serviettes
sinon la prestation est bonne, literie confortable, salle de bain neuve avec douche italienne
globalement la chambre est très bien
Best part of this stay was the rooftop pool/ cafe/ yoga studio!

it is a nice cozy place.
our room was relatively small but we'll equipped
access to other services (gym) is a plus
it does feel more like a hotel than someone's home but overall a nice place
you do have to cycle to city center but there is stuff to do around

Bob W Noord was a great experience, boasting all of the essentials that one might need to life comfortably in Amsterdam. The staff were incredibly responsive, check-in and check-out were incredibly easy and the studio was very comfortable. If you stay here, be prepared to learn to use Dutch public transport to access the remainder of the city. Thanks Bob W!
Very good stay, Malachi was very friendly and was very flexible with me dropping my bags off earlier than the check-in. He was proactive and very responsive for messages.
War stark, vor allem die Bettdecke +Kissen.
Cozy, clean, and a quick walk to the train stop. Would recommend for a couple trying to get away for the weekend!

very friendly and helpfull host.
the autobus stop Is 1 km to foot in a good park, that can be good for Who has no problem to walk like has. but can be a problem for Who don't like to walk a lot

We really enjoyed our stay at this modern, comfortable, clean, scenic apartment overlooking the Amstel Canal.  Great location that offered a quiet place to stay and relax outside the hustle and bustle of busy central Amsterdam.  The accommodations were perfect- spacious 2 bedrooms with separate bathroom and shower room plus large living room overlooking the canal and fully stocked kitchen made it the perfect home away from home.  John was very communicative and responsive which made our stay comfortable and easy.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat and highly recommend this gorgeous apartment to friends and family.

Easy instruction to get in the flat.
Clean flat and amazing view overlooking at the river. Collections of wine glasses you can use over the sink. John respond the message quick in 2 hours and resolved electrical issue.
Bon accueil,logement :chambre et salle de bain très bien rangée et propre,proximité métro et commerces ,environnement paisible avec canaux et   très calme on a passé un bon sejour
Endroit calme , chambre propre je recommande

We stayed for a week in the property. Everything was as advertised and host was wonderful. Nice neighborhood, walkable restaurants and cafes. Very peaceful and quiet. The espresso coffee machine and the mini fridge was a huge bonus for us!! This place has a very laid back and casual atmosphere. Exactly like the pictures. Thanks again for a great stay!!

Property was as described.  If you need to use all the bedrooms, of which there are three, be sure to let the host know.  Living, dining, kitchen area was large and clean.  We didn't make use of the backyard outdoor space is it was cold outside.
K was very friendly and flexible with check in. Helpful with directions and clear instructions.

Wonderful Stay!
Our recent stay at Anthony's house in Amsterdam was fantastic. The house was charming, well-decorated, and equipped with everything we needed. Its location was perfect for exploring the city, and Anthony, Marit, and Madeleine were gracious hosts who made us feel right at home. We highly recommend staying here for a memorable Amsterdam experience.
Thank you very much.
Willy

Ben’s apartment was ideal. In a quiet residential neighborhood with easy access to the tram #2 which went everywhere around the city. A nice little neighborhood cafe by canal.  The place was spotless and I was supplied with detailed instructions on how things work. The bathroom is tiny but clean and functional.  Definitely recommended for 1 or 2 people.
Wir waren sehr zufrieden mit der Unterkunft und mit dem Service. Gerne wieder!

This place was great to stay while visiting Amsterdam. So nice and comfortable.
You can find anything to feel like you’re home.

This was our first time being in Amsterdam and it was great to be in Alberto's apartment. Our flight was delayed for a bit and Alberto was kind enough to wait for us even though we were a bit late. The apartment was great. There is a cozy lounge area which helped us wind down after walking around all day in Amsterdam. But, to be honest, the best feature of the apartment were those two lovely cats. First of all, they were very clean and affectionate, and after a long day of walking they were the best companions to wind down with. We didn't had to do anything with their food, water or litter boxes. There is a small water fountain, an automatic feeder and their litter boxes were on the balcony. The location was also very convenient, it is a 10ish minute walk to metro and bus stations, we rented a car and there was a car park around 5 minute walk from the apartment. There's also grocery stores and restaura near the apartment. It really was a great experience and everything went smoothly.

Jacqueline’s house in North Amsterdam was perfect for us. It is a very typical small Dutch house with a narrow staircase, slanted roof, and pretty garden. It is very clean, nicely decorated, nice kitchen and bathroom.  The neighbor is pretty, quaint, and very safe. We rented bikes the whole time and biked in and out of Amsterdam easily going on the free ferry. Jacqueline was very kind, accommodating and communicative. She helped with some tips for touring the area. We loved staying there and would highly recommend her place.

Ein Super schönes Studio mit moderner Ausstattung, die Lage ist einfach perfekt.
Carien war eine tolle Gastgeberin ich komme gerne wieder :)

Carien’s place was unbelievable. My wife and I stayed for two nights because our friends live on the other side of Vondelpark. The location of the studio couldn’t have been more perfect. 5 minute walk to museums, 2 minute walk to the park, and in a picturesque neighborhood. The best aspect is the host though. Carien is proactive, communicative, and extremely helpful. There was ample coffee, chocolates, water, and all necessary household amenities. Truly appreciate everything! I would definitely stay here again and will look for it next year!

Toby is super friendly and responsive, and it is very helpful to check in with my needs even before my trip. The apartment is exactly like what it was described: very neat and tidy. Basically, everything you are looking for is included, even snacks! The location is close to bus stops and a metro station, and within 30 minutes, you get to the central station and other touristy areas. The neighborhood is quiet and very close to grocery stores.
I highly recommend this place to people who are looking for a short-term or long-term stay or who want to experience the "everyday life" experience.
great place

Un logement parfait pour un séjour parfait en amoureux. Logement placé proche d’une ligne de tram, centre-ville et aéroport facilement accessibles !
Logement lumineux, chambre et literie de qualité !
Merci encore pour le séjour ☺️
Séjour parfait emplacement parfait

Très bon contact avec Eva, très réactive et bonne communication.
L’appartement est bien aménagé et en très bon état. Bien que la rue soit calme, le quartier est très animé avec beaucoup de restaurants avec le centre restant accessible à pied. Excellente localisation!

Erik ist ein super Gastgeber. Vielen DANK für das herzliche Willkommen und die tolle Wohnung. Wir haben uns von der ersten Minute wohl gefühlt. Sehr schön eingerichtet, tolles Bad und endlich mal Betten wie Zuhause! Wir werden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen. Die Lage ist top, schöne Lokale, Bäcker und Supermarkt um die Ecke. Wir waren 3 Tage in Amsterdam und wären gerne länger geblieben. Bis zum nächsten MAL - DANKE!
Fantastic place and host! I highly recommend this stay! Nikol was very nice and communicative! You will not be disappointed!
The location of this apartment was excellent! The apartment itself was very spacious and bright. However there could definitely be more decor/art to make the space feel cosier!

Estivemos um casal e uma criança de 8 anos por 6 noites no apartamento do Anthony. Desde o primeiro contato, ele foi muito atencioso e tirou minhas dúvidas. Fomos recebidos com uma boa garrafa de vinho e um bilhete simpático. O apartamento estava muito limpo e bem equipado. O sofá foi ótimo para meu filho dormir confortavelmente todas as noites. Embora seja o apartamento que próprio Anthony mora, ele foi cuidadosamente preparado para receber hóspedes sem o desconforto de muitos itens pessoais, mas ao mesmo tempo com o benefício de ter temperos, azeite, papel higiênico, sabão e esses itens básicos que nem sempre encontramos em nocarzs.
A localização não poderia ser melhor. O bairro é muito simpático,bares e restaurantes por perto, um parque ótimo com parquinho maravilhoso quase na esquina de casa. Fácil acesso de metrô e tram. O único ponto de atenção é que o apartamento fica no terceiro andar com escada bastante íngreme, o que é comum na cidade. Adoramos e recomendamos!
Great location in terms of proximity to a station, with frequent trains into the city. Room was comfortable and warm.

Great stay at Peter’s place, it had everything we needed and the beds were so comfortable! Close to the metro too so you can get around easily. Would definitely stay again when next in Amsterdam. Thanks Peter!

We loved the place. Comfortable, cozy, just as described. Maxime is very pleasant and communication was easy. There’s a great coffee shop and deli around the corner. We walked everywhere to explore Amsterdam. Highly recommend! And looking forward to our next visit.
Thanks Maxime!

A lovely place to be, with easy metro but also easy walking pretty much everywhere. Host Jan could not be more welcoming and if asked gives excellent advice, including personal choices for first rate dining! Apartment exactly as pictured and described - even better if that is possible!

I had a 2 day conference booked at Westerpark/Gashouder. So i was looking for somewhere local to that. The place looked great and clean in the pictures. It was also local (10 minutes walk) to the conference - and the main reasons for me choosing to stay here initially. Although both Lizzy and Jesper were very responsive to my messages and very helpful with their responses. Also, whether it was knowledge of the local area or something as basic as borrowing me an adapter for charging my phone and laptop, nothing was an issue for them. They made me feel right at home with wine and chips on arrival as well as a friendly greeting! The bed was particularly comfortable and clean, which was perfect after a busy day. When I visit Amsterdam again, I will be making sure to see if they have availability first. Thanks both of you, for the hospitality and for making my trip that little bit more enjoyable.
Parfait

Wir haben jede Sekunde genossen. Branko und seine Frau sind fantastische Gastgeber und wir freuen uns schon jetzt auf unseren nächsten Besuch. Die Unterkunft war wunderschön und hochwertig eingerichtet. Tausend Dank auch nochmal für das Gastgeschenk. ❤️

Selvano was responsive and very helpful (messaged us during our stay to make sure all was good), the place was very clean, comfortable and modern, with everything you need to feel like you're living at home (including fully stocked kitchen, washing machine and dryer). The neighbourhood is great - you feel like you are away from the bustling, touristy centre, with some nice little restaurants nearby - but it is only a 10-minute walk to the 2-minute ferry ride to the Central Station and downtown. Ferry runs 24-hours and often, and provides a wonderful view of the river lights at night. Train to the airport from Central Station 10-15 minutes, so location is great. Having the back yard also a big plus (particularly for cigarette smokers, like me)
great hostal, great house
Logement très propre et très bien placé dans Amsterdam. L’hôte est très sympathique et réactive. Elle nous a donné des recommandations de restaurants et répondait rapidement a nos demandes.

The apartment was perfect for our needs. Beds were comfortable, the kitchen was well outfitted and the apartment was very clean. Amy gave us a warm welcome and answered all our questions.
Grocery shops and cafes are a ten minute walk away. We look forward to staying here again.
Le logement est très propre et bien aménagé, par contre assez loin de la gare (30min) ce qui est assez contraignant par temps de pluie.

Our second visit did not disappoint. Emi was welcoming, proactive and helpful. This is an impeccably clean series of professionally managed apartments. It’s located ten minutes’ walk from the nearest tram stop and grocery store.
Note that the layout involves a loft bedroom with steep stairs.
Stunning and extremely comfortable penthouse with very comfortable beds! Lovely kitchen with a nice espresso machine! Saved us lots of money on coffees! Thank you for a wonderful stay

Fantastic stay. Everything was great. The front desk was super helpful at all times. The only thing that was weird was the fact that I had to check in outside of nocarz. I didn't realize that would be an extra step when I booked. Other than that, it was amazing

This home is everything an nocarz should be. Clean, comfortable and homey. Marius met us for check in with a glorious spread of treats and made us feel like guests in his home. The location was close enough to the  center for easy access yet peaceful and felt like a taste of local Amsterdam. Highly recommended.

We had a great stay at the appartment, which is very nicely located. We stayed with a little baby but this was not an issue at all, they also provided necessary amenities on the spot. It is true that there were a lot of instructions sent beforehand as mentioned by others, which did in the end allow for a very smooth check-in. Everything was sparkling clean, and staff was friendly.
We had an excellent stay. The location is quiet and peaceful but walkable to everything. So relaxing to end our long days there. Jacob is amazingly friendly and helpful!

Jacob was very accommodating. He met us in person when we arrived to show us around. He checked in with us a couple of times while we were there to see if we needed anything. It was the perfect apartment for our shorter stay in Amsterdam. Great location, comfortable bed and a lovely host. We hope to return.
Super, sehr nette Gastgeberin!
Lovely apartment to explore Amsterdam from. Very clean and tidy too. Close to trams and metro to get around.

Séjour très agréable , appartement lumineux et spacieux
Notre Hôte fut très accueillant , très bonne communication du fait qu'ils habitent en dessous de l'appartement
Nous avons eu tout une liste de restaurants dans le quartier
Horaire flexible pour déposer nos valises a l'arrivée et idem pour le retour très appréciable
Proche de la station de métro Pijp 8 minutes à pied quartier paisible et appartement calme le soir
Belle expérience

On a attendu plus d’une heure pour pouvoir accéder au logement, il n’y avait pas d’eau chaude pour prendre une douche!!!
Je trouve que niveau qualité-prix cela ne correspond pas du tout!
Alles Top. Wunderschönes Apartment.

Tout était parfait !
Tant nos hôtes que le logement.
Ingrid et Hank ont été super accueillants, gentils et de très bon conseil.
Un vrai bonheur !
Dormir sur leur bateau fut une expérience géniale, à refaire.
Dommage qu'Amsterdam soit si loin !
Un grand merci encore à eux !
Great host and a very good place to stay in Amsterdam!

Hamed was super friendly!! The room felt safe and secure and was in a great location. Perfect room and bathroom with a fridge/ sink and kettle ect. Only issue was people outside kept us awake but that’s what happens in tourist areas so can’t complain. Only thing I’d note is the blinds let in a lot of light in at night so so maybe more black out blinds but other than that I’d recommend this place so much!! On top of a little shop which was really handy.

Great stay at Marco's place, I came with 2 friends of mine for the week-end.
The apartment matched the pictures and description, and as soon as we stepped in, we were pleasantly surprised to see Marco had noted a couple of adresses around town, to help us out of we didn't know our way around the city.
Beds and furniture were cozy, overall temperature in the apartment could of been a little warmer but we managed. Bathroom was clean and spatious👍
I would simply suggest to watch out for the water temperature, it can fluctuate pretty abruptly, going from cool to very hot from one second to the next (nothing alarming though)
Lastly, we also had food and drinks at our disposal in the fridge which Marco had let us dig into (I would suggest you ask him for his authorisation though just in case 😉). Netflix was also available on the TV (image and sound were crisp, loved it).
Big thanks, we'll consider coming back sometime!
We had a lovely time staying at Veronica's place. Great apartment, great location! It was also super easy to communicate with Veronica. Everything was perfect, highly recommend staying here!

We had a great time staying at Katerina's place. Great location and a perfect corner unit overlooking the canal and throngs of bikers. She was very flexible with booking and patient while we dealt with travel issues on the front and back of the stay. I would happily stay again.

Great historical appartmenent with a wonderfull view of sarphatipark. It also has a vew in the back of typicall Dutch gardens.  Excellent location, i highly  recommend the indian restaurant (surya) if you're hungry .

Emilie’s place felt spacious and in a lovely, quiet area of Amsterdam but with easy access to the tram and Metro.  The bed was comfortable and everything we needed was provided. Emilie was responsive and friendly in all communication and gave helpful ideas for her neighbourhood and the city. Loved the nearby Deguelle Bakery and Hertog’s Bakery for croissant and bread. We would definitely return to Emilie’s😊

Quiet area and lovely place. Central Amsterdam is pretty close, so you don't have to rely on a car or even bike. Parking is pretty tough as the streets are so narrow, but it's super convenient that it's right in front of the house. We were travelling with a toddler and he seemed super comfy and happy there. There also was everything we needed in the kitchen for breakfast (as we were eating outside the rest of the time). Everything was clean, communication was easy, friendly and fast. Staying in Amsterdam is pricey, so according to that, the accommodation was still a good deal. Thanks for the nice stay!
Leider keine Handtücher in der Unterkunft

Nous avons avec mon compagnon un excellent séjour chez Masha. L'appartement de Masha est très bien situé, facilement accessible, paisible et surtout très beau. Nous y reviendrons avec beaucoup de plaisir.
Sans hésité, nous vous le recommandons à 100%

Suzanne's place Is in a very good location - close enough to be able to walk to most things but still quiet at night. If you don't want to walk, there are bus and tram stops nearby. And Suzanne Is a wonderful host with lots of great advice.
Helene’s place was great!!  Walking distance to things or a short tram ride away!  Peaceful, quiet neighborhood!

Had a lovely stay. Apartment was as described. It was easy to get to the tram, metro and bus to get everywhere we wanted to go,  and it was easy to get to a local supermarket. Barry was friendly and responded promptly to messages. The large bar of chocolate and bottle of fizz was a lovely surprise.

Rutger is an attentive and knowledgeable host and has lots of local recommendations! The area is beautiful with lots of restaurants and close to many tram lines and walking distance from the train station.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Amsterdam dans le logement de Grace.
Très bien équipé et joliment décoré, un supermarché est à proximité 👍🏻
Grace est très réactive !

One of the gems on all of Amsterdam nocarz. The loft apartment has sexy, amazing lighting that gets warmer as you dim it. We also enjoyed the beautiful furniture, wide-plank floors, and stunning kitchen with marble countertops and high-end appliances. A pair of Sonos Fives was an added plus.
The upstairs terrace is a treat where you can see all of Amsterdam from your perch. Blackout window treatments in the bedroom ensure a good night’s sleep. I’m a clean freak and found nothing to complain about.
The host was very communicative and helpful. It was tough to leave!

Julia's apartment was excellent: Spacious living room, a full kitchen, two comfortable bedrooms and lots of natural light. Public transportation was very convenient, and Julia was very welcoming, responsive, and accommodating with our check-in/check-out.
Only downside to the location is that buses stop running after midnight.
Overall highly recommended.

Julie was really friendly and kind!
The room was clean and cosy (I want to specify that the bathroom is currently without a door).
The house is in the north of Amsterdam, but the center is easy to reach by public transport (20 minutes total, by bus or by metro).
The stay overall was super positive! I really recommend Julie and her room!

Goda was so responsive from the get go. A great host, her place is beautiful and clean, just like the pictures. Has 2 balconies and there’s a tram station outside with good links otherwise it’s 30/40 minute walk. I would recommend booking Goda’s place and would definitely come back to stay here.

Merci Julia !
C’était vraiment un séjour hyper agréable. Tous les éléments étaient réunis : confort, bonne localisation, hôte accueillante et serviable, propreté 😊
C’était top !
Daantje’s place is nothing less than amazing, in the middle of the Jordaan and with surprisingly great amenities!
Un superbe loft dans un superbe quartier, nous avons apprécié!

This room with bathroom is clean and uncluttered with cute decor, in a central but busy location that can get quite noisy at times.  Note it's an old building and the stairs are impressively narrow and steep esp when carrying luggage.  The hosts were great and we esp appreciated some flexibility with check-in and out, and the thoughtful touch of cookies and drinks awaiting us.  Very good value.

The apartment was perfect for us being that everything we wanted to do and see was close by with plenty of restaurants. We spent our entire stay walking everywhere. Willemijn was very responsive and provided clear instructions for check-in as well as recommending things to do and places to eat. We would definitely recommend this place and will book it again on future visits.
El hostal está bien ubicado en Amsterdam y es perfecto para viajes cortos en los que vas a estar todo el día de visita
Excesivo olor a marihuana por todo el hostel
Bente’s place was absolutely perfect for our short stay in Amsterdam! Would definitely recommend to anyone. Thank you again :)
The location was wonderful and the neighbors are lovely. There are 3 gated entries to ensure you can get inside easily. It’s quite small so tall people be mindful of knocking your noggin!!

Hosts communicated well by messaging us information early and often. They were flexible around our arrival time and offered to hold our bags if arriving early. Provided recommendations for local food. Check in was easy with host present.

とても温かく迎えてくれたホストの対応が素晴らしかったです。きめ細やかなおもてなしがあり、フルーツやパン、卵や飲み物、ヨーグルトなど、朝食用の食材も用意してくれていました。下にホストが住んでいますが、全く音も気にならない完全なプライベート空間です。窓からの景色はのどかで、遠くに馬が草を食べているのが見えました。私達は毎日NDSM埠頭まで歩き、無料のフェリーでアムステルダム中央駅へ行き、市街地を散策できました。美しい環境でリラックスしたい方におすすめです。
Tessa war
We stayed at Agustina's place over the winter holiday and loved the location and the space. Very clean and quiet. Convenient to tram lines and activities. Just perfect for our family.

Claire’s home was beautiful! A dream apartment with loads of charm and warmth! Her home is well decorated and EXTREMELY well stocked and I will forever covet her coffee machine! Bed is comfy and the couch was very cozy and comfy.  It’s well situated to use public transportation and very close to activities within the city. Close to grocery stores, restaurants and bakeries.   Claire is fantastic with communication and very helpful.  I would go back in a heartbeat!
Amazing

Absolutely loved staying at Jona’s place. It felt just like home. Jona is friendly and was flexible with check-in and check-out.
If I could rate my experience 6 stars, I would.
Inviting home right next to Vondelpark. Extremely clean - spotless.  Welcoming hosts as well :) Very comfortable stay.

Merci à Peter et toute l’équipe du Hegeraad café pour leur accueil chalereux !
Des personnes accueillantes, souriantes et serviables qui nous ont fait nous sentir chez nous comme des locaux.
Je recommande sans la moindre hésitation !

Perfect location if you want a semi-quiet place that’s still within a 5 mins walk of a bunch of coffee shops, restaurants, shops, bars, and central station. The apartment is on the second floor with steep steps and the bed is up a ladder, so make sure you’re comfortable with all of that. There’s a floor fan, and we slept with the window open since the weather was perfect. A bit expensive, but worth it to be in the middle of Amsterdam.

Lucas was a great host, very responsive and helpful. The location of the apartment is great, in a lovely neighbourhood with lots of restaurant, bar, pub, cafe recommendations from Lucas. The apartment was clean, spacious with lots of light and filled with supplies and cooking facilities. We really enjoyed our stay here.
Uns hat es sehr sehr gut gefallen.
Quiet and cozy place. We felt at home. Thank you!

Dennis’s apartment was great for a two night stay in Amsterdam, located just outside of the main city centre, around 20 minutes away, on public transport. The apartment was clean and tidy, Dennis was really helpful when we had questions and he was quick to respond. Overall I would definitely recommend this for a short stay to the city!

Staying at Bart's place was super easy and comfortable. Bart is very responsive and proactively checks if everything is going well. Key pick-up and drop-off were flexible and easy, location of the apartment is fantastic, just off of the Javastraat with plenty of great restaurants, bars and shops. Will definitely stay there again!
Gute Kommunikation und schöne, ruhige Lage der Wohnung.
metroya çok yakın temiz standart bir hotel ..fiyat performans anlamında bekle tileri karşılar ölçüde..
Leider kann man das Fenster im Zimmer nicht öffnen. Dafür läuft 24/7 die Lüftung was zum einschlafen leider echt nicht hilfreich ist.
Estuvo bueno para hospedarnos un dia.
La habitación tiene aproximadamente 10 metros , no hay  ningún tipo de ventilación ,la puerta del baño no llega hasta arriba por lo cual no hay privacidad , es muy incómoda
We had an awesome time and enjoyed it a lot. the best ist the location, it is very near to everything and the neighborhood is amazing
Estuvimos sólo una noche y estuvo bien.
Todo estuvo perfecto. Quizás un poco lejos del centro de Ámsterdam, pero con muchas opciones de transporte público y en un barrio muy agradable.
Amazing staff, great amenities, great room.
Nice rooms , close walk to everything

Appartement très lumineux, atypique et très design.
L’Accès à l’appartement par des marches très raides devrait être mentionné. Le fait que le salon ne peut pas du être assombri pour la nuit devrait être indiqué.
Accommodation was perfect and the host was very easy to communicate with

Éramos un grupo grande y fue perfecto por la cantidad de camas. Es un buen gesto tener una toalla por personas incluso nos dejaron cepillos de dientes y pasta dental.
la única pega que pondría es que habían arañas y algún que otro insecto... y no existían sábanas en algunos colchones. al igual que las fundas del edredón que era con lo que nos tapabamos no tenía pinta de haberse lavado de unos inquilinos a otros.

I stayed with adult children. Its in the centre of Amsterdam, in the red light area, which is absolutely fine. It was perfect for us, a walk from Amsterdam Central, close to bars and places to eat. They were very helpful. only downside was it was a bit noisy in the corridors.
Tutto bene. Niente di negativo.
Smooth and easy check in to a beautiful loft in a neighborhood in east Amsterdam. Would highly recommend.
Buena ubicación
Alles super, vielen Dank für den schönen Aufenthalt.

Soggiorno piacevole, camera e bagno puliti e host gentilissimi.
Zona tranquilla e vicina alla metro.
The place was great and clean, located in a lovely neighborhood with easy access to Amsterdam Centraal by tram or train. The host was very responsive and engaging.
Great cafes and restaurants, lovely neighbourhood!

Overall a great stay in a beautiful neighborhood! Our one and only complaint is the shower. It’s tiny which we didn’t mind as much as the leaking that occurred when we used it. We ended up using our towels to wipe the floor and had to ask Jasper for new towels which he kindly dropped off while we were out. Also the curtain isn’t waterproof and sticks to your skin as you’re showering which feels gross and unhygienic.

The house location is great. It was our second time in Amsterdam and it was within walking distance of our favorite places. Very clean and well equipped. We felt extremely comfortable. The host is extremely helpful. We would love to go there again.

Mike foi muito gentil e atencioso. O apartamento era completo e hospedou de maneira confortável a minha família de 4 pessoas, sendo duas crianças de 4 anos cada. A localização é muito boa, com bons lugares na região para comer e fazer compras.
Great location, friendly and responsive host, but a little noisy at night!

A beautiful townhouse/2 floors apartment with all you need. Big rooftop, well equipt kitchen for all your needs and just a 2 minute walk from the tram. I could see my self rent this place for a second time.
Thanks for letting us rent your apartment.

Esther is zeer flexibel. Doordat onze trein vertraging had, kwamen we veel later aan dan afgesproken. Dit was geen probleem.
De kamer, badkamer en gemeenschappelijke ruimte was zeer proper en opgeruimd.
Hele fijne tips gekregen voor in de buurt.
Bedankt voor het fijne verblijf!
Good location and nice sized apartment
Zeer ruim appartement met alles wat je nodig hebt voor een kort verblijf in Amsterdam.

L’appartement est placé dans un nouveau quartier très moderne et calme. Le paysage est magnifique et l’accès au centre-ville est assez simple.
Les propriétaires sont très sympathiques et accueillants.
Je reviendrai certainement lors de mon prochain séjour à Amsterdam.

De ruimte van Marlou was super fijn! Echt perfect voor als je Amsterdam wilt bezoeken met een gezin. Het huis is super sfeervol ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. Het appartement ligt loopafstand van vele winkels en restaurants. De buurt is gezellig en hip. Je bent met de tram in 5 minuten in het centrum Amsterdam.
Wij hebben een zoontje van 2 jaar oud en het was perfect voor hem😍 . Veel speelgoed en leuke kinderkamers. Ook de slaapkamers voor de ouders en de 2 badkamers zijn super goed ingericht met lekkere bedden.
Door de privé tuin heerlijk om gezellig buiten te eten.
Kortom echt een aanrader voor een verblijf in Amsterdam!
Ik zal iedereen aanraden hier te verblijven en zal zeker terugkomen😄

AP is a great host!
He is very accommodating, polite and helpful. Messages were quickly answered.
The apartment is comfortable and well equipped with household items.
We’re definitely coming back on our next Amsterdam trip!
great place to stay. about a 10mins walk to any shops but overall a great place  to stay

Located in the heart of Interlaken. Easy to walk to everything and we even walked to and from the train station (15 min.). Gorgeous little city and the apartment was great for us 5 girls traveling Europe! 😊

We had a wonderful time staying at Robin and Charlottes place over the Christmas holiday! They decorated the place with Christmas decorations and made us feel right at home! The location was exactly what we wanted and beautifully overlooked the canals. The space was beautifully decorated with lots of plants and clean of any clutter. It felt like a home away from home. They were also very responsive and great communicators!
Brilliant accommodation not too far from the city centre
Her şey çok güzeldi

If you are looking for a calm and beautiful place to stay in Amsterdam, this is a perfect choice. You can easily reach the city center by car or train or bicycle within 20 min. The apartment is very nicely designed and we all felt immediatly at home. We also got a booklet with many recommendations for activities and shops and restaurants. The larger bed is very comfortable. The second bed is big and comfortable enough, but the air got really bad up there, as there is no window. Also, there are no closets to put our clothes in, but this was not a problem for us. The bathroom is perfect, everything essential is included. One of the best things comes with the beautiful and big terrace outside the apartment. You can easily sit there with 4 people and enjoy the weather. All in all we absolutely recommend this apartment and we would love to book it the next time we come to Amsterdam!
great communication from the host, fantastic location and well kept rooms. the front door was a little hard to find and the TV didn't connect to the Wi-Fi but other than that it was great.

Great stay at Emma's flat. It is a very cosy studio, located near the popular destinations and easily accesible by cycling. Emma is a very friendly and nice host, she was always responsive, on time and with perfectly detailed instructions. I will definitely be in touch for a future trip in Amsterdam!

Matthijs and Sandi were extremely welcoming and made my friend and I feel instantly at home. The area they live in is very quiet and peaceful, with a brilliant selection of shops, bars, restaurants and cafés within easy walking distance. Their home is gorgeous. Had a wonderful stay and would stay again.
Loved the place it was really comfortable
It was decent stay

Loek and Stan welcomed us warmly and gave us a tour of the home. The location is great for quick access to some of the best restaurants and bars in the area. Plenty of shopping and close to some of the tourist areas. The home is provocatively decorated and laid out nicely. Highly recommend.
Serviço limpeza quarto 4 estrelas.
Muy bonito y muy buen precio

Notre séjour fut rapide mais qualitatif. On a beaucoup apprécié l’atmosphère de cette appartement et notre hôte a était très réactif.
Il manquait juste netflix pour nos fin de soirée 😁 et petit plus pour le marché juste à côté avec de la bonne streetfood et petit dej le matin.

Não consegui me hospedar no local, solicitei o cancelamento para o anfitrião bem antes do Check-in e mesmo assim não aceitaram o cancelamento. Não obtive reembolso e nenhuma opção para alteração da data de hospedagem, o anfitrião demora muito para responder e não de predispõe a nenhuma ajuda.
Terminei sem conseguir me hospedar e não obtive o reembolso do valore, ficando sem o dinheiro!
Très bon séjour passé chez Léonie. Je recommande fortement, l'appartement est très bien équipé, agréable et bien placé pour aller en centre-ville grâce au métro

Charlie foi muito prestativa e atenciosa
O apartamento é muito bem localizado
Sentimos falta de uma máquina de café / ou cafeteira. E a escada de acesso é muito estreita. Fora isto, tudo funcionou bem
Lugar muy bonito y cómodo, sobre avenida de fácil acceso.

Youlia was a friendly, warm and welcoming host. From the moment I arrived it felt like home right away! The place is comfortable, peaceful, and full of harmony. I would definitely love to stay here again, highly recommended!
This is a great apartment in a very convenient location. We had some issues with the hot water, which was fixed quickly. Good communication. We enjoyed our stay.

Teddie’s home was a wonderful spot to stay in the city! The apartment exceeded our expectations and was in such a peaceful location, while still being close extremely accessible to the rest of the city. Teddie was very friendly and a helpful host — our experience could not have been better!

To enjoy Amsterdam this location was perfect. Windows looking out at trams bicyclists restaraunts coffee shop the vibrancy of the city a main thoroughfare. Location location location. Giampaolo and Roberto were perfect responsive hosts.
Stayed here with my best friend, it is close to public transport and is easy to check in and check out.
Muy bonito estuvimos muy contentas

Nice modern unit , clean and well prepared for our stay. We ubered to the old  city center and prices were not bad. Location and modern amenities were great for our needs. Would definitely stay here again.
Appartement agréable, seul problème est la localisation, presque 20 minutes de marche pour atteindre le premier tram et appartement plus petit qu’en photo.
Loved staying at Annelots place. I can highly recommend it
Spacious and very comfortable apartment in a great location. Host was very friendly and helpful. Highly recommended
Ana is a great host. She has been super kind and responsive. The flat is cozy and has all the amenities. The bed is super comfortable and neighborhood is very peaceful.

I recently stayed at Tatiana´s great apartment in and had an exceptional experience. The apartment was very clean.
Tatiana was very responsive, providing helpful tips about the area and ensuring that we had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect, with easy access to restaurants, making it convenient to explore the city.
Overall, I highly recommend this nocarz to anyone looking for a cozy and enjoyable stay. I would definitely return in the future!
Freddie was extremely kind and helpful.
Great place to say and within good walking distance of public transport and good food.
非常友善的房東！
Merci pour ce superbe logement très cosy et propre.
Unsere Zeit in Pim's Unterkunft war sehr schön & gemütlich.

Laura and Max’s apartment was stunning, I have never stayed in such a beautiful apartment. The location was stunning, local restaurants were amazing and it was super close to tram stops which make getting about the city very easy.
The amenities they provided for us were more than we could have ever asked for; stunning wine glasses, plenty of cutlery and plates, full access to the kitchen; coffee machine, dishwasher and washing machine.
The flat itself was beautiful, AMAZING outdoor spaces (the roof terrace is a bit scary to get to re: the stairs, but it is so so so stunning and a very special addition to an already beautiful apartment).
It was perfectly clean, the bathroom was lovely as well.
Laura had put me in touch with a friend as they were out of the country so if anything went wrong we had someone to come and help us. Romée was super friendly and communicative too.
I could not recommend Laura and Max’s apartment enough.
La mejor opción de todas! Todo perfecto Si vuelvo a Ámsterdam es sin duda a la casa de laurel

La casa es perfecta! Tuvimos una estadía impecable todo es fantástico
Nos hicieron recomendaciones que nos sirvieron mucho. Siempre estuvieron atentos a nosotros.
La verdad es que los recomiendo 100%
La casa es hermosa, ellos son muy amables, el barrio es divino, la ubicación súper recomendable
Nos dejaron paraguas, bebidas en la heladera, y nos dejaron usar sus bicicletas.
No tengo más que palabras de agradecimiento 🥰❤️ un placer!
Excellently equipped kitchen in a charming space that had us feeling instantly at home. Accommodating hosts, quiet street and a chic neighbourhood make this a unique find.

Eva’s place was perfect for a few days in Amsterdam! The neighborhood is lovely, and the city center / museum area were both nice walks or quick public transport trips away. Her apartment was clean and light. Would definitely recommend!

Maarten’s home was very nice and it’s easy to get inside. There’s all you need in the apartment. Just not to many kitchen accessories ;)
Hope you will like it too

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à 4 dont deux enfants de 2 ans et 6 ans. L'appartement est idéalement situé dans le quartier de Jordaan, à 10 min en transport de la gare centrale d'Amsterdam.
Julia a su être très disponible avant et pendant le séjour
Je recommande vivement à tout point de vue

A cute place in a good area of the city. My reason for the poor review has to do with the wifi connection, bad smell, no washer, and lack of toilet paper. The wifi connection was terrible and I was trying to work the first couple of days of my stay so had to go elsewhere in order to work. There was a very bad smell in the kitchen area. There was only 1 roll of toilet paper left for a 6-day stay. There was no washing machine or drying rack. There were no written instructions or recommendations for the flat. The School of Life coffee/bookstore next door was awesome. Close to public transport and a great neighborhood location.

I’ve never had a host open their house with this much love, hospitality, and confidence. I was unable to make my first night, and they adjusted their lives to accommodate me, offering more than expected. Wine and local offerings to settle me in was greatly appreciated. At one point I thought they stopped the rain for us. Truly amazing hosts, they care about their guests and made me a happier person. Memories I will never forget ❤️

Nous avons ADORÉ notre séjour dans cet appartement !
Hôte très accueillant, accessible et chaleureux. Nous avons même eu le droit à de nombreuses recommandations de sa part.
Appartement agréable, cosy, un petit cocon pour les amoureux ! Très fonctionnel pour faire ces propres repas avec tout à disposition. Il n’y a eu aucun bruit extérieur venu nous déranger.
MERCI encore pour tout !

Appartement très bien situé pour découvrir la ville et ses festivités de fin d'année.
Environnement calme et beaucoup d'équipements.
Hote très sympathique et réactif !

El lugar es muy lindo, rodeado por un parque enorme, muy cerca del centro, recomendado, muy limpio.
No especifica que debes pagar adicionales por ejemplo para que te presten una toalla debes pagar 7 euros y no responden rápido, si tienes algún problema.
Déçu du logement pour un prix exorbitant
Nous avons séjour à 4 dans ce bel appartement. Tout était réunis pour passer un bon moment entre ami. L’appartement est mieux en vrai qu’en photo !
Very good and perfect for what we needed
had a great time thanks
sehr schöne wohnung. mega cooles und gemütliches sofa. auch terasse vorhanden und guter ausblick

We loved this place! As soon as you step inside you feel right at home. It’s an artsy space as the owner is a painter, it’s well decorated, clean and it just felt right. It has a beautiful kitchen and table to dine on and a big, cozy bedroom (and a few other rooms) upstairs. The bathroom was clean and spacious. The house looks just as beautiful as the pictures suggest and you’re staying in a lovely and peaceful area just outside the busy city centre with a 5-10 min. train ride in. We had a wonderful stay, thank you!
Top keuze!

Wij hebben als gezin van 4 een geweldige tijd gehad in het appartement van Afke. Zeer ruim, heel sfeervol en huiselijk. Een ideale plek voor gezin of twee stellen. Het is zelfs nog wat ruimer dan de foto’s doen vermoeden. Het is een geweldige buurt met veel gezellige restaurantjes en winkels, maar mocht je eens thuis willen eten dan is alles voorhanden. Zeer aanbevolen! Dank voor de gastvrijheid!

We had a wonderful stay, the location was perfect. The view was incredible, and while the street below is busy, the flat remained quiet. Merel was so kind and helpful, she's a wonderful host. She helped carry our bags up the three sets of stairs which was so helpful! We had possibly the best night of sleep ever, the bed was so comfortable! Highly recommend, we'll definitely be back!

I’ve stayed at many nocarzs in Amsterdam and they all were missing something - internet, loud dirty, or something. The Dutch aren’t known for their hospitality is what I’m told. However this place really does have everything! Best nocarz I’ve stayed at out of 8 in the last 3 months 🫶🏽

Amazing nocarz, exactly as described, so spacious and felt like home.
Mart was a great host, really responsive and helpful.
We had a great stay and would not hesitate to come back!
Ottima posizione per visitare la città , ambiente confortevole e tranquillo , come essere a casa in pieno stile olandese , assolutamente consignato
Great place and lovely hosts
